p: [21] jaatiko.tisahassehi ^a^P1.0001^ea^ ^a^M1.0001^ea^ ^a^V1.0001^ea^, pamaa.narahita.m hita.m.
[22] lokassa ^b^lokanaathena,^eb^ kata.m yena mahesinaa..
[21] tassa paade namassitvaa, katvaa ^b^dhammassa^eb^ ca~njali.m.
[22] ^b^sa"ngha~nca^eb^ patimaanetvaa, sabbasammaanabhaajana.m..
[21] namassanaadino ^a^V1.0002^ea^ assa, pu~n~nassa ratanattaye.
[22] pavattassaanubhaavena, chetvaa sabbe upaddave..
[21] ta.m ta.m kaara.namaagamma, desitaani jutiimataa.
[22] ^b^apa.n.nakaa^eb^diini puraa, jaatakaani mahesinaa..
[21] yaani yesu cira.m satthaa, lokanitthara.natthiko.
[22] anante bodhisambhaare, paripaacesi naayako..
[21] taani sabbaani ekajjha.m, aaropentehi sa"ngaha.m.
[22] ^b^jaataka.m^eb^ naama sa"ngiita.m, dhammasa"ngaahakehi ya.m..
[21] buddhava.msassa etassa, icchantena cira.t.thiti.m.
[22] yaacito abhigantvaana, therena ^b^atthadassinaa^eb^..
[21] asa.msa.t.thavihaare ^a^M1.0002^ea^, sadaa suddhavihaarinaa.
[22] tatheva ^b^buddhamittena,^eb^ santacittena vi~n~nunaa..
[21] mahi.msaasakava.msamhi, sambhuutena naya~n~nunaa.
[22] ^b^buddhadevena^eb^ ca tathaa, bhikkhunaa suddhabuddhinaa..
[21] mahaapurisacariyaana.m, aanubhaava.m acintiya.m.
[22] tassa vijjotayantassa, jaatakassatthava.n.nana.m..
[21] mahaavihaaravaasiina.m, vaacanaamagganissita.m.
[22] bhaasissa.m bhaasato ta.m me, saadhu ga.nhantu saadhavoti..

[03] saa ^a^V1.0003^ea^ ^a^P1.0002^ea^ panaaya.m jaatakassa atthava.n.nanaa duurenidaana.m,  aviduurenidaana.m, santikenidaananti imaani tii.ni nidaanaani dassetvaa va.n.niyamaanaa ye na.m  su.nanti, tehi samudaagamato pa.t.thaaya vi~n~naatattaa yasmaa su.t.thu vi~n~naataa naama hoti, tasmaa ta.m taani  nidaanaani dassetvaa va.n.nayissaama.

[03] tattha aadito taava tesa.m nidaanaana.m paricchedo veditabbo. diipa"nkarapaadamuulasmi~nhi  kataabhiniihaarassa mahaasattassa yaava vessantarattabhaavaa cavitvaa tusitapure nibbatti, taava pavatto  kathaamaggo ^b^duurenidaana.m^eb^ naama. tusitabhavanato pana cavitvaa yaava bodhima.n.de sabba~n~nutappatti,  taava pavatto kathaamaggo ^b^aviduurenidaana.m^eb^ naama. ^b^santikenidaana.m^eb^ pana tesu tesu .thaanesu  viharato tasmi.m tasmi.myeva .thaane labbhatiiti.

h4.p: [03] tatrida.m ^b^duurenidaana.m^eb^ naama -- ito kira kappasatasahassaadhikaana.m catunna.m asa"nkhyeyyaana.m  matthake ^b^amaravatii^eb^ naama nagara.m ahosi. tattha ^b^sumedho^eb^ naama braahma.no pa.tivasati  ubhato sujaato maatito ^a^M1.0003^ea^ ca pitito ca sa.msuddhagaha.niko yaava sattamaa kulapariva.t.taa  akkhitto anupaku.t.tho jaativaadena abhiruupo dassaniiyo paasaadiko paramaaya va.n.napokkharataaya  samannaagato. so a~n~na.m kamma.m akatvaa braahma.nasippameva ugga.nhi. tassa daharakaaleyeva  maataapitaro kaalamaka.msu. athassa raasiva.d.dhako amacco aayapotthaka.m aaharitvaa  suva.n.narajatama.nimuttaadibharite gabbhe vivaritvaa ``ettaka.m te, kumaara, maatu santaka.m, ettaka.m pitu  santaka.m, ettaka.m ayyakapayyakaana''nti yaava sattamaa kulapariva.t.taa dhana.m aacikkhitvaa ``eta.m  pa.tipajjaahii''ti aaha. sumedhapa.n.dito cintesi -- ``ima.m dhana.m sa.mharitvaa mayha.m pitupitaamahaadayo  paraloka.m gacchantaa eka.m kahaapa.nampi gahetvaa na gataa, mayaa pana gahetvaa gamanakaara.na.m kaatu.m  va.t.tatii''ti. so ra~n~no aarocetvaa nagare bheri.m caraapetvaa mahaajanassa daana.m datvaa taapasapabbajja.m  pabbaji. imassa panatthassa aavibhaavattha.m imasmi.m .thaane sumedhakathaa kathetabbaa ^a^V1.0004^ea^. saa  panesaa ki~ncaapi buddhava.mse nirantara.m aagataayeva, gaathaasambandhena pana aagatattaa na su.t.thu paaka.taa.  tasmaa ta.m antarantaraa gaathaaya sambandhadiipakehi vacanehi saddhi.m kathessaama.

p: [03] kappasatasahassaadhikaana~nhi catunna.m asa"nkhyeyyaana.m matthake dasahi saddehi avivitta.m  ``amaravatii''ti ca ``amara''nti ca laddhanaama.m nagara.m ahosi, ya.m sandhaaya buddhava.mse vutta.m --
[21] ``kappe ^a^P1.0003^ea^ ca satasahasse, caturo ca asa"nkhiye.
[27] amara.m naama nagara.m, dassaneyya.m manorama.m.
[22] dasahi saddehi avivitta.m, annapaanasamaayuta''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^dasahi saddehi avivitta^eb^nti hatthisaddena, assasaddena, rathasaddena, bherisaddena,  mudi"ngasaddena, vii.naasaddena, sammasaddena, taa.lasaddena, sa"nkhasaddena ``asnaatha, pivatha, khaadathaa''ti  dasamena saddenaati imehi dasahi saddehi avivitta.m ahosi. tesa.m pana saddaana.m ekadesameva gahetvaa  --
[21] ``hatthisadda.m ^a^M1.0004^ea^ assasadda.m, bherisa"nkharathaani ca.
[22] khaadatha pivatha ceva, annapaanena ghosita''nti.. --
[25] buddhava.mse ima.m gaatha.m vatvaa --
[21] ``nagara.m sabba"ngasampanna.m, sabbakammamupaagata.m.
[27] sattaratanasampanna.m, naanaajanasamaakula.m.
[22] samiddha.m devanagara.mva, aavaasa.m pu~n~nakammina.m..
[21] ``nagare amaravatiyaa, sumedho naama braahma.no.
[22] anekako.tisannicayo, pahuutadhanadha~n~navaa..
[21] ``ajjhaayako ^a^V1.0005^ea^ mantadharo, ti.n.na.m vedaana paaraguu.
[22] lakkha.ne itihaase ca, sadhamme paarami.m gato''ti.. -- vutta.m.

[03] athekadivasa.m so sumedhapa.n.dito uparipaasaadavaratale rahogato hutvaa palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa  nisinno cintesi -- ``punabbhave, pa.n.dita, pa.tisandhiggaha.na.m naama dukkha.m, tathaa  nibbattanibbatta.t.thaane sariirabhedana.m, aha~nca jaatidhammo jaraadhammo byaadhidhammo mara.nadhammo, eva.mbhuutena  mayaa ajaati.m ajara.m abyaadhi.m adukkha.m sukha.m siitala.m amatamahaanibbaana.m pariyesitu.m va.t.tati, avassa.m  bhavato muccitvaa nibbaanagaaminaa ekena maggena bhavitabba''nti. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``rahogato nisiiditvaa, eva.m cintesaha.m tadaa.
[22] dukkho punabbhavo naama, sariirassa ca bhedana.m..
[21] ``jaatidhammo jaraadhammo, byaadhidhammo saha.m tadaa.
[22] ajara.m amata.m khema.m, pariyesissaami nibbuti.m..
[21] ``ya.mnuunima.m puutikaaya.m, naanaaku.napapuurita.m.
[22] cha.d.dayitvaana gaccheyya.m, anapekkho anatthiko..
[21] ``atthi ^a^P1.0004^ea^ hehiti so maggo, na so sakkaa na hetuye.
[22] pariyesissaami ta.m magga.m, bhavato parimuttiyaa''ti..

[03] tato ^a^M1.0005^ea^ uttaripi eva.m cintesi -- yathaa hi loke dukkhassa pa.tipakkhabhuuta.m  sukha.m naama atthi, eva.m bhave sati tappa.tipakkhena vibhavenaapi bhavitabba.m. yathaa ca u.nhe sati  tassa vuupasamabhuuta.m siitampi atthi, eva.m raagaadiina.m aggiina.m vuupasamena nibbaanenaapi bhavitabba.m.  yathaa ca paapassa laamakassa dhammassa pa.tipakkhabhuuto kalyaa.no anavajjadhammopi atthiyeva, evameva  paapikaaya jaatiyaa sati sabbajaatikkhepanato ajaatisa"nkhaatena nibbaanenaapi bhavitabbamevaati.  tena vutta.m --
[21] ``yathaapi ^a^V1.0006^ea^ dukkhe vijjante, sukha.m naamapi vijjati.
[22] eva.m bhave vijjamaane, vibhavopi icchitabbako..
[21] ``yathaapi u.nhe vijjante, apara.m vijjati siitala.m.
[22] eva.m tividhaggi vijjante, nibbaana.m icchitabbaka.m..
[21] ``yathaapi paape vijjante, kalyaa.namapi vijjati.
[22] evameva jaati vijjante, ajaatipicchitabbaka''nti..

[03] aparampi cintesi -- yathaa naama guutharaasimhi nimuggena purisena duurato  pa~ncava.n.napadumasa~nchanna.m mahaata.laaka.m disvaa ``katarena nu kho maggena ettha gantabba''nti ta.m ta.laaka.m  gavesitu.m yutta.m. ya.m tassa agavesana.m, na so ta.laakassa doso. evameva kilesamaladhovane  amatamahaanibbaanata.laake vijjante tassa agavesana.m na amatanibbaanamahaata.laakassa doso. yathaa ca  corehi samparivaarito puriso palaayanamagge vijjamaanepi sace na palaayati, na so maggassa  doso, purisasseva doso. evameva kilesehi parivaaretvaa gahitassa purisassa vijjamaaneyeva  nibbaanagaamimhi sive magge maggassa agavesana.m naama na maggassa doso, puggalasseva doso.  yathaa ca byaadhipii.lito puriso vijjamaane byaadhitikicchake vejje sace ta.m vejja.m gavesitvaa byaadhi.m  na tikicchaapeti, na so vejjassa doso, purisasseva doso. evameva yo kilesabyaadhipii.lito  puriso kilesavuupasamamaggakovida.m vijjamaanameva aacariya.m na gavesati, tasseva doso, na  kilesavinaasakassa aacariyassaati. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``yathaa guuthagato puriso, ta.laaka.m disvaana puurita.m.
[22] na gavesati ta.m ta.laaka.m, na doso ta.laakassa so..
[21] ``eva.m ^a^M1.0006^ea^ kilesamaladhove, vijjante amatanta.le.
[22] na gavesati ta.m ta.laaka.m, na doso amatanta.le..
[21] ``yathaa ^a^P1.0005^ea^ ariihi pariruddho, vijjante gamanampathe.
[22] na palaayati so puriso, na doso a~njasassa so..
[21] ``eva.m ^a^V1.0007^ea^ kilesapariruddho, vijjamaane sive pathe.
[22] na gavesati ta.m magga.m, na doso sivama~njase..
[21] ``yathaapi byaadhito puriso, vijjamaane tikicchake.
[22] na tikicchaapeti ta.m byaadhi.m, na doso so tikicchake..
[21] ``eva.m kilesabyaadhiihi, dukkhito paripii.lito.
[22] na gavesati ta.m aacariya.m, na doso so vinaayake''ti..

[03] aparampi cintesi -- yathaa ma.n.danajaatiko puriso ka.n.the aasatta.m ku.napa.m cha.d.detvaa sukhii  gacchati, eva.m mayaapi ima.m puutikaaya.m cha.d.detvaa anapekkhena nibbaananagara.m pavisitabba.m. yathaa ca  naranaariyo ukkaarabhuumiya.m uccaarapassaava.m katvaa na ta.m uccha"ngena vaa aadaaya dasantena vaa ve.thetvaa  gacchanti, jigucchamaanaa pana anapekkhaava cha.d.detvaa gacchanti, eva.m mayaapi ima.m puutikaaya.m  anapekkhena cha.d.detvaa amata.m nibbaananagara.m pavisitu.m va.t.tati. yathaa ca naavikaa naama jajjara.m naava.m  anapekkhaa cha.d.detvaa gacchanti, eva.m ahampi ima.m navahi va.namukhehi paggharanta.m kaaya.m cha.d.detvaa  anapekkho nibbaanapura.m pavisissaami. yathaa ca puriso naanaaratanaani aadaaya corehi saddhi.m  magga.m gacchanto attano ratananaasabhayena te cha.d.detvaa khema.m magga.m ga.nhaati, eva.m ayampi karajakaayo  ratanavilopakacorasadiso. sacaaha.m ettha ta.nha.m karissaami, ariyamaggakusaladhammaratana.m me  nassissati. tasmaa mayaa ima.m corasadisa.m kaaya.m cha.d.detvaa nibbaananagara.m pavisitu.m va.t.tatiiti.  tena vutta.m --
[21] ``yathaapi ku.napa.m puriso, ka.n.the baddha.m jigucchiya.
[22] mocayitvaana gaccheyya, sukhii serii saya.mvasii..
[21] ``tathevima.m ^a^M1.0007^ea^ puutikaaya.m, naanaaku.napasa~ncaya.m.
[22] cha.d.dayitvaana gaccheyya.m, anapekkho anatthiko..
[21] ``yathaa uccaara.t.thaanamhi, kariisa.m naranaariyo.
[22] cha.d.dayitvaana gacchanti, anapekkhaa anatthikaa..
[21] ``evamevaaha.m ^a^V1.0008^ea^ ima.m kaaya.m, naanaaku.napapuurita.m.
[22] cha.d.dayitvaana gacchissa.m, vacca.m katvaa yathaa ku.ti.m..
[21] ``yathaapi jajjara.m naava.m, palugga.m udagaahini.m.
[22] saamii cha.d.detvaa gacchanti, anapekkhaa anatthikaa..
[21] ``evamevaaha.m ^a^P1.0006^ea^ ima.m kaaya.m, navacchidda.m dhuvassava.m.
[22] cha.d.dayitvaana gacchissa.m, ji.n.nanaava.mva saamikaa..
[21] ``yathaapi puriso corehi, gacchanto bha.n.damaadiya.
[22] bha.n.dacchedabhaya.m disvaa, cha.d.dayitvaana gacchati..
[21] ``evameva aya.m kaayo, mahaacorasamo viya.
[22] pahaayima.m gamissaami, kusalacchedanaabhayaa''ti..

[03] eva.m sumedhapa.n.dito naanaavidhaahi upamaahi ima.m nekkhammuupasa.mhita.m attha.m cintetvaa  sakanivesane aparimita.m bhogakkhandha.m he.t.thaa vuttanayena kapa.naddhikaadiina.m vissajjetvaa mahaadaana.m datvaa  vatthukaame ca kilesakaame ca pahaaya amaranagarato nikkhamitvaa ekakova himavante dhammika.m naama  pabbata.m nissaaya assama.m katvaa tattha pa.n.nasaala~nca ca"nkama~nca maapetvaa pa~ncahi niivara.nadosehi  vivajjita.m ``eva.m samaahite citte''tiaadinaa nayena vuttehi a.t.thahi kaara.nagu.nehi samupeta.m  abhi~n~naasa"nkhaata.m bala.m aaharitu.m tasmi.m assamapade navadosasamannaagata.m saa.taka.m pajahitvaa  dvaadasagu.nasamannaagata.m vaakaciira.m nivaasetvaa isipabbajja.m pabbaji. eva.m pabbajito  a.t.thadosasamaaki.n.na.m ta.m pa.n.nasaala.m pahaaya dasagu.nasamannaagata.m rukkhamuula.m upagantvaa sabba.m dha~n~navikati.m  pahaaya pavattaphalabhojano hutvaa nisajja.t.thaanaca"nkamanavaseneva padhaana.m padahanto sattaahabbhantareyeva a.t.thanna.m  samaapattiina.m pa~ncanna~nca abhi~n~naana.m laabhii ahosi. eva.m ta.m yathaapatthita.m abhi~n~naabala.m paapu.ni.  tena vutta.m --
[21] ``evaaha.m ^a^M1.0008^ea^ cintayitvaana, nekako.tisata.m dhana.m.
[22] naathaanaathaana.m datvaana, himavantamupaagami.m..
[21] ``himavantassaaviduure ^a^V1.0009^ea^, dhammiko naama pabbato.
[22] assamo sukato mayha.m, pa.n.nasaalaa sumaapitaa..
[21] ``ca"nkama.m tattha maapesi.m, pa~ncadosavivajjita.m.
[22] a.t.thagu.nasamupeta.m, abhi~n~naabalamaahari.m..
[21] ``saa.taka.m pajahi.m tattha, navadosamupaagata.m.
[22] vaakaciira.m nivaasesi.m, dvaadasagu.namupaagata.m..
[21] ``a.t.thadosasamaaki.n.na.m, pajahi.m pa.n.nasaalaka.m.
[22] upaagami.m rukkhamuula.m, gu.ne dasahupaagata.m..
[21] ``vaapita.m ropita.m dha~n~na.m, pajahi.m niravasesato.
[22] anekagu.nasampanna.m, pavattaphalamaadiyi.m..
[21] ``tatthappadhaana.m ^a^P1.0007^ea^ padahi.m, nisajja.t.thaanaca"nkame.
[22] abbhantaramhi sattaahe, abhi~n~naabalapaapu.ni''nti..

[03] tattha ``assamo sukato mayha.m, pa.n.nasaalaa sumaapitaa''ti imaaya paa.liyaa sumedhapa.n.ditena  assamapa.n.nasaalaaca"nkamaa sahatthaa maapitaa viya vuttaa. aya.m panettha attho -- mahaasatta.m  ``himavanta.m ajjhogaahetvaa ajja dhammika.m pabbata.m pavisissaamii''ti nikkhanta.m disvaa sakko  devaanamindo vissakammadevaputta.m aamantesi -- ``taata, aya.m sumedhapa.n.dito pabbajissaamiiti  nikkhanto, etassa vasana.t.thaana.m maapehii''ti. so tassa vacana.m sampa.ticchitvaa rama.niiya.m assama.m,  sugutta.m pa.n.nasaala.m, manorama.m ca"nkama~nca maapesi. bhagavaa pana tadaa attano pu~n~naanubhaavena nipphanna.m  ta.m assamapada.m sandhaaya saariputta, tasmi.m dhammikapabbate --
[21] ``assamo sukato mayha.m, pa.n.nasaalaa sumaapitaa.
[22] ca"nkama.m tattha maapesi.m, pa~ncadosavivajjita''nti.. --
[25] aaha ^a^V1.0010^ea^. tattha ^b^sukato mayha^eb^nti sukato mayaa. ^b^pa.n.nasaalaa  sumaapitaa^eb^ti pa.n.nacchadanasaalaapi me sumaapitaa ahosi.

[03] ^b^pa~ncadosavivajjita^eb^nti ^a^M1.0009^ea^ pa~ncime ca"nkamadosaa naama -- thaddhavisamataa,  antorukkhataa, gahanacchannataa, atisambaadhataa, ativisaalataati. thaddhavisamabhuumibhaagasmi~nhi  ca"nkame ca"nkamantassa paadaa rujjanti, pho.taa u.t.thahanti, citta.m ekagga.m na labhati, kamma.t.thaana.m vipajjati.  mudusamatale pana phaasuvihaara.m aagamma kamma.t.thaana.m sampajjati. tasmaa thaddhavisamabhuumibhaagataa eko  dosoti veditabbo. ca"nkamassa anto vaa majjhe vaa ko.tiya.m vaa rukkhe sati pamaadamaagamma  ca"nkamantassa nalaa.ta.m vaa siisa.m vaa pa.tiha~n~natiiti antorukkhataa dutiyo doso.  ti.nalataadigahanacchanne ca"nkame ca"nkamanto andhakaaravelaaya.m uragaadike paa.ne akkamitvaa vaa maareti,  tehi vaa da.t.tho dukkha.m aapajjatiiti gahanacchannataa tatiyo doso. atisambaadhe ca"nkame vitthaarato  ratanike vaa a.d.dharatanike vaa ca"nkamantassa paricchede pakkhalitvaa nakhaapi a"nguliyopi  bhijjantiiti atisambaadhataa catuttho doso. ativisaale ca"nkame ca"nkamantassa citta.m vidhaavati,  ekaggata.m na labhatiiti ativisaalataa pa~ncamo doso. puthulato pana diya.d.dharatana.m dviisu passesu  ratanamattaanuca"nkama.m diighato sa.t.thihattha.m mudutala.m samavippaki.n.navaaluka.m ca"nkama.m va.t.tati cetiyagirimhi  diipappasaadakamahindattherassa ca"nkamana.m viya, taadisa.m ta.m ahosi. tenaaha ``ca"nkama.m tattha maapesi.m,  pa~ncadosavivajjita''nti.

[03] ^b^a.t.thagu.nasamupeta^eb^nti a.t.thahi sama.nasukhehi upeta.m. a.t.thimaani sama.nasukhaani naama --  dhanadha~n~napariggahaabhaavo, anavajjapi.n.dapaatapariyesanabhaavo, nibbutapi.n.dapaatabhu~njanabhaavo, ra.t.tha.m pii.letvaa  dhanasaara.m vaa siisakahaapa.naadiini vaa ga.nhantesu raajakulesu ra.t.thapii.lanakilesaabhaavo, upakara.nesu  nicchandaraagabhaavo, coravilope nibbhayabhaavo, raajaraajamahaamattehi asa.msa.t.thabhaavo, catuusu disaasu  appa.tihatabhaavoti. ida.m vutta.m ^a^P1.0008^ea^ hoti -- yathaa tasmi.m assame vasantena sakkaa  honti imaani a.t.tha sama.nasukhaani vinditu.m, eva.m a.t.thagu.nasamupeta.m ta.m assama.m maapesinti.

[03] ^b^abhi~n~naabalamaahari^eb^nti pacchaa tasmi.m assame vasanto kasi.naparikamma.m katvaa  abhi~n~naana.m samaapattiina~nca uppaadanatthaaya aniccato dukkhato vipassana.m aarabhitvaa thaamappatta.m  vipassanaabala.m aahari.m. yathaa tasmi.m vasanto ta.m bala.m ^a^M1.0010^ea^ aaharitu.m sakkomi, eva.m ta.m  assama.m tassa abhi~n~natthaaya vipassanaabalassa anucchavika.m katvaa maapesinti attho.

[03] ^b^saa.taka.m^eb^ ^a^V1.0011^ea^ ^b^pajahi.m tattha, navadosamupaagata^eb^nti etthaaya.m anupubbikathaa --  tadaa kira ku.tile.naca"nkamaadipa.tima.n.dita.m pupphuupagaphaluupagarukkhasa~nchanna.m rama.niiya.m madhurasalilaasaya.m  apagatavaa.lamigabhi.msanakasaku.na.m pavivekakkhama.m assama.m maapetvaa ala"nkataca"nkamassa ubhosu antesu  aalambanaphalaka.m sa.mvidhaaya nisiidanatthaaya ca"nkamavemajjhe samatala.m muggava.n.nasila.m maapetvaa  antopa.n.nasaalaaya.m ja.taama.n.dalavaakaciiratida.n.daku.n.dikaadike taapasaparikkhaare, ma.n.dape  paaniiyagha.tapaaniiyasa"nkhapaaniiyasaraavaani, aggisaalaaya.m a"ngaarakapalladaaruaadiiniiti eva.m ya.m ya.m  pabbajitaana.m upakaaraaya sa.mvattati, ta.m ta.m sabba.m maapetvaa pa.n.nasaalaaya bhittiya.m ``ye keci  pabbajitukaamaa ime parikkhaare gahetvaa pabbajantuu''ti akkharaani chinditvaa devalokameva gate  vissakammadevaputte sumedhapa.n.dito himavantapabbatapaade girikandaraanusaarena attano nivaasaanuruupa.m  phaasuka.t.thaana.m olokento nadiinivattane vissakammanimmita.m sakkadattiya.m rama.niiya.m assama.m disvaa  ca"nkamanako.ti.m gantvaa padavala~nja.m apassanto ``dhuva.m pabbajitaa dhuragaame bhikkha.m pariyesitvaa  kilantaruupaa aagantvaa pa.n.nasaala.m pavisitvaa nisinnaa bhavissantii''ti cintetvaa thoka.m aagametvaa  ``ativiya ciraayanti, jaanissaamii''ti pa.n.naasaalaaku.tidvaara.m vivaritvaa anto pavisitvaa ito  cito ca olokento mahaabhittiya.m akkharaani vaacetvaa ``mayha.m kappiyaparikkhaaraa ete, ime  gahetvaa pabbajissaamii''ti attano nivatthapaaruta.m saa.takayuga.m pajahi. tenaaha ``saa.taka.m pajahi.m  tatthaa''ti. eva.m pavi.t.tho aha.m, saariputta, tassa.m pa.n.nasaalaaya.m saa.taka.m pajahi.m.

[03] ^b^navadosamupaagata^eb^nti saa.taka.m pajahanto nava dose disvaa pajahinti diipeti.  taapasapabbajja.m pabbajitaana~nhi saa.takasmi.m nava dosaa upa.t.thahanti. tesu tassa mahagghabhaavo eko  doso, parapa.tibaddhataaya uppajjanabhaavo eko, paribhogena lahu.m kilissanabhaavo eko. kili.t.tho  hi dhovitabbo ca rajitabbo ca hoti. paribhogena jiira.nabhaavo eko. ji.n.nassa hi tunna.m vaa  agga.ladaana.m vaa kaatabba.m hoti ^a^M1.0011^ea^. puna pariyesanaaya durabhisambhavabhaavo eko,  taapasapabbajjaaya asaaruppabhaavo eko, paccatthikaana.m saadhaara.nabhaavo eko. yathaa hi na.m paccatthikaa  na ga.nhanti, eva.m gopetabbo hoti. paribhu~njantassa vibhuusana.t.thaanabhaavo eko, gahetvaa vicarantassa  khandhabhaaramahicchabhaavo ekoti.

[03] ^b^vaakaciira.m nivaasesi^eb^nti tadaaha.m, saariputta, ime nava dose disvaa saa.taka.m pahaaya  vaakaciira.m nivaasesi.m, mu~njati.na.m ^a^P1.0009^ea^ hiira.m hiira.m katvaa ganthetvaa katavaakaciira.m  nivaasanapaarupanatthaaya aadiyinti attho.

[03] ^b^dvaadasagu.namupaagata^eb^nti ^a^V1.0012^ea^ dvaadasahi aanisa.msehi samannaagata.m.  vaakaciirasmi~nhi dvaadasa aanisa.msaa -- appaggha.m sundara.m kappiyanti aya.m taava eko aanisa.mso,  sahatthaa kaatu.m sakkaati aya.m dutiyo, paribhogena sa.nika.m kilissati, dhoviyamaanepi papa~nco  natthiiti aya.m tatiyo, paribhogena ji.n.nepi sibbitabbaabhaavo catuttho, puna pariyesantassa sukhena  kara.nabhaavo pa~ncamo, taapasapabbajjaaya saaruppabhaavo cha.t.tho, paccatthikaana.m nirupabhogabhaavo sattamo,  paribhu~njantassa vibhuusana.t.thaanaabhaavo a.t.thamo, dhaara.ne sallahukabhaavo navamo, ciivarapaccaye appicchabhaavo  dasamo, vaakuppattiyaa dhammikaanavajjabhaavo ekaadasamo, vaakaciire na.t.thepi anapekkhabhaavo  dvaadasamoti.

[03] ^b^a.t.thadosasamaaki.n.na.m, pajahi.m pa.n.nasaalaka^eb^nti. katha.m pajahi? so kira varasaa.takayuga.m  omu~ncitvaa ciivarava.mse laggita.m anojapupphadaamasadisa.m ratta.m vaakaciira.m gahetvaa nivaasetvaa, tassuupari  apara.m suva.n.nava.n.na.m vaakaciira.m paridahitvaa, punnaagapupphasantharasadisa.m sakhura.m ajinacamma.m eka.msa.m katvaa  ja.taama.n.dala.m pa.timu~ncitvaa cuu.laaya saddhi.m niccalabhaavakara.nattha.m saarasuuci.m pavesetvaa muttajaalasadisaaya  sikkaaya pavaa.lava.n.na.m ku.n.dika.m odahitvaa tiisu .thaanesu va"nkakaaja.m aadaaya ekissaa kaajako.tiyaa  ku.n.dika.m, ekissaa a"nkusapacchitida.n.dakaadiini olaggetvaa khaaribhaara.m a.mse katvaa, dakkhi.nena  hatthena kattarada.n.da.m gahetvaa pa.n.nasaalato nikkhamitvaa sa.t.thihatthe mahaaca"nkame aparaapara.m ca"nkamanto  attano vesa.m oloketvaa -- ``mayha.m manoratho matthaka.m patto, sobhati vata me pabbajjaa,  buddhapaccekabuddhaadiihi sabbehi dhiirapurisehi va.n.nitaa thomitaa ^a^M1.0012^ea^ aya.m pabbajjaa naama,  pahiina.m me gihibandhana.m, nikkhantosmi nekkhamma.m, laddhaa me uttamapabbajjaa, karissaami sama.nadhamma.m,  labhissaami maggaphalasukha''nti ussaahajaato khaarikaaja.m otaaretvaa ca"nkamavemajjhe  muggava.n.nasilaapa.t.te suva.n.napa.timaa viya nisinno divasabhaaga.m viitinaametvaa saayanhasamaya.m pa.n.nasaala.m  pavisitvaa, bidalama~ncakapasse ka.t.thattharikaaya nipanno sariira.m utu.m gaahaapetvaa, balavapaccuuse  pabujjhitvaa attano aagamana.m aavajjesi ``aha.m gharaavaase aadiinava.m disvaa amitabhoga.m anantayasa.m  pahaaya ara~n~na.m pavisitvaa nekkhammagavesako hutvaa pabbajito, ito daani pa.t.thaaya pamaadacaara.m caritu.m  na va.t.tati.

[03] paviveka~nhi pahaaya vicaranta.m micchaavitakkamakkhikaa khaadanti, idaani mayaa vivekamanubruuhetu.m  va.t.tati. aha~nhi gharaavaasa.m palibodhato disvaa nikkhanto, aya~nca manaapaa pa.n.nasaalaa,  beluvapakkava.n.naparibha.n.dakataa bhuumi, rajatava.n.naa setabhittiyo, kapotapaadava.n.na.m pa.n.nacchadana.m  ^a^V1.0013^ea^, vicittatthara.nava.n.no bidalama~ncako, nivaasaphaasuka.m vasana.t.thaana.m, na etto atirekataraa  viya me gehasampadaa pa~n~naayatii''ti pa.n.nasaalaaya dose vicinanto a.t.tha dose passi.

[03] pa.n.nasaalaaparibhogasmi~nhi a.t.tha aadiinavaa -- mahaasamaarambhena dabbasambhaare samodhaanetvaa  kara.napariyesanabhaavo eko aadiinavo, ti.napa.n.namattikaasu patitaasu taasa.m ^a^P1.0010^ea^ punappuna.m  .thapetabbataaya nibandhajagganabhaavo dutiyo, senaasana.m naama mahallakassa paapu.naati, avelaaya  vu.t.thaapiyamaanassa cittekaggataa na hotiiti u.t.thaapaniyabhaavo tatiyo, siitu.nhapa.tighaatena kaayassa  sukhumaalakara.nabhaavo catuttho, geha.m pavi.t.thena ya.mki~nci paapa.m sakkaa kaatunti garahaapa.ticchaadanabhaavo  pa~ncamo, ``mayha''nti pariggahakara.nabhaavo cha.t.tho, gehassa atthibhaavo naama sadutiyakavaasoti  sattamo, uukaama"ngulagharago.likaadiina.m saadhaara.nataaya bahusaadhaara.nabhaavo a.t.thamo. iti ime a.t.tha  aadiinave disvaa mahaasatto pa.n.nasaala.m pajati. tenaaha ``a.t.thadosasamaaki.n.na.m, pajahi.m  pa.n.nasaalaka''nti.

[03] ^b^upaagami.m rukkhamuula.m, gu.ne dasahupaagata^eb^nti channa.m pa.tikkhipitvaa dasahi gu.nehi upeta.m  rukkhamuula.m upagatosmiiti vadati. tatrime dasa gu.naa -- appasamaarambhataa eko gu.no,  upagamanamattakameva hi tattha hoti; apa.tijagganataa ^a^M1.0013^ea^ dutiyo, ta~nhi samma.t.thampi  asamma.t.thampi paribhogaphaasuka.m hotiyeva. anu.t.thaapariyabhaavo tatiyo, garaha.m nappa.ticchaadeti; tattha  hi paapa.m karonto lajjatiiti garahaaya appa.ticchannabhaavo catuttho; abbhokaasavaaso viya kaaya.m na  santhambhetiiti kaayassa asanthambhanabhaavo pa~ncamo; pariggahakara.naabhaavo cha.t.tho; gehaalayapa.tikkhepo  sattamo; bahusaadhaara.nagehe viya ``pa.tijaggissaami na.m, nikkhamathaa''ti niihara.nakaabhaavo a.t.thamo;  vasantassa sappiitikabhaavo navamo; rukkhamuulasenaasanassa gatagata.t.thaane sulabhataaya anapekkhabhaavo  dasamoti ime dasa gu.ne disvaa rukkhamuula.m upaagatosmiiti vadati.

[03] imaani ettakaani kaara.naani sallakkhetvaa mahaasatto punadivase bhikkhaaya gaama.m paavisi.  athassa sampattagaame manussaa mahantena ussaahena bhikkha.m ada.msu. so bhattakicca.m ni.t.thaapetvaa  assama.m aagamma nisiiditvaa cintesi ``naaha.m aahaara.m na labhaamiiti pabbajito, siniddhaahaaro  naamesa maanamadapurisamade va.d.dheti, aahaaramuulakassa ca dukkhassa anto natthi. ya.mnuunaaha.m  vaapitaropitadha~n~nanibbatta.m aahaara.m pajahitvaa pavattaphalabhojano bhaveyya''nti. so tato  ^a^V1.0014^ea^ .t.thaaya tathaa katvaa gha.tento vaayamanto sattaahabbhantareyeva a.t.tha samaapattiyo pa~nca  abhi~n~naayo ca nibbattesi. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``vaapita.m ropita.m dha~n~na.m, pajahi.m niravasesato.
[22] anekagu.nasampanna.m, pavattaphalamaadiyi.m..
[21] ``tatthappadhaana.m padahi.m, nisajja.t.thaanaca"nkame.
[22] abbhantaramhi sattaahe, abhi~n~naabalapaapu.ni''nti..

[03] eva.m abhi~n~naabala.m patvaa sumedhataapase samaapattisukhena viitinaamente diipa"nkaro naama satthaa  loke udapaadi. tassa pa.tisandhijaatisambodhidhammacakkappavattanesu sakalaapi dasasahassii lokadhaatu  sa.mkampi ^a^P1.0011^ea^ sampakampi sampavedhi, mahaavirava.m viravi, dvatti.msa pubbanimittaani  paaturahesu.m. sumedhataapaso samaapattisukhena viitinaamento neva ta.m saddamassosi, na taani  nimittaani addasa. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``eva.m ^a^M1.0014^ea^ me siddhippattassa, vasiibhuutassa saasane.
[22] diipa"nkaro naama jino, uppajji lokanaayako..
[21] ``uppajjante ca jaayante, bujjhante dhammadesane.
[22] caturo nimitte naaddasa.m, jhaanaratisamappito''ti..

[03] tasmi.m kaale diipa"nkaradasabalo catuuhi khii.naasavasatasahassehi parivuto anupubbena caarika.m  caramaano ramma.m naama nagara.m patvaa sudassanamahaavihaare pa.tivasati. rammanagaravaasino ``diipa"nkaro  kira sama.nissaro paramaatisambodhi.m patvaa pavattavaradhammacakko anupubbena caarika.m caramaano  rammanagara.m patvaa sudassanamahaavihaare pa.tivasatii''ti sutvaa sappinavaniitaadiini ceva bhesajjaani  vatthacchaadanaani ca gaahaapetvaa gandhamaalaadihatthaa yena buddho, yena dhammo, yena sa"ngho, tanninnaa  tappo.naa tappabbhaaraa hutvaa satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa vanditvaa gandhamaalaadiihi puujetvaa ekamanta.m  nisinnaa dhammadesana.m sutvaa svaatanaaya nimantetvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkami.msu.

[03] te punadivase mahaadaana.m sajjetvaa nagara.m ala"nkaritvaa dasabalassa aagamanamagga.m ala"nkarontaa  ^a^V1.0015^ea^ udakabhinna.t.thaanesu pa.msu.m pakkhipitvaa sama.m bhuumitala.m katvaa rajatapa.t.tava.n.na.m vaaluka.m  aakiranti, laajaani ceva pupphaani ca vikiranti, naanaaviraagehi vatthehi dhajapa.taake ussaapenti,  kadaliyo ceva pu.n.nagha.tapantiyo ca pati.t.thaapenti. tasmi.m kaale sumedhataapaso attano assamapadaa  uggantvaa tesa.m manussaana.m uparibhaagena aakaasena gacchanto te ha.t.thatu.t.the manusse disvaa ``ki.m nu  kho kaara.na''nti aakaasato oruyha ekamanta.m .thito manusse pucchi -- ``ambho kassa tumhe ima.m  magga.m ala"nkarothaa''ti? tena vutta.m --
[21] ``paccantadesavisaye, nimantetvaa tathaagata.m.
[22] tassa aagamana.m magga.m, sodhenti tu.t.thamaanasaa..
[21] ``aha.m tena samayena, nikkhamitvaa sakassamaa.
[22] dhunanto vaakaciiraani, gacchaami ambare tadaa..
[21] ``vedajaata.m jana.m disvaa, tu.t.thaha.t.tha.m pamodita.m.
[22] orohitvaana gaganaa, manusse pucchi taavade..
[21] ```tu.t.thaha.t.tho ^a^P1.0012^ea^ ^a^M1.0015^ea^ pamudito, vedajaato mahaajano.
[22] kassa sodhiiyati maggo, a~njasa.m va.tumaayana'''nti..

[03] manussaa aaha.msu ``bhante sumedha, na tva.m jaanaasi, diipa"nkaradasabalo sammaasambodhi.m patvaa  pavattitavaradhammacakko caarika.m caramaano amhaaka.m nagara.m patvaa sudassanamahaavihaare pa.tivasati. maya.m  ta.m bhagavanta.m nimantayimhaa, tasseta.m buddhassa bhagavato aagamanamagga.m ala"nkaromaa''ti. sumedhataapaso  cintesi -- ``buddhoti kho ghosamattakampi loke dullabha.m, pageva buddhuppaado, mayaapi imehi  manussehi saddhi.m dasabalassa magga.m ala"nkaritu.m va.t.tatii''ti. so te manusse aaha -- ``sace bho  tumhe eta.m magga.m buddhassa ala"nkarotha, mayhampi eka.m okaasa.m detha, ahampi tumhehi saddhi.m magga.m  ala"nkarissaamii''ti. te ``saadhuu''ti sampa.ticchitvaa ``sumedhataapaso iddhimaa''ti jaanantaa  udakabhinnokaasa.m sallakkhetvaa ``tva.m ima.m .thaana.m ala"nkarohii''ti ada.msu. sumedho buddhaaramma.na.m piiti.m  gahetvaa cintesi ``aha.m ima.m okaasa.m iddhiyaa ala"nkaritu.m sakkomi, eva.m ala"nkato pana mama mana.m  na paritosessati, ajja mayaa kaayaveyyaavacca.m kaatu.m va.t.tatii''ti pa.msu.m aaharitvaa tasmi.m padese  pakkhipi.

[03] tassa ^a^V1.0016^ea^ tasmi.m padese anala"nkateyeva diipa"nkaro dasabalo mahaanubhaavaana.m  cha.labhi~n~naana.m khii.naasavaana.m catuuhi satasahassehi parivuto devataasu dibbagandhamaalaadiihi puujayantiisu  dibbasa"ngiitesu pavattantesu manussesu maanusakagandhehi ceva maalaadiihi ca puujayantesu anantaaya  buddhalii.laaya manosilaatale vijambhamaano siiho viya ta.m ala"nkatapa.tiyatta.m magga.m pa.tipajji.  sumedhataapaso akkhiini ummiiletvaa ala"nkatamaggena aagacchantassa dasabalassa  dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.napa.tima.n.dita.m asiitiyaa anubya~njanehi anura~njita.m byaamappabhaaya samparivaarita.m  ma.niva.n.nagaganatale naanappakaaraa vijjulataa viya aave.laave.labhuutaa ceva yugalayugalabhuutaa ca  chabba.n.naghanabuddharasmiyo vissajjenta.m ruupaggappatta.m attabhaava.m oloketvaa ``ajja mayaa dasabalassa  jiivitapariccaaga.m kaatu.m va.t.tati, maa bhagavaa kalala.m akkami, ma.niphalakasetu.m pana akkamanto viya  saddhi.m catuuhi khii.naasavasatasahassehi mama pi.t.thi.m maddamaano gacchatu, ta.m me ^a^M1.0016^ea^  bhavissati diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa''ti kese mocetvaa ajinacammaja.taama.n.dalavaakaciiraani ^a^P1.0013^ea^  kaa.lava.n.ne kalale pattharitvaa ma.niphalakasetu viya kalalapi.t.the nipajji. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``te me pu.t.thaa viyaaka.msu, `buddho loke anuttaro.
[27] diipa"nkaro naama jino, uppajji lokanaayako.
[22] tassa sodhiiyati maggo, a~njasa.m va.tumaayana.m'..
[21] ``buddhoti mama sutvaana, piiti uppajji taavade.
[22] buddho buddhoti kathayanto, somanassa.m pavedayi.m..
[21] ``tattha .thatvaa vicintesi.m, tu.t.tho sa.mviggamaanaso.
[22] `idha biijaani ropissa.m, kha.no eva maa upaccagaa'..
[21] ``yadi buddhassa sodhetha, ekokaasa.m dadaatha me.
[22] ahampi sodhayissaami, a~njasa.m va.tumaayana.m..
[21] ``ada.msu te mamokaasa.m, sodhetu.m a~njasa.m tadaa.
[22] buddho buddhoti cintento, magga.m sodhemaha.m tadaa..
[21] ``ani.t.thite ^a^V1.0017^ea^ mamokaase, diipa"nkaro mahaamuni.
[27] catuuhi satasahassehi, cha.labhi~n~nehi taadihi.
[22] khii.naasavehi vimalehi, pa.tipajji a~njasa.m jino..
[21] ``paccuggamanaa vattanti, vajjanti bheriyo bahuu.
[22] aamoditaa naramaruu, saadhukaara.m pavattayu.m..
[21] ``devaa manusse passanti, manussaapi ca devataa.
[22] ubhopi te pa~njalikaa, anuyanti tathaagata.m..
[21] ``devaa dibbehi turiyehi, manussaa maanusehi ca.
[22] ubhopi te vajjayantaa, anuyanti tathaagata.m..
[21] ``dibba.m mandaarava.m puppha.m, paduma.m paarichattaka.m.
[22] disodisa.m okiranti, aakaasanabhagataa maruu..
[21] ``campaka.m ^a^M1.0017^ea^ salala.m niipa.m, naagapunnaagaketaka.m.
[22] disodisa.m ukkhipanti, bhuumitalagataa naraa..
[21] ``kese mu~ncitvaaha.m tattha, vaakaciira~nca cammaka.m.
[22] kalale pattharitvaana, avakujjo nipajjaha.m..
[21] ``akkamitvaana ma.m buddho, saha sissehi gacchatu.
[22] maa na.m kalale akkamittho, hitaaya me bhavissatii''ti..

[03] so kalalapi.t.the nipannakova puna akkhiini ummiiletvaa diipa"nkaradasabalassa buddhasiri.m  sampassamaano eva.m cintesi -- ``sacaaha.m iccheyya.m, sabbakilese jhaapetvaa sa"nghanavako hutvaa  rammanagara.m paviseyya.m. a~n~naatakavesena ^a^P1.0014^ea^ pana me kilese jhaapetvaa nibbaanappattiyaa  kicca.m natthi. ya.mnuunaaha.m diipa"nkaradasabalo viya paramaabhisambodhi.m patvaa dhammanaava.m aaropetvaa  mahaajana.m sa.msaarasaagaraa ^a^V1.0018^ea^ uttaaretvaa pacchaa parinibbaayeyya.m, ida.m mayha.m patiruupa''nti.  tato a.t.tha dhamme samodhaanetvaa buddhabhaavaaya abhiniihaara.m katvaa nipajji. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``pathaviya.m nipannassa, eva.m me aasi cetaso.
[22] `icchamaano aha.m ajja, kilese jhaapaye mama..
[21] `ki.m me a~n~naatavesena, dhamma.m sacchikatenidha.
[22] sabba~n~nuta.m paapu.nitvaa, buddho hessa.m sadevake..
[21] `ki.m me ekena ti.n.nena, purisena thaamadassinaa.
[22] sabba~n~nuta.m paapu.nitvaa, santaaressa.m sadevake..
[21] `iminaa me adhikaarena, katena purisuttame.

[03] manussattabhaavasmi.myeva ^a^M1.0018^ea^ hi .thatvaa buddhatta.m patthentassa patthanaa samijjhati, na  naagassa vaa supa.n.nassa vaa devataaya vaa patthanaa samijjhati. manussattabhaavepi purisali"nge  .thitasseva patthanaa samijjhati, na itthiyaa vaa pa.n.dakanapu.msakaubhatobya~njanakaana.m vaa patthanaa  samijjhati. purisassaapi tasmi.m attabhaave arahattappattiyaa hetusampannasseva patthanaa samijjhati,  no itarassa. hetusampannassaapi jiivamaanakabuddhasseva santike patthentassa patthanaa samijjhati,  parinibbute buddhe cetiyasantike vaa bodhimuule vaa patthentassa na samijjhati. buddhaana.m santike  patthentassaapi ^a^V1.0019^ea^ pabbajjaali"nge .thitasseva samijjhati, no gihili"nge .thitassa.  pabbajitassaapi pa~ncaabhi~n~nassa a.t.thasamaapattilaabhinoyeva samijjhati, na imaaya gu.nasampattiyaa  virahitassa. gu.nasampannenaapi yena attano jiivita.m buddhaana.m pariccatta.m hoti, tassa iminaa  adhikaarena adhikaarasampannasseva samijjhati, na itarassa. adhikaarasampannassaapi yassa  buddhakaarakadhammaana.m atthaaya mahanto chando ca ussaaho ca vaayaamo ca pariye.t.thi ca, tasseva  samijjhati, na itarassa.

[03] tatrida.m chandamahantataaya opamma.m -- sace hi evamassa ``yo sakalacakkavaa.lagabbha.m  ekodakiibhuuta.m attano baahubalena uttaritvaa paara.m gantu.m samattho ^a^P1.0015^ea^, so buddhatta.m  paapu.naati. yo vaa pana sakalacakkavaa.lagabbha.m ve.lugumbasa~nchanna.m byuuhitvaa madditvaa padasaa gacchanto  paara.m gantu.m samattho, so buddhatta.m paapu.naati. yo vaa pana sakalacakkavaa.lagabbha.m sattiyo aako.tetvaa  nirantara.m sattiphalasamaaki.n.na.m padasaa akkamamaano paara.m gantu.m samattho, so buddhatta.m paapu.naati. yo  vaa pana sakalacakkavaa.lagabbha.m viitaccita"ngaarabharita.m paadehi maddamaano paara.m gantu.m samattho, so buddhatta.m  paapu.naatii''ti. yo etesu ekampi attano dukkara.m na ma~n~nati, ``aha.m etampi taritvaa vaa gantvaa  vaa paara.m gahessaamii''ti eva.m mahantena chandena ca ussaahena ca vaayaamena ca pariye.t.thiyaa ca  samannaagato hoti, tassa patthanaa samijjhati, na itarassa. sumedhataapaso pana ime a.t.tha dhamme  samodhaanetvaa buddhabhaavaaya abhiniihaara.m katvaa nipajji.

[21] ``diipa"nkaro lokaviduu, aahutiina.m pa.tiggaho.

[27] kolito upatisso ca, aggaa hessanti saavakaa.

[03] sumedhataapaso ``mayha.m kira patthanaa samijjhissatii''ti somanassappatto ahosi.  mahaajano diipa"nkaradasabalassa vacana.m sutvaa ``sumedhataapaso kira buddhabiija.m buddha"nkuro''ti ha.t.thatu.t.tho  ahosi. eva~ncassa ahosi ``yathaa naama puriso nadi.m taranto ujukena titthena uttaritu.m  asakkonto he.t.thaatitthena uttarati, evameva mayampi diipa"nkaradasabalassa saasane maggaphala.m alabhamaanaa  anaagate yadaa tva.m buddho bhavissasi, tadaa tava sammukhaa maggaphala.m sacchikaatu.m samatthaa  bhaveyyaamaa''ti patthana.m .thapayi.msu. diipa"nkaradasabalopi bodhisatta.m pasa.msitvaa a.t.thahi pupphamu.t.thiihi  puujetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami, tepi catusatasahassasa"nkhaa khii.naasavaa bodhisatta.m gandhehi ca  maalehi ca puujetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkami.msu. devamanussaa pana tatheva puujetvaa vanditvaa pakkantaa.

[21] ``tatheva tva.m sabbabhave, passa andughare viya.
[22] nekkhammaabhimukho hohi, bhavato parimuttiyaa''ti..

[03] athassa ``na ettakeheva buddhakaarakadhammehi bhavitabba''nti uttaripi upadhaarayato catuttha.m  pa~n~naapaarami.m disvaa etadahosi -- ``sumedhapa.n.dita, tva.m ito pa.t.thaaya pa~n~naapaaramimpi puureyyaasi.  hiinamajjhimukka.t.thesu ka~nci avajjetvaa sabbepi pa.n.dite upasa"nkamitvaa pa~nha.m puccheyyaasi. yathaa hi  pi.n.dacaariko bhikkhu hiinaadikesu kulesu ki~nci avajjetvaa pa.tipaa.tiyaa pi.n.daaya caranto khippa.m  yaapana.m labhati, eva.m tvampi sabbapa.n.dite upasa"nkamitvaa pa~nha.m pucchanto buddho bhavissasii''ti catuttha.m  pa~n~naapaarami.m da.lha.m katvaa adhi.t.thaasi. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``na ^a^V1.0029^ea^ ^a^M1.0027^ea^ hete ettakaayeva, buddhadhammaa bhavissare.
[22] a~n~nepi vicinissaami, ye dhammaa bodhipaacanaa..
[21] ``vicinanto tadaadakkhi.m, catuttha.m pa~n~naapaarami.m.
[22] pubbakehi mahesiihi, aasevitanisevita.m..
[21] ``ima.m tva.m catuttha.m taava, da.lha.m katvaa samaadiya.
[22] pa~n~naapaaramita.m gaccha, yadi bodhi.m pattumicchasi..
[21] ``yathaapi ^a^P1.0022^ea^ bhikkhu bhikkhanto, hiinamukka.t.thamajjhime.
[22] kulaani na vivajjento, eva.m labhati yaapana.m..
[21] ``tatheva tva.m sabbakaala.m, paripucchanto budha.m jana.m.
[22] pa~n~naapaaramita.m gantvaa, sambodhi.m paapu.nissasii''ti..

[03] athassa ``na ettakeheva buddhakaarakadhammehi bhavitabba''nti uttaripi upadhaarayato pa~ncama.m  viiriyapaarami.m disvaa etadahosi -- ``sumedhapa.n.dita, tva.m ito pa.t.thaaya viiriyapaaramimpi puureyyaasi.  yathaa hi siiho migaraajaa sabbairiyaapathesu da.lhaviiriyo hoti, eva.m tvampi sabbabhavesu  sabbairiyaapathesu da.lhaviiriyo anoliinaviiriyo samaano buddho bhavissasii''ti pa~ncama.m  viiriyapaarami.m da.lha.m katvaa adhi.t.thaasi. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``na hete ettakaayeva, buddhadhammaa bhavissare.
[22] a~n~nepi vicinissaami, ye dhammaa bodhipaacanaa..
[21] ``vicinanto tadaadakkhi.m, pa~ncama.m viiriyapaarami.m.
[22] pubbakehi mahesiihi, aasevitanisevita.m..
[21] ``ima.m tva.m pa~ncama.m taava, da.lha.m katvaa samaadiya.
[22] viiriyapaaramita.m gaccha, yadi bodhi.m pattumicchasi..
[21] ``yathaapi ^a^V1.0030^ea^ siiho migaraajaa, nisajja.t.thaanaca"nkame.
[22] aliinaviiriyo hoti, paggahitamano sadaa..
[21] ``tatheva tva.m sabbabhave, pagga.nha viiriya.m da.lha.m.
[22] viiriyapaaramita.m gantvaa, sambodhi.m paapu.nissasii''ti..

[03] athassa ``na ettakeheva buddhakaarakadhammehi bhavitabba''nti uttaripi upadhaarayato cha.t.tha.m  khantipaarami.m disvaa etadahosi -- ``sumedhapa.n.dita, tva.m ito ^a^M1.0028^ea^ pa.t.thaaya  khantipaaramimpi puureyyaasi. sammaananepi avamaananepi khamova bhaveyyaasi. yathaa hi pathaviya.m  naama sucimpi pakkhipanti asucimpi, na tena pathavii sineha.m, na pa.tigha.m karoti, khamati sahati  adhivaasetiyeva, eva.m tvampi sammaananaavamaananakkhamova samaano buddho bhavissasii''ti cha.t.tha.m  khantipaarami.m da.lha.m katvaa adhi.t.thaasi. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``na hete ettakaayeva, buddhadhammaa bhavissare.
[22] a~n~nepi vicinissaami, ye dhammaa bodhipaacanaa..
[21] ``vicinanto tadaadakkhi.m, cha.t.thama.m khantipaarami.m.
[22] pubbakehi mahesiihi, aasevitanisevita.m..
[21] ``ima.m tva.m cha.t.thama.m taava, da.lha.m katvaa samaadiya.
[22] tattha advejjhamaanaso, sambodhi.m paapu.nissasi..
[21] ``yathaapi ^a^P1.0023^ea^ pathavii naama, sucimpi asucimpi ca.
[22] sabba.m sahati nikkhepa.m, na karoti pa.tigha.m tayaa..
[21] ``tatheva tvampi sabbesa.m, sammaanaavamaanakkhamo.
[22] khantipaaramita.m gantvaa, sambodhi.m paapu.nissasii''ti..

[03] athassa ``na ettakeheva buddhakaarakadhammehi bhavitabba''nti uttaripi upadhaarayato sattama.m  saccapaarami.m disvaa etadahosi -- ``sumedhapa.n.dita, tva.m ito pa.t.thaaya saccapaaramimpi puureyyaasi.  asaniyaa ^a^V1.0031^ea^ matthake patamaanaayapi dhanaadiina.m atthaaya chandaadivasena sampajaanamusaavaada.m  naama maakaasi. yathaa hi osadhitaarakaa naama sabbautuusu attano gamanaviithi.m jahitvaa a~n~naaya  viithiyaa na gacchati, sakaviithiyaava gacchati, evameva tvampi sacca.m pahaaya musaavaada.m naama  akarontoyeva buddho bhavissasii''ti sattama.m saccapaarami.m da.lha.m katvaa adhi.t.thaasi. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``na hete ettakaayeva, buddhadhammaa bhavissare.
[22] a~n~nepi vicinissaami, ye dhammaa bodhipaacanaa..
[21] ``vicinanto tadaadakkhi.m, sattama.m saccapaarami.m.
[22] pubbakehi mahesiihi, aasevitanisevita.m..
[21] ``ima.m ^a^M1.0029^ea^ tva.m sattama.m taava, da.lha.m katvaa samaadiya.
[22] tattha advejjhavacano, sambodhi.m paapu.nissasi..
[21] ``yathaapi osadhii naama, tulaabhuutaa sadevake.
[22] samaye utuvasse vaa, na vokkamati viithito..
[21] ``tatheva tvampi saccesu, maa vokkamasi viithito.
[22] saccapaaramita.m gantvaa, sambodhi.m paapu.nissasii''ti..

[03] athassa ``na ettakeheva buddhakaarakadhammehi bhavitabba''nti uttaripi upadhaarayato a.t.thama.m  adhi.t.thaanapaarami.m disvaa etadahosi -- ``sumedhapa.n.dita, tva.m ito pa.t.thaaya adhi.t.thaanapaaramimpi  puureyyaasi. ya.m adhi.t.thaasi, tasmi.m adhi.t.thaane niccalo bhaveyyaasi. yathaa hi pabbato naama  sabbadisaasu vaatehi paha.topi na kampati na calati, attano .thaaneyeva ti.t.thati, evameva tvampi  attano adhi.t.thaane niccalo hontova buddho bhavissasii''ti a.t.thama.m adhi.t.thaanapaarami.m da.lha.m katvaa  adhi.t.thaasi. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``na hete ettakaayeva, buddhadhammaa bhavissare.
[22] a~n~nepi vicinissaami, ye dhammaa bodhipaacanaa..
[21] ``vicinanto ^a^V1.0032^ea^ ^a^P1.0024^ea^ tadaadakkhi.m, a.t.thama.m adhi.t.thaanapaarami.m.
[22] pubbakehi mahesiihi, aasevitanisevita.m..
[21] ``ima.m tva.m a.t.thama.m taava, da.lha.m katvaa samaadiya.
[22] tattha tva.m acalo hutvaa, sambodhi.m paapu.nissasi..
[21] ``yathaapi pabbato selo, acalo suppati.t.thito.
[22] na kampati bhusavaatehi, saka.t.thaaneva ti.t.thati..
[21] ``tatheva tvampi adhi.t.thaane, sabbadaa acalo bhava.
[22] adhi.t.thaanapaaramita.m gantvaa, sambodhi.m paapu.nissasii''ti..

[03] athassa ``na ettakeheva buddhakaarakadhammehi bhavitabba''nti uttaripi upadhaarayato navama.m  mettaapaarami.m disvaa etadahosi -- ``sumedhapa.n.dita, tva.m ito pa.t.thaaya navama.m mettaapaaramimpi  puureyyaasi. ahitesupi hitesupi ekacitto bhaveyyaasi. yathaa hi udaka.m naama paapajanassaapi  kalyaa.najanassaapi siitibhaava.m ekasadisa.m katvaa pharati, evameva tvampi sabbasattesu ^a^M1.0030^ea^  mettacittena ekacittova honto buddho bhavissasii''ti navama.m mettaapaarami.m da.lha.m katvaa  adhi.t.thaasi. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``na hete ettakaayeva, buddhadhammaa bhavissare.
[22] a~n~nepi vicinissaami, ye dhammaa bodhipaacanaa..
[21] ``vicinanto tadaadakkhi.m, navama.m mettaapaarami.m.
[22] pubbakehi mahesiihi, aasevitanisevita.m..
[21] ``ima.m tva.m navama.m taava, da.lha.m katvaa samaadiya.
[22] mettaaya asamo hohi, yadi bodhi.m pattumicchasi..
[21] ``yathaapi udaka.m naama, kalyaa.ne paapake jane.
[22] sama.m pharati siitena, pavaaheti rajomala.m..
[21] ``tatheva ^a^V1.0033^ea^ tvampi ahitahite, sama.m mettaaya bhaavaya.
[22] mettaapaaramita.m gantvaa, sambodhi.m paapu.nissasii''ti..

[03] athassa ``na ettakeheva buddhakaarakadhammehi bhavitabba''nti uttaripi upadhaarayato dasama.m  upekkhaapaarami.m disvaa etadahosi -- ``sumedhapa.n.dita, tva.m ito pa.t.thaaya upekkhaapaaramimpi  puureyyaasi. sukhepi dukkhepi majjhattova bhaveyyaasi. yathaa hi pathavii naama sucimpi  asucimpi pakkhippamaanaa majjhattaava hoti, evameva tvampi sukhadukkhesu majjhattova honto buddho  bhavissasii''ti dasama.m upekkhaapaarami.m da.lha.m katvaa adhi.t.thaasi. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``na ^a^P1.0025^ea^ hete ettakaayeva, buddhadhammaa bhavissare.
[22] a~n~nepi vicinissaami, ye dhammaa bodhipaacanaa..
[21] ``vicinanto tadaadakkhi.m, dasama.m upekkhaapaarami.m.
[22] pubbakehi mahesiihi, aasevitanisevita.m..
[21] ``ima.m tva.m dasama.m taava, da.lha.m katvaa samaadiya.
[22] tulaabhuuto da.lho hutvaa, sambodhi.m paapu.nissasi..
[21] ``yathaapi pathavii naama, nikkhitta.m asuci.m suci.m.
[22] upekkhati ubhopete, kopaanunayavajjitaa..
[21] ``tatheva tvampi sukhadukkhe, tulaabhuuto sadaa bhava.
[22] upekkhaapaaramita.m gantvaa, sambodhi.m paapu.nissasii''ti..

[03] tato ^a^M1.0031^ea^ cintesi -- ``imasmi.m loke bodhisattehi puuretabbaa bodhiparipaacanaa  buddhakaarakadhammaa ettakaayeva, dasa paaramiyo .thapetvaa a~n~ne natthi, imaapi dasa paaramiyo uddha.m  aakaasepi natthi, he.t.thaa pathaviyampi, puratthimaadiisu disaasupi natthi, mayhameva pana  hadayama.msabbhantare pati.t.thitaa''ti. eva.m taasa.m hadaye pati.t.thitabhaava.m disvaa sabbaapi taa da.lha.m katvaa  adhi.t.thaaya punappuna.m sammasanto anulomapa.tiloma.m sammasati, pariyante gahetvaa aadi.m paapeti,  aadimhi gahetvaa pariyante .thapeti, majjhe gahetvaa ubhato osaapeti, ubhato ko.tiisu ^a^V1.0034^ea^  hetvaa majjhe osaapeti. baahirakabha.n.dapariccaago daanapaaramii naama, a"ngapariccaago daanaupapaaramii  naama, jiivitapariccaago daanaparamatthapaaramii naamaati dasa paaramiyo dasa upapaaramiyo dasa  paramatthapaaramiyo yantatela.m viniva.t.tento viya mahaameru.m mattha.m katvaa cakkavaa.lamahaasamudda.m aalu.lento  viya ca sammasi. tasseva.m dasa paaramiyo sammasantassa dhammatejena  catunahutaadhikadviyojanasatasahassabahalaa aya.m mahaapathavii hatthinaa akkantana.lakalaapo viya,  pii.liyamaana.m ucchuyanta.m viya ca mahaavirava.m viravamaanaa sa"nkampi sampakampi sampavedhi, kulaalacakka.m  viya telayantacakka.m viya ca paribbhami. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``ettakaayeva te loke, ye dhammaa bodhipaacanaa.
[22] tatuddha.m natthi a~n~natra, da.lha.m tattha pati.t.thaha..
[21] ``ime dhamme sammasato, sabhaavasarasalakkha.ne.
[22] dhammatejena vasudhaa, dasasahassii pakampatha..
[21] ``calatii ravatii pathavii, ucchuyanta.mva pii.lita.m.
[22] telayante yathaa cakka.m, eva.m kampati medanii''ti..

[03] mahaapathaviyaa ^a^P1.0026^ea^ kampamaanaaya rammanagaravaasino sa.n.thaatu.m asakkontaa  yugantavaatabbhaahataa mahaasaalaa viya mucchitamucchitaava papati.msu, gha.taadiini ^a^M1.0032^ea^  kulaalabhaajanaani pava.t.tantaani a~n~nama~n~na.m paharantaani cu.n.navicu.n.naani ahesu.m. mahaajano  bhiitatasito satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa ``ki.m nu kho bhagavaa naagaava.t.to aya.m bhuutayakkhadevataasu  a~n~nataraava.t.toti na hi maya.m eta.m jaanaama, apica kho sabbopi aya.m mahaajano upadduto, ki.m nu  kho imassa lokassa paapaka.m bhavissati, udaahu kalyaa.na.m, kathetha no eta.m kaara.na''nti aaha.  atha satthaa tesa.m katha.m sutvaa ``tumhe maa bhaayatha maa cintayittha, natthi vo itonidaana.m bhaya.m.  yo so mayaa ajja sumedhapa.n.dito `anaagate gotamo naama buddho bhavissatii'ti byaakato, so dasa  paaramiyo sammasati, tassa dasa paaramiyo sammasantassa vilo.lentassa dhammatejena  sakaladasasahassilokadhaatu ekappahaarena kampati, ceva, ravati caa''ti aaha. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``yaavataa parisaa aasi, buddhassa parivesane.
[22] pavedhamaanaa saa tattha, mucchitaa sesi bhuumiya.m..
[21] ``gha.taanekasahassaani ^a^V1.0035^ea^, kumbhiina~nca sataa bahuu.
[22] sa~ncu.n.namathitaa tattha, a~n~nama~n~na.m pagha.t.titaa..
[21] ``ubbiggaa tasitaa bhiitaa, bhantaa byadhitamaanasaa.
[22] mahaajanaa samaagamma, diipa"nkaramupaagamu.m..
[21] `ki.m bhavissati lokassa, kalyaa.namatha paapaka.m.
[22] sabbo upadduto loko, ta.m vinodehi cakkhuma'..
[21] ``tesa.m tadaa sa~n~naapesi, diipa"nkaro mahaamuni.
[22] vissatthaa hotha maa bhaatha, imasmi.m pathavikampane..
[21] ``yamaha.m ajja byaakaasi.m, buddho loke bhavissati.
[22] eso sammasati dhamma.m, pubbaka.m jinasevita.m..
[21] ``tassa sammasato dhamma.m, buddhabhuumi.m asesato.
[22] tenaaya.m kampitaa pathavii, dasasahassii sadevake''ti..

[03] mahaajano tathaagatassa vacana.m sutvaa ha.t.thatu.t.tho maalaagandhavilepana.m aadaaya rammanagaraa  nikkhamitvaa bodhisatta.m upasa"nkamitvaa maalaadiihi puujetvaa ^a^M1.0033^ea^ vanditvaa padakkhi.na.m  katvaa rammanagarameva paavisi. bodhisattopi dasa paaramiyo sammasitvaa viiriya.m da.lha.m katvaa  adhi.t.thaaya nisinnaasanaa vu.t.thaasi. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``buddhassa ^a^P1.0027^ea^ vacana.m sutvaa, mano nibbaayi taavade.
[22] sabbe ma.m upasa"nkamma, punaapi abhivandisu.m..
[21] ``samaadiyitvaa buddhagu.na.m, da.lha.m katvaana maanasa.m.
[22] diipa"nkara.m namassitvaa, aasanaa vu.t.thahi.m tadaa''ti..

[03] atha bodhisatta.m aasanaa vu.t.thahanta.m sakaladasasahassacakkavaa.ladevataa sannipatitvaa dibbehi  maalaagandhehi ^a^V1.0036^ea^ puujetvaa vanditvaa ``ayya sumedhataapasa, tayaa ajja diipa"nkaradasabalassa  paadamuule mahatii patthanaa patthitaa, saa te anantaraayena samijjhatu, maa te bhaya.m vaa chambhitatta.m vaa  ahosi, sariire appamattakopi rogo maa uppajji, khippa.m paaramiyo puuretvaa sammaasambodhi.m  pa.tivijjha. yathaa pupphuupagaphaluupagaa rukkhaa samaye pupphanti ceva phalanti ca, tatheva tvampi samaya.m  anatikkamitvaa khippa.m sambodhimuttama.m phusassuu''tiaadiini thutima"ngalaani payirudaaha.msu, eva.m  payirudaahitvaa attano attano deva.t.thaanameva agama.msu. bodhisattopi devataahi abhitthuto ``aha.m  dasa paaramiyo puuretvaa kappasatasahassaadhikaana.m catunna.m asa"nkhyeyyaana.m matthake buddho bhavissaamii''ti  viiriya.m da.lha.m katvaa adhi.t.thaaya nabha.m abbhuggantvaa himavantameva agamaasi. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``dibba.m maanusaka.m puppha.m, devaa maanusakaa ubho.
[22] samokiranti pupphehi, vu.t.thahantassa aasanaa..
[21] ``vedayanti ca te sotthi.m, devaa maanusakaa ubho.
[22] mahanta.m patthita.m tuyha.m, ta.m labhassu yathicchita.m..
[21] ``sabbiitiyo vivajjantu, soko rogo vinassatu.
[22] maa te bhavantvantaraayaa, phusa khippa.m bodhimuttama.m..
[21] ``yathaapi samaye patte, pupphanti pupphino dumaa.
[22] tatheva tva.m mahaaviira, buddha~naa.nena pupphassu..
[21] ``yathaa ^a^M1.0034^ea^ ye keci sambuddhaa, puurayu.m dasa paaramii.
[22] tatheva tva.m mahaaviira, puuraya dasa paaramii..
[21] ``yathaa ye keci sambuddhaa, bodhima.n.damhi bujjhare.
[22] tatheva tva.m mahaaviira, bujjhassu jinabodhiya.m..
[21] ``yathaa ye keci sambuddhaa, dhammacakka.m pavattayu.m.
[22] tatheva tva.m mahaaviira, dhammacakka.m pavattaya..
[21] ``pu.n.namaaye ^a^V1.0037^ea^ yathaa cando, parisuddho virocati.
[22] tatheva tva.m pu.n.namano, viroca dasasahassiya.m..
[21] ``raahumutto ^a^P1.0028^ea^ yathaa suuriyo, taapena atirocati.
[22] tatheva lokaa muccitvaa, viroca siriyaa tuva.m..
[21] ``yathaa yaa kaaci nadiyo, osaranti mahodadhi.m.
[22] eva.m sadevakaa lokaa, osarantu tavantike..
[21] ``tehi thutappasattho so, dasa dhamme samaadiya.
[22] te dhamme paripuurento, pavana.m paavisii tadaa''ti..
[06] sumedhakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] rammanagaravaasinopi kho nagara.m pavisitvaa buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusa"nghassa mahaadaana.m ada.msu.  satthaa tesa.m dhamma.m desetvaa mahaajana.m sara.naadiisu pati.t.thaapetvaa rammanagaramhaa nikkhamitvaa tato  uddhampi yaavataayuka.m ti.t.thanto sabba.m buddhakicca.m katvaa anukkamena anupaadisesaaya nibbaanadhaatuyaa  parinibbaayi. tattha ya.m vattabba.m, ta.m sabba.m buddhava.mse vuttanayeneva veditabba.m. vutta~nhi tattha --
[21] ``tadaa te bhojayitvaana, sasa"ngha.m lokanaayaka.m.
[22] upagacchu.m sara.na.m tassa, diipa"nkarassa satthuno..
[21] ``sara.naagamane ka~nci, niveseti tathaagato.
[22] ka~nci pa~ncasu siilesu, siile dasavidhe para.m..
[21] ``kassaci ^a^M1.0035^ea^ deti saama~n~na.m, caturo phalamuttame.
[22] kassaci asame dhamme, deti so pa.tisambhidaa..
[21] ``kassaci ^a^V1.0038^ea^ varasamaapattiyo, a.t.tha deti naraasabho.
[22] tisso kassaci vijjaayo, cha.labhi~n~naa pavecchati..
[21] ``tena yogena janakaaya.m, ovadati mahaamuni.
[22] tena vitthaarika.m aasi, lokanaathassa saasana.m..
[21] ``mahaahanusabhakkhandho, diipa"nkarasanaamako.
[22] bahuu jane taarayati, parimoceti duggati.m..
[21] ``bodhaneyya.m jana.m disvaa, satasahassepi yojane.
[22] kha.nena upagantvaana, bodheti ta.m mahaamuni..
[21] ``pa.thamaabhisamaye buddho, ko.tisatamabodhayi.
[22] dutiyaabhisamaye naatho, navutiko.timabodhayi..
[21] ``yadaa ca devabhavanamhi, buddho dhammamadesayi.
[22] navutiko.tisahassaana.m, tatiyaabhisamayo ahu..
[21] ``sannipaataa ^a^P1.0029^ea^ tayo aasu.m, diipa"nkarassa satthuno.
[22] ko.tisatasahassaana.m, pa.thamo aasi samaagamo..
[21] ``puna naaradakuu.tamhi, pavivekagate jine.
[22] khii.naasavaa viitamalaa, sami.msu satako.tiyo..
[21] ``yamhi kaale mahaaviiro, sudassanasiluccaye.
[22] navutiko.tisahassehi, pavaaresi mahaamuni..
[21] ``aha.m tena samayena, ja.tilo uggataapano.
[22] antalikkhamhi cara.no, pa~ncaabhi~n~naasu paaraguu..
[21] ``dasaviisasahassaana.m ^a^V1.0039^ea^, dhammaabhisamayo ahu.
[22] ekadvinna.m abhisamayaa, ga.nanaato asa"nkhiyaa..
[21] ``vitthaarika.m baahuja~n~na.m, iddha.m phiita.m ahu tadaa.
[22] diipa"nkarassa bhagavato, saasana.m suvisodhita.m..
[21] ``cattaari ^a^M1.0036^ea^ satasahassaani, cha.labhi~n~naa mahiddhikaa.
[22] diipa"nkara.m lokavidu.m, parivaarenti sabbadaa..
[21] ``ye keci tena samayena, jahanti maanusa.m bhava.m.
[22] apattamaanasaa sekkhaa, garahitaa bhavanti te..
[21] ``supupphita.m paavacana.m, arahantehi taadihi.
[22] khii.naasavehi vimalehi, upasobhati sadevake..
[21] ``nagara.m rammavatii naama, sudevo naama khattiyo.
[22] sumedhaa naama janikaa, diipa"nkarassa satthuno..
[21] ``suma"ngalo ca tisso ca, ahesu.m aggasaavakaa.
[22] saagato naamupa.t.thaako, diipa"nkarassa satthuno..
[21] ``nandaa ceva sunandaa ca, ahesu.m aggasaavikaa.
[22] bodhi tassa bhagavato, pipphaliiti pavuccati..
[21] ``asiitihatthamubbedho, diipa"nkaro mahaamuni.
[22] sobhati diiparukkhova, saalaraajaava phullito..
[21] ``satasahassavassaani, aayu tassa mahesino.
[22] taavataa ti.t.thamaano so, taaresi janata.m bahu.m..
[21] ``jotayitvaana ^a^V1.0040^ea^ saddhamma.m, santaaretvaa mahaajana.m.
[22] jalitvaa aggikhandhova, nibbuto so sasaavako..
[21] ``saa ca iddhi so ca yaso, taani ca paadesu cakkaratanaani.
[22] sabba.m tamantarahita.m, nanu rittaa sabbasa"nkhaaraa''ti..

[03] diipa"nkarassa ^a^P1.0030^ea^ pana bhagavato aparabhaage eka.m asa"nkhyeyya.m atikkamitvaa  ^b^ko.n.da~n~no^eb^ naama satthaa udapaadi. tassaapi tayo saavakasannipaataa ahesu.m. pa.thamasannipaate  ko.tisatasahassa.m, dutiye ko.tisahassa.m, tatiye navutiko.tiyo. tadaa bodhisatto vijitaavii naama  cakkavattii hutvaa ko.tisatasahassasa"nkhassa buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusa"nghassa mahaadaana.m adaasi.  satthaa bodhisatta.m ``buddho bhavissasii''ti byaakaritvaa dhamma.m desesi. so satthu dhammakatha.m sutvaa  rajja.m niyyaadetvaa pabbaji. so tii.ni ^a^M1.0037^ea^ pi.takaani uggahetvaa a.t.tha samaapattiyo  pa~nca abhi~n~naayo ca uppaadetvaa aparihiinajjhaano brahmaloke nibbatti. ko.n.da~n~nassa buddhassa pana  rammavatii naama nagara.m, sunando naama khattiyo pitaa, sujaataa naama devii maataa, bhaddo ca subhaddo  ca dve aggasaavakaa, anuruddho naamupa.t.thaako, tissaa ca upatissaa ca dve aggasaavikaa,  saalakalyaa.nii bodhi, a.t.thaasiitihatthubbedha.m sariira.m, vassasatasahassa.m aayuppamaa.na.m ahosi.
[21] ``diipa"nkarassa aparena, ko.n.da~n~no naama naayako.
[22] anantatejo amitayaso, appameyyo duraasado''ti..

[03] tassa aparabhaage eka.m asa"nkhyeyya.m atikkamitvaa ekasmi.myeva kappe caturo buddhaa nibbatti.msu  ^b^ma"ngalo, sumano, revato, sobhito^eb^ti. ^b^ma"ngalassa^eb^ bhagavato tayo sannipaataa ahesu.m.  tesu pa.thamasannipaate ko.tisatasahassa.m bhikkhuu ahesu.m, dutiye ko.tisahassa.m, tatiye navutiko.tiyo.  vemaatikabhaataa kirassa aanandakumaaro naama navutiko.tisa"nkhaaya parisaaya saddhi.m dhammassavanatthaaya  satthu santika.m agamaasi. satthaa tassa anupubbi.m katha.m kathesi, so saddhi.m parisaaya saha  pa.tisambhidaahi arahatta.m paapu.ni. satthaa tesa.m kulaputtaana.m pubbacarita.m olokento  iddhimayapattaciivarassa upanissaya.m disvaa dakkhi.nahattha.m pasaaretvaa ``etha, bhikkhavo''ti aaha.  sabbe ta"nkha.na~n~neva iddhimayapattaciivaradharaa sa.t.thivassamahaatheraa viya aakappasampannaa hutvaa satthaara.m  vanditvaa parivaarayi.msu. ayamassa tatiyo saavakasannipaato ahosi.

[03] yathaa ^a^V1.0041^ea^ pana a~n~nesa.m buddhaana.m samantaa asiitihatthappamaa.naayeva sariirappabhaa  ahosi, na eva.m tassa tassa pana bhagavato sariirappabhaa niccakaala.m dasasahassilokadhaatu.m pharitvaa  a.t.thaasi. rukkhapathavipabbatasamuddaadayo antamaso ukkhalikaadiini upaadaaya suva.n.napa.t.tapariyonaddhaa  viya ahesu.m. aayuppamaa.na.m panassa navutivassasahassaani ahosi. ettaka.m kaala.m  candimasuuriyaadayo attano pabhaaya virocitu.m naasakkhi.msu, rattindivaparicchedo na pa~n~naayittha.  divaa suuriyaalokena viya sattaa nicca.m ^a^P1.0031^ea^ ^a^M1.0038^ea^ buddhaalokeneva vicari.msu,  saaya.m pupphitakusumaana.m, paato ravanakasaku.naadiina~nca vasena loko rattindivapariccheda.m sallakkhesi.

[03] ki.m pana a~n~nesa.m buddhaana.m ayamaanubhaavo natthiiti? no natthi. tepi hi aaka"nkhamaanaa  dasasahassi.m vaa lokadhaatu.m tato vaa bhiyyo aabhaaya phareyyu.m. ma"ngalassa pana bhagavato  pubbapatthanaavasena a~n~nesa.m byaamappabhaa viya sariirappabhaa niccakaalameva dasasahassilokadhaatu.m pharitvaa  a.t.thaasi. so kira bodhisattacariyakaale vessantarasadise attabhaave .thito saputtadaaro  va"nkapabbatasadise pabbate vasi. atheko kharadaa.thiko naama yakkho mahaapurisassa daanajjhaasayata.m  sutvaa braahma.nava.n.nena upasa"nkamitvaa mahaasatta.m dve daarake yaaci. mahaasatto ``dadaami braahma.nassa  puttake''ti ha.t.thapaha.t.tho udakapariyanta.m pathavi.m kampento dvepi daarake adaasi. yakkho ca"nkamanako.tiya.m  aalambanaphalaka.m nissaaya .thatvaa passantasseva mahaasattassa muulakalaape viya dve daarake khaadi.  mahaapurisassa yakkha.m oloketvaa mukhe viva.tamatte aggijaala.m viya lohitadhaara.m uggiramaana.m tassa  mukha.m disvaapi kesaggamattampi domanassa.m na uppajji. ``sudinna.m vata me daana''nti cintayato  panassa sariire mahanta.m piitisomanassa udapaadi. so ``imassa me nissandena anaagate iminaava  niihaarena rasmiyo nikkhamantuu''ti patthana.m akaasi. tassa ta.m patthana.m nissaaya buddhabhuutassa  sariirato rasmiyo nikkhamitvaa ettaka.m .thaana.m phari.msu.

[03] aparampissa pubbacarita.m atthi. so kira bodhisattakaale ekassa buddhassa cetiya.m disvaa  ``imassa buddhassa mayaa jiivita.m pariccajitu.m va.t.tatii''ti da.n.dadiipikaave.thananiyaamena sakalasariira.m  ve.thaapetvaa ratanamattamaku.la.m satasahassagghanika.m suva.n.napaati.m sappissa puuraapetvaa tattha sahassava.t.tiyo  jaalaapetvaa ta.m siisenaadaaya sakalasariira.m jaalaapetvaa cetiya.m padakkhi.na.m karonto sakalaratti.m  viitinaamesi. eva.m yaava aru.nuggamanaa vaayamantassaapissa lomakuupamattampi usuma.m na ga.nhi.  padumagabbha.m pavi.t.thakaalo viya ahosi. dhammo hi naamesa attaana.m rakkhanta.m rakkhati. tenaaha  bhagavaa --
[21] ``dhammo ^a^V1.0042^ea^ ^a^M1.0039^ea^ have rakkhati dhammacaari.m, dhammo suci.n.no  sukhamaavahaati.
[22] esaanisa.mso dhamme suci.n.ne, na duggati.m gacchati dhammacaarii''ti.. (theragaa0  303; jaa0 1.10.102; 1.15.385).
[03] imassaapi ^a^P1.0032^ea^ kammassa nissandena tassa bhagavato sariirobhaaso  dasasahassilokadhaatu.m pharitvaa a.t.thaasi.

[03] tadaa amhaaka.m bodhisatto suruci naama braahma.no hutvaa ``satthaara.m nimantessaamii''ti  upasa"nkamitvaa madhuradhammakatha.m sutvaa ``sve mayha.m bhikkha.m ga.nhatha, bhante''ti aaha. braahma.na,  kittakehi te bhikkhuuhi atthoti? ``kittakaa pana vo, bhante, parivaarabhikkhuu''ti aaha. tadaa  pana satthu pa.thamasannipaatoyeva hoti, tasmaa ``ko.tisatasahassa''nti aaha. bhante, sabbehipi  saddhi.m mayha.m gehe bhikkha.m ga.nhathaati. satthaa adhivaasesi. braahma.no svaatanaaya nimantetvaa geha.m  gacchanto cintesi -- ``aha.m ettakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m yaagubhattavatthaadiini daatu.m sakkomi, nisiidana.t.thaana.m  pana katha.m bhavissatii''ti.

[03] tassa saa cintaa caturaasiitiyojanasahassamatthake .thitassa devara~n~no pa.n.dukambalasilaasanassa  u.nhabhaava.m janesi. sakko ``ko nu kho ma.m imamhaa .thaanaa caavetukaamo''ti dibbacakkhunaa  olokento mahaapurisa.m disvaa ``suruci naama braahma.no buddhappamukha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m nimantetvaa  nisiidana.t.thaanatthaaya cintesi, mayaapi tattha gantvaa pu~n~nako.t.thaasa.m gahetu.m va.t.tatii''ti va.d.dhakiva.n.na.m  nimminitvaa vaasipharasuhattho mahaapurisassa purato paaturahosi. so ``atthi nu kho kassaci  bhatiyaa kattabba''nti aaha. mahaapuriso ta.m disvaa ``ki.m kamma.m karissasii''ti aaha. ``mama  ajaananasippa.m naama natthi, geha.m vaa ma.n.dapa.m vaa yo ya.m kaareti, tassa ta.m kaatu.m jaanaamii''ti.  ``tena hi mayha.m kamma.m atthii''ti. ``ki.m ayyaa''ti? ``svaatanaaya me  ko.tisatasahassabhikkhuu nimantitaa, tesa.m nisiidanama.n.dapa.m karissasii''ti. ``aha.m naama kareyya.m,  sace mama bhati.m daatu.m sakkhissathaa''ti. ``sakkhissaami taataa''ti. ``saadhu karissaamii''ti  gantvaa eka.m padesa.m olokesi, dvaadasaterasayojanappamaa.no padeso kasi.nama.n.dala.m ^a^M1.0040^ea^  viya samatalo ahosi. so ``ettake .thaane sattaratanamayo ma.n.dapo u.t.thahatuu''ti cintetvaa  olokesi. taavadeva pathavi.m bhinditvaa ma.n.dapo u.t.thahi. tassa sova.n.namayesu thambhesu rajatamayaa  gha.takaa ahesu.m, rajatamayesu sova.n.namayaa, ma.nitthambhesu pavaa.lamayaa, pavaa.latthambhesu ma.nimayaa,  sattaratanamayesu sattaratanamayaava gha.takaa ahesu.m ^a^V1.0043^ea^. tato ``ma.n.dapassa antarantarena  ki"nki.nikajaala.m olambatuu''ti olokesi, saha olokaneneva ki"nki.nikajaala.m olambi, yassa  mandavaateritassa pa~nca"ngikasseva tuuriyassa madhurasaddo niggacchati, dibbasa"ngiitivattanakaalo viya  hoti. ``antarantaraa gandhadaamamaalaadaamaani olambantuu''ti cintesi, daamaani olambi.msu.  ``ko.tisatasahassasa"nkhaana.m bhikkhuuna.m ^a^P1.0033^ea^ aasanaani ca aadhaarakaani ca pathavi.m  bhinditvaa u.t.thahantuu''ti cintesi, taavadeva u.t.thahi.msu. ``ko.ne ko.ne ekekaa udakacaa.tiyo  u.t.thahantuu''ti cintesi, udakacaa.tiyo u.t.thahi.msu.

[03] ettaka.m maapetvaa braahma.nassa santika.m gantvaa ``ehi ayya, tava ma.n.dapa.m oloketvaa mayha.m  bhati.m dehii''ti aaha. mahaapuriso gantvaa ma.n.dapa.m olokesi, olokentassevassa sakalasariira.m  pa~ncava.n.naaya piitiyaa nirantara.m phu.ta.m ahosi. athassa ma.n.dapa.m olokayato etadahosi --  ``naaya.m ma.n.dapo manussabhuutena kato, mayha.m pana ajjhaasaya.m mayha.m gu.na.m aagamma addhaa sakkabhavana.m  u.nha.m ahosi, tato sakkena devara~n~naa aya.m ma.n.dapo kaarito bhavissatii''ti. ``na kho pana me  yutta.m evaruupe ma.n.dape ekadivasa.myeva daana.m daatu.m, sattaaha.m dassaamii''ti cintesi. baahirakadaana~nhi  kittakampi samaana.m bodhisattaana.m tu.t.thi.m kaatu.m na sakkoti, ala"nkatasiisa.m pana chinditvaa  a~njitaakkhiini uppaa.tetvaa hadayama.msa.m vaa ubba.t.tetvaa dinnakaale bodhisattaana.m caaga.m nissaaya tu.t.thi  naama hoti. amhaakampi hi bodhisattassa sivijaatake devasika.m pa~nca kahaapa.nasatasahassaani  vissajjetvaa catuusu dvaaresu nagaramajjhe ca daana.m dentassa ta.m daana.m caagatu.t.thi.m uppaadetu.m naasakkhi.  yadaa panassa braahma.nava.n.nena aagantvaa sakko devaraajaa akkhiini yaaci, tadaa taani uppaa.tetvaa  dadamaanasseva haaso uppajji, kesaggamattampi cittassa a~n~nathatta.m naahosi. eva.m daana.m nissaaya  bodhisattaana.m titti naama natthi. tasmaa sopi mahaapuriso ^a^M1.0041^ea^ ``sattaaha.m mayaa  ko.tisatasahassasa"nkhaana.m bhikkhuuna.m daana.m daatu.m va.t.tatii''ti cintetvaa tasmi.m ma.n.dape buddhappamukha.m  bhikkhusa"ngha.m nisiidaapetvaa sattaaha.m gavapaana.m naama daana.m adaasi. gavapaananti mahante mahante  kolambe khiirassa puuretvaa uddhanesu aaropetvaa ghanapaakapakke khiire thoke ta.n.dule pakkhipitvaa  pakkamadhusakkaraacu.n.nasappiihi abhisa"nkhata.m bhojana.m vuccati. manussaayeva pana parivisitu.m  naasakkhi.msu, devaapi ekantarikaa hutvaa parivisi.msu. dvaadasaterasayojanappamaa.na.m .thaanampi bhikkhuu  ga.nhitu.m nappahosiyeva. te pana bhikkhuu attano attano aanubhaavena nisiidi.msu.  pariyosaanadivase sabbabhikkhuuna.m pattaani dhovaapetvaa bhesajjatthaaya sappinavaniitamadhuphaa.nitaadiini  puuretvaa ticiivarehi saddhi.m adaasi, sa"nghanavakabhikkhunaa laddhaciivarasaa.takaa satasahassagghanakaa ahesu.m.

[03] satthaa ^a^V1.0044^ea^ anumodana.m karonto ``aya.m puriso evaruupa.m mahaadaana.m adaasi, ko nu  kho bhavissatii''ti upadhaarento ``anaagate kappasatasahassaadhikaana.m dvinna.m asa"nkhyeyyaana.m matthake  gotamo naama buddho bhavissatii''ti disvaa mahaapurisa.m aamantetvaa ``tva.m ettaka.m ^a^P1.0034^ea^  naama kaala.m atikkamitvaa gotamo naama buddho bhavissasii''ti byaakaasi. mahaapuriso byaakara.na.m  sutvaa ``aha.m kira buddho bhavissaami, ko me gharaavaasena attho, pabbajissaamii''ti cintetvaa  tathaaruupa.m sampatti.m khe.lapi.n.da.m viya pahaaya satthu santike pabbajitvaa buddhavacana.m ugga.nhitvaa  abhi~n~naa ca samaapattiyo ca nibbattetvaa aayupariyosaane brahmaloke nibbatti.

[03] ma"ngalassa pana bhagavato nagara.m uttara.m naama ahosi, pitaapi uttaro naama khattiyo, maataapi  uttaraa naama devii, sudevo ca dhammaseno ca dve aggasaavakaa, paalito naamupa.t.thaako, siivalii ca  asokaa ca dve aggasaavikaa, naagarukkho bodhi, a.t.thaasiitihatthubbedha.m sariira.m ahosi.  navutivassasahassaani .thatvaa parinibbute pana tasmi.m bhagavati ekappahaareneva dasa cakkavaa.lasahassaani  ekandhakaaraani ahesu.m. sabbacakkavaa.lesu manussaana.m mahanta.m aarodanaparidevana.m ahosi.
[21] ``ko.n.da~n~nassa ^a^M1.0042^ea^ aparena, ma"ngalo naama naayako.
[22] tama.m loke nihantvaana, dhammokkamabhidhaarayii''ti..

[03] eva.m dasasahassilokadhaatu.m andhakaara.m katvaa parinibbutassa tassa bhagavato aparabhaage  ^b^sumano^eb^ naama satthaa udapaadi. tassaapi tayo saavakasannipaataa ahesu.m. pa.thamasannipaate  ko.tisatasahassabhikkhuu ahesu.m, dutiye ka~ncanapabbatamhi navutiko.tisahassaani, tatiye  asiitiko.tisahassaani. tadaa mahaasatto atulo naama naagaraajaa ahosi mahiddhiko mahaanubhaavo.  so ``buddho uppanno''ti sutvaa ~naatisa"nghaparivuto naagabhavanaa nikkhamitvaa  ko.tisatasahassabhikkhuparivaarassa tassa bhagavato dibbatuuriyehi upahaara.m kaaretvaa mahaadaana.m pavattetvaa  pacceka.m dussayugaani datvaa sara.nesu pati.t.thaasi. sopi na.m satthaa ``anaagate buddho bhavissasii''ti  byaakaasi. tassa bhagavato nagara.m khema.m naama ahosi, sudatto naama raajaa pitaa, sirimaa naama  maataa, sara.no ca bhaavitatto ca dve aggasaavakaa, udeno naamupa.t.thaako, so.naa ca upaso.naa ca dve  aggasaavikaa, naagarukkho bodhi, navutihatthubbedha.m sariira.m, navutiyeva vassasahassaani aayuppamaa.na.m  ahosi.
[21] ``ma"ngalassa ^a^V1.0045^ea^ aparena, sumano naama naayako.
[22] sabbadhammehi asamo, sabbasattaanamuttamo''ti..

[03] tassa ^a^P1.0035^ea^ aparabhaage ^b^revato^eb^ naama satthaa udapaadi. tassaapi tayo  saavakasannipaataa ahesu.m. pa.thamasannipaate ga.nanaa natthi, dutiye ko.tisatasahassabhikkhuu ahesu.m,  tathaa tatiye. tadaa bodhisatto atidevo naama braahma.no hutvaa satthu dhammadesana.m sutvaa sara.nesu  pati.t.thaaya sirasmi.m a~njali.m .thapetvaa tassa satthuno kilesappahaane va.n.na.m vatvaa uttaraasa"ngena puuja.m  akaasi. sopi na.m ``buddho bhavissasii''ti byaakaasi. tassa pana bhagavato nagara.m dha~n~navatii  naama ahosi, pitaa vipulo naama khattiyo, maataapi vipulaa naama devii, varu.no ca brahmadevo ca  dve aggasaavakaa, sambhavo naamupa.t.thaako, bhaddaa ca subhaddaa ca dve aggasaavikaa, naagarukkhova bodhi,  sariira.m asiitihatthubbedha.m ahosi, aayu sa.t.thi vassasahassaaniiti.
[21] ``sumanassa ^a^M1.0043^ea^ aparena, revato naama naayako.
[22] anuupamo asadiso, atulo uttamo jino''ti..

[03] tassa aparabhaage ^b^sobhito^eb^ naama satthaa udapaadi. tassaapi tayo saavakasannipaataa  ahesu.m. pa.thamasannipaate ko.tisatabhikkhuu ahesu.m, dutiye navutiko.tiyo, tatiye asiitiko.tiyo.  tadaa bodhisatto ajito naama braahma.no hutvaa satthu dhammadesana.m sutvaa sara.nesu pati.t.thaaya  buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusa"nghassa mahaadaana.m adaasi. sopi na.m ``buddho bhavissasii''ti byaakaasi.  tassa pana bhagavato sudhamma.m naama nagara.m ahosi, pitaapi sudhammo naama raajaa, maataapi  sudhammaa naama devii, asamo ca sunetto ca dve aggasaavakaa, anomo naamupa.t.thaako, nakulaa ca  sujaataa ca dve aggasaavikaa, naagarukkhova bodhi, a.t.thapa.n.naasahatthubbedha.m sariira.m ahosi, navuti  vassasahassaani aayuppamaa.nanti.
[21] ``revatassa aparena, sobhito naama naayako.
[22] samaahito santacitto, asamo appa.tipuggalo''ti..

[03] tassa aparabhaage eka.m asa"nkhyeyya.m atikkamitvaa ekasmi.myeva kappe tayo buddhaa nibbatti.msu  ^b^anomadassii padumo naarado^eb^ti. ^b^anomadassissa^eb^ bhagavato tayo saavakasannipaataa  ahesu.m. pa.thamasannipaate bhikkhuu a.t.thasatasahassaani ahesu.m, dutiye satta, tatiye cha. tadaa  bodhisatto ^a^V1.0046^ea^ eko yakkhasenaapati ahosi mahiddhiko mahaanubhaavo  anekako.tisatasahassaana.m ^a^P1.0036^ea^ yakkhaana.m adhipati. so ``buddho uppanno''ti sutvaa  aagantvaa buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusa"nghassa mahaadaana.m adaasi. satthaapi na.m ``anaagate buddho  bhavissasii''ti byaakaasi. anomadassissa pana bhagavato candavatii naama nagara.m ahosi, yasavaa  naama raajaa pitaa, yasodharaa naama maataa, nisabho ca anomo ca dve aggasaavakaa, varu.no  naamupa.t.thaako, sundarii ca sumanaa ca dve aggasaavikaa, ajjunarukkho bodhi, a.t.thapa.n.naasahatthubbedha.m  sariira.m ahosi, vassasatasahassa.m aayuuti.
[21] ``sobhitassa aparena, sambuddho dvipaduttamo.
[22] anomadassii amitayaso, tejassii duratikkamo''ti..

[03] tassa ^a^M1.0044^ea^ aparabhaage ^b^padumo^eb^ naama satthaa udapaadi. tassaapi tayo  bhaavakasannipaataa ahesu.m. pa.thamasannipaate ko.tisatasahassabhikkhuu ahesu.m, dutiye tii.ni  satasahassaani, tatiye agaamake ara~n~ne mahaavanasa.n.davaasiina.m bhikkhuuna.m dve satasahassaani. tadaa  tathaagate tasmi.m vanasa.n.de vasante bodhisatto siiho hutvaa satthaara.m nirodhasamaapatti.m samaapanna.m disvaa  pasannacitto vanditvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa piitisomanassajaato tikkhattu.m siihanaada.m naditvaa sattaaha.m  buddhaaramma.napiiti.m avijahitvaa piitisukheneva gocaraaya apakkamitvaa jiivitapariccaaga.m katvaa  payirupaasamaano a.t.thaasi. satthaa sattaahaccayena nirodhaa vu.t.thito siiha.m oloketvaa  ``bhikkhusa"nghepi citta.m pasaadetvaa sa"ngha.m vandissatiiti bhikkhusa"ngho aagacchatuu''ti cintesi.  bhikkhuu taavadeva aagami.msu. siiho sa"nghe citta.m pasaadesi. satthaa tassa mana.m oloketvaa  ``anaagate buddho bhavissasii''ti byaakaasi. padumassa pana bhagavato campaka.m naama nagara.m  ahosi, asamo naama raajaa pitaa, asamaa naama devii maataa, saalo ca upasaalo ca dve  aggasaavakaa, varu.no naamupa.t.thaako, raamaa ca suraamaa ca dve aggasaavikaa, so.narukkho naama bodhi,  a.t.thapa.n.naasahatthubbedha.m sariira.m ahosi, aayu vassasatasahassanti.
[21] ``anomadassissa aparena, sambuddho dvipaduttamo.
[22] padumo naama naamena, asamo appa.tipuggalo''ti..

[03] tassa aparabhaage ^b^naarado^eb^ naama satthaa udapaadi. tassaapi tayo saavakasannipaataa  ahesu.m. pa.thamasannipaate ko.tisatasahassabhikkhuu ahesu.m, dutiye ^a^P1.0037^ea^  navutiko.tisahassaani, tatiye asiitiko.tisahassaani ^a^V1.0047^ea^. tadaa bodhisatto  isipabbajja.m pabbajitvaa pa~ncasu abhi~n~naasu a.t.thasu ca samaapattiisu ci.n.navasii hutvaa buddhappamukhassa  bhikkhusa"nghassa mahaadaana.m datvaa lohitacandanena puuja.m akaasi. sopi na.m ``anaagate buddho  bhavissasii''ti byaakaasi. tassa bhagavato dha~n~navatii naama nagara.m ahosi, sudevo naama khattiyo  pitaa, anomaa naama maataa, saddasaalo ca jitamitto ca dve aggasaavakaa, vaase.t.tho naamupa.t.thaako  ^a^M1.0045^ea^, uttaraa ca phaggunii ca dve aggasaavikaa, mahaaso.narukkho naama bodhi, sariira.m  a.t.thaasiitihatthubbedha.m ahosi, navutivassasahassaani aayuuti.
[21] ``padumassa aparena, sambuddho dvipaduttamo.
[22] naarado naama naamena, asamo appa.tipuggalo''ti..

[03] naaradabuddhassa aparabhaage eka.m asa"nkhyeyya.m atikkamitvaa ito satasahassakappamatthake ekasmi.m  kappe ekova ^b^padumuttara^eb^buddho naama udapaadi. tassaapi tayo saavakasannipaataa ahesu.m. pa.thame  ko.tisatasahassabhikkhuu ahesu.m, dutiye vebhaarapabbate navutiko.tisahassaani, tatiye  asiitiko.tisahassaani. tadaa bodhisatto ja.tilo naama mahaara.t.thiyo hutvaa buddhappamukhassa  bhikkhusa"nghassa saciivara.m daana.m adaasi. sopi na.m ``anaagate buddho bhavissasii''ti byaakaasi.  padumuttarassa pana bhagavato kaale titthiyaa naama naahesu.m. sabbe devamanussaa buddhameva sara.na.m  agama.msu. tassa nagara.m ha.msavatii naama ahosi, pitaa aanando naama khattiyo, maataa sujaataa  naama devii, devalo ca sujaato ca dve aggasaavakaa, sumano naamupa.t.thaako, amitaa ca asamaa ca dve  aggasaavikaa, salalarukkho bodhi, sariira.m a.t.thapa.n.naasahatthubbedha.m ahosi, sariirappabhaa samantato  dvaadasa yojanaani ga.nhi, vassasatasahassa.m aayuuti.
[21] ``naaradassa aparena, sambuddho dvipaduttamo.
[22] padumuttaro naama jino, akkhobho saagaruupamo''ti..

[03] tassa aparabhaage sattati kappasahassaani atikkamitvaa ^b^sumedho sujaato^eb^ caati ekasmi.m  kappe dve buddhaa nibbatti.msu. ^b^sumedhassaapi^eb^ tayo saavakasannipaataa ahesu.m, pa.thamasannipaate  sudassananagare ko.tisatakhii.naasavaa ahesu.m, dutiye pana navutiko.tiyo, tatiye asiitiko.tiyo.  tadaa bodhisatto uttaro naama maa.navo hutvaa nidahitvaa .thapita.myeva asiitiko.tidhana.m ^a^V1.0048^ea^  ^a^P1.0038^ea^ vissajjetvaa buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusa"nghassa mahaadaana.m datvaa dhamma.m sutvaa sara.nesu  pati.t.thaaya ^a^M1.0046^ea^ nikkhamitvaa pabbaji. sopi na.m ``anaagate buddho bhavissasii''ti  byaakaasi. sumedhassa bhagavato sudassana.m naama nagara.m ahosi, sudatto naama raajaa pitaa, maataapi  sudattaa naama, sara.no ca sabbakaamo ca dve aggasaavakaa, saagaro naamupa.t.thaako, raamaa ca suraamaa ca  dve aggasaavikaa, mahaaniiparukkho bodhi, sariira.m a.t.thaasiitihatthubbedha.m ahosi, aayu navuti  vassasahassaaniiti.
[21] ``padumuttarassa aparena, sumedho naama naayako.
[22] duraasado uggatejo, sabbalokuttamo munii''ti..

[03] tassa aparabhaage ^b^sujaato^eb^ naama satthaa udapaadi. tassaapi tayo saavakasannipaataa  ahesu.m. pa.thamasannipaate sa.t.thi bhikkhusatasahassaani ahesu.m, dutiye pa~n~naasa.m, tatiye cattaaliisa.m.  tadaa bodhisatto cakkavattiraajaa hutvaa ``buddho uppanno''ti sutvaa upasa"nkamitvaa dhamma.m sutvaa  buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusa"nghassa saddhi.m sattahi ratanehi catumahaadiiparajja.m datvaa satthu santike  pabbaji. sakalara.t.thavaasino ra.t.thuppaada.m gahetvaa aaraamikakicca.m saadhentaa buddhappamukhassa  bhikkhusa"nghassa nicca.m mahaadaana.m ada.msu. sopi na.m satthaa ``anaagate buddho bhavissasii''ti  byaakaasi. tassa bhagavato nagara.m suma"ngala.m naama ahosi, uggato naama raajaa pitaa, pabhaavatii  naama maataa, sudassano ca sudevo ca dve aggasaavakaa, naarado naamupa.t.thaako, naagaa ca naagasamaalaa  ca dve aggasaavikaa, mahaave.lurukkho bodhi. so kira mandacchiddo ghanakkhandho upari niggataahi  mahaasaakhaahi morapi~nchakalaapo viya virocittha. tassa bhagavato sariira.m pa.n.naasahatthubbedha.m  ahosi, aayu navuti vassasahassaaniiti.
[21] ``tattheva ma.n.dakappamhi, sujaato naama naayako.
[22] siihahanusabhakkhandho, appameyyo duraasado''ti..

[03] tassa aparabhaage ito a.t.thaarasakappasatamatthake ekasmi.m kappe ^b^piyadassii, atthadassii,  dhammadassii^eb^ti tayo buddhaa nibbatti.msu. ^b^piyadassissaa^eb^pi tayo saavakasannipaataa ahesu.m.  pa.thame ko.tisatasahassaa bhikkhuu ahesu.m, dutiye navutiko.tiyo, tatiye asiitiko.tiyo. tadaa  bodhisatto kassapo naama maa.navo ti.n.na.m vedaana.m paara.m gato hutvaa ^a^M1.0047^ea^ satthu  dhammadesana.m sutvaa ko.tisatasahassadhanapariccaagena sa"nghaaraama.m ^a^P1.0039^ea^ kaaretvaa sara.nesu ca  siilesu ca pati.t.thaasi. atha na.m ^a^V1.0049^ea^ satthaa ``a.t.thaarasakappasataccayena buddho  bhavissasii''ti byaakaasi. tassa bhagavato anoma.m naama nagara.m ahosi, pitaa sudinno naama  raajaa, maataa candaa naama devii, paalito ca sabbadassii ca dve aggasaavakaa, sobhito naamupa.t.thaako,  sujaataa ca dhammadinnaa ca dve aggasaavikaa, kakudharukkho bodhi, sariira.m asiitihatthubbedha.m ahosi,  navuti vassasahassaani aayuuti.
[21] ``sujaatassa aparena, sayambhuu lokanaayako.
[22] duraasado asamasamo, piyadassii mahaayaso''ti..

[03] tassa aparabhaage ^b^atthadassii^eb^ naama satthaa udapaadi. tassaapi tayo saavakasannipaataa  ahesu.m. pa.thame a.t.thanavuti bhikkhusatasahassaani ahesu.m, dutiye a.t.thaasiitisatasahassaani, tathaa  tatiye. tadaa bodhisatto susiimo naama mahiddhiko taapaso hutvaa devalokato mandaaravapupphacchatta.m  aaharitvaa satthaara.m puujesi, sopi na.m ``anaagate buddho bhavissasii''ti byaakaasi. tassa  bhagavato sobhita.m naama nagara.m ahosi, saagaro naama raajaa pitaa, sudassanaa naama maataa, santo  ca upasanto ca dve aggasaavakaa, abhayo naamupa.t.thaako, dhammaa ca sudhammaa ca dve aggasaavikaa,  campakarukkho bodhi, sariira.m asiitihatthubbedha.m ahosi, sariirappabhaa samantato sabbakaala.m yojanamatta.m  pharitvaa a.t.thaasi, aayu vassasatasahassanti.
[21] ``tattheva ma.n.dakappamhi, atthadassii naraasabho.
[22] mahaatama.m nihantvaana, patto sambodhimuttama''nti..

[03] tassa aparabhaage ^b^dhammadassii^eb^ naama satthaa udapaadi. tassaapi tayo saavakasannipaataa  ahesu.m. pa.thame ko.tisata.m bhikkhuu ahesu.m, dutiye sattatiko.tiyo, tatiye asiitiko.tiyo. tadaa  bodhisatto sakko devaraajaa hutvaa dibbagandhapupphehi ca dibbatuuriyehi ca puuja.m akaasi, sopi na.m  ``anaagate buddho bhavissasii''ti byaakaasi. tassa bhagavato sara.na.m naama nagara.m ahosi, pitaa  sara.no naama raajaa, maataa sunandaa naama, padumo ca phussadevo ca dve aggasaavakaa, sunetto  naamupa.t.thaako ^a^M1.0048^ea^, khemaa ca sabbanaamaa ca dve aggasaavikaa, ratta"nkurarukkho bodhi,  ``bimbijaalo''tipi vuccati, sariira.m panassa asiitihatthubbedha.m ahosi, vassasatasahassa.m aayuuti.
[21] ``tattheva ^a^V1.0050^ea^ ma.n.dakappamhi, dhammadassii mahaayaso.
[22] tamandhakaara.m vidhamitvaa, atirocati sadevake''ti..

[03] tassa ^a^P1.0040^ea^ aparabhaage ito catunavutikappamatthake ekasmi.m kappe ekova  ^b^siddhattho^eb^ naama buddho udapaadi. tassaapi tayo saavakasannipaataa ahesu.m. pa.thamasannipaate  ko.tisatasahassa.m bhikkhuu ahesu.m, dutiye navutiko.tiyo, tatiye asiitiko.tiyo. tadaa bodhisatto  uggatejo abhi~n~naabalasampanno ma"ngalo naama taapaso hutvaa mahaajambuphala.m aaharitvaa tathaagatassa  adaasi. satthaa ta.m phala.m paribhu~njitvaa ``catunavutikappamatthake buddho bhavissasii''ti bodhisatta.m  byaakaasi. tassa bhagavato nagara.m vebhaara.m naama ahosi, pitaa jayaseno naama raajaa, maataa  suphassaa naama, sambalo ca sumitto ca dve aggasaavakaa, revato naamupa.t.thaako, siivalii ca suraamaa  ca dve aggasaavikaa, ka.nikaararukkho bodhi, sariira.m sa.t.thihatthubbedha.m ahosi, vassasatasahassa.m  aayuuti.
[21] ``dhammadassissa aparena, siddhattho naama naayako.
[22] nihanitvaa tama.m sabba.m, suuriyo abbhuggato yathaa''ti..

[03] tassa aparabhaage ito dvaanavutikappamatthake ^b^tisso phusso^eb^ti ekasmi.m kappe dve buddhaa  nibbatti.msu. ^b^tissassa^eb^ bhagavato tayo saavakasannipaataa ahesu.m. pa.thamasannipaate bhikkhuuna.m  ko.tisata.m ahosi, dutiye navutiko.tiyo, tatiye asiitiko.tiyo. tadaa bodhisatto mahaabhogo  mahaayaso sujaato naama khattiyo hutvaa isipabbajja.m pabbajitvaa mahiddhikabhaava.m patvaa ``buddho  uppanno''ti sutvaa dibbamandaaravapadumapaaricchattakapupphaani aadaaya catuparisamajjhe gacchanta.m tathaagata.m  puujesi, aakaase pupphavitaana.m akaasi. sopi na.m satthaa ``ito dvaanavutikappe buddho  bhavissasii''ti byaakaasi. tassa bhagavato khema.m naama nagara.m ahosi, pitaa janasandho naama  khattiyo, maataa padumaa naama ^a^M1.0049^ea^, brahmadevo ca udayo ca dve aggasaavakaa, sama"ngo  naamupa.t.thaako, phussaa ca sudattaa ca dve aggasaavikaa, asanarukkho bodhi, sariira.m sa.t.thihatthubbedha.m  ahosi, vassasatasahassa.m aayuuti.
[21] ``siddhatthassa aparena, asamo appa.tipuggalo.
[22] anantasiilo amitayaso, tisso lokagganaayako''ti..

[03] tassa ^a^V1.0051^ea^ aparabhaage ^b^phusso^eb^ naama satthaa udapaadi. tassaapi tayo  saavakasannipaataa ahesu.m. pa.thamasannipaate sa.t.thi bhikkhusatasahassaani ahesu.m, dutiye pa.n.naasa,  tatiye dvatti.msa. tadaa bodhisatto vijitaavii naama khattiyo hutvaa mahaarajja.m pahaaya satthu santike  pabbajitvaa tii.ni pi.takaani ^a^P1.0041^ea^ uggahetvaa mahaajanassa dhammakatha.m kathesi,  siilapaarami~nca puuresi. sopi na.m ``buddho bhavissasii''ti tatheva byaakaasi. tassa bhagavato  kaasii naama nagara.m ahosi, jayaseno naama raajaa pitaa, sirimaa naama maataa, surakkhito ca  dhammaseno ca dve aggasaavakaa, sabhiyo naamupa.t.thaako, caalaa ca upacaalaa ca dve aggasaavikaa,  aamalakarukkho bodhi, sariira.m a.t.thapa.n.naasahatthubbedha.m ahosi, navuti vassasahassaani aayuuti.
[21] ``tattheva ma.n.dakappamhi, ahu satthaa anuttaro.
[22] anuupamo asamasamo, phusso lokagganaayako''ti..
