[03] tattha ^b^dhammo^eb^ti pa~ncasiilaa.t.thasiiladasasiilaani tii.ni sucaritaani  sattati.msabodhipakkhiyadhammaa amatamahaanibbaananti sabbopesa dhammo naama. ^b^akaddamo^eb^ti  raagadosamohamaanadi.t.thikilesakaddamaana.m abhaavena akaddamo. iminaa sesadhammato vinivattetvaa  nibbaanameva dasseti. ``yaavataa, bhikkhave, dhammaa sa"nkhataa vaa asa"nkhataa vaa, viraago tesa.m  dhammaana.m aggamakkhaayati, yadida.m madanimmadano pipaasavinayo aalayasamugghaato va.t.tupacchedo  ta.nhakkhayo viraago nirodho nibbaana''nti (a0 ni0  4.34; itivu0 90) hi vutta.m, tadeva  dassento, taata cuu.latu.n.dila, aha.m nibbaanata.laaka.m ``rahado''ti kathemi.  jaatijaraabyaadhimara.naadiini hi tattha natthi, sace mara.nato mu~ncitukaamo, nibbaanagaamini.m pa.tipada.m  ga.nhaati. upanissayapaccayavasena kira bodhisatto eva.m kathesi.

[03] ^b^paapa.m^eb^ ^a^M3.0273^ea^ ^b^sedamala^eb^nti ^a^P3.0291^ea^ taata cuu.latu.n.dila, paapa.m  sedamalasadisattaa ``sedamala''nti poraa.nakapa.n.ditehi kathita.m. ta.m paneta.m ekavidhena paapa.m yadida.m  manopadoso, duvidhena paapa.m paapaka~nca siila.m, paapikaa ca di.t.thi, tividhena paapa.m tii.ni duccaritaani,  catubbidhena paapa.m cattaari agatigamanaani, pa~ncavidhena paapa.m pa~nca cetokhilaa, chabbidhena paapa.m cha  agaaravaa, sattavidhena paapa.m satta asaddhammaa, a.t.thavidhena paapa.m a.t.tha micchattaa, navavidhena paapa.m nava  aaghaatavatthuuni, dasavidhena paapa.m dasa akusalakammapathaa, bahuvidhena paapa.m raago doso mohoti  ekakadukatikaadivasena vibhattaa akusalaa dhammaa, iti sabbampeta.m paapa.m  ``sariiranissitasedamalasadisa''nti pa.n.ditehi kathita.m.

[03] ^b^siila^eb^nti pa~ncasiila.m dasasiila.m catupaarisuddhisiila.m. ``ida.m, taata, siila.m  catujjaatigandhavilepanasadisa''nti vadati. ^b^tassaa^eb^ti tassa silassa gandho tiisu vayesu  kadaaci na chijjati, sakalaloka.m pattharitvaa gacchati.
[21] ``na pupphagandho pa.tivaatameti, na candana.m taggaramallikaa vaa.
[22] sata~nca gandho pa.tivaatameti, sabbaa disaa sappuriso pavaayati..
[21] ``candana.m ^a^V3.0255^ea^ tagara.m vaapi, uppala.m atha vassikii.
[22] etesa.m gandhajaataana.m, siilagandho anuttaro..
[21] ``appamatto aya.m gandho, yvaaya.m tagaracandana.m.
[22] yo ca siilavata.m gandho, vaati devesu uttamo''ti.. (dha0 pa0 54-56).

[03] ^b^nandanti sariiraghaatino^eb^ti taata cuu.latu.n.dila, ime a~n~naa.namanussaa ``madhurama.msa.m  khaadissaama, puttadaarampi khaadaapessaamaa''ti paa.naatipaata.m karontaa nandanti tussanti, paa.naatipaato  aasevito bhaavito bahuliikato nirayasa.mvattaniko hoti, tiracchaanayoni...pe0...  pettivisayasa.mvattaniko hoti, yo sabbalahuko paa.naatipaatassa vipaako, so manussabhuutassa  appaayukasa.mvattaniko hotiiti ima.m paa.naatipaate aadiinava.m na jaananti. ajaanantaa --
[21] ``madhuvaa ^a^M3.0274^ea^ ma~n~nati baalo, yaava paapa.m na paccati.
[22] yadaa ca paccati paapa.m, baalo dukkha.m nigacchatii''ti.. (dha0 pa0 69) --
[25] madhurasa~n~nino hutvaa --
[21] ``caranti baalaa dummedhaa, amitteneva attanaa.
[22] karontaa paapaka.m kamma.m, ya.m hoti ka.tukapphala''nti.. (dha0 pa0 66) --
[25] ettakampi na jaananti.
[21] ``na ta.m kamma.m kata.m saadhu, ya.m katvaa anutappati.
[22] yassa assumukho roda.m, vipaaka.m pa.tisevatii''ti.. (dha0 pa0 67).

[03] ^b^na ca nandanti sariiradhaarino^eb^ti taata cuu.latu.n.dila, ye panete sariiradhaarino sattaa, te  attano mara.ne ^a^P3.0292^ea^ aagacchante .thapetvaa  siihamigaraajahatthaajaaniiyaassaajaaniiyakhii.naasave avasesaa bodhisatta.m aadi.m katvaa abhaayantaa naama  natthi.
[21] ``sabbe ^a^V3.0256^ea^ tasanti da.n.dassa, sabbe bhaayanti maccuno.
[22] attaana.m upama.m katvaa, na haneyya na ghaataye''ti.. (dha0 pa0 129).

[03] ^b^pu.n.naayaa^eb^ti gu.napu.n.naaya. ^b^pu.n.namaasiyaa^eb^ti pu.n.nacandayuttaaya, maasa.m vaa puuretvaa  .thitaaya. tadaa kira pu.n.namaasii uposathadivaso hoti. ^b^ramamaanaava jahanti jiivita^eb^nti  taata cuu.latu.n.dila, maa soci maa paridevi, mara.nassa naama te bhaayanti, yesa.m abbhantare  siilaadigu.naa natthi. maya.m pana siilaacaarasampannaa pu~n~navanto, tasmaa amhaadisaa sattaa ramamaanaava  jahanti jiivitanti.

[03] eva.m mahaasatto madhurena sarena buddhalii.laaya dhamma.m desesi. mahaajanakaayaa a"nguliyo  pho.tesu.m, celukkhepaa ca pavatti.msu, saadhukaarasaddapu.n.na.m antalikkha.m ahosi. baaraa.nasiraajaa  bodhisatta.m rajjena puujetvaa mahallikaaya yasa.m datvaa ubhopi te gandhodakena nhaapetvaa gandhaadiihi  vilimpaapetvaa giivaasu ma.niratanaani pi.landhaapetvaa ghara.m netvaa putta.t.thaane .thapetvaa mahantena parivaarena  pa.tijaggi. bodhisatto ra~n~no ^a^M3.0275^ea^ pa~nca siilaani adaasi. sabbe  baaraa.nasivaasino ca kaasira.t.thavaasino ca pa~nca siilaani rakkhi.msu. mahaasatto nesa.m  pakkhadivasesu dhamma.m desesi, vinicchaye nisiiditvaa a.d.de tiiresi. tasmi.m dharamaane kuu.ta.d.dakaarakaa  naama naahesu.m. aparabhaage raajaa kaalamakaasi. mahaasatto tassa sariiraparihaara.m kaaretvaa  vinicchaye potthake likhaapetvaa ``ima.m potthaka.m oloketvaa a.d.da.m tiireyyaathaa''ti vatvaa mahaajanassa  dhamma.m desetvaa appamaadena ovaada.m datvaa sabbesa.m rodantaana.m paridevantaana~n~neva saddhi.m cuu.latu.n.dilena  ara~n~na.m paavisi. tadaa bodhisattassa ovaado sa.t.thi vassasahassaani pavatti.
[03] satthaa ^a^P3.0293^ea^ ima.m dhammadesana.m aaharitvaa saccaani pakaasetvaa jaataka.m  samodhaanesi, saccapariyosaane so mara.nabhiiruko bhikkhu sotaapattiphale pati.t.thahi.
[03] tadaa raajaa aanando ahosi, cuu.latu.n.dilo mara.nabhiiruko bhikkhu, parisaa buddhaparisaa,  mahaatu.n.dilo pana ahameva ahosinti.
[06] tu.n.dilajaatakava.n.nanaa tatiyaa.

[03] ^b^si"ngiimigo^eb^ti ^a^V3.0257^ea^ ida.m satthaa ve.luvane viharanto aanandattherassa attano  atthaaya jiivitapariccaaga.m aarabbha kathesi. vatthu yaava dhanuggahapayojanaa ^b^kha.n.dahaalajaatake^eb^  (jaa0 2.22.982 aadayo) dhanapaalavissajjana.m ^b^cuu.laha.msamahaaha.msajaatake^eb^ (jaa0 1.15.133  aadayo) kathita.m. tadaa hi bhikkhuu dhammasabhaaya.m katha.m samu.t.thaapesu.m ``aavuso,  dhammabha.n.daagaarikaaanandatthero sekkhapa.tisambhidaappatto hutvaa dhanapaalake aagacchante sammaasambuddhassa  jiivita.m pariccajii''ti. satthaa aagantvaa ``kaaya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathaaya  sannisinnaa''ti pucchitvaa ``imaaya naamaa''ti vutte ``na, bhikkhave, idaaneva, pubbepi aanando  mayha.m jiivita.m pariccajiyevaa''ti vatvaa atiita.m aahari.

[03] atiite raajagahassa pubbapasse saalindiyo naama braahma.nagaamo hoti. tadaa bodhisatto  tasmi.m gaame kassakabraahma.nakule nibbattitvaa ^a^M3.0276^ea^ vayappatto ku.tumba.m sa.n.thapetvaa tassa  gaamassa pubbuttaraaya disaaya ekasmi.m gaamakhette kariisasahassamatta.m kasi.m kaaresi. so ekadivasa.m  manussehi saddhi.m khetta.m gantvaa kammakaare ``kasathaa''ti aa.naapetvaa mukhadhovanatthaaya khettako.tiya.m  mahanta.m sobbha.m upasa"nkami. tasmi.m kho pana sobbhe eko suva.n.nava.n.no kakka.tako pa.tivasati  abhiruupo paasaadiko. bodhisatto dantaka.t.tha.m khaaditvaa ta.m sobbha.m otari. tassa  mukhadhovanakaale ^a^P3.0294^ea^ kakka.tako santika.m aagamaasi. atha na.m so ukkhipitvaa  attano uttarisaa.takantare nipajjaapetvaa gahetvaa khette kattabbakicca.m katvaa gacchanto tattheva na.m sobbhe  pakkhipitvaa geha.m agamaasi. tato pa.t.thaaya khetta.m aagacchanto pa.thama.m ta.m sobbha.m gantvaa kakka.taka.m  ukkhipitvaa uttarisaa.takantare nipajjaapetvaa pacchaa kammanta.m vicaaresi. iti tesa.m a~n~nama~n~na.m  vissaaso da.lho ahosi.

[03] bodhisatto nibaddha.m khetta.m aagacchati, akkhiisu ca panassa pa~nca pasaadaa tii.ni ma.n.dalaani  visuddhaani hutvaa pa~n~naayanti. athassa khettako.tiya.m ekasmi.m taale kaakakulaavake kaakii  akkhiini disvaa khaaditukaamaa hutvaa kaaka.m aaha -- ``saami, doha.lo me uppanno''ti. ``ki.m  doha.lo naamaa''ti? ``etassa braahma.nassa akkhiini khaaditukaamaamhii''ti. ``duddoha.lo te  uppanno, ko etaani aaharitu.m sakkhissatii''ti. ``tva.m na sakkosii''ti ahampeta.m jaanaami, yo  panesa taalassa aviduure vammiko, ettha ka.nhasappo vasati. ``ta.m upa.t.thaha, so eta.m .da.msitvaa  maaressati, athassa akkhiini uppaa.tetvaa tva.m aaharissasii''ti ^a^V3.0258^ea^. so ``saadhuu''ti  sampa.ticchitvaa tato pa.t.thaaya ka.nhasappa.m upa.t.thahi. bodhisattenapi vaapitasassaana.m gabbhaggaha.nakaale  kakka.tako mahaa ahosi. athekadivasa.m sappo kaakamaaha ``samma, tva.m nibaddha.m ma.m upa.t.thahasi, ki.m  te karomii''ti. ``saami, tumhaaka.m daasiyaa etassa khettasaamikassa akkhiisu doha.lo uppajji,  svaaha.m tumhaaka.m aanubhaavena tassa akkhiini labhissaamiiti tumhe upa.t.thahaamii''ti. sappo ``hotu,  nayida.m garuka.m, labhissasii''ti ta.m assaasetvaa puna divase braahma.nassa aagamanamagge kedaaramariyaada.m  ^a^P3.0295^ea^ ^a^M3.0277^ea^ nissaaya ti.nehi pa.ticchanno hutvaa tassaagamana.m olokento  nipajji.

[03] bodhisatto aagacchanto pa.thama.m sobbha.m otaritvaa mukha.m dhovitvaa sineha.m paccupa.t.thaapetvaa  suva.n.nakakka.taka.m aali"ngetvaa uttarisaa.takantare nipajjaapetvaa khetta.m paavisi. sappo ta.m aagacchanta.m  disvaava vegena pakkhanditvaa pi.n.dikama.mse .da.msitvaa tattheva paatetvaa vammika.m sandhaaya palaayi.  bodhisattassa patana~nca kakka.takassa saa.takantarato la"nghana~nca kaakassa aagantvaa bodhisattassa ure  niliiyana~nca apacchaaapurima.m ahosi. kaako niliiyitvaa akkhiini tu.n.dena pahari. kakka.tako  ``ima.m kaaka.m nissaaya mama sahaayassa bhaya.m uppanna.m, etasmi.m gahite sappo aagacchissatii''ti  sa.n.daasena ga.nhanto viya kaaka.m giivaaya.m a.lena da.lha.m gahetvaa kilametvaa thoka.m sithilamakaasi.  kaako ``kissa ma.m samma, cha.d.detvaa palaayasi, esa ma.m kakka.tako bhiyyo vihe.theti, yaava na  maraami, taava ehii''ti sappa.m pakkosanto pa.thama.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``si"ngiimigo aayatacakkhunetto, a.t.thittaco vaarisayo alomo.
[22] tenaabhibhuuto kapa.na.m rudaami, hare sakhaa kissa nu ma.m jahaasii''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^si"ngiimigo^eb^ti si"ngiisuva.n.nava.n.nataaya vaa a.lasa"nkhaataana.m vaa si"ngaana.m  atthitaaya kakka.tako vutto. ^b^aayatacakkhunetto^eb^ti diighehi cakkhusa"nkhaatehi nettehi  samannaagato. a.t.thimeva taco assaati ^b^a.t.thittaco. hare sakhaa^eb^ti aalapanameta.m, ambho  sahaayaati attho.
[03] sappo ta.m sutvaa mahanta.m pha.na.m katvaa kaaka.m assaasento agamaasi. satthaa imamattha.m diipento  abhisambuddho hutvaa dutiya.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``so ^a^V3.0259^ea^ ^a^P3.0296^ea^ ^a^M3.0278^ea^ passasanto mahataa  pha.nena, bhuja"ngamo kakka.tamajjhapatto.
[22] sakhaa sakhaara.m paritaayamaano, bhuja"ngama.m kakka.tako gahesii''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^kakka.tamajjhapatto^eb^ti kakka.taka.m sampatto. ^b^sakhaa sakhaara^eb^nti sahaayo sahaaya.m.  ``saka.m sakhaara''ntipi paa.tho, attano sahaayanti attho. ^b^paritaayamaano^eb^ti rakkhamaano.  ^b^gahesii^eb^ti dutiyena a.lena giivaaya.m da.lha.m gahesi.

[03] atha na.m kilametvaa thoka.m sithilamakaasi. atha sappo ``kakka.takaa naama neva kaakama.msa.m  khaadanti, na sappama.msa.m, atha kena nu kho kaara.nena aya.m amhe ga.nhii''ti cintetvaa ta.m pucchanto  tatiya.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``na vaayasa.m no pana ka.nhasappa.m, ghaasatthiko kakka.tako adeyya.
[22] pucchaami ta.m aayatacakkhunetta, atha kissa hetumha ubho gahiitaa''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^ghaasatthiko^eb^ti aahaaratthiko hutvaa. ^b^adeyyaa^eb^tiaadiyeyya, na-kaarena  yojetvaa na ga.nhiiti attho.
[03] ta.m sutvaa kakka.tako gaha.nakaara.na.m kathento dve gaathaa abhaasi --
[21] ``aya.m puriso mama atthakaamo, yo ma.m gahetvaana dakaaya neti.
[22] tasmi.m mate dukkhamanappaka.m me, aha~nca eso ca ubho na homa..
[21] ``mama~nca disvaana pavaddhakaaya.m, sabbo jano hi.msitumeva micche.
[22] saadu~nca thuula~nca mudu~nca ma.msa.m, kaakaapi ma.m disva vihe.thayeyyu''nti..

[03] tattha ^a^P3.0297^ea^ ^a^M3.0279^ea^ ^b^aya^eb^nti bodhisatta.m niddisati.  ^b^atthakaamo^eb^ti hitakaamo. ^b^dakaaya netii^eb^ti yo ma.m sampiyaayamaano uttarisaa.takena  gahetvaana udakaaya neti, attano vasanakasobbha.m paapeti. ^b^tasmi.m mate^eb^ti sace so imasmi.m  .thaane marissati, etasmi.m mate mama kaayika.m cetasika.m mahanta.m dukkha.m bhavissatiiti diipeti.  ^b^ubho na homaa^eb^ti dvepi janaa na bhavissaama. ^b^mama~nca disvaanaa^eb^ti gaathaaya ayamattho  -- ida~nca apara.m kaara.na.m, imasmi.m mate anaatha.m nippaccaya.m ma.m pava.d.dhitakaaya.m ^a^V3.0260^ea^ disvaa  sabbo jano ``imassa kakka.takassa saadu~nca thuula~nca mudu~nca ma.msa''nti ma.m maaretu.m iccheyya, na  kevala~nca jano manusso, tiracchaanabhuutaa kaakaapi ma.m disvaa vihe.thayeyyu.m viheseyyu.m maareyyu.m.
[03] ta.m sutvaa sappo cintesi ``ekenupaayena ima.m va~ncetvaa kaaka~nca attaana~nca mocessaamii''ti.  atha na.m va~ncetukaamo cha.t.tha.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``sacetassa hetumha ubho gahiitaa, u.t.thaatu pose visamaavamaami.
[22] mama~nca kaaka~nca pamu~nca khippa.m, pure visa.m gaa.lhamupeti macca''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^sacetassa hetuu^eb^ti sace etassa kaara.naa. ^b^u.t.thaatuu^eb^ti nibbiso hotu.  ^b^visamaavamaamii^eb^ti ahamassa visa.m aaka.d.dhaami, nibbisa.m na.m karomi. ^b^pure visa.m  gaa.lhamupeti macca^eb^nti ima~nhi macca.m mayaa anaavamiyamaana.m visa.m gaa.lha.m balava.m hutvaa upagaccheyya,  ta.m yaava na upagacchati, taavadeva amhe dvepi jane khippa.m mu~ncaati.

[03] ta.m sutvaa kakka.tako cintesi ``aya.m ekenupaayena ma.m dvepi jane vissajjaapetvaa  palaayitukaamo, mayha.m upaayakosalla.m na jaanaati, aha.m daani yathaa sappo sa~ncaritu.m sakkoti, eva.m  a.la.m sithila.m karissaami, kaaka.m pana neva vissajjessaamii''ti eva.m cintetvaa sattama.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``sappa.m ^a^P3.0298^ea^ pamokkhaami na taava kaaka.m, pa.tibandhako hohiti taava  kaako.
[22] purisa~nca disvaana sukhi.m aroga.m, kaaka.m pamokkhaami yatheva sappa''nti..

[03] tattha ^a^M3.0280^ea^ ^b^pa.tibandhako^eb^ti paa.tibhogo. ^b^yatheva sappa^eb^nti yathaa  bhavanta.m sappa.m mu~ncaami, tathaa kaaka.m pamokkhaami, kevala.m tva.m imassa braahma.nassa sariirato siigha.m  visa.m aavamaahiiti.

[03] eva~nca pana vatvaa tassa sukhasa~ncaara.nattha.m a.la.m sithilamakaasi. sappo visa.m aavamitvaa  mahaasattassa sariira.m nibbisa.m akaasi. so niddukkho u.t.thaaya pakativa.n.neneva a.t.thaasi. kakka.tako  ``sace ime dvepi janaa arogaa bhavissanti, mayha.m sahaayassa va.d.dhi naama na bhavissati,  vinaasessaami ne''ti cintetvaa kattarikaaya uppalamaku.la.m viya a.lehi ubhinnampi ^a^V3.0261^ea^  siisa.m kappetvaa jiivitakkhaya.m paapesi. kaakiipi tamhaa .thaanaa palaayi. bodhisatto sappassa  sariira.m da.n.dake ve.thetvaa gumbapi.t.the khipi. suva.n.nakakka.taka.m sobbhe vissajjetvaa nhatvaa  saalindiyagaamameva gato. tato pa.t.thaaya kakka.takena saddhi.m adhikataro vissaaso ahosi.
[03] satthaa ima.m dhammadesana.m aaharitvaa saccaani pakaasetvaa jaataka.m samodhaanento osaanagaathamaaha  --
[21] ``kaako tadaa devadatto ahosi, maaro pana ka.nhasappo ahosi.
[22] aanandabhaddo kakka.tako ahosi, aha.m tadaa braahma.no homi satthaa''ti..
[03] saccapariyosaane bahuu sotaapannaadayo ahesu.m. kaakii pana gaathaaya na vuttaa, saa  ci~ncamaa.navikaa ahosiiti.
[06] suva.n.nakakka.takajaatakava.n.nanaa catutthaa.

[03] ^b^saku.no^eb^ ^a^P3.0299^ea^ ^b^mayhako naamaa^eb^ti ida.m satthaa jetavane viharanto  aagantukase.t.thi.m aarabbha kathesi. saavatthiya~nhi aagantukase.t.thi naama a.d.dho ahosi mahaddhano.  so neva attanaa bhoge bhu~nji, na paresa.m adaasi, naanaggarase pa.niite bhojane upaniite ta.m na  bhu~njati, bila"ngadutiya.m ^a^M3.0281^ea^ ka.naajaka.m eva bhu~njati, dhuupitavaasitesu kaasikavatthesu  upaniitesu taani haaretvaa thuulathuulasaa.take nivaaseti, aajaaniiyayutte ma.nikanakavicitte rathe upaniite  tampi haraapetvaa kattararathakena gacchati, suva.n.nacchatte dhaariyamaane ta.m apanetvaa pa.n.nacchattena  dhaariyamaanena. so yaavajiiva.m daanaadiisu pu~n~nesu ekampi akatvaa kaala.m katvaa roruvaniraye  nibbatti. tassa aputtaka.m saapateyya.m raajabala.m sattahi rattidivasehi raajakula.m pavesesi. tasmi.m  pavesite raajaa bhuttapaataraaso jetavana.m gantvaa satthaara.m vanditvaa nisinno ``ki.m, mahaaraaja,  buddhupa.t.thaana.m na karosii''ti vutte ``bhante, saavatthiya.m aagantukase.t.thino naama kaalakatassa  assaamikadhane amhaaka.m ghare aahariyamaaneyeva satta rattidivasaa gataa, so pana eta.m dhana.m  labhitvaapi neva attanaa paribhu~nji, na paresa.m adaasi, rakkhasapariggahitapokkhara.nii viyassa  ^a^V3.0262^ea^ dhana.m ahosi, so ekadivasampi pa.niitabhojanaadiina.m rasa.m ananubhavitvaava mara.namukha.m  pavi.t.tho, eva.m maccharii apu~n~nasatto ki.m katvaa ettaka.m dhana.m labhi, kena cassa bhogesu citta.m na  ramii''ti satthaara.m pucchi. satthaa ``mahaaraaja, dhanalaabho ca, dhana.m laddhaa aparibhu~njanakaara.na~nca  teneva kata''nti vatvaa tena yaacito atiita.m aahari.

[03] atiite baaraa.nasiya.m brahmadatte rajja.m kaarente baaraa.nasise.t.thi assaddho ahosi maccharii, na  kassaci ki~nci deti, na ka~nci sa"nga.nhaati. so ekadivasa.m raajupa.t.thaana.m gacchanto tagarasikhi.m  naama paccekabuddha.m pi.n.daaya caranta.m disvaa vanditvaa ``laddhaa, bhante, bhikkhaa''ti pucchitvaa ``nanu  caraama mahaase.t.thii''ti vutte purisa.m ^a^P3.0300^ea^ aa.naapesi ``gaccha, ima.m amhaaka.m ghara.m  aanetvaa mama palla"nke nisiidaapetvaa amhaaka.m pa.tiyattabhattassa patta.m puuretvaa daapehii''ti. so  paccekabuddha.m ghara.m netvaa nisiidaapetvaa se.t.thibhariyaaya aacikkhi. saa naanaggarasabhattassa patta.m puuretvaa  tassa adaasi. so bhatta.m gahetvaa se.t.thinivesanaa nikkhamitvaa antaraviithiya.m pa.tipajji. se.t.thi  raajakulato paccaagacchanto ta.m disvaa vanditvaa ``laddha.m, bhante, bhatta''nti pucchi. ``laddha.m  mahaase.t.thii''ti. so patta.m oloketvaa citta.m pasaadetu.m naasakkhi ^a^M3.0282^ea^, ``ima.m me  bhatta.m daasaa vaa kammakaraa vaa bhu~njitvaa dukkarampi kamma.m kareyyu.m, aho vata me jaanii''ti  aparacetana.m paripu.n.na.m kaatu.m naasakkhi. daana~nhi naama tisso cetanaa paripu.n.na.m kaatu.m  sakkontasseva mahapphala.m hoti.
[21] ``pubbeva daanaa sumanaa bhavaama, dadampi ve attamanaa bhavaama.
[22] datvaapi ve naanutappaama pacchaa, tasmaa hi amha.m daharaa namiyyare.. (jaa0  1.10.95).
[21] ``pubbeva daanaa sumano, dada.m citta.m pasaadaye.
[22] datvaa attamano hoti, esaa ya~n~nassa sampadaa''.. (a0 ni0  6.37; pe0  va0 305).

[03] iti, mahaaraaja, aagantukase.t.thi tagarasikhipaccekabuddhassa dinnapaccayena bahu.m dhana.m labhi, datvaa  aparacetana.m pa.niita.m kaatu.m asamatthataaya bhoge bhu~njitu.m naasakkhiiti. ``putta.m pana kasmaa na labhi,  bhante''ti? satthaa ``puttassa alabhanakaara.nampi teneva kata.m, mahaaraajaa''ti vatvaa tena yaacito  atiita.m aahari.

[03] atiite ^a^V3.0263^ea^ baaraa.nasiya.m brahmadatte rajja.m kaarente bodhisatto asiitiko.tivibhave  se.t.thikule nibbattitvaa vayappatto maataapituuna.m accayena kani.t.tha.m sa"nga.nhitvaa ku.tumba.m vicaarento  gharadvaare daanasaala.m kaaretvaa mahaadaana.m pavattento agaara.m ajjhaavasi. athassa eko putto jaayi.  so tassa padasaa gamanakaale kaamesu aadiinava.m nekkhamme caanisa.msa.m disvaa saddhi.m puttadaarena sabba.m  gharavibhava.m ^a^P3.0301^ea^ kani.t.thassa niyyaatetvaa ``appamatto daana.m pavattehii''ti ovaada.m datvaa  isipabbajja.m pabbajitvaa abhi~n~naa ca samaapattiyo ca nibbattetvaa himavantapadese vihaasi.  kani.t.thopissa eka.m putta.m pa.tilabhi. so ta.m va.d.dhanta.m disvaa cintesi ``mama bhaatu putte jiivante  ku.tumba.m bhinditvaa dvidhaa bhavissati, bhaatu putta.m maaressaamii''ti. atha na.m ekadivasa.m nadiya.m  opilaapetvaa maaresi. tamena.m nhatvaa aagata.m bhaatu jaayaa ``kuhi.m mama putto''ti pucchi.  ``nadiya.m udaka.m kii.li, atha na.m udake vicinanto naaddasa''nti. saa roditvaa kanditvaa tu.nhii  ahosi.

[03] bodhisatto ^a^M3.0283^ea^ ta.m pavatti.m ~natvaa ``ida.m kicca.m paaka.ta.m karissaamii''ti  aakaasenaagantvaa baaraa.nasiya.m otaritvaa sunivattho supaaruto tassa gharadvaare .thatvaa daanasaala.m  adisvaa ``daanasaalaapi iminaa asappurisena naasitaa''ti cintesi. kani.t.tho tassa aagatabhaava.m  ~natvaa aagantvaa mahaasatta.m vanditvaa paasaada.m aaropetvaa subhojana.m bhojesi. so bhattakiccaavasaane  sukhakathaaya nisinno ``daarako na pa~n~naayati, kaha.m nu kho''ti pucchi. ``mato, bhante''ti.  ``kena kaara.nenaa''ti? ``udakakii.lana.t.thaane asukakaara.nenaati na jaanaamii''ti. ``ki.m tva.m  asappurisa na jaanissasi, tayaa katakicca.m mayha.m paaka.ta.m, nanu tva.m iminaa naama kaara.nena ta.m  maaresi, ki.m nu tva.m raajaadiina.m vasena nassamaana.m dhana.m rakkhitu.m sakku.neyyaasi, mayhakasaku.nassa ca  tuyha~nca ki.m naanaakara.na''nti? athassa mahaasatto buddhalii.laaya dhamma.m desento imaa gaathaa abhaasi  --
[21] ``saku.no mayhako naama, girisaanudariicaro.
[22] pakka.m pipphalimaaruyha, `mayha.m mayha'nti kandati..
[21] ``tasseva.m ^a^P3.0302^ea^ vilapantassa, dijasa"nghaa samaagataa.
[22] bhutvaana pipphali.m yanti, vilapatveva so dijo..
[21] ``evameva ^a^V3.0264^ea^ idhekacco, sa"ngharitvaa bahu.m dhana.m.
[22] nevattano na ~naatiina.m, yathodhi.m pa.tipajjati..
[21] ``na so acchaadana.m bhatta.m, na maala.m na vilepana.m.
[22] anubhoti saki.m ki~nci, na sa"nga.nhaati ~naatake..
[21] ``tasseva.m vilapantassa, mayha.m mayhanti rakkhato.
[27] raajaano atha vaa coraa, daayaadaa yeva appiyaa.
[22] dhanamaadaaya gacchanti, vilapatveva so naro..
[21] ``dhiiro bhoge adhigamma, sa"nga.nhaati ca ~naatake.
[22] tena so kitti.m pappoti, pecca sagge pamodatii''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^M3.0284^ea^ ^b^mayhako^eb^ti ``mayha.m mayha''nti viravanavasena eva.mladdhanaamo.  girisaanudariisu caratiiti ^b^girisaanudariicaro. pakka.m pipphali^eb^nti himavantapadese eka.m  phalabharita.m pipphalirukkha.m. ^b^kandatii^eb^ti dijaga.ne ta.m rukkha.m parivaaretvaa pakkaani khaadante  vaaretu.m ``mayha.m mayha''nti paridevanto vicarati. ^b^tasseva.m vilapantassaa^eb^ti tassa  vilapantasseva. ^b^bhutvaana vipphali.m yantii^eb^ti ta.m pipphalirukkha.m paribhu~njitvaa a~n~na.m  phalasampanna.m rukkha.m gacchanti. ^b^vilapatvevaa^eb^ti so pana dijo vilapatiyeva.  ^b^yathodhi^eb^nti yathaako.t.thaasa.m, maataapitaabhaatubhaginiiputtadhiitaadiina.m upabhogaparibhogavasena yo yo  ko.t.thaaso daatabbo, ta.m ta.m na detiiti attho.

[03] ^b^saki^eb^nti ekavaarampi naanubhoti. ``saka''ntipi paa.tho, attano santakampiiti  attho. ^b^na sa"nga.nhaatii^eb^ti bhattacchaadanabiijana"ngalaadidaanavasena na sa"nga.nhaati.  ^b^vilapatveva so naro^eb^ti etesu raajaadiisu dhana.m gahetvaa gacchantesu kevala.m so puriso  vilapatiyeva. ^b^dhiiro^eb^ti pa.n.dito. ^b^sa"nga.nhaatii^eb^ti attano santika.m aagate  dubbala~naatake bhattacchaadanabiijana"ngalaadidaanena sa"nga.nhaati. ^b^tenaa^eb^ti so puriso tena  ~naatisa"ngahena catuparisamajjhe kitti~nca attano va.n.nabha.nana~nca paapu.naati, pecca sagge devanagare  pamodati.
[03] eva.m ^a^P3.0303^ea^ mahaasatto tassa dhamma.m desetvaa daana.m paakatika.m kaaretvaa himavantameva  gantvaa aparihiinajjhaano brahmalokuupago ahosi.

[03] satthaa ^a^V3.0265^ea^ ima.m dhammadesana.m aaharitvaa ``iti kho, mahaaraaja, aagantukase.t.thi bhaatu  puttassa maaritattaa ettaka.m kaala.m neva putta.m, na dhiitara.m alabhii''ti vatvaa jaataka.m samodhaanesi --  ``tadaa kani.t.tho aagantukase.t.thi ahosi, je.t.thako pana ahameva ahosi''nti.
[06] mayhakajaatakava.n.nanaa pa~ncamaa.

[03] ^b^dubba.n.naruupa^eb^nti ^a^M3.0285^ea^ ida.m satthaa jetavane viharanto lokatthacariya.m  aarabbha kathesi. vatthu ^b^mahaaka.nhajaatake^eb^ (jaa0 1.12.61 aadayo) aavi bhavissati.  tadaa pana satthaa ``na, bhikkhave, idaaneva, pubbepi tathaagato lokatthacariya.m cariyevaa''ti vatvaa  atiita.m aahari.

[03] atiite baaraa.nasiya.m brahmadatte rajja.m kaarente bodhisatto sakko ahosi. tadaa eko  vijjaadharo vijja.m parivattetvaa a.d.dharattasamaye aagantvaa baaraa.nasira~n~no aggamahesiyaa saddhi.m  aticarati, tassaa paricaarikaayo sa~njaani.msu. saa sayameva raajaana.m upasa"nkamitvaa ``deva, eko  puriso a.d.dharattasamaye sirigabbha.m pavisitvaa ma.m duusetii''ti aaha. ``sakkhissasi pana ki~nci  sa~n~naa.na.m kaatu''nti? ``sakkomi, devaa''ti saa jaatihi"ngulikapaati.m aaharaapetvaa tassa purisassa  ratti.m aagantvaa abhiramitvaa gacchantassa pi.t.thiya.m pa~nca"ngulika.m datvaa paatova ra~n~no aarocesi.  raajaa manusse aa.naapesi ``gacchatha, sabbadisaasu oloketvaa pi.t.thiya.m  katajaatihi"ngulapa~nca"ngulikapurisa.m ga.nhathaa''ti. vijjaadharopi ratti.m anaacaara.m katvaa divaa susaane  suuriya.m namassanto ekapaadena ti.t.thati. raajapurisaa ta.m disvaa parivaarayi.msu. so ``paaka.ta.m me  kamma.m jaata''nti ^a^P3.0304^ea^ vijja.m parivattetvaa aakaasena uppatitvaa gato.

[03] raajaa ta.m disvaa aagatapurise ``addasathaa''ti pucchi. ``aama, addasaamaa''ti. ``ko  naameso''ti? ``pabbajito, devaa''ti. ``so hi ratti.m anaacaara.m katvaa divaa pabbajitavesena  vasati''. raajaa ``ime divaa sama.navesena caritvaa ratti.m anaacaara.m karontii''ti pabbajitaana.m  kujjhitvaa micchaagaha.na.m gahetvaa ``mayha.m vijitaa ime sabbe pabbajitaa palaayantu, di.t.thadi.t.tha.t.thaane  raajaa.na.m karissantuu''ti bheri.m caraapesi. tiyojanasatikaa kaasira.t.thaa palaayitvaa sabbe pabbajitaa  a~n~naraajadhaaniyo agami.msu. sakalakaasira.t.the manussaana.m ovaadadaayako ^a^V3.0266^ea^ ekopi  dhammikasama.nabraahma.no naahosi. anovaadakaa manussaa pharusaa ahesu.m, daanasiilavimukhaa matamataa  yebhuyyena apaaye nibbatti.msu, sagge nibbattanakaa naama naahesu.m.

[03] sakko ^a^M3.0286^ea^ nave devaputte apassanto ``ki.m nu kho kaara.na''nti aavajjetvaa  vijjaadhara.m nissaaya baaraa.nasira~n~naa kuddhena micchaagaha.na.m gahetvaa pabbajitaana.m ra.t.thaa pabbaajitabhaava.m  ~natvaa ``.thapetvaa ma.m a~n~no imassa ra~n~no micchaagaha.na.m bhinditu.m samattho naama natthi, ra~n~no ca  ra.t.thavaasiina~nca avassayo bhavissaamii''ti cintetvaa nandamuulapabbhaare paccekabuddhaana.m santika.m gantvaa  vanditvaa ``bhante, mayha.m eka.m mahallaka.m paccekabuddha.m detha, kaasira.t.tha.m pasaadessaamii''ti aaha. so  sa"nghattherameva labhi, athassa pattaciivara.m gahetvaa ta.m purato katvaa saya.m pacchato hutvaa sirasmi.m  a~njali.m .thapetvaa paccekabuddha.m namassanto uttamaruupadharo maa.navako hutvaa sakalanagarassa matthakena  tikkhattu.m vicaritvaa raajadvaara.m aagantvaa aakaase a.t.thaasi. amaccaa ra~n~no aarocesu.m ``deva,  abhiruupo maa.navako eka.m sama.na.m aanetvaa raajadvaare ^a^P3.0305^ea^ aakaase .thito''ti. raajaa  aasanaa u.t.thaaya siihapa~njare .thatvaa ``maa.navaka, kasmaa tva.m abhiruupo samaano etassa viruupassa  sama.nassa pattaciivara.m gahetvaa namassamaano .thito''ti tena saddhi.m sallapanto pa.thama.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``dubba.n.naruupa.m tuvamariyava.n.nii, purakkhatvaa pa~njaliko namassasi.
[22] seyyo nu teso udavaa sarikkho, naama.m parassattano caapi bruuhii''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^ariyava.n.nii^eb^ti sundararuupo. ^b^seyyo nu teso^eb^ti eso viruupo pabbajito  ki.m nu tayaa uttaritaro, udaahu sarikkho. ^b^naama.m parassattano caapii^eb^ti etassa parassa ca  attano ca naama.m bruuhiiti pucchati.
[03] atha na.m sakko ``mahaaraaja, sama.naa naama garu.t.thaaniyaa, tena me naama.m lapitu.m na labbhati,  mayha.m pana te naama.m kathessaamii''ti vatvaa dutiya.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``na naamagotta.m ga.nhanti raaja, sammaggataanujjugataana devaa.
[22] aha~nca te naamadheyya.m vadaami, sakkohamasmii tidasaanamindo''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^M3.0287^ea^ ^b^sammaggataanujjugataana devaa^eb^ti mahaaraaja, sabbasa"nkhaare yathaa  sabhaavasarasavasena sammasitvaa ^a^V3.0267^ea^ aggaphala.m arahatta.m pattattaa sammaggataana.m, ujunaa ca  a.t.tha"ngikena maggena nibbaana.m gatattaa ujugataana.m mahaakhii.naasavaana.m upapattidevehi uttaritaraana.m  visuddhidevaana.m upapattidevaa naamagotta.m na ga.nhanti. ^b^aha~nca te naamadheyya^eb^nti apica aha.m  attano naamadheyya.m tuyha.m kathemi.
[03] ta.m sutvaa raajaa tatiyagaathaaya bhikkhunamassane aanisa.msa.m pucchi --
[21] ``yo disvaa bhikkhu.m cara.nuupapanna.m, purakkhatvaa pa~njaliko namassati.
[22] pucchaami ^a^P3.0306^ea^ ta.m devaraajetamattha.m, ito cuto ki.m labhate sukha.m so''ti..
[03]  sakko catutthagaathaaya kathesi --
[21] ``yo disvaa bhikkhu.m cara.nuupapanna.m, purakkhatvaa pa~njaliko namassati.
[22] di.t.theva dhamme labhate pasa.msa.m, sagga~nca so yaati sariirabhedaa''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^bhikkhu^eb^nti bhinnakilesa.m parisuddhapuggala.m. ^b^cara.nuupapanna^eb^nti siilacara.nena  upeta.m. ^b^di.t.theva dhamme^eb^ti na kevala.m ito cutoyeva, imasmi.m pana attabhaave so pasa.msa.m labhati,  pasa.msaasukha.m vindatiiti.
[03] raajaa sakkassa katha.m sutvaa attano micchaagaha.na.m bhinditvaa tu.t.thamaanaso pa~ncama.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``lakkhii vata me udapaadi ajja, ya.m vaasava.m bhuutapatiddasaama.
[22] bhikkhu~nca disvaana tuva~nca sakka, kaahaami pu~n~naani anappakaanii''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^lakkhii^eb^ti sirii, pa~n~naatipi vadanti. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- ajja mama tava  vacana.m su.nantasseva kusalaakusalavipaakajaananapa~n~naa udapaadiiti. ^b^ya^eb^nti nipaatamatta.m.  ^b^bhuutapatiddasaamaa^eb^ti bhuutapati.m addasaama.
[03] ta.m ^a^M3.0288^ea^ sutvaa sakko pa.n.ditassa thuti.m karonto cha.t.tha.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``addhaa ^a^V3.0268^ea^ have sevitabbaa sapa~n~naa, bahussutaa ye bahu.thaanacintino.
[22] bhikkhu~nca disvaana mama~nca raaja, karohi pu~n~naani anappakaanii''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^bahu.thaanacintino^eb^ti bahuuni kaara.naani cintanasamatthaa.
[03] ta.m ^a^P3.0307^ea^ sutvaa raajaa osaanagaathamaaha --
[21] ``akkodhano niccapasannacitto, sabbaatithiiyaacayogo bhavitvaa.
[22] nihacca maana.m abhivaadayissa.m, sutvaana devinda subhaasitaanii''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^sabbaatithiiyaacayogo bhavitvaa^eb^ti sabbesa.m atithiina.m aagataana.m aagantukaana.m ya.m ya.m  te yaacanti, tassa tassa yutto anucchaviko bhavitvaa, sabba.m tehi yaacitayaacita.m dadamaanoti  attho. ^b^sutvaana devinda subhaasitaanii^eb^ti tava subhaasitaani sutvaa aha.m evaruupo  bhavissaamiiti vadati.

[03] eva~nca pana vatvaa paasaadaa oruyha paccekabuddha.m vanditvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. paccekabuddho  aakaase palla"nkena nisiiditvaa ``mahaaraaja, vijjaadharo na sama.no, tva.m ito pa.t.thaaya `atuccho  loko, atthi dhammikasama.nabraahma.naa'ti ~natvaa daana.m dehi, siila.m rakkha, uposathakamma.m karohii''ti  raajaana.m ovadi. sakkopi sakkaanubhaavena aakaase .thatvaa ``ito pa.t.thaaya appamattaa hothaa''ti  naagaraana.m ovaada.m datvaa ``palaataa sama.nabraahma.naa aagacchantuu''ti bheri.m caraapesi. atha te ubhopi  saka.t.thaanameva agama.msu. raajaa tassa ovaade .thatvaa daanaadiini pu~n~naani akaasi.
[03] satthaa ima.m dhammadesana.m aaharitvaa jaataka.m samodhaanesi -- ``tadaa paccekabuddho parinibbuto,  raajaa aanando ahosi, sakko pana ahameva ahosi''nti.
[06] vijjaadharajaatakava.n.nanaa cha.t.thaa.

[03] ^b^yameta^eb^nti ^a^V3.0269^ea^ ^a^M3.0289^ea^ ida.m satthaa jetavane viharanto a~n~natara.m  bhikkhu.m aarabbha kathesi. so kira jetavanaa nikkhamitvaa kosalara.t.the a~n~natara.m ara~n~na.m nissaaya  viharanto ekadivasa.m padumasara.m ^a^P3.0308^ea^ otaritvaa supupphitapaduma.m disvaa adhovaate  .thatvaa upasi"nghi. atha na.m tasmi.m vane adhivatthaa devataa ``maarisa, tva.m gandhatheno naama, ida.m  te eka.m theyya"nga''nti sa.mvejesi. so taaya sa.mvejito puna jetavana.m aagantvaa satthaara.m vanditvaa  nisinno ``kaha.m bhikkhu nivutthosii''ti pu.t.tho ``asukavanasa.n.de naama, tattha ca ma.m devataa eva.m  naama sa.mvejesii''ti aaha. atha na.m satthaa ``na kho bhikkhu puppha.m upasi"nghanto tvameva devataaya  sa.mvejito, poraa.nakapa.n.ditaapi sa.mvejitapubbaa''ti vatvaa tena yaacito atiita.m aahari.

[03] atiite baaraa.nasiya.m brahmadatte rajja.m kaarente bodhisatto ekasmi.m kaasikagaame braahma.nakule  nibbattitvaa vayappatto takkasilaaya.m uggahitasippo aparabhaage isipabbajja.m pabbajitvaa eka.m padumasara.m  nissaaya upavasanto ekadivasa.m sara.m otaritvaa supupphitapaduma.m upasi"nghamaano a.t.thaasi. atha na.m  ekaa devadhiitaa rukkhakkhandhavivare .thatvaa sa.mvejayamaanaa pa.thama.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``yameta.m vaarija.m puppha.m, adinna.m upasi"nghasi.
[22] eka"ngameta.m theyyaana.m, gandhathenosi maarisaa''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^eka"ngameta^eb^nti ekako.t.thaaso esa.
[03] tato bodhisatto dutiya.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``na haraami na bha~njaami, aaraa si"nghaami vaarija.m.
[22] atha kena nu va.n.nena, gandhathenoti vuccatii''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^aaraa si"nghaamii^eb^ti duure .thito ghaayaami. ^b^va.n.nenaa^eb^ti kaara.nena.

[03] tasmi.m ^a^M3.0290^ea^ kha.ne eko puriso tasmi.m sare bhisaani ceva kha.nati,  pu.n.dariikaani ca bha~njati ^a^V3.0270^ea^. bodhisatto ta.m disvaa ``ma.m aaraa .thatvaa upasi"nghanta.m  `coro'ti vadasi, eta.m purisa.m ^a^P3.0309^ea^ kasmaa na bha.nasii''ti taaya saddhi.m sallapanto  tatiya.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``yoya.m bhisaani kha.nati, pu.n.dariikaani bha~njati.
[22] eva.m aaki.n.nakammanto, kasmaa eso na vuccatii''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^aaki.n.nakammanto^eb^ti kakkha.lakammanto daaru.nakammanto.
[03] athassa avacanakaara.na.m aacikkhantii devataa catutthapa~ncamagaathaa abhaasi --
[21] ``aaki.n.naluddo puriso, dhaaticela.mva makkhito.
[22] tasmi.m me vacana.m natthi, ta~ncaarahaami vattave..
[21] ``ana"nga.nassa posassa, nicca.m sucigavesino.
[22] vaalaggamatta.m paapassa, abbhaamatta.mva khaayatii''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^dhaaticela.mvaa^eb^ti khe.lasi"nghaa.nikamuttaguuthamakkhita.m dhaatidaasiyaa nivatthacela.m viya  aya.m paapamakkhitoyeva, tena kaara.nena tasmi.m mama vacana.m natthi. ^b^ta~ncaarahaamii^eb^ti sama.naa  pana ovaadakkhamaa honti piyasiilaa, tasmaa ta.m appamattakampi ayutta.m karonta.m vattu.m arahaami  sama.naati. ^b^ana"nga.nassaa^eb^ti niddosassa tumhaadisassa. ^b^abbhaamatta.mva khaayatii^eb^ti  mahaameghappamaa.na.m hutvaa upa.t.thaati, idaani kasmaa evaruupa.m dosa.m abbohaarika.m karosiiti.
[03] taaya pana sa.mvejito bodhisatto sa.mvegappatto cha.t.tha.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``addhaa ma.m yakkha jaanaasi, atho ma.m anukampasi.
[22] punapi yakkha vajjaasi, yadaa passasi edisa''nti..
[03] tattha ^b^yakkhaa^eb^ti devata.m aalapati. ^b^vajjaasii^eb^ti vadeyyaasi. ^b^yadaa passasi  edisa^eb^nti yadaa mama evaruupa.m dosa.m passasi, tadaa eva.m mama vadeyyaasiiti vadati.
[03] athassa ^a^V3.0271^ea^ ^a^M3.0291^ea^ saa devadhiitaa sattama.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``neva ta.m upajiivaami, napi te bhatakaamhase.
[22] tvameva bhikkhu jaaneyya, yena gaccheyya suggati''nti..

[03] tattha ^a^P3.0310^ea^ ^b^bhatakaamhase^eb^ti tava bhatihataa kammakaraapi na homa.  ki.mkaara.naa ta.m sabbakaala.m rakkhamaanaa vicarissaamaati diipeti. ^b^yena gaccheyyaa^eb^ti bhikkhu  yena kammena tva.m sugati.m gaccheyyaasi, tvameva ta.m jaaneyyaasiiti.
[03] eva.m saa tassa ovaada.m datvaa attano vimaanameva pavi.t.thaa. bodhisattopi jhaana.m nibbattetvaa  brahmalokaparaaya.no ahosi.
[03] satthaa ima.m dhammadesana.m aaharitvaa saccaani pakaasetvaa jaataka.m samodhaanesi, saccapariyosaane  so bhikkhu sotaapattiphale pati.t.thahi.
[03] tadaa devadhiitaa uppalava.n.naa ahosi, taapaso pana ahameva ahosinti.
[06] si"nghapupphajaatakava.n.nanaa sattamaa.

[03] ^b^susukha.m vata jiivantii^eb^ti ida.m satthaa pubbaaraame viharanto ke.lisiilake bhikkhuu aarabbha  kathesi. tesu hi mahaamoggallaanattherena paasaada.m kampetvaa sa.mvejitesu dhammasabhaaya.m bhikkhuu tesa.m  agu.na.m kathentaa nisiidi.msu. satthaa aagantvaa ``kaaya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathaaya  sannisinnaa''ti pucchitvaa ``imaaya naamaa''ti vutte ``na, bhikkhave, idaaneva, pubbepete  ke.lisiilakaayevaa''ti vatvaa atiita.m aahari.

[03] atiite baaraa.nasiya.m brahmadatte rajja.m kaarente bodhisatto sakko ahosi. atha a~n~natarasmi.m  kaasikagaame satta bhaataro kaamesu dosa.m disvaa nikkhamitvaa isipabbajja.m pabbajitvaa majjhaara~n~ne  vasantaa yoge yoga.m akatvaa kaayada.lhiibahulaa hutvaa naanappakaara.m kii.la.m ^a^V3.0272^ea^ kii.lantaa  ^a^M3.0292^ea^ cari.msu. sakko devaraajaa ``ime sa.mvejessaamii''ti suko hutvaa tesa.m vasana.t.thaana.m  aagantvaa ekasmi.m rukkhe niliiyitvaa te sa.mvejento pa.thama.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``susukha.m ^a^P3.0311^ea^ vata jiivanti, ye janaa vighaasaadino.
[22] di.t.theva dhamme paasa.msaa, samparaaye ca suggatii''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^vighaasaadino^eb^ti bhuttaatireka.m bhu~njante sandhaayaaha. ^b^di.t.theva dhamme^eb^ti ye  evaruupaa, te di.t.theva dhamme paasa.msaa, samparaaye ca tesa.m sugati hoti, sagge uppajjantiiti  adhippaayena vadati.
[03] atha tesu eko tassa vacana.m sutvaa avasese aamantetvaa dutiya.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``sukassa bhaasamaanassa, na nisaametha pa.n.ditaa.
[22] ida.m su.naatha sodariyaa, amhevaaya.m pasa.msatii''ti..

[01] tattha ^b^bhaasamaanassaa^eb^ti maanusikaaya vaacaaya bha.nantassa. ^b^na  nisaamethaa^eb^ti na su.naatha. ^b^ida.m su.naathaa^eb^ti idamassa vacana.m su.naatha. ^b^sodariyaa^eb^ti  samaane udare vutthabhaavena te aalapanto aaha.
[03] atha ne pa.tikkhipanto suko tatiya.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``naaha.m tumhe pasa.msaami, ku.napaadaa su.naatha me.
[22] ucchi.t.thabhojino tumhe, na tumhe vighaasaadino''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^ku.napaadaa^eb^ti ku.napakhaadakaati te aalapati.
[03] te tassa vacana.m sutvaa sabbepi catuttha.m gaathamaaha.msu --
[21] ``sattavassaa pabbajitaa, majjhaara~n~ne sikha.n.dino.
[27] vighaaseneva yaapentaa, maya~nce bhoto gaarayhaa.
[22] ke nu bhoto pasa.msiyaa''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^V3.0273^ea^ ^b^sikha.n.dino^eb^ti cuu.laaya samannaagataa. ^b^vighaasenevaa^eb^ti ettaka.m  kaala.m satta vassaani siihabyagghavighaaseneva yaapentaa yadi bhoto gaarayhaa, atha ke nu te  pasa.msiyaati.
[03] te ^a^M3.0293^ea^ lajjaapento mahaasatto pa~ncama.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``tumhe siihaana.m byagghaana.m, vaa.laana~ncaavasi.t.thaka.m.
[22] ucchi.t.theneva yaapentaa, ma~n~nivho vighaasaadino''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^vaa.laana~ncaavasi.t.thaka^eb^nti sesavaa.lamigaana~nca avasi.t.thaka.m ucchi.t.thabhojana.m.
[03] ta.m ^a^P3.0312^ea^ sutvaa taapasaa ``sace maya.m na vighaasaadaa, atha ke carahi te  vighaasaadaa''ti? atha tesa.m so tamattha.m aacikkhanto cha.t.tha.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``ye braahma.nassa sama.nassa, a~n~nassa vaa vanibbino.
[22] datvaava sesa.m bhu~njanti, te janaa vighaasaadino''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^vanibbino^eb^ti ta.m ta.m bha.n.da.m yaacanakassa. eva.m te lajjaapetvaa mahaasatto  saka.t.thaanameva gato.
[03] satthaa ima.m dhammadesana.m aaharitvaa jaataka.m samodhaanesi -- ``tadaa satta bhaataro ime  ke.lisiilakaa bhikkhuu ahesu.m, sakko pana ahameva ahosi''nti.
[06] vighaasaadajaatakava.n.nanaa a.t.thamaa.

[03] ^b^pa.niita^eb^nti ida.m satthaa jetavane viharanto eka.m lolabhikkhu.m aarabbha kathesi. ta~nhi  satthaa ``sacca.m kira tva.m bhikkhu lolo''ti pucchitvaa ``aama, bhante''ti vutte ``na kho bhikkhu  idaaneva lolo, pubbepi tva.m loloyeva, lolataaya pana baaraa.nasiya.m hatthigavaassapurisaku.napehi  ^a^V3.0274^ea^ atitto `ito uttaritara.m labhissaamii'ti ara~n~na.m pavi.t.thosii''ti vatvaa atiita.m aahari.

[03] atiite baaraa.nasiya.m brahmadatte rajja.m kaarente bodhisatto va.t.takayoniya.m nibbattitvaa ara~n~ne  luukhati.nabiijaahaaro vasi. tadaa baaraa.nasiya.m eko lolakaako hatthiku.napaadiihi atitto ``ito  uttaritara.m labhissaamii''ti ara~n~na.m pavisitvaa phalaaphala.m khaadanto bodhisatta.m ^a^M3.0294^ea^  disvaa ``aya.m va.t.tako ativiya thuulasariiro, madhura.m gocara.m khaadati ma~n~ne, etassa gocara.m  pucchitvaa ta.m khaaditvaa ahampi thuulo bhavissaamii''ti cintetvaa bodhisattassa uparibhaage saakhaaya  niliiyitvaa bodhisatta.m pucchi ``bho va.t.taka, ki.m naama pa.niitaahaara.m bhu~njasi, thuulasariiro  ahosii''ti? bodhisatto ^a^P3.0313^ea^ tena pucchito tena saddhi.m pa.tisanthaara.m karonto pa.thama.m  gaathamaaha --
[21] ``pa.niita.m bhu~njase bhatta.m, sappitela~nca maatula.
[22] atha kena nu va.n.nena, kiso tvamasi vaayasaa''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^bhatta^eb^nti manussaana.m bhojananiyaamena pa.tiyaaditabhatta.m. ^b^maatulaa^eb^ti ta.m  piyasamudaacaarena aalapati. ^b^kiso^eb^ti appama.msalohito.
[03] tassa vacana.m sutvaa kaako tisso gaathaa abhaasi --
[21] ``amittamajjhe vasato, tesu aamisamesato.
[22] nicca.m ubbiggahadayassa, kuto kaakassa da.lhiya.m..
[21] ``nicca.m ubbegino kaakaa, dha"nkaa paapena kammunaa.
[22] laddho pi.n.do na pii.neti, kiso tenasmi va.t.taka..
[21] ``luukhaani ti.nabiijaani, appasnehaani bhu~njasi.
[22] atha kena nu va.n.nena, thuulo tvamasi va.t.takaa''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^da.lhiya^eb^nti evaruupassa mayha.m kaakassa kuto da.lhiibhaavo, kuto thuulanti attho.  ^b^ubbegino^eb^ti ^a^V3.0275^ea^ ubbegavanto. ^b^dha"nkaa^eb^ti kaakaanameva naama.m. ^b^paapena  kammunaa laddho^eb^ti kaakena manussasantakavilumpanasa"nkhaatena paapena kammena laddho pi.n.do.  ^b^na pii.netii^eb^ti na tappeti. ^b^tenasmii^eb^ti tena kaara.nenaaha.m kiso asmi.  ^b^appasnehaanii^eb^ti mandojaani. ida.m kaako bodhisatta.m ``pa.niitabhojana.m khaadatii''ti sa~n~nii  hutvaapi va.t.takaana.m gahitagocara.m pucchanto aaha.
[03] ta.m sutvaa bodhisatto attano thuulabhaavakaara.na.m kathento imaa gaathaa abhaasi --
[21] ``appicchaa ^a^M3.0295^ea^ appacintaaya, aduuragamanena ca.
[22] laddhaaladdhena yaapento, thuulo tenasmi vaayasa..
[21] ``appicchassa hi posassa, appacintasukhassa ca.
[22] susa"ngahitamaanassa, vuttii susamudaanayaa''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^appicchaa^eb^ti aahaaresu appicchataaya nitta.nhataaya, kevala.m sariirayaapanavaseneva  aahaaraahara.nataayaati attho. ^b^appacintaayaa^eb^ti ``ajja kaha.m aahaara.m ^a^P3.0314^ea^  labhissaami, sve kaha''nti eva.m aahaaracintaaya abhaavena. ^b^aduuragamanena caa^eb^ti ``asukasmi.m  naama .thaane madhura.m labhissaamii''ti cintetvaa aviduuragamanena ca. ^b^laddhaaladdhenaa^eb^ti luukha.m vaa  hotu pa.niita.m vaa, ya.m laddha.m, teneva. ^b^thuulo tenasmii^eb^ti tena catubbidhena kaara.nena thuulo asmi.  ^b^vaayasaa^eb^ti kaaka.m aalapati. ^b^appacintasukhassaa^eb^ti aahaaracintaarahitaana.m  appacintaanamariyaana.m sukha.m assatthiiti appacintasukho, tassa taadisena sukhena samannaagatassa.  ^b^susa"ngahitamaanassaa^eb^ti ``ettaka.m bhu~njitvaa jiiraapetu.m sakkhissaamii''ti eva.m su.t.thu  sa"ngahitaahaaramaanassa. ^b^vuttii susamudaanayaa^eb^ti evaruupassa puggalassa jiivitavutti sukhena  sakkaa samudaanetu.m susamudaanayaa sunibbattiyaa.
[03] satthaa ima.m dhammadesana.m aaharitvaa saccaani pakaasetvaa jaataka.m samodhaanesi, saccapariyosaane  lolabhikkhu sotaapattiphale pati.t.thahi.
[03] tadaa kaako lolabhikkhu ahosi, va.t.tako pana ahameva ahosinti.
[06] va.t.takajaatakava.n.nanaa navamaa.
[03] ^b^cirassa.m^eb^ ^a^V3.0276^ea^ ^b^vata passaamii^eb^ti ida.m satthaa jetavane viharanto  lolabhikkhu.myeva aarabbha kathesi. paccuppannavatthu he.t.thaa vuttanayameva.

[03] atiite baaraa.nasiya.m brahmadatte rajja.m kaarente bodhisatto paaraavato hutvaa baaraa.nasise.t.thino  mahaanase nii.lapacchiya.m vasati. kaakopi ^a^M3.0296^ea^ tena saddhi.m vissaasa.m katvaa tattheva  vasatiiti sabba.m vitthaaretabba.m. bhattakaarako kaakapattaani lu~ncitvaa pi.t.thena ta.m makkhetvaa eka.m  kapaalakha.n.da.m vijjhitvaa ka.n.the pi.landhitvaa pacchiya.m pakkhipi. bodhisatto ara~n~nato aagantvaa ta.m  disvaa parihaasa.m karonto pa.thama.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``cirassa.m vata passaami, sahaaya.m ma.nidhaarina.m.
[22] sukataa massukuttiyaa, sobhate vata me sakhaa''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^massukuttiyaa^eb^ti imaaya massukiriyaaya.
[03] ta.m ^a^P3.0315^ea^ sutvaa kaako dutiya.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``paruu.lhakacchanakhalomo, aha.m kammesu byaava.to.
[22] cirassa.m nhaapita.m laddhaa, loma.m ta.m ajja haarayi''nti..
[03] tattha ^b^aha.m kammesu byaava.to^eb^ti aha.m samma paaraavata, raajakammesu byaava.to okaasa.m  alabhanto paruu.lhakacchanakhalomo ahosinti vadati. ^b^ajja haarayi^eb^nti ajja haaresi.m.
[03] tato bodhisatto tatiya.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``ya.m nu loma.m ahaaresi, dullabha.m laddha kappaka.m.
[22] atha ki~ncarahi te samma, ka.n.the ki.niki.naayatii''ti..
[03] tassattho ^a^V3.0277^ea^ -- ya.m taava dullabha.m kappaka.m labhitvaa loma.m haraapesi, ta.m haraapaya,  atha ki~ncarahi te vayassa ida.m ka.n.the ki.niki.naayatiiti.
[03] tato kaako dve gaathaa abhaasi --
[21] ``manussasukhumaalaana.m, ma.ni ka.n.thesu lambati.
[22] tesaaha.m anusikkhaami, maa tva.m ma~n~ni davaa kata.m..
[21] ``sacepima.m pihayasi, massukutti.m sukaarita.m.
[22] kaarayissaami te samma, ma.ni~ncaapi dadaami te''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^ma.nii^eb^ti evaruupaana.m manussaana.m eka.m ma.niratana.m ka.n.thesu lambati.  ^b^tesaaha^eb^nti tesa.m aha.m. ^b^maa tva.m ma~n~nii^eb^ti tva.m pana ``eta.m mayaa davaa kata''nti ^a^M3.0297^ea^  maa ma~n~ni. ^b^sacepima.m pihayasii^eb^ti sace ima.m mama kata.m massukutti.m tva.m icchasi.
[03] ta.m sutvaa bodhisatto cha.t.tha.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``tva~n~neva ma.ninaa channo, sukataaya ca massuyaa.
[22] aamanta kho ta.m gacchaami, piya.m me tavadassana''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^ma.ninaa^eb^ti ma.nino, ayameva vaa paa.tho. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- samma vaayasa,  tva~n~neva imassa ma.nino anucchaviko imissaa ca sukataaya massuyaa ^a^P3.0316^ea^, mama pana  tava adassanameva piya.m, tasmaa ta.m aamantayitvaa gacchaamiiti.
[03] eva~nca pana vatvaa bodhisatto uppatitvaa a~n~nattha gato. kaako tattheva jiivitakkhaya.m patto.

[03] satthaa ^a^V3.0278^ea^ ima.m dhammadesana.m aaharitvaa saccaani pakaasetvaa jaataka.m samodhaanesi,  saccapariyosaane lolabhikkhu anaagaamiphale pati.t.thahi. tadaa kaako lolabhikkhu ahosi,  paaraavato pana ahameva ahosinti.
[06] paaraavatajaatakava.n.nanaa dasamaa.
[06] kharaputtavaggo dutiyo ni.t.thito.
[01] jaatakuddaana.m --
[21] avaariya.m setaketu, dariimukha~nca neru ca.
[22] aasa"nkamigaalopa~nca, kaa.laka.n.nii ca kukku.ta.m..
[21] dhammadhaja~nca nandiya.m, kharaputta.m suuci ceva.
[22] tu.n.dila.m so.n.nakakka.ta.m, mayhaka.m vijjaadhara~nceva..
[21] si"nghapuppha.m vighaasaada.m, va.t.taka~nca paaraavata.m.
[22] sa"ngaayi.msu mahaatheraa, chakke viisati jaatake..
[06] chakkanipaatava.n.nanaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] ^b^diya.d.dhakukkuu^eb^ti ^a^V3.0279^ea^ ^a^P3.0317^ea^ ^a^M3.0298^ea^ ida.m satthaa jetavane  viharanto raajovaada.m aarabbha kathesi. paccuppannavatthu ^b^tesaku.najaatake^eb^ (jaa0 2.17.1  aadayo) aavi bhavissati.

[03] atiite baaraa.nasiya.m brahmadatte rajja.m kaarente bodhisatto tassa atthadhammaanusaasako amacco  ahosi. raajaa agatigamane pati.t.thaaya adhammena rajja.m kaaresi, janapada.m pii.letvaa dhanameva sa.mhari.  bodhisatto raajaana.m ovaditukaamo eka.m upama.m upadhaarento vicarati, ra~n~no uyyaane vaasaagaara.m  vippakata.m hoti ani.t.thitacchadana.m, daaruka.n.nika.m aaropetvaa gopaanasiyo pavesitamattaa honti.  raajaa kii.lanatthaaya uyyaana.m gantvaa tattha vicaritvaa ta.m geha.m pavisitvaa ullokento ka.n.nikama.n.dala.m  disvaa attano uparipatanabhayena nikkhamitvaa bahi .thito puna oloketvaa ``ki.m nu kho  nissaaya ka.n.nikaa .thitaa, ki.m nissaaya gopaanasiyo''ti cintetvaa bodhisatta.m pucchanto pa.thama.m  gaathamaaha --
[21] ``diya.d.dhakukkuu ^a^P3.0318^ea^ udayena ka.n.nikaa, vidatthiyo a.t.tha parikkhipanti  na.m.
[22] saa si.msapaa, saaramayaa apheggukaa, kuhi.m .thitaa upparito na dha.msatii''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^diya.d.dhakukkuu^eb^ti diya.d.dharatanaa. ^b^udayenaa^eb^ti uccattena. ^b^parikkhipanti  na^eb^nti ta.m paneta.m a.t.tha vidatthiyo parikkhipanti, parikkhepato a.t.thavidatthipamaa.naati vutta.m hoti.  ^b^kuhi.m .thitaa^eb^ti kattha pati.t.thitaa hutvaa. ^b^na dha.msatii^eb^ti na patati.
[03] ta.m ^a^V3.0280^ea^ ^a^M3.0299^ea^ sutvaa bodhisatto ``laddhaa daani me ra~n~no ovaadatthaaya  upamaa''ti cintetvaa imaa gaathaa aaha --
[21] ``yaa ti.msati saaramayaa anujjukaa, parikiriya gopaanasiyo sama.m .thitaa.
[22] taahi susa"ngahitaa balasaa pii.litaa, sama.m .thitaa upparito na dha.msati..
[21] ``evampi mittehi da.lhehi pa.n.dito, abhejjaruupehi suciihi mantibhi.
[22] susa"ngahiito siriyaa na dha.msati, gopaanasiibhaaravahaava ka.n.nikaa''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^yaa ti.msati saaramayaa^eb^ti yaa etaa saararukkhamayaa ti.msati gopaanasiyo.  ^b^parikiriyaa^eb^ti parivaaretvaa. ^b^sama.m .thitaa^eb^ti samabhaagena .thitaa. ^b^balasaa  pii.litaa^eb^ti taahi taahi gopaanasiihi balena pii.litaa su.t.thu sa"ngahitaa ekaabaddhaa hutvaa.  ^b^pa.n.dito^eb^ti ~naa.nasampanno raajaa. ^b^suciihii^eb^ti sucisamaacaarehi kalyaa.namittehi.  ^b^mantibhii^eb^ti mantakusalehi. ^b^gopaanasiibhaaravahaava ka.n.nikaa^eb^ti yathaa gopaanasiina.m bhaara.m  vahamaanaa ka.n.nikaa na dha.msati na patati, eva.m raajaapi vuttappakaarehi mantiihi abhijjahadayehi  susa"ngahito sirito na dha.msati na patati na parihaayati.

[03] raajaa ^a^P3.0319^ea^ bodhisatte kathenteyeva attano kiriya.m sallakkhetvaa ka.n.nikaaya  asati gopaanasiyo na ti.t.thanti, gopaanasiihi asa"ngahitaa ka.n.nikaa na ti.t.thati, gopaanasiisu  bhijjantiisu ka.n.nikaa patati, evameva adhammiko raajaa attano mittaamacce ca balakaaye ca  braahma.nagahapatike ca asa"nga.nhanto tesu bhijjantesu tehi asa"ngahito issariyaa dha.msati, ra~n~naa naama  dhammikena bhavitabbanti. athassa tasmi.m kha.ne pa.n.naakaaratthaaya maatulu"nga.m aahari.msu. raajaa  ``sahaaya, ima.m maatulu"nga.m khaadaa''ti bodhisatta.m aaha. bodhisatto ta.m gahetvaa ``mahaaraaja, ima.m  khaaditu.m ajaanantaa tittaka.m vaa karonti ambila.m vaa, jaanantaa ^a^M3.0300^ea^ pana pa.n.ditaa  tittaka.m haaretvaa ambila.m aniiharitvaa maatulu"ngarasa.m anaasetvaava khaadantii''ti ra~n~no imaaya  upamaaya dhanasa"nghara.nuupaaya.m dassento dve gaathaa abhaasi --
[21] ``kharattaca.m bella.m yathaapi satthavaa, anaamasantopi karoti tittaka.m.
[22] samaahara.m saadu.m karoti patthiva, asaadu.m kayiraa tanubandhamuddhara.m..
[21] ``evampi ^a^V3.0281^ea^ gaamanigamesu pa.n.dito, asaahasa.m raajadhanaani sa"nghara.m.
[22] dhammaanuvattii pa.tipajjamaano, sa phaati kayiraa avihe.thaya.m para''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^kharattaca^eb^nti thaddhataca.m. ^b^bella^eb^nti maatulu"nga.m. `bela''ntipi paa.tho,  ayamevattho. ^b^satthavaa^eb^ti satthakahattho. ^b^anaamasanto^eb^ti bahitaca.m tanukampi atacchanto  ida.m phala.m tittaka.m karoti. ^b^samaahara^eb^nti samaaharanto bahitaca.m tacchanto anto ca ambila.m  aniiharanto ta.m saadu.m karoti. ^b^patthivaa^eb^ti raajaana.m aalapati. ^b^tanubandhamuddhara^eb^nti  ^a^P3.0320^ea^ tanuka.m pana taca.m uddharanto sabbaso tittakassa anapaniitattaa ta.m asaadumeva  kayiraa. ^b^eva^eb^nti eva.m pa.n.dito raajaapi asaahasa.m saahasiyaa ta.nhaaya vasa.m agacchanto  agatigamana.m pahaaya ra.t.tha.m apii.letvaa upacikaana.m vammikava.d.dhananiyaamena madhukaraana.m re.nu.m gahetvaa  madhukara.naniyaamena ca dhana.m sa"ngharanto --
[21] ``daana.m siila.m pariccaaga.m, ajjava.m maddava.m tapa.m.
[22] akkodha.m avihi.msa~nca, khanti~nca avirodhana''nti.. --
[25] iti imesa.m dasanna.m raajadhammaana.m anuvattanena dhammaanuvattii hutvaa pa.tipajjamaano so  attano ca paresa~nca phaati.m va.d.dhi.m kareyya para.m avihe.thentoyevaati.

[03] raajaa bodhisattena saddhi.m mantento pokkhara.niitiira.m gantvaa supupphita.m baalasuuriyava.n.na.m udakena  anupalitta.m paduma.m disvaa aaha -- ``sahaaya, ima.m ^a^M3.0301^ea^ paduma.m udake sa~njaatameva  udakena alimpamaana.m .thita''nti. atha na.m bodhisatto ``mahaaraaja, ra~n~naa naama evaruupena  bhavitabba''nti ovadanto imaa gaathaa aaha --
[21] ``odaatamuula.m sucivaarisambhava.m, jaata.m yathaa pokkhara.niisu ambuja.m.
[22] paduma.m yathaa agginikaasiphaalima.m, na kaddamo na rajo na vaari limpati..
[21] ``evampi vohaarasuci.m asaahasa.m, visuddhakammantamapetapaapaka.m.
[22] na limpati kammakilesa taadiso, jaata.m yathaa pokkhara.niisu ambuja''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^odaatamuula^eb^nti pa.n.daramuula.m. ^b^ambuja^eb^nti padumasseva vevacana.m.  ^b^agginikaasiphaalima^eb^nti agginikaasinaa suuriyena phaalita.m vikasitanti attho. ^b^na  kaddamo na^eb^ ^a^V3.0282^ea^ ^b^rajo na vaari limpatii^eb^ti neva kaddamo na rajo na udaka.m  limpati, na makkhetiiti attho. ``lippati''cceva vaa paa.tho, bhummatthe vaa etaani  paccattavacanaani, etesu kaddamaadiisu na lippati, na alliiyatiiti attho. ^b^vohaarasuci^eb^nti  ^a^P3.0321^ea^ poraa.nakehi dhammikaraajuuhi likhaapetvaa .thapitavinicchayavohaare suci.m,  agatigamana.m pahaaya dhammena vinicchayakaarakanti attho. ^b^asaahasa^eb^nti dhammikavinicchaye  .thitattaayeva saahasikakiriyaaya virahita.m. ^b^visuddhakammanta^eb^nti teneva asaahasika.t.thena  visuddhakammanta.m saccavaadi.m nikkodha.m majjhatta.m tulaabhuuta.m lokassa. ^b^apetapaapaka^eb^nti  apagatapaapakamma.m. ^b^na limpati kammakilesa taadiso^eb^ti ta.m raajaana.m paa.naatipaato adinnaadaana.m  kaamesumicchaacaaro musaavaadoti aya.m kammakileso na alliiyati. ki.mkaara.naa? ^b^taadiso  jaata.m yathaa pokkhara.niisu ambuja.m^eb^. taadiso hi raajaa yathaa pokkhara.niisu jaata.m paduma.m  anupalitta.m, eva.m anupalitto naama hoti.
[03] raajaa bodhisattassa ovaada.m sutvaa tato pa.t.thaaya dhammena rajja.m kaarento daanaadiini pu~n~naani  katvaa saggaparaaya.no ahosi.
[03] satthaa ^a^M3.0302^ea^ ima.m dhammadesana.m aaharitvaa jaataka.m samodhaanesi -- ``tadaa raajaa  aanando ahosi, pa.n.ditaamacco pana ahameva ahosi''nti.
[06] kukkujaatakava.n.nanaa pa.thamaa.

[03] ^b^yathaa caapo ninnamatii^eb^ti ida.m satthaa ve.luvane viharanto vipakkhasevaka.m bhikkhu.m aarabbha  kathesi. vatthu pana he.t.thaa ^b^mahi.laamukhajaatake^eb^ (jaa0 1.1.26) vitthaaritameva. tadaa pana  satthaa ``na, bhikkhave, idaaneva, pubbepesa vipakkhasevakoyevaa''ti vatvaa atiita.m aahari.

[03]  atiite baaraa.nasiya.m brahmadatte rajja.m kaarente bodhisatto siiho hutvaa siihiyaa saddhi.m sa.mvasanto  dve potake labhi -- putta~nca dhiitara~nca. puttassa manojoti naama.m ahosi, so vayappatto eka.m  siihapotika.m ga.nhi. iti te pa~nca janaa ahesu.m. manojo vanamahi.msaadayo vadhitvaa ma.msa.m  aaharitvaa maataapitaro ca bhagini~nca pajaapati~nca poseti. so ^a^P3.0322^ea^ ekadivasa.m  gocarabhuumiya.m giriya.m naama si"ngaala.m palaayitu.m appahonta.m urena nipanna.m disvaa ``ki.m, sammaa''ti  ^a^V3.0283^ea^ pucchitvaa ``upa.t.thaatukaamomhi, saamii''ti vutte ``saadhu, upa.t.thahassuu''ti ta.m gahetvaa  attano vasanaguha.m aanesi. bodhisatto ta.m disvaa ``taata manoja, si"ngaalaa naama dussiilaa  paapadhammaa akicce niyojenti, maa eta.m attano santike karii''ti vaaretu.m naasakkhi.

[03] athekadivasa.m si"ngaalo assama.msa.m khaaditukaamo manoja.m aaha -- ``saami, amhehi .thapetvaa  assama.msa.m a~n~na.m akhaaditapubba.m naama natthi, assa.m ga.nhissaamaa''ti. ``kaha.m pana, samma, assaa  hontii''ti? ``baaraa.nasiya.m nadiitiire''ti. so tassa vacana.m gahetvaa tena saddhi.m assaana.m  nadiyaa nhaanavelaaya.m gantvaa eka.m assa.m gahetvaa pi.t.thiya.m aaropetvaa vegena attano guhaadvaarameva  aagato. athassa pitaa assama.msa.m khaaditvaa ``taata, assaa naama raajabhogaa, raajaano ca naama  anekamaayaa kusalehi ^a^M3.0303^ea^ dhanuggahehi vijjhaapenti, assama.msakhaadanasiihaa naama  diighaayukaa na honti, ito pa.t.thaaya maa assa.m ga.nhii''ti aaha. so pitu vacana.m akatvaa ga.nhateva.  ``siiho asse ga.nhaatii''ti sutvaa raajaa antonagareyeva assaana.m pokkhara.ni.m kaaraapesi.  tatopi aagantvaa ga.nhiyeva. raajaa assasaala.m kaaretvaa antosaalaayameva ti.nodaka.m daapesi.  siiho paakaaramatthakena gantvaa antosaalaatopi ga.nhiyeva.

[03] raajaa eka.m akkha.navedhi.m dhanuggaha.m pakkosaapetvaa ``sakkhissasi taata, siiha.m vijjhitu''nti  aaha. so ``sakkomii''ti vatvaa paakaara.m nissaaya siihassa aagamanamagge a.t.taka.m kaaretvaa a.t.thaasi.  siiho aagantvaa bahisusaane si"ngaala.m .thapetvaa assagaha.natthaaya nagara.m pakkhandi. dhanuggaho  aagamanakaale ``atitikhi.no vego''ti siiha.m avijjhitvaa assa.m gahetvaa gamanakaale garubhaarataaya  oliinavega.m siiha.m tikhi.nena naaraacena pacchaabhaage vijjhi. naaraaco purimakaayena nikkhamitvaa  aakaasa.m pakkhandi. siiho ^a^P3.0323^ea^ ``viddhosmii''ti viravi. dhanuggaho ta.m  vijjhitvaa asani viya jiya.m pothesi. si"ngaalo siihassa ca jiyaaya ca sadda.m sutvaa  ``sahaayo me dhanuggahena vijjhitvaa maarito bhavissati, matakena hi saddhi.m vissaaso naama  natthi, idaani mama pakatiyaa vasanavanameva gamissaamii''ti attanaava saddhi.m sallapanto dve gaathaa  abhaasi --
[21] ``yathaa caapo ninnamati, jiyaa caapi nikuujati.
[22] ha~n~nate nuuna manojo, migaraajaa sakhaa mama..
[21] ``handa ^a^V3.0284^ea^ daani vanantaani, pakkamaami yathaasukha.m.
[22] netaadisaa sakhaa honti, labbhaa me jiivato sakhaa''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^yathaa^eb^ti yenaakaareneva caapo ninnamati. ^b^ha~n~nate nuunaa^eb^ti nuuna ha~n~nati.  ^b^netaadisaa^eb^ti evaruupaa matakaa sahaayaa naama na honti. ^b^labbhaa me^eb^ti jiivato mama  sahaayo naama sakkaa laddhu.m.

[03] siihopi ekavegena gantvaa assa.m guhaadvaare paatetvaa sayampi maritvaa pati. athassa ~naatakaa  nikkhamitvaa ta.m lohitamakkhita.m pahaaramukhehi ^a^M3.0304^ea^ paggharitalohita.m paapajanasevitaaya  jiivitakkhaya.m patta.m addasa.msu, disvaa cassa maataa pitaa bhaginii pajaapatiiti pa.tipaa.tiyaa catasso  gaathaa bhaasi.msu --
[21] ``na paapajanasa.msevii, accanta.m sukhamedhati.
[22] manoja.m passa semaana.m, giriyassaanusaasanii..
[21] ``na paapasampava"nkena, maataa puttena nandati.
[22] manoja.m passa semaana.m, acchanna.m samhi lohite..
[21] ``evamaapajjate poso, paapiyo ca nigacchati.
[22] yo ve hitaana.m vacana.m, na karoti atthadassina.m..
[21] ``eva~nca so hoti tato ca paapiyo, yo uttamo adhamajanuupasevii.
[22] passuttama.m ^a^P3.0324^ea^ adhamajanuupasevita.m, migaadhipa.m saravaraveganiddhuta''nti..

[03]  tattha ^b^accanta.m sukhamedhatii^eb^ti na cira.m sukha.m labhati. ^b^giriyassaanusaasanii^eb^ti  aya.m evaruupaa giriyassaanusaasaniiti garahanto aaha. ^b^paapasampava"nkenaa^eb^ti paapesu sampava"nkena  paapasahaayena. ^b^acchanna^eb^nti nimugga.m. ^b^paapiyo ca nigacchatii^eb^ti paapa~nca vindati.  ^b^hitaana^eb^nti atthakaamaana.m. ^b^atthadassina^eb^nti anaagataattha.m passantaana.m.  ^b^paapiyo^eb^ti paapataro. ^b^adhamajanuupasevii^eb^ti adhamajana.m upasevii. ^b^uttama^eb^nti  sariirabalena je.t.thaka.m.
[03] pacchimaa ^a^V3.0285^ea^ abhisambuddhagaathaa --
[21] ``nihiiyati puriso nihiinasevii, na ca haayetha kadaaci tulyasevii.
[22] se.t.thamupagama.m udeti khippa.m, tasmaattanaa uttaritara.m bhajethaa''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^nihiiyatii^eb^ti bhikkhave, nihiinasevii naama manojo siiho viya nihiiyati  parihaayati vinaasa.m paapu.naati. ^b^tulyasevii^eb^ti siilaadiihi attanaa ^a^M3.0305^ea^ sadisa.m  sevamaano na haayati, va.d.dhiyeva panassa hoti. ^b^se.t.thamupagama^eb^nti siilaadiihi uttaritara.myeva  upagacchanto. ^b^udeti khippa^eb^nti siighameva siilaadiihi gu.nehi udeti, vuddhi.m upagacchatiiti.
[03] satthaa ima.m dhammadesana.m aaharitvaa saccaani pakaasetvaa jaataka.m samodhaanesi, saccapariyosaane  vipakkhasevako sotaapattiphale pati.t.thahi.
[03] tadaa si"ngaalo devadatto ahosi, manojo vipakkhasevako, bhaginii uppalava.n.naa, bhariyaa  khemaa bhikkhunii, maataa raahulamaataa, pitaa siiharaajaa pana ahameva ahosinti.
[06] manojajaatakava.n.nanaa dutiyaa.
[03] ^b^raajaa te bhatta^eb^nti ida.m satthaa jetavane viharanto maatuposakabhikkhu.m aarabbha kathesi.  vatthu ^b^saamajaatake^eb^ (jaa0 2.22.296 aadayo) aavi bhavissati.

[03] atiite ^a^P3.0325^ea^ baaraa.nasiya.m brahmadatte rajja.m kaarente bodhisatto duggatagahapatikule  nibbatti, sutanuutissa naama.m aka.msu. so vayappatto bhati.m katvaa maataapitaro posetvaa pitari  kaalakate maatara.m poseti. tasmi.m pana kaale baaraa.nasiraajaa migavittako ahosi. so  ekadivasa.m mahantena parivaarena yojanadviyojanamatta.m ara~n~na.m pavisitvaa ``yassa .thita.t.thaanena migo  palaayati, so ima.m naama jito''ti sabbesa.m aarocaapesi. amaccaa ra~n~no dhuvamagga.t.thaane ko.t.thaka.m  chaadetvaa ada.msu. manussehi migaana.m vasana.t.thaanaani parivaaretvaa unnaadentehi u.t.thaapitesu migesu  eko e.nimigo ra~n~no .thita.t.thaana.m pa.tipajji. raajaa ``ta.m vijjhissaamii''ti sara.m khipi  ^a^V3.0286^ea^. uggahitamaayo migo sara.m mahaaphaasukaabhimukha.m aagacchanta.m ~natvaa parivattitvaa sarena  viddho viya hutvaa pati. raajaa ``migo me viddho''ti gaha.natthaaya dhaavi. migo u.t.thaaya  vaatavegena palaayi, amaccaadayo raajaana.m avahasi.msu. so miga.m anubandhitvaa kilantakaale khaggena  dvidhaa chinditvaa ekasmi.m da.n.dake laggitvaa ^a^M3.0306^ea^ kaaja.m vahanto viya aagacchanto  ``thoka.m vissamissaamii''ti maggasamiipe .thita.m va.tarukkha.m upagantvaa nipajjitvaa nidda.m okkami.

[03] tasmi.m pana va.tarukkhe nibbatto maghadevo naama yakkho tattha pavi.t.the vessava.nassa santikaa  khaaditu.m labhi. so raajaana.m u.t.thaaya gacchanta.m ``ti.t.tha bhakkhosi me''ti hatthe ga.nhi. ``tva.m  konaamosii''ti? ``aha.m idha nibbattayakkho, ima.m .thaana.m pavi.t.thake khaaditu.m labhaamii''ti. raajaa  sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa ``ki.m ajjeva ma.m khaadissasi, udaahu nibaddha.m khaadissasii''ti pucchi.  ``labhanto nibaddha.m khaadissaamii''ti. raajaa ``ima.m ajja miga.m khaaditvaa ma.m vissajjehi, aha.m  te sve pa.t.thaaya ekaaya bhattapaatiyaa saddhi.m eka.m manussa.m pesessaamii''ti. ``tena hi appamatto  hohi, apesitadivase ta~n~neva ^a^P3.0326^ea^ khaadissaamii''ti. ``aha.m baaraa.nasiraajaa,  mayha.m avijjamaana.m naama natthii''ti. yakkho pa.ti~n~na.m gahetvaa ta.m vissajjesi. so nagara.m  pavisitvaa tamattha.m ekassa atthacarakassa amaccassa kathetvaa ``idaani ki.m kaatabba''nti pucchi.  ``divasaparicchedo kato, devaa''ti? ``na kato''ti. ``ayutta.m vo kata.m, eva.m santepi maa  cintayittha, bahuu bandhanaagaare manussaa''ti. ``tena hi tva.m eta.m kamma.m kara, mayha.m jiivita.m  dehii''ti.

[03] amacco ``saadhuu''ti sampa.ticchitvaa devasika.m bandhanaagaarato manussa.m niiharitvaa bhattapaati.m  gahetvaa ka~nci ajaanaapetvaava yakkhassa pesesi. yakkho bhatta.m bhu~njitvaa manussa.m khaadati.  aparabhaage bandhanaagaaraani nimmanussaani jaataani. raajaa bhattahaaraka.m alabhanto mara.nabhayena kampi.  atha na.m amacco assaasetvaa ``deva, jiivitaasaato dhanaasaava balavataraa, hatthikkhandhe  sahassabha.n.dika.m .thapetvaa `ko ima.m dhana.m gahetvaa yakkhassa bhatta.m aadaaya gamissatii'ti bheri.m  caraapemaa''ti vatvaa tathaa kaaresi. atha ta.m sutvaa bodhisatto cintesi ``aha.m bhatiyaa  maasaka.d.dhamaasaka.m sa"ngharitvaa kicchena maatara.m posemi, ima.m dhana.m gahetvaa maatu datvaa yakkhassa  santika.m gamissaami, sace yakkha.m dametu.m sakkhissaami, icceta.m kusala.m, no ce sakkhissaami,  maataa me sukha.m jiivissatii''ti. so tamattha.m maatu aarocetvaa ``ala.m taata, na mama attho  dhanenaa''ti dve vaare pa.tikkhipitvaa tatiyavaare ta.m anaapucchitvaava ``aaharatha, ayya, sahassa.m, aha.m  bhatta.m harissaamii''ti sahassa.m gahetvaa maatu datvaa ``amma ^a^M3.0307^ea^, maa cintayi  ^a^V3.0287^ea^, aha.m yakkha.m dametvaa mahaajanassa sotthi.m karissaami, ajjeva tava assukilinnamukha.m  haasaapentova aagacchissaamii''ti maatara.m vanditvaa raajapurisehi saddhi.m ra~n~no santika.m gantvaa  vanditvaa a.t.thaasi.

[03] tato ra~n~naa ``taata, tva.m bhatta.m harissasii''ti vutte ``aama, devaa''ti aaha. ``ki.m te  laddhu.m va.t.tatii''ti? ``tumhaaka.m ^a^P3.0327^ea^ suva.n.napaadukaa, devaa''ti. ``ki.mkaara.naa''ti?  ``deva, so yakkho attano rukkhamuule bhuumiya.m .thitake khaaditu.m labhati, aha.m etassa  santakabhuumiya.m a.t.thatvaa paadukaasu .thassaamii''ti. ``a~n~na.m ki.m laddhu.m va.t.tatii''ti? ``tumhaaka.m  chatta.m, devaa''ti. ``ida.m kimatthaayaa''ti? ``deva, yakkho attano rukkhacchaayaaya .thitake  khaaditu.m labhati, aha.m tassa rukkhacchaayaaya a.t.thatvaa chattacchaayaaya .thassaamii''ti. ``a~n~na.m ki.m  laddhu.m va.t.tatii''ti. ``tumhaaka.m khagga.m, devaa''ti. ``iminaa ko attho''ti? ``deva,  amanussaapi aavudhahatthaana.m bhaayantiyevaa''ti. ``a~n~na.m ki.m laddhu.m va.t.tatii''ti? ``suva.n.napaati.m  puuretvaa tumhaaka.m bhu~njanakabhatta.m detha, devaa''ti. ``ki.mkaara.naa, taataa''ti? ``deva, maadisassa  naama pa.n.ditassa purisassa mattikapaatiyaa luukhabhojana.m haritu.m ananucchavika''nti. ``saadhu,  taataa''ti raajaa sabba.m daapetvaa tassa veyyaavaccakare pa.tipaadesi.

[03] bodhisatto ``mahaaraaja, maa bhaayittha, ajjaaha.m yakkha.m dametvaa tumhaaka.m sotthi.m katvaa  aagamissaamii''ti raajaana.m vanditvaa upakara.naani gaahaapetvaa tattha gantvaa manusse rukkhassaaviduure  .thapetvaa suva.n.napaaduka.m aaruyha khagga.m sannayhitvaa setacchatta.m matthake katvaa ka~ncanapaatiyaa bhatta.m  gahetvaa yakkhassa santika.m paayaasi. yakkho magga.m olokento ta.m disvaa ``aya.m puriso na  a~n~nesu divasesu aagamananiyaamena eti, ki.m nu kho kaara.na''nti cintesi. bodhisattopi  rukkhasamiipa.m gantvaa asitu.n.dena bhattapaati.m antochaayaaya karitvaa chaayaaya pariyante .thito pa.thama.m  gaathamaaha.
[21] ``raajaa te bhatta.m paahesi, suci.m ma.msuupasecana.m.
[22] maghadevasmi.m adhivatthe, ehi nikkhamma bhu~njasuu''ti..
[03] tattha ^a^P3.0328^ea^ ^b^paahesii^eb^ti pahi.ni. ^b^maghadevasmi.m adhivatthe^eb^ti  maghadevoti va.tarukkho vuccati, tasmi.m adhivattheti devata.m aalapati.
[03] ta.m ^a^V3.0288^ea^ ^a^M3.0308^ea^ sutvaa yakkho ``ima.m purisa.m va~ncetvaa antochaayaaya  pavi.t.tha.m khaadissaamii''ti cintetvaa dutiya.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``ehi maa.nava orena, bhikkhamaadaaya suupita.m.
[22] tva~nca maa.nava bhikkhaa ca, ubho bhakkhaa bhavissathaa''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^bhikkha^eb^nti mama nibaddhabhikkha.m. ^b^suupita^eb^nti suupasampanna.m.
[03] tato bodhisatto dve gaathaa abhaasi --
[21] ``appakena tuva.m yakkha, thullamattha.m jahissasi.
[22] bhikkha.m te naaharissanti, janaa mara.nasa~n~nino..
[21] ``laddhaaya yakkhaa tava niccabhikkha.m, suci.m pa.niita.m rasasaa upeta.m.
[22] bhikkha~nca te aahariyo naro idha, sudullabho hehiti bhakkhite mayii''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^thullamattha^eb^nti appakena kaara.nena mahanta.m attha.m jahissasiiti dasseti.  ^b^naaharissantii^eb^ti ito pa.t.thaaya mara.nasa~n~nino hutvaa na aaharissanti, atha tva.m milaatasaakho  viya rukkho niraahaaro dubbalo bhavissasiiti. ^b^laddhaaya^eb^nti laddhaaya.m laddhaagamana.m. ida.m  vutta.m hoti -- samma yakkha, ya.m aha.m ajja aahari.m, ida.m tava niccabhikkha.m suci.m pa.niita.m uttama.m  rasena upeta.m laddhaagamana.m devasika.m te aagacchissati. ^b^aahariyo^eb^ti aahara.nako. ida.m vutta.m  hoti -- ``sace tva.m ima.m bhikkha.m gahetvaa aagata.m ma.m bhakkhasi, atheva.m mayi bhakkhite bhikkha~nca  te aahara.nako a~n~no naro idha sudullabho bhavissati. ki.mkaara.naa? maadiso hi baaraa.nasiya.m  a~n~no pa.n.ditamanusso naama natthi, mayi pana khaadite sutanupi naama yakkhena khaadito, a~n~nassa  kassa so lajjissatii''ti bhattaahara.naka.m na labhissasi, atha te ito pa.t.thaaya bhojana.m dullabha.m  bhavissati, amhaakampi raajaana.m ga.nhitu.m na labhissasi. kasmaa? rukkhato bahibhaavena. sace  panida.m bhatta.m bhu~njitvaa ma.m pahi.nissasi, aha.m te ra~n~no kathetvaa nibaddha.m bhatta.m pesessaami,  attaanampi ca te ^a^P3.0329^ea^ khaaditu.m ^a^M3.0309^ea^ na dassaami, ahampi tava santike  .thaane na .thassaami, paadukaasu .thassaami, rukkhacchaayaayampi te na .thassaami, attano  chattacchaayaayameva .thassaami, sace pana mayaa saddhi.m virujjhissasi, khaggena ta.m dvidhaa bhindissaami  ^a^V3.0289^ea^, aha~nhi ajja etadatthameva sajjo hutvaa aagatoti. eva.m kira na.m mahaasatto tajjesi.
[03] yakkho ``yuttaruupa.m maa.navo vadatii''ti sallakkhetvaa pasannacitto dve gaathaa abhaasi --
[21] ``mameva sutano attho, yathaa bhaasasi maa.nava.
[22] mayaa tva.m samanu~n~naato, sotthi.m passaahi maatara.m..
[21] ``khagga.m chatta~nca paati~nca, gacchamaadaaya maa.nava.
[22] sotthi.m passatu te maataa, tva~nca passaahi maatara''nti..
[03] tattha ^b^sutano^eb^ti bodhisatta.m aalapati. ^b^yathaa bhaasasii^eb^ti yathaa tva.m bhaasasi,  tathaa yo esa tayaa bhaasito attho, eso mamevattho, mayhameva va.d.dhiiti.

[03] yakkhassa katha.m sutvaa bodhisatto ``mama kamma.m nipphanna.m, damito me yakkho, bahu~nca dhana.m  laddha.m, ra~n~no ca vacana.m kata''nti tu.t.thacitto yakkhassa anumodana.m karonto osaanagaathamaaha --
[21] ``eva.m yakkha sukhii hohi, saha sabbehi ~naatibhi.
[22] dhana~nca me adhigata.m, ra~n~no ca vacana.m kata''nti.. --

[25] vatvaa ca pana yakkha.m aamantetvaa ``samma, tva.m pubbe akusalakamma.m katvaa kakkha.lo  pharuso paresa.m lohitama.msabhakkho yakkho hutvaa nibbatto, ito pa.t.thaaya paa.naatipaataadiini maa  karii''ti siile ca aanisa.msa.m, dussiilye ca aadiinava.m kathetvaa yakkha.m pa~ncasu siilesu pati.t.thaapetvaa  ``ki.m te ara~n~navaasena, ehi nagaradvaare ta.m nisiidaapetvaa aggabhattalaabhi.m karomii''ti yakkhena  saddhi.m nikkhamitvaa khaggaadiini yakkha.m gaahaapetvaa baaraa.nasi.m agamaasi. ``sutanu maa.navo  yakkha.m gahetvaa etii''ti ra~n~no aarocesu.m. raajaa amaccaparivuto bodhisattassa ^a^P3.0330^ea^  paccuggamana.m katvaa yakkha.m nagaradvaare ^a^M3.0310^ea^ nisiidaapetvaa aggabhattalaabhina.m katvaa nagara.m  pavisitvaa bheri.m caraapetvaa naagare sannipaataapetvaa bodhisattassa gu.na.m kathetvaa senaapati.t.thaana.m adaasi.  aya~nca bodhisattassa ovaade .thatvaa daanaadiini pu~n~naani katvaa saggaparaaya.no ahosi.

[03] satthaa ^a^V3.0290^ea^ ima.m dhammadesana.m aaharitvaa saccaani pakaasetvaa jaataka.m samodhaanesi,  saccapariyosaane maatuposakabhikkhu sotaapattiphale pati.t.thahi. tadaa yakkho a"ngulimaalo ahosi,  raajaa aanando, maa.navo pana ahameva ahosinti.
[06] sutanujaatakava.n.nanaa tatiyaa.
[03] ^b^te katha.m nu karissantii^eb^ti ida.m satthaa jetavane viharanto eka.m maatuposakabhikkhu.m  aarabbha kathesi. vatthu ^b^saamajaatake^eb^ (jaa0 2.22.296 aadayo) aavi bhavissati.

[03] atiite baaraa.nasiya.m brahmadatte rajja.m kaarente bodhisatto gijjhayoniya.m nibbattitvaa vayappatto  vuddhe parihiinacakkhuke maataapitaro gijjhaguhaaya.m .thapetvaa goma.msaadiini aaharitvaa posesi. tasmi.m  kaale baaraa.nasiya.m susaane eko nesaado aniyametvaa gijjhaana.m paase o.d.desi. athekadivasa.m  bodhisatto goma.msaadi.m pariyesanto susaana.m pavi.t.tho paadena paase bajjhitvaa attano na cintesi,  vuddhe parihiinacakkhuke maataapitaro anussaritvaa ``katha.m nu kho me maataapitaro yaapessanti, mama  baddhabhaavampi ajaanantaa anaathaa nippaccayaa pabbataguhaayameva sussitvaa marissanti ma~n~ne''ti  vilapanto pa.thama.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``te katha.m nu karissanti, vuddhaa giridariisayaa.
[22] aha.m baddhosmi paasena, niliiyassa vasa.m gato''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^niliiyassaa^eb^ti eva.mnaamakassa nesaadaputtassa.
[03] atha ^a^M3.0311^ea^ nesaadaputto gijjharaajassa ^a^P3.0331^ea^ paridevitasadda.m sutvaa  dutiya.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``ki.m gijjha paridevasi, kaa nu te paridevanaa.
[22] na me suto vaa di.t.tho vaa, bhaasanto maanusi.m dijo''ti..
[25] gijjho aaha --
[21] ``bharaami ^a^V3.0291^ea^ maataapitaro, vuddhe giridariisaye.
[22] te katha.m nu karissanti, aha.m vasa.m gato tavaa''ti..
[25] nesaado aaha --
[21] ``ya.m nu gijjho yojanasata.m, ku.napaani avekkhati.
[22] kasmaa jaala~nca paasa~nca, aasajjaapi na bujjhasii''ti..
[25] gijjharaajaa aaha --
[21] ``yadaa paraabhavo hoti, poso jiivitasa"nkhaye.
[22] atha jaala~nca paasa~nca, aasajjaapi na bujjhatii''ti..
[21] ``bharassu maataapitaro, vuddhe giridariisaye.
[22] mayaa tva.m samanu~n~naato, sotthi.m passaahi ~naatake..
[21] ``eva.m luddaka nandassu, saha sabbehi ~naatibhi.
[22] bharissa.m maataapitaro, vuddhe giridariisaye''ti.. --
[25] nesaadaputtena dutiyaa, gijjhena tatiyaati imaa gaathaa pa.tipaa.tiyaa vuttaa.

[03] tattha ^b^ya.m nuu^eb^ti ya.m nu eta.m loke kathiiyati. ^b^gijjho yojanasata.m, ku.napaani  avekkhatii^eb^ti yojanasata.m atikkamma .thitaanipi ku.napaani passati, ta.m yadi tatha.m, atha kasmaa tva.m  ima.m jaala~nca paasa~nca aasajjaapi na bujjhasi, santika.m aagantvaapi na jaanaasiiti.

[03] ^b^paraabhavo^eb^ti vinaaso. ^b^bharassuu^eb^ti ida.m so bodhisattassa dhammakatha.m sutvaa  ``pa.n.dito gijjharaajaa paridevanto na attano paridevati, maataapituuna.m ^a^M3.0312^ea^  paridevati, naaya.m maaretu.m yutto''ti tussitvaa aaha, vatvaa ca pana piyacittena muducittena paasa.m  mocesi.
[03] athassa ^a^V3.0292^ea^ bodhisatto mara.namukhaa pamutto sukhito anumodana.m karonto  osaanagaatha.m vatvaa mukhapuura.m ma.msa.m aadaaya maataapituuna.m adaasi.
[03] satthaa ima.m dhammadesana.m aaharitvaa saccaani pakaasetvaa jaataka.m samodhaanesi, saccapariyosaane  maatuposakabhikkhu sotaapattiphale pati.t.thahi ^a^P3.0332^ea^.
[03] tadaa nesaadaputto channo ahosi, maataapitaro mahaaraajakulaani, gijjharaajaa pana ahameva  ahosinti.
[06] maatuposakagijjhajaatakava.n.nanaa catutthaa.

[03] ^b^anutiiracaarii bhaddante^eb^ti ida.m satthaa jetavane viharanto upananda.m sakyaputta.m aarabbha  kathesi. so hi saasane pabbajitvaa appicchataadigu.ne pahaaya mahaata.nho ahosi.  vassuupanaayikaaya dve tayo vihaare pariggahetvaa ekasmi.m chatta.m vaa upaahana.m vaa ekasmi.m kattaraya.t.thi.m  vaa udakatumba.m vaa .thapetvaa ekasmi.m saya.m vasati. so ekasmi.m janapadavihaare vassa.m upagantvaa  ``bhikkhuuhi naama appicchehi bhavitabba''nti aakaase canda.m u.t.thaapento viya bhikkhuuna.m  paccayasantosadiipaka.m ariyava.msapa.tipada.m kathesi. ta.m sutvaa bhikkhuu manaapaani pattaciivaraani cha.d.detvaa  mattikaapattaani ceva pa.msukuulaciivaraani ca ga.nhi.msu. so taani attano vasana.t.thaane .thapetvaa  vutthavasso pavaaretvaa yaanaka.m puuretvaa jetavana.m gacchanto antaraamagge ekassa ara~n~navihaarassa  pi.t.thibhaage paade valliyaa palibuddho ``addhaa ettha ki~nci laddhabba.m bhavissatii''ti ta.m vihaara.m  paavisi. tattha pana dve mahallakaa bhikkhuu vassa.m upagacchi.msu. te dve ca thuulasaa.take eka~nca  sukhumakambala.m labhitvaa bhaajetu.m asakkontaa ta.m disvaa ``thero no bhaajetvaa dassatii''ti tu.t.thacittaa  ``maya.m, bhante, ima.m vassaavaasika.m bhaajetu.m na sakkoma, ima.m no nissaaya vivaado hoti, ida.m  amhaaka.m bhaajetvaa dethaa''ti aaha.msu. so ^a^M3.0313^ea^ ``saadhu bhaajessaamii''ti dve  thuulasaa.take dvinnampi bhaajetvaa ``aya.m amhaaka.m vinayadharaana.m paapu.naatii''ti kambala.m gahetvaa pakkaami.

[03] tepi theraa kambale saalayaa teneva saddhi.m jetavana.m gantvaa vinayadharaana.m bhikkhuuna.m tamattha.m  aarocetvaa ^a^V3.0293^ea^ ``labbhati nu kho, bhante, vinayadharaana.m eva.m vilopa.m khaaditu''nti aaha.msu.  bhikkhuu upanandattherena aabhata.m pattaciivararaasi.m disvaa ``mahaapu~n~nosi tva.m aavuso, bahu.m te  pattaciivara.m laddha''nti vadi.msu. so ``kuto me aavuso, pu~n~na.m, iminaa me upaayena ida.m  laddha''nti sabba.m kathesi. bhikkhuu dhammasabhaaya.m katha.m samu.t.thaapesu.m ``aavuso, upanando sakyaputto  mahaata.nho mahaalobho''ti. satthaa ^a^P3.0333^ea^ aagantvaa ``kaaya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi  kathaaya sannisinnaa''ti pucchitvaa ``imaaya naamaa''ti vutte ``na, bhikkhave, upanandena pa.tipadaaya  anucchavika.m kata.m, parassa pa.tipada.m kathentena naama bhikkhunaa pa.thama.m attano anucchavika.m katvaa  pacchaa paro ovaditabbo''ti.
[21] ``attaanameva pa.thama.m, patiruupe nivesaye.
[22] atha~n~namanusaaseyya, na kilisseyya pa.n.dito''ti.. (dha0 pa0 158) --

[25] imaaya dhammapade gaathaaya dhamma.m desetvaa ``na, bhikkhave, upanando idaaneva, pubbepesa  mahaata.nho mahaalobhova, na ca pana idaaneva, pubbepesa imesa.m santaka.m vilumpiyevaa''ti vatvaa atiita.m  aahari.

[03] atiite baaraa.nasiya.m brahmadatte rajja.m kaarente bodhisatto nadiitiire rukkhadevataa ahosi. tadaa  eko si"ngaalo maayaavi.m naama bhariya.m gahetvaa nadiitiire ekasmi.m .thaane vasi. athekadivasa.m  si"ngaalii si"ngaala.m aaha ``doha.lo me saami, uppanno, allarohitamaccha.m khaaditu.m icchaamii''ti.  si"ngaalo ``appossukkaa hohi, aaharissaami te''ti nadiitiire caranto valliyaa paade  palibujjhitvaa anutiirameva agamaasi. tasmi.m kha.ne gambhiiracaarii ca anutiiracaarii caati dve uddaa  macche pariyesantaa tiire a.t.tha.msu. tesu gambhiiracaarii mahanta.m rohitamaccha.m disvaa vegena udake  pavisitvaa ta.m na"ngu.t.the ga.nhi. balavaa maccho parika.d.dhanto yaasi. so gambhiiracaarii uddo  ``mahaamaccho ubhinnampi no pahossati, ehi me sahaayo hohii''ti itarena saddhi.m sallapanto pa.thama.m  gaathamaaha --
[21] ``anutiiracaarii ^a^M3.0314^ea^ bhaddante, sahaayamanudhaava ma.m.
[22] mahaa me gahito maccho, so ma.m harati vegasaa''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^V3.0294^ea^ ^b^sahaayamanudhaava ma^eb^nti sahaaya anudhaava ma.m, sandhivasena ma-kaaro  vutto. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- yathaaha.m iminaa macchena na sa.mhiiraami, eva.m ma.m na"ngu.t.thakha.n.de gahetvaa tva.m  anudhaavaati.
[03] ta.m ^a^P3.0334^ea^ sutvaa itaro dutiya.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``gambhiiracaarii bhaddante, da.lha.m ga.nhaahi thaamasaa.
[22] aha.m ta.m uddharissaami, supa.n.no uragaamivaa''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^thaamasaa^eb^ti thaamena. ^b^uddharissaamii^eb^ti niiharissaami. ^b^supa.n.no  uragaamivaa^eb^ti garu.lo sappa.m viya.

[03] atha dvepi te ekato hutvaa rohitamaccha.m niiharitvaa thale .thapetvaa maaretvaa ``tva.m bhaajehi,  tva.m bhaajehii''ti kalaha.m katvaa bhaajetu.m asakkontaa .thapetvaa nisiidi.msu. tasmi.m kaale si"ngaalo ta.m  .thaana.m anuppatto. te ta.m disvaa ubhopi paccuggamana.m katvaa ``aya.m, samma, dabbhapupphamaccho amhehi  ekato hutvaa gahito, ta.m no bhaajetu.m asakkontaana.m vivaado uppanno, samabhaaga.m no bhaajetvaa  dehii''ti tatiya.m gaathamaaha.msu --
[21] ``vivaado no samuppanno, dabbhapuppha su.nohi me.
[22] samehi medhaga.m sammaa, vivaado vuupasammata''nti..
[03] tattha ^b^dabbhapupphaa^eb^ti dabbhapupphasamaanava.n.nataaya ta.m aalapanti. ^b^medhaga^eb^nti kalaha.m.
[03] tesa.m vacana.m sutvaa si"ngaalo attano bala.m diipento --
[21] ``dhamma.t.thoha.m pure aasi.m, bahuu a.d.daa me tiiritaa.
[22] samemi medhaga.m sammaa, vivaado vuupasammata''nti.. --
[25] ida.m gaatha.m vatvaa bhaajento --
[21] ``anutiiracaari ^a^V3.0295^ea^ ^a^M3.0315^ea^ na"ngu.t.tha.m, siisa.m gambhiiracaarino.
[22] accaaya.m majjhimo kha.n.do, dhamma.t.thassa bhavissatii''ti.. --
[25] ima.m gaathamaaha --

[03] tattha pa.thamagaathaaya ayamattho -- aha.m pubbe raajuuna.m vinicchayaamacco aasi.m, tena mayaa  vinicchaye nisiiditvaa bahuu a.d.daa tiiritaa, tesa.m tesa.m braahma.nagahapatikaadiina.m bahuu a.d.daa tiiritaa  vinicchitaa, svaaha.m tumhaadisaana.m samajaatikaana.m catuppadaana.m a.d.da.m tiiretu.m ki.m na sakkhissaami, aha.m  vo samemi medhaga.m, sammaa ma.m nissaaya tumhaaka.m vivaado vuupasammatuuti ^a^P3.0335^ea^.

[03] eva~nca pana vatvaa maccha.m tayo ko.t.thaase katvaa anutiiracaari tva.m na"ngu.t.tha.m ga.nha, siisa.m  gambhiiracaarino hotu. ^b^accaaya.m majjhimo kha.n.do^eb^ti apica aya.m majjhimo ko.t.thaaso. atha  vaa ^b^accaa^eb^ti aticca, ime dve ko.t.thaase atikkamitvaa .thito aya.m majjhimo kha.n.do dhamma.t.thassa  vinicchayasaamikassa mayha.m bhavissatiiti.

[03] eva.m ta.m maccha.m vibhajitvaa ``tumhe kalaha.m akatvaa na"ngu.t.tha~nca siisa~nca khaadathaa''ti vatvaa  majjhimakha.n.da.m mukhena .da.msitvaa tesa.m passantaana.myeva palaayi. te sahassa.m paraajitaa viya dummukhaa  nisiiditvaa gaathamaaha.msu --
[21] ``cirampi bhakkho abhavissa, sace na vivademase.
[22] asiisaka.m ana"ngu.t.tha.m, si"ngaalo harati rohita''nti..
[03] tattha ^b^cirampii^eb^ti dve tayo divase sandhaaya vutta.m.
[03] si"ngaalopi ``ajja bhariya.m rohitamaccha.m khaadaapessaamii''ti tu.t.thacitto tassaa santika.m  agamaasi. saa ta.m aagacchanta.m disvaa abhinandamaanaa --
[21] ``yathaapi raajaa nandeyya, rajja.m laddhaana khattiyo.
[22] evaahamajja nandaami, disvaa pu.n.namukha.m pati''nti.. --
[25] ima.m ^a^V3.0296^ea^ gaatha.m vatvaa adhigamuupaaya.m pucchantii --
[21] ``katha.m nu thalajo santo, udake maccha.m paraamasi.
[22] pu.t.tho me samma akkhaahi, katha.m adhigata.m tayaa''ti.. --
[25] ima.m gaathamaaha --
[03] tattha ^a^M3.0316^ea^ ^b^katha.m nuu^eb^ti ``khaada, bhadde''ti macchakha.n.de purato .thapite  ``katha.m nu tva.m thalajo samaano udake maccha.m ga.nhii''ti pucchi.
[03] si"ngaalo tassaa adhigamuupaaya.m aacikkhanto anantaragaathamaaha --
[21] ``vivaadena kisaa honti, vivaadena dhanakkhayaa.
[22] jiinaa uddaa vivaadena, bhu~nja maayaavi rohita''nti..

[03] tattha ^a^P3.0336^ea^ ^b^vivaadena kisaa hontii^eb^ti bhadde, ime sattaa vivaada.m karontaa  vivaada.m nissaaya kisaa appama.msalohitaa honti. ^b^vivaadena dhanakkhayaa^eb^ti  hira~n~nasuva.n.naadiina.m dhanaana.m khayaa vivaadeneva honti. dviisupi vivadantesu eko paraajito  paraajitattaa dhanakkhaya.m paapu.naati, itaro jayabhaagadaanena. ^b^jiinaa uddaa^eb^ti dve uddaapi  vivaadeneva ima.m maccha.m jiinaa, tasmaa tva.m mayaa aabhatassa uppatti.m maa puccha, kevala.m ima.m bhu~nja  maayaavi rohitanti.
[03] itaraa abhisambuddhagaathaa --
[21] ``evameva manussesu, vivaado yattha jaayati.
[27] dhamma.t.tha.m pa.tidhaavati, so hi nesa.m vinaayako.
[22] dhanaapi tattha jiiyanti, raajakoso pava.d.dhatii''ti..
