[03] tattha ^b^evamevaa^eb^ti bhikkhave, yathaa ete uddaa jiinaa, evameva manussesupi yasmi.m .thaane  vivaado jaayati, tattha te manussaa dhamma.t.tha.m patidhaavanti, vinicchayasaamika.m upasa"nkamanti.  ki.mkaara.naa? ^b^so hi nesa.m vinaayako,^eb^ so tesa.m vivaadaapannaana.m vivaadavuupasamakoti attho.  ^b^dhanaapi^eb^ ^a^V3.0297^ea^ ^b^tatthaa^eb^ti tattha te vivaadaapannaa dhanatopi jiiyanti, attano  santakaa parihaayanti, da.n.dena ceva jayabhaagaggaha.nena ca raajakoso pava.d.dhatiiti.

[03] satthaa ima.m dhammadesana.m aaharitvaa jaataka.m samodhaanesi -- ``tadaa si"ngaalo upanando  ahosi, uddaa dve mahallakaa, tassa kaara.nassa paccakkhakaarikaa rukkhadevataa pana ahameva  ahosi''nti.
[06] dabbhapupphajaatakava.n.nanaa pa~ncamaa.

[03] ^b^pa.n.naka.m^eb^ ^a^M3.0317^ea^ ^b^tikhi.nadhaara^eb^nti ida.m satthaa jetavane viharanto  puraa.nadutiyikaapalobhana.m aarabbha kathesi. ta~nhi bhikkhu.m satthaa ``sacca.m kira tva.m bhikkhu  ukka.n.thito''ti pucchitvaa ``sacca.m, bhante''ti vutte ``kena ukka.n.thaapito''ti vatvaa  ``puraa.nadutiyikaayaa''ti vutte ``bhikkhu aya.m itthii tuyha.m anatthakaarikaa, pubbepi tva.m ima.m  nissaaya cetasikarogena maranto pa.n.dite nissaaya jiivita.m alatthaa''ti vatvaa atiita.m aahari.

[03] atiite ^a^P3.0337^ea^ baaraa.nasiya.m maddavamahaaraaje rajja.m kaarente bodhisatto braahma.nakule  nibbatti, senakakumaarotissa naama.m aka.msu. so vayappatto takkasilaaya.m sabbasippaani ugga.nhitvaa  baaraa.nasi.m paccaagantvaa maddavara~n~no atthadhammaanusaasako amacco ahosi, ``senakapa.n.dito''ti vutte  sakalanagare cando viya suuriyo viya ca pa~n~naayi. tadaa ra~n~no purohitaputto raajupa.t.thaana.m aagato  sabbaala"nkaarapa.tima.n.dita.m uttamaruupadhara.m ra~n~no aggamahesi.m disvaa pa.tibaddhacitto hutvaa geha.m gantvaa  niraahaaro nipajjitvaa sahaayakehi pu.t.tho tamattha.m aarocesi. raajaapi ``purohitaputto na  dissati, kaha.m nu kho''ti pucchitvaa tamattha.m sutvaa ta.m pakkosaapetvaa ``aha.m te ima.m satta  divasaani dammi, sattaaha.m ghare katvaa a.t.thame divase aaneyyaasii''ti aaha. so ``saadhuu''ti  sampa.ticchitvaa ta.m geha.m netvaa taaya saddhi.m abhirami. te a~n~nama~n~na.m pa.tibaddhacittaa hutvaa ka~nci  ajaanaapetvaa aggadvaarena palaayitvaa a~n~nassa ra~n~no vijita.m agamasu.m, koci gata.t.thaana.m na jaani,  naavaaya gatamaggo viya ahosi. raajaa nagare bheri.m caraapetvaa naanappakaarena vicinantopi tassa  gata.t.thaana.m na a~n~naasi. athassa ta.m nissaaya balavasoko ^a^V3.0298^ea^ uppajji, hadaya.m u.nha.m hutvaa  lohita.m pagghari. tato pa.t.thaaya cassa kucchito lohita.m nikkhami, byaadhi mahanto ahosi.  mahantaapi raajavejjaa tikicchitu.m naasakkhi.msu.

[03] bodhisatto ``imassa ra~n~no byaadhi natthi, bhariya.m pana apassanto cetasikarogena phu.t.tho,  upaayena ta.m tikicchissaamii''ti aayura~nca pukkusa~ncaati dve ra~n~no pa.n.ditaamacce aamantetvaa  ``ra~n~no deviyaa adassanena ^a^M3.0318^ea^ cetasika.m roga.m .thapetvaa a~n~no rogo natthi,  bahuupakaaro ca kho pana amhaaka.m raajaa, tasmaa upaayena na.m tikicchaama, raaja"nga.ne ^a^P3.0338^ea^  samajja.m kaaretvaa asi.m gilitu.m jaanantena asi.m gilaapetvaa raajaana.m siihapa~njare katvaa  samajja.m olokaapessaama, raajaa asi.m gilanta.m disvaa `atthi nu kho ito a~n~na.m dukkaratara'nti  pa~nha.m pucchissati. ta.m samma aayura, tva.m `asuka.m naama dadaamiiti vacana.m ito dukkaratara'nti  byaakareyyaasi, tato samma pukkusa, ta.m pucchissati, athassa tva.m `mahaaraaja, dadaamiiti vatvaa  adadato saa vaacaa aphalaa hoti, tathaaruupa.m vaaca.m na keci upajiivanti na khaadanti na pivanti,  ye pana tassa vacanassaanucchavika.m karonti, yathaapa.ti~n~naatamattha.m dentiyeva, ida.m tato dukkaratara'nti  eva.m byaakareyyaasi, ito para.m kattabba.m aha.m jaanissaamii''ti vatvaa samajja.m kaaresi.

[03] atha te tayopi pa.n.ditaa ra~n~no santika.m gantvaa ``mahaaraaja, raaja"nga.ne samajjo vattati, ta.m  olokentaana.m dukkhampi na dukkha.m hoti, ehi gacchaamaa''ti raajaana.m netvaa siihapa~njara.m vivaritvaa  samajja.m olokaapesu.m. bahuu janaa attano attano jaananakasippa.m dassesu.m. eko pana puriso  tetti.msa"ngula.m tikhi.nadhaara.m asiratana.m gilati. raajaa ta.m disvaa ``aya.m puriso eta.m asi.m  gilati, `atthi nu kho ito a~n~na.m dukkaratara'nti ime pa.n.dite pucchissaamii''ti cintetvaa aayura.m  pucchanto pa.thama.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``pa.n.naka.m tikhi.nadhaara.m, asi.m sampannapaayina.m.
[27] parisaaya.m puriso gilati, ki.m dukkaratara.m tato.
[22] yada~n~na.m dukkara.m .thaana.m, ta.m me akkhaahi pucchito''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^pa.n.naka^eb^nti pa.n.nakara.t.the uppanna.m. ^b^sampannapaayina^eb^nti sampanna.m  paralohitapaayina.m. ^b^parisaaya^eb^nti parisamajjhe dhanalobhena aya.m puriso gilati.  ^b^yada~n~na^eb^nti ito asigilanato ya.m a~n~na.m dukkaratara.m kaara.na.m, ta.m mayaa pucchito kathehiiti.
[03] athassa ^a^V3.0299^ea^ ^a^P3.0339^ea^ ^a^M3.0319^ea^ so ta.m kathento dutiya.m gaathamaaha  --
[21] ``gileyya puriso lobhaa, asi.m sampannapaayina.m.
[27] yo ca vajjaa dadaamiiti, ta.m dukkaratara.m tato.
[22] sabba~n~na.m sukara.m .thaana.m, eva.m jaanaahi maddavaa''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^vajjaa^eb^ti vadeyya. ^b^ta.m dukkaratara^eb^nti ``dadaamii''ti vacana.m tato  asigilanato dukkaratara.m. ^b^sabba~n~na^eb^nti ``asuka.m naama tava dassaamii''ti vacana.m .thapetvaa  a~n~na.m sabbampi kaara.na.m sukara.m. ^b^maddavaa^eb^ti raajaana.m gottena aalapati.

[03] ra~n~no aayurapa.n.ditassa vacana.m sutvaa ``asigilanato kira `ida.m naama dammii'ti vacana.m  dukkara.m, aha~nca `purohitaputtassa devi.m dammii'ti avaca.m, atidukkara.m vata me kata''nti viima.msantasseva  hadayasoko thoka.m tanutta.m gato. so tato ``parassa ima.m dammiiti vacanato pana a~n~na.m dukkaratara.m  atthi nu kho''ti cintetvaa pukkusapa.n.ditena saddhi.m sallapanto tatiya.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``byaakaasi aayuro pa~nha.m, attha.m dhammassa kovido.
[27] pukkusa.m daani pucchaami, ki.m dukkaratara.m tato.
[22] yada~n~na.m dukkara.m .thaana.m, ta.m me akkhaahi pucchito''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^pa~nha.m attha^eb^nti pa~nhassa attha.m byaakaasiiti vutta.m hoti. ^b^dhammassa  kovido^eb^ti tadatthajotake ganthe kusalo. ^b^tato^eb^ti tato vacanato ki.m dukkarataranti.
[03] athassa byaakaronto pukkusapa.n.dito catuttha.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``na vaacamupajiivanti, aphala.m giramudiirita.m.
[27] yo ca datvaa avaakayiraa, ta.m dukkaratara.m tato.
[22] sabba~n~na.m sukara.m .thaana.m, eva.m jaanaahi maddavaa''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^datvaa^eb^ti ``asuka.m naama dammii''ti pa.ti~n~na.m datvaa. ^b^avaakayiraa^eb^ti ta.m  pa.ti~n~naatamattha.m ^a^V3.0300^ea^ dadanto tasmi.m lobha.m avaakareyya chindeyya, ta.m bha.n.da.m ^a^P3.0340^ea^  dadeyyaati vutta.m hoti. ^b^tato^eb^ti tato asigilanato ``asuka.m naama te  dammii''ti vacanato ca tadeva dukkaratara.m.

[03] ra~n~no ^a^M3.0320^ea^ ta.m vacana.m sutvaa ``aha.m `purohitaputtassa devi.m dammii'ti pa.thama.m  vatvaa vaacaaya anucchavika.m katvaa ta.m adaasi.m, dukkara.m vata me kata''nti parivitakkentassa soko  tanukataro jaato. athassa etadahosi ``senakapa.n.ditato a~n~no pa.n.ditataro naama natthi, ima.m  pa~nha.m eta.m pucchissaamii''ti. tato ta.m pucchanto pa~ncama.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``byaakaasi pukkuso pa~nha.m, attha.m dhammassa kovido.
[27] senaka.m daani pucchaami, ki.m dukkaratara.m tato.
[22] yada~n~na.m dukkara.m .thaana.m, ta.m me akkhaahi pucchito''ti..
[03] athassa byaakaronto senako cha.t.tha.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``dadeyya puriso daana.m, appa.m vaa yadi vaa bahu.m.
[27] yo ca datvaa naanutappe, ta.m dukkaratara.m tato.
[22] sabba~n~na.m sukara.m .thaana.m, eva.m jaanaahi maddavaa''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^naanutappe^eb^ti attano atikanta.m atimanaapa.m piyabha.n.da.m parassa datvaa ``kimattha.m  mayaa ida.m dinna''nti eva.m ta.m piyabha.n.da.m aarabbha yo pacchaa na tappati na socati, ta.m  asigilanato ca ``asuka.m naama te dammii''ti vacanato ca tassa daanato ca dukkaratara.m.
[03] iti mahaasatto raajaana.m sa~n~naapentaa kathesi. daana~nhi datvaa aparacetanaava dussandhaariyaa,  tassaa sandhaara.nadukkarataa vessantarajaatakena diipitaa. vutta~nheta.m --
[21] ``adu caapa.m gahetvaana, khagga.m bandhiya vaamato.
[22] aanessaami sake putte, puttaana~nhi vadho dukho..
[21] ``a.t.thaanameta.m ^a^V3.0301^ea^ dukkharuupa.m, ya.m kumaaraa viha~n~nare.
[22] sata~nca dhammama~n~naaya, ko datvaa anutappatii''ti.. (jaa0 2.22.2158-2159).

[03] raajaapi bodhisattassa vacana.m sutvaa sallakkhesi ``aha.m attano maneneva purohitaputtassa  devi.m datvaa sakamana.m sandhaaretu.m ^a^P3.0341^ea^ na sakkomi, socaami kilamaami, na me ida.m  anucchavika.m, sace saa mayi sasinehaa bhaveyya ^a^M3.0321^ea^, ima.m issariya.m cha.d.detvaa na  palaayeyya, mayi pana sineha.m akatvaa palaataaya ki.m taaya mayha''nti. tasseva.m cintentassa  padumapatte udakabindu viya sabbasoko nivattitvaa gato, ta"nkha.na~n~nevassa kucchi parisa.n.thaasi.  so nirogo sukhito hutvaa bodhisattassa thuti.m karonto osaanagaathamaaha --
[21] ``byaakaasi aayuro pa~nha.m, atho pukkusaporiso.
[22] sabbe pa~nhe atibhoti, yathaa bhaasati senako''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^yathaa bhaasatii^eb^ti yathaa pa.n.dito bhaasati, tatheveta.m daana.m naama datvaa neva  anutappitabbanti. ima.m panassa thuti.m katvaa tu.t.tho bahu.m dhanamadaasi.

[03] satthaa ima.m dhammadesana.m aaharitvaa saccaani pakaasetvaa jaataka.m samodhaanesi, saccapariyosaane  ukka.n.thitabhikkhu sotaapattiphale pati.t.thahi. tadaa raajamahesii puraa.nadutiyikaa ahosi, raajaa  ukka.n.thitabhikkhu, aayurapa.n.dito moggallaano, pukkusapa.n.dito saariputto, senakapa.n.dito ahameva  ahosinti.
[06] pa.n.nakajaatakava.n.nanaa cha.t.thaa.
[03] ^b^vibbhantacitto^eb^ti ida.m satthaa jetavane viharanto attano pa~n~naapaarami.m aarabbha kathesi.  paccuppannavatthu ^b^uma"ngajaatake^eb^ (jaa0 2.22.590 aadayo) aavi bhavissati.

[03] atiite baaraa.nasiya.m janako naama raajaa rajja.m kaaresi. tadaa bodhisatto braahma.nakule  nibbatti ^a^V3.0302^ea^, senakakumaarotissa naama.m kari.msu. so vayappatto takkasilaaya.m  sabbasippaani ugga.nhitvaa baaraa.nasi.m paccaagantvaa raajaana.m passi, raajaa ta.m amacca.t.thaane .thapesi,  mahanta~ncassa yasa.m anuppadaasi ^a^P3.0342^ea^. so ra~n~no attha~nca dhamma~nca anusaasi,  madhurakatho dhammakathiko hutvaa raajaana.m pa~ncasu siilesu pati.t.thaapetvaa daane uposathakamme dasasu  kusalakammapathesuuti imaaya kalyaa.napa.tipadaaya pati.t.thaapesi ^a^M3.0322^ea^, sakalara.t.the buddhaana.m  uppannakaalo viya ahosi. pakkhadivasesu raajaa ca uparaajaadayo ca sabbe sannipatitvaa  dhammasabha.m sajjenti. mahaasatto sajjitadhammasabhaaya.m ratanapalla"nkavaragato buddhalii.laaya dhamma.m deseti,  buddhaana.m dhammakathaasadisaavassa kathaa hoti.

[03] atha a~n~nataro mahallakabraahma.no dhanabhikkha.m caritvaa kahaapa.nasahassa.m labhitvaa ekasmi.m  braahma.nakule nikkhipitvaa puna ``bhikkha.m carissaamii''ti gato. tassa gatakaale ta.m kula.m  kahaapa.ne va.la~njesi. so aagantvaa kahaapa.ne aaharaapesi. braahma.no kahaapa.ne daatu.m asakkonto  attano dhiitara.m tassa paadaparicaarika.m katvaa adaasi. braahma.no ta.m gahetvaa baaraa.nasito aviduure  ekasmi.m braahma.nagaame vaasa.m kappesi. athassa bhariyaa daharataaya kaamesu atittaa a~n~nena  taru.nabraahma.nena saddhi.m micchaacaara.m cari. ^b^so.lasa^eb^ hi ^b^atappaniiyavatthuuni^eb^ naama.  katamaani so.lasa? saagaro sabbasavantiihi na tappati, aggi upaadaanena na tappati, raajaa ra.t.thena  na tappati, baalo paapehi na tappati, itthii methunadhammena ala"nkaarena vijaayanenaati imehi tiihi  na tappati, braahma.no mantehi na tappati, jhaayii vihaarasamaapattiyaa na tappati, sekkho apacayena  na tappati, appiccho dhuta"ngagu.nena na tappati, aaraddhaviiriyo viiriyaarambhena na tappati,  dhammakathiko saakacchaaya na tappati, visaarado parisaaya na tappati, saddho sa"nghupa.t.thaanena na  tappati, daayako pariccaagena na tappati, pa.n.dito dhammassavanena na tappati, catasso parisaa  tathaagatadassanena na tappantiiti.

[03] saapi braahma.nii methunadhammena, atittaa ^a^P3.0343^ea^ ta.m braahma.na.m niiharitvaa vissatthaa  paapakamma.m kaatukaamaa hutvaa ekadivasa.m dummanaa nipajjitvaa ``ki.m bhotii''ti vuttaa ``braahma.na, aha.m  tava gehe kamma.m kaatu.m na sakkomi, daasidaasa.m aanehii''ti aaha. ``bhoti dhana.m me natthi, ki.m  datvaa aanemii''ti. ``bhikkha.m caritvaa dhana.m pariyesitvaa aanehii''ti. ``tena hi bhoti  paatheyya.m me sajjehii''ti. ``saa tassa baddhasattuuna~nca abaddhasattuuna~nca cammapasibbaka.m puuretvaa  adaasi''. braahma.no gaamanigamaraajadhaaniisu ^a^M3.0323^ea^ caranto satta kahaapa.nasataani  labhitvaa ``ala.m me ettaka.m dhana.m daasidaasamuulaayaa''ti nivattitvaa attano gaama.m aagacchanto  ekasmi.m udakaphaasuka.t.thaane ^a^V3.0303^ea^ pasibbaka.m mu~ncitvaa sattu.m khaaditvaa pasibbakamukha.m  abandhitvaava paaniiya.m pivitu.m oti.n.no. athekasmi.m rukkhasusire eko ka.nhasappo sattugandha.m  ghaayitvaa pasibbaka.m pavisitvaa bhoga.m aabhujitvaa sattu.m khaadanto nipajji. braahma.no aagantvaa  pasibbakassa abbhantara.m anoloketvaa pasibbaka.m bandhitvaa a.mse katvaa paayaasi. antaraamagge  ekasmi.m rukkhe nibbattadevataa khandhavi.tape .thatvaa ``braahma.na, sace antaraamagge vasissasi, saya.m  marissasi, sace ajja ghara.m gamissasi, bhariyaa te marissatii''ti vatvaa antaradhaayi. so  olokento devata.m adisvaa bhiito mara.nabhayatajjito rodanto paridevanto baaraa.nasinagaradvaara.m  sampaapu.ni.

[03] tadaa ca pannarasuposatho hoti ala"nkatadhammaasane nisiiditvaa bodhisattassa  dhammakathanadivaso. mahaajano naanaagandhapupphaadihattho vaggavaggo hutvaa dhammi.m katha.m sotu.m gacchati.  braahma.no ta.m disvaa ``kaha.m gacchathaa''ti pucchitvaa ``braahma.na, ajja senakapa.n.dito madhurassarena  buddhalii.laaya dhamma.m deseti, ki.m tvampi na jaanaasii''ti vutte cintesi ``pa.n.dito kira  dhammakathiko, aha~ncamhi mara.nabhayatajjito, pa.n.ditaa kho pana mahantampi ^a^P3.0344^ea^ soka.m  haritu.m sakkonti, mayaapi tattha gantvaa dhamma.m sotu.m va.t.tatii''ti. so tehi saddhi.m tattha gantvaa  mahaasatta.m parivaaretvaa nisinnaaya saraajikaaya parisaaya pariyante sattupasibbakena khandhagatena  dhammaasanato aviduure mara.nabhayatajjito rodamaano a.t.thaasi. mahaasatto aakaasaga"nga.m otaranto  viya amatavassa.m vassento viya ca dhamma.m desesi. mahaajano sa~njaatasomanasso saadhukaara.m datvaa  dhamma.m assosi.

[03] pa.n.ditaa ca naama disaacakkhukaa honti. tasmi.m kha.ne mahaasatto pasannapa~ncapasaadaani  akkhiini ummiiletvaa samantato parisa.m olokento ta.m braahma.na.m disvaa cintesi ``ettakaa parisaa  somanassajaataa saadhukaara.m datvaa dhamma.m su.nanti, aya.m paneko braahma.no domanassappatto rodati,  etassa abbhantare assujananasamatthena sokena bhavitabba.m, tamassa ambilena ^a^M3.0324^ea^  paharitvaa tambamala.m viya padumapalaasato udakabindu.m viya vinivattetvaa ettheva na.m nissoka.m  tu.t.thamaanasa.m katvaa dhamma.m desessaamii''ti. so ta.m aamantetvaa ``braahma.na, senakapa.n.dito naamaaha.m,  idaaneva ta.m nissoka.m karissaami, vissattho kathehii''ti tena saddhi.m sallapanto pa.thama.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``vibbhantacitto kupitindriyosi, nettehi te vaariga.naa savanti.
[22] ki.m te na.t.tha.m ki.m pana patthayaano, idhaagamaa brahme tadi"ngha bruuhii''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^V3.0304^ea^ ^b^kupitindriyosii^eb^ti cakkhundriyameva sandhaaya  ``kupitindriyosii''ti aaha. ^b^vaariga.naa^eb^ti assubinduuni. ^b^i"nghaa^eb^ti codanatthe  nipaato. ta~nhi mahaasatto codento evamaaha ``braahma.na, sattaa naama dviihi kaara.nehi socanti  paridevanti sattasa"nkhaaresu kismi~ncideva piyajaatike na.t.the vaa, ki~ncideva piyajaatika.m patthetvaa  alabhantaa vaa. tattha ki.m te na.t.tha.m, ki.m vaa pana patthayanto tva.m idha aagato, ida.m me khippa.m  bruuhii''ti.
[03] athassa ^a^P3.0345^ea^ attano sokakaara.na.m kathento braahma.no dutiya.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``miyyetha bhariyaa vajato mamajja, agacchato mara.namaaha yakkho.
[22] etena dukkhena pavedhitosmi, akkhaahi me senaka etamattha''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^vajato^eb^ti geha.m gacchantassa. ^b^agacchato^eb^ti agacchantassa.  ^b^yakkho^eb^ti antaraamagge ekaa rukkhadevataa evamaahaati vadati. saa kira devataa ``pasibbake  te braahma.na, ka.nhasappo''ti anaacikkhantii bodhisattassa ~naa.naanubhaavappakaasanattha.m naacikkhi.  ^b^etena dukkhenaa^eb^ti gacchato bhariyaaya mara.nadukkhena, agacchato attano mara.nadukkhena, tenasmi  pavedhito gha.t.tito kampito. ^b^etamattha^eb^nti eta.m kaara.na.m. yena me kaara.nena ^a^M3.0325^ea^  gacchato bhariyaaya mara.na.m, agacchato attano mara.na.m hoti, eta.m me kaara.na.m  aacikkhaahiiti attho.

[03] mahaasatto braahma.nassa vacana.m sutvaa samuddamatthake jaala.m khipanto viya ~naa.najaala.m pattharitvaa  ``imesa.m sattaana.m bahuuni mara.nakaara.naani. samudde nimuggaapi maranti, tattha vaa.lamacchehi  gahitaapi, ga"ngaaya patitaapi, tattha susumaarehi gahitaapi, rukkhato patitaapi, ka.n.takena viddhaapi,  naanappakaarehi aavudhehi paha.taapi, visa.m khaaditvaapi, ubbandhitvaapi, papaate patitaapi,  atisiitaadiihi vaa naanappakaarehi vaa rogehi upaddutaapi marantiyeva, eva.m bahuusu mara.nakaara.nesu  katarena nu kho kaara.nena ajjesa braahma.no antaraamagge vasanto saya.m marissati, gehamassa vajato  bhariyaa marissatii''ti cintesi. cintento eva braahma.nassa khandhe pasibbaka.m disvaa ``imasmi.m  pasibbake ekena sappena pavi.t.thena bhavitabba.m, pavisanto ca paneso imasmi.m braahma.ne paataraasasamaye  sattu.m khaaditvaa pasibbakamukha.m abandhitvaa paaniiya.m paatu.m gate sattugandhena sappo pavi.t.tho bhavissati.  braahma.nopi paaniiya.m pivitvaa aagato sappassa pavi.t.thabhaava.m ajaanitvaa pasibbaka.m bandhitvaa aadaaya  pakkanto ^a^P3.0346^ea^ bhavissati, sacaaya.m antaraamagge vasanto saaya.m vasana.t.thaane ``sattu.m  khaadissaamii''ti pasibbaka.m mu~ncitvaa hattha.m pavesessati ^a^V3.0305^ea^, atha na.m sappo hatthe  .da.msitvaa jiivitakkhaya.m paapessati, idamassa antaraamagge vasantassa mara.nakaara.na.m. sace pana geha.m  gaccheyya, pasibbako bhariyaaya hatthagato bhavissati, saa `antobha.n.da.m olokessaamii''ti  pasibbaka.m mu~ncitvaa hattha.m pavesessati, atha na.m sappo .da.msitvaa jiivitakkhaya.m paapessati, idamassa  ajja geha.m gatassa bhariyaaya mara.nakaara.na''nti upaayakosalla~naa.neneva a~n~naasi.

[03] athassa etadahosi ``iminaa ka.nhasappena suurena nibbhayena bhavitabba.m. aya~nhi braahma.nassa  mahaaphaasuka.m paharantopi pasibbake attano calana.m vaa phandana.m vaa na dasseti, evaruupaaya parisaaya  majjhepi attano atthibhaava.m na dasseti, tasmaa iminaa ka.nhasappena suurena nibbhayena  bhavitabba''nti. idampi so upaayakosalla~naa.neneva dibbacakkhunaa passanto viya a~n~naasi. eva.m  saraajikaaya parisaaya majjhe sappa.m pasibbaka.m pavisanta.m disvaa .thitapuriso viya mahaasatto  upaayakosalla~naa.neneva paricchinditvaa braahma.nassa pa~nha.m kathento tatiya.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``bahuuni ^a^M3.0326^ea^ .thaanaani vicintayitvaa, yamettha vakkhaami tadeva sacca.m.
[22] ma~n~naami te braahma.na sattubhasta.m, ajaanato ka.nhasappo pavi.t.tho''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^bahuuni .thaanaanii^eb^ti bahuuni kaara.naani. ^b^vicintayitvaa^eb^ti pa.tivijjhitvaa  cintaavasena pavattapa.tivedho hutvaa. ^b^yamettha vakkhaamii^eb^ti ya.m te aha.m etesu kaara.nesu eta.m  kaara.na.m vakkhaami. ^b^tadeva sacca^eb^nti tadeva tatha.m dibbacakkhunaa disvaa kathitasadisa.m  bhavissatiiti diipeti. ^b^ma~n~naamii^eb^ti sallakkhemi. ^b^sattubhasta^eb^nti sattupasibbaka.m.  ^b^ajaanato^eb^ti ajaanantasseva eko ka.nhasappo pavi.t.thoti ma~n~naamiiti.

[03] eva~nca ^a^P3.0347^ea^ pana vatvaa ``atthi te braahma.na, etasmi.m pasibbake sattuu''ti  pucchi. ``atthi, pa.n.ditaa''ti. ``ajja paataraasavelaaya sattu.m khaadii''ti? ``aama,  pa.n.ditaa''ti. ``kattha nisiiditvaa''ti? ``ara~n~ne rukkhamuulasmi.m, pa.n.ditaa''ti. ``sattu.m  khaaditvaa paaniiya.m paatu.m gacchanto pasibbakamukha.m bandhi, na bandhii''ti? ``na bandhi.m,  pa.n.ditaa''ti. ``paaniiya.m pivitvaa aagato pasibbaka.m oloketvaa bandhii''ti. ``anoloketvaava  bandhi.m, pa.n.ditaa''ti. ``braahma.na, tava paaniiya.m paatu.m gatakaale ajaanantasseva te sattugandhena  pasibbaka.m sappo pavi.t.thoti ma~n~naami, evamettha aagato tva.m, tasmaa pasibbaka.m otaaretvaa  parisamajjhe .thapetvaa pasibbakamukha.m ^a^V3.0306^ea^ mocetvaa pa.tikkamma .thito eka.m da.n.daka.m gahetvaa  pasibbaka.m taava pahara, tato pattha.tapha.na.m susuutisadda.m katvaa nikkhamanta.m ka.nhasappa.m disvaa nikka"nkho  bhavissatii''ti catuttha.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``aadaaya da.n.da.m parisumbha bhasta.m, passe.lamuuga.m uraga.m dujivha.m.
[22] chindajja ka"nkha.m vicikicchitaani, bhuja"ngama.m passa pamu~nca bhasta''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^parisumbhaa^eb^ti pahara. ^b^passe.lamuuga^eb^nti e.la.m paggharantena mukhena e.lamuuga.m  pasibbakato nikkhamanta.m dujivha.m uraga.m passa. ^b^chandajja ka"nkha.m vicikicchitaanii^eb^ti  ``atthi nu kho me pasibbake sappo, udaahu natthii''ti ka"nkhameva punappuna.m uppajjamaanaani  vicikicchitaani ca ajja chinda, mayha.m saddaha, avitatha~nhi me veyyaakara.na.m, idaaneva nikkhamanta.m  bhuja"ngama.m passa pamu~nca bhastanti.

[03] braahma.no ^a^M3.0327^ea^ mahaasattassa katha.m sutvaa sa.mviggo bhayappatto tathaa akaasi.  sappopi sattubhaste da.n.dena paha.te pasibbakamukhaa nikkhamitvaa mahaajana.m olokento a.t.thaasi.  tamattha.m ^a^P3.0348^ea^ pakaasento satthaa pa~ncama.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``sa.mviggaruupo parisaaya majjhe, so braahma.no sattubhasta.m pamu~nci.
[22] atha nikkhami urago uggatejo, aasiiviso sappo pha.na.m karitvaa''ti..

[03] sappassa pha.na.m katvaa nikkhantakaale ``mahaasattassa sabba~n~nubuddhasseva byaakara.na.m ahosii''ti  mahaajano celukkhepasahassaani pavattesi, a"ngulipho.tanasahassaani paribbhami.msu, ghanameghavassa.m viya  sattaratanavassa.m vassi, saadhukaarasahassaani pavatti.msu, mahaapathaviibhijjanasaddo viya ahosi. ida.m  pana buddhalii.laaya evaruupassa pa~nhassa kathana.m naama neva jaatiyaa bala.m, na gottakulappadesaana.m bala.m,  kassa paneta.m balanti? pa~n~naaya bala.m. pa~n~navaa hi puggalo vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa ariyamaggadvaara.m  vivaritvaa amatamahaanibbaana.m pavisati, saavakapaaramimpi paccekabodhimpi sammaasambodhimpi  pa.tivijjhati. amatamahaanibbaanasampaapakesu hi dhammesu pa~n~naava se.t.thaa, avasesaa tassaa parivaaraa  honti. teneta.m vutta.m --
[21] ``pa~n~naa ^a^V3.0307^ea^ hi se.t.thaa kusalaa vadanti, nakkhattaraajaariva taarakaana.m.
[22] siila.m sirii caapi sata~nca dhammo, anvaayikaa pa~n~navato bhavantii''ti.. (jaa0  2.17.81).

[03] eva.m kathite ca pana mahaasattena pa~nhe eko ahitu.n.diko sappassa mukhabandhana.m katvaa sappa.m  gahetvaa ara~n~ne vissajjesi. braahma.no raajaana.m upasa"nkamitvaa jayaapetvaa a~njali.m paggayha ra~n~no  thuti.m karonto upa.d.dhagaathamaaha --
[21] ``suladdhalaabhaa janakassa ra~n~no.
[22] yo passatii senaka.m saadhupa~n~na''nti..

[03] tassattho ^a^M3.0328^ea^ -- yo saadhupa~n~na.m uttamapa~n~na.m senakapa.n.dita.m akkhiini  ummiiletvaa icchiticchitakkha.ne piyacakkhuuhi passitu.m labhati, tassa ra~n~no janakassa ete  icchiticchitakkha.ne dassanalaabhaa suladdhalaabhaa vata, etena laddhesu sabbalaabhesu eteva laabhaa  suladdhalaabhaa naamaati.
[03] braahma.nopi ra~n~no ^a^P3.0349^ea^ thuti.m katvaa puna pasibbakato satta kahaapa.nasataani  gahetvaa mahaasattassa thuti.m katvaa tu.t.thidaaya.m daatukaamo diya.d.dhagaathamaaha --
[22] ``viva.t.tachaddo nusi sabbadassii, ~naa.na.m nu te braahma.na bhi.msaruupa.m..
[21] ``imaani me sattasataani atthi, ga.nhaahi sabbaani dadaami tuyha.m.
[22] tayaa hi me jiivitamajja laddha.m, athopi bhariyaaya makaasi sotthi''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^viva.t.tachaddo nusi sabbadassii^eb^ti ki.m nu kho tva.m sabbesu dhammaakaaresu  viva.t.tachadano viva.t.taneyyadhammo sabba~n~nubuddhoti thutivasena pucchati. ^b^~naa.na.m nu te braahma.na  bhi.msaruupa^eb^nti udaahu asabba~n~nussapi sato tava ~naa.na.m ativiya bhi.msaruupa.m sabba~n~nuta~n~naa.na.m viya  balavanti. ^b^tayaa hi me^eb^ti tayaa hi dinnattaa ajja mayaa jiivita.m laddha.m. ^b^athopi  bhariyaaya makaasi sotthi^eb^nti athopi me bhariyaaya tvameva sotthi.m akaasi.

[03] iti ^a^V3.0308^ea^ so vatvaa ``sacepi satasahassa.m bhaveyya, dadeyyamevaaha.m, ettakameva me  dhana.m, imaani me satta sataani ga.nhaa''ti punappuna.m bodhisatta.m yaaci. ta.m sutvaa bodhisatto a.t.thama.m  gaathamaaha --
[21] ``na pa.n.ditaa vetanamaadiyanti, citraahi gaathaahi subhaasitaahi.
[22] itopi te brahme dadantu vitta.m, aadaaya tva.m gaccha saka.m niketa''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^vetana^eb^nti vettana.m, ayameva vaa paa.tho. ^b^itopi te brahme^eb^ti braahma.na, ito  mama paadamuulatopi tuyha.m dhana.m dadantu. ^b^vitta.m aadaaya tva.m gacchaa^eb^ti ^a^M3.0329^ea^ ito  a~n~naani tii.ni sataani gahetvaa sahassabha.n.dika.m aadaaya sakanivesana.m gaccha.

[03] eva~nca pana vatvaa mahaasatto braahma.nassa sahassa.m puuraapento kahaapa.ne daapetvaa ``braahma.na, kena  tva.m dhanabhikkhaaya pesito''ti pucchi. ``bhariyaaya me pa.n.ditaa''ti. ``bhariyaa ^a^P3.0350^ea^  pana te mahallikaa, daharaa''ti. ``daharaa, pa.n.ditaa''ti. ``tena hi saa a~n~nena  saddhi.m anaacaara.m karontii `nibbhayaa hutvaa karissaamii'ti ta.m pesesi, sace ime kahaapa.ne ghara.m  nessasi, saa te dukkhena laddhakahaapa.ne attano jaarassa dassati, tasmaa tva.m ujukameva geha.m  agantvaa bahigaame rukkhamuule vaa yattha katthaci vaa kahaapa.ne .thapetvaa paviseyyaasii''ti vatvaa ta.m  uyyojesi. so gaamasamiipa.m gantvaa ekasmi.m rukkhamuule kahaapa.ne .thapetvaa saaya.m geha.m agamaasi.  bhariyaapissa tasmi.m kha.ne jaarena saddhi.m nisinnaa ahosi. braahma.no dvaare .thatvaa ``bhotii''ti  aaha. saa tassa sadda.m sallakkhetvaa diipa.m nibbaapetvaa dvaara.m vivaritvaa braahma.ne anto pavi.t.the itara.m  niiharitvaa dvaaramuule .thapetvaa geha.m pavisitvaa pasibbake ki~nci adisvaa ``braahma.na, ki.m te bhikkha.m  caritvaa laddha''nti pucchi. ``sahassa.m me laddha''nti. ``kaha.m pana ta''nti. ``asuka.t.thaane  naama .thapita.m, paatova aaharissaami, maa cintayii''ti. saa gantvaa jaarassa aacikkhi. so  nikkhamitvaa attanaa .thapita.m viya ga.nhi.

[03] braahma.no punadivase gantvaa kahaapa.ne apassanto bodhisattassa santika.m gantvaa ``ki.m,  braahma.naa''ti vutte ``kahaapa.ne na passaami, pa.n.ditaa''ti aaha. ``bhariyaaya te aacikkhii''ti?  ``aama, pa.n.ditaa''ti. mahaasatto taaya jaarassa aacikkhitabhaava.m ~natvaa ``atthi pana te  braahma.na, bhariyaaya kuluupakabraahma.no''ti pucchi. ``atthi, pa.n.ditaa''ti. ``tuyhampi atthii''ti?  ``aama, pa.n.ditaa''ti. athassa mahaasatto sattanna.m divasaana.m paribbaya.m daapetvaa ^a^V3.0309^ea^  ``gaccha pa.thamadivase tava satta, bhariyaaya te sattaati cuddasa braahma.ne nimantetvaa bhojetha,  punadivasato pa.t.thaaya ekeka.m haapetvaa sattame divase tava eka.m, bhariyaaya te ekanti dve braahma.ne  nimantetvaa bhariyaaya te satta divase nimantitabraahma.nassa nibaddha.m aagamanabhaava.m ~natvaa mayha.m  aarocehii''ti ^a^P3.0351^ea^ aaha. braahma.no tathaa ^a^M3.0330^ea^ katvaa ``sallakkhito  me pa.n.dita, nibaddha.m bhu~njanakabraahma.no''ti mahaasattassa aarocesi.

[03] bodhisatto tena saddhi.m purise pesetvaa ta.m braahma.na.m aaharaapetvaa ``asukarukkhamuulato te  imassa braahma.nassa santaka.m kahaapa.nasahassa.m gahita''nti pucchi. ``na ga.nhaami, pa.n.ditaa''ti.  ``tva.m mama senakapa.n.ditabhaava.m na jaanaasi, aaharaapessaami te kahaapa.ne''ti. so bhiito  ``gahitaa me''ti sampa.ticchi. ``kuhi.m te .thapitaa''ti? ``tattheva, pa.n.dita, .thapitaa''ti.  bodhisatto braahma.na.m pucchi ``braahma.na, ki.m te saayeva bhariyaa hotu, udaahu a~n~na.m ga.nhissasii''ti.  ``saayeva me hotu, pa.n.ditaa''ti. bodhisatto manusse pesetvaa braahma.nassa kahaapa.ne ca  braahma.ni~nca aaharaapetvaa corabraahma.nassa hatthato kahaapa.ne braahma.nassa daapetvaa itarassa raajaa.na.m  kaaretvaa nagaraa niiharaapetvaa braahma.niyaapi raajaa.na.m kaaretvaa braahma.nassa mahanta.m yasa.m datvaa attanoyeva  santike vasaapesi.

[03] satthaa ima.m dhammadesana.m aaharitvaa saccaani pakaasetvaa jaataka.m samodhaanesi, saccapariyosaane  bahuu sotaapattiphalaadiini sacchikari.msu. tadaa braahma.no aanando ahosi, rukkhadevataa saariputto,  parisaa buddhaparisaa, senakapa.n.dito pana ahameva ahosinti.
[06] sattubhastajaatakava.n.nanaa sattamaa.

[03] ^b^yeme aha.m na jaanaamii^eb^ti ida.m satthaa aa.lavi.m nissaaya aggaa.lave cetiye viharanto  ku.tikaarasikkhaapada.m aarabbha kathesi. paccuppannavatthu he.t.thaa ^b^ma.nika.n.thajaatake^eb^ (jaa0 1.3.7  aadayo) kathitameva. satthaa pana te bhikkhuu aamantetvaa ``bhikkhave, poraa.nakapa.n.ditaa pubbe  anuppanne ^a^P3.0352^ea^ buddhe baahirakapabbajjaaya pabbajitvaa raajuuhi pavaaritaapi `yaacanaa naama  paresa.m appiyaa amanaapaa'ti na yaaci.msuu''ti vatvaa atiita.m aahari.

[03] atiite ^a^V3.0310^ea^ ^a^M3.0331^ea^ baaraa.nasiya.m brahmadatte rajja.m kaarente bodhisatto  ekasmi.m nigame braahma.nakule nibbatti, a.t.thisenakumaarotissa naama.m kari.msu. so vayappatto  takkasilaaya.m sabbasippaani ugga.nhitvaa aparabhaage kaamesu aadiinava.m disvaa gharaavaasato  nikkhamitvaa isipabbajja.m pabbajitvaa jhaanaabhi~n~naasamaapattiyo nibbattetvaa himavantapadese cira.m  vasitvaa lo.nambilasevanatthaaya manussapatha.m otaritvaa anupubbena baaraa.nasi.m patvaa raajuyyaane  vasitvaa punadivase bhikkhaaya caranto raaja"nga.na.m agamaasi. raajaa tassaacaaravihaare pasiiditvaa ta.m  nimantaapetvaa paasaadatale palla"nke nisiidaapetvaa subhojana.m bhojetvaa bhojanaavasaane anumodana.m sutvaa  pasanno pa.ti~n~na.m gahetvaa mahaasatta.m raajuyyaane vasaapesi, divasassa ca dve tayo vaare upa.t.thaana.m  agamaasi. so ekadivasa.m dhammakathaaya pasanno rajja.m aadi.m katvaa ``yena vo attho, ta.m  vadeyyaathaa''ti pavaaresi. bodhisatto ``ida.m naama me dehii''ti na vadati. a~n~ne yaacakaa  ``ida.m dehi, ida.m dehii''ti icchiticchita.m yaacanti, raajaa asajjamaano detiyeva. so  ekadivasa.m cintesi ``a~n~ne yaacanakavanibbakaa `ida~ncida~nca amhaaka.m dehii'ti ma.m yaacanti,  ayyo pana a.t.thiseno pavaaritakaalato pa.t.thaaya na ki~nci yaacati, pa~n~navaa kho panesa upaayakusalo,  pucchissaami na''nti. so ekadivasa.m bhuttapaataraaso gantvaa vanditvaa ekamanta.m nisinno a~n~nesa.m  yaacanakaara.na.m tassa ca ayaacanakaara.na.m pucchanto pa.thama.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``yeme aha.m na jaanaami, a.t.thisena vanibbake.
[22] te ma.m sa"ngamma yaacanti, kasmaa ma.m tva.m na yaacasii''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^P3.0353^ea^ ^b^vanibbake^eb^ti yaacanake. ^b^sa"ngammaa^eb^ti samaagantvaa.  ida.m vutta.m hoti -- ayya, a.t.thisena, yeme vanibbake aha.m naamagottajaatikulappadesena ``ime  naamete''tipi na jaanaami, te ma.m samaagantvaa icchiticchita.m yaacanti, tva.m pana kasmaa ma.m ki~nci  na yaacasiiti.
[03] ta.m sutvaa bodhisatto dutiya.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``yaacako appiyo hoti, yaaca.m adadamappiyo.
[22] tasmaaha.m ta.m na yaacaami, maa me videssanaa ahuu''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^M3.0332^ea^ ^b^yaacako appiyo hotii^eb^ti yo hi, mahaaraaja, puggalo ``ida.m  me dehii''ti yaacako, so maataapituunampi mittaamaccaadiinampi appiyo hoti amanaapo. tassa  appiyabhaavo ^a^V3.0311^ea^ ma.nika.n.thajaatakena diipetabbo. ^b^yaaca^eb^nti yaacitabha.n.da.m.  ^b^adada^eb^nti adadamaano. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- yopi yaacita.m na deti, so maataapitaro aadi.m  katvaa adadamaano puggalo yaacakassa appiyo hotiiti. ^b^tasmaa^eb^ti yasmaa yaacakopi  daayakassa, yaacita.m bha.n.da.m adadantopi yaacakassa appiyo hoti, tasmaa aha.m ta.m na yaacaami.  ^b^maa me videssanaa ahuu^eb^ti sace hi aha.m yaaceyyameva, tava videsso bhaveyya, saa me tava  santikaa uppannaa videssanaa, sace pana tva.m na dadeyyaasi, mama videsso bhaveyyaasi, saa ca mama  tayi videssanaa, eva.m sabbathaapi maa me videssanaa ahu, maa no ubhinnampi mettaa bhijjiiti  etamattha.m sampassanto aha.m ta.m na ki~nci yaacaamiiti.
[03] athassa vacana.m sutvaa raajaa tisso gaathaa abhaasi --
[21] ``yo ve yaacanajiivaano, kaale yaaca.m na yaacati.
[22] para~nca pu~n~naa dha.mseti, attanaapi na jiivati..
[21] ``yo ca yaacanajiivaano, kaale yaaca~nhi yaacati.
[22] para~nca pu~n~na.m labbheti, attanaapi ca jiivati..
[21] ``na vedessanti sappa~n~naa, disvaa yaacakamaagate.
[22] brahmacaari piyo mesi, vada tva.m bha~n~namicchasii''ti..

[01] tattha ^b^yaacanajiivaano^eb^ti yaacanajiivamaano, ayameva vaa paa.tho. ida.m vutta.m hoti  -- ayya, a.t.thisena yo yaacanena jiivamaano dhammiko sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa  yaacitabbayuttapattakaale ki~ncideva yaacitabba.m na yaacati, so para~nca daayaka.m pu~n~naa dha.mseti  parihaapeti, attanaapi ca sukha.m na jiivati. ^b^pu~n~na.m labbhetii^eb^ti ^a^P3.0354^ea^ kaale pana  yaacitabba.m yaacanto para~nca pu~n~na.m adhigameti, attanaapi ca sukha.m jiivati. ^b^na vedessantii^eb^ti  ya.m tva.m vadesi ``maa me videssanaa ahuu''ti, ta.m kasmaa vadasi. sappa~n~naa hi daana~nca ^a^M3.0333^ea^  daanaphala~nca jaanantaa pa.n.ditaa yaacake aagate disvaa na dessanti na kujjhanti,  a~n~nadatthu pana pamuditaava hontiiti diipeti. ^b^yaacakamaagate^eb^ti ma-kaaro bya~njanasandhivasena  vutto, yaacake aagateti attho. ^b^brahmacaari piyo mesii^eb^ti ayya a.t.thisena, parisuddhacaari  mahaapu~n~na, tva.m mayha.m ativiya piyo, tasmaa vara.m tva.m ma.m vadehi yaacaahiyeva.  ^b^bha~n~namicchasii^eb^ti ya.mki~nci vattabba.m icchasi, sabba.m vada, rajjampi te dassaamiyevaati.

[03] eva.m ^a^V3.0312^ea^ bodhisatto ra~n~naa rajjenaapi pavaarito neva ki~nci yaaci. ra~n~no pana  eva.m attano ajjhaasaye kathite mahaasattopi pabbajitapa.tipatti.m dassetu.m ``mahaaraaja, yaacanaa hi  naamesaa kaamabhogiina.m gihiina.m aaci.n.naa, na pabbajitaana.m, pabbajitena pana pabbajitakaalato pa.t.thaaya  gihiihi asamaanaparisuddhaajiivena bhavitabba''nti pabbajitapa.tipada.m dassento cha.t.tha.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``na ve yaacanti sappa~n~naa, dhiiro ca veditumarahati.
[22] uddissa ariyaa ti.t.thanti, esaa ariyaana yaacanaa''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^sappa~n~naa^eb^ti buddhaa ca buddasaavakaa ca bodhiyaa pa.tipannaa isipabbajja.m pabbajitaa  bodhisattaa ca sabbepi sappa~n~naa ca susiilaa ca, ete evaruupaa sappa~n~naa ``amhaaka.m ida~ncida~nca  dethaa''ti na yaacanti. ^b^dhiiro ca veditumarahatii^eb^ti upa.t.thaako pana dhiiro pa.n.dito  gilaanakaale ca agilaanakaale ca yena yenattho, ta.m sabba.m sayameva veditu.m jaanitu.m arahati.  ^b^uddissa ariyaa ti.t.thantii^eb^ti ariyaa pana vaaca.m abhinditvaa yenatthikaa honti, ta.m uddissa  kevala.m bhikkhaacaaravattena ti.t.thanti, neva kaaya"nga.m vaa vaaca"nga.m vaa kopenti. kaayavikaara.m dassetvaa  nimitta.m karonto hi kaaya"nga.m kopeti naama, vaciibheda.m karonto vaaca"nga.m kopeti naama, tadubhaya.m  akatvaa buddhaadayo ariyaa ti.t.thanti. ^b^esaa ariyaana yaacanaa^eb^ti esaa kaaya"ngavaaca"nga.m  akopetvaa bhikkhaaya ti.t.thamaanaa ariyaana.m yaacanaa naama.

[03] raajaa ^a^P3.0355^ea^ bodhisattassa vacana.m sutvaa ``bhante, yadi sappa~n~no upa.t.thaako  attanaava ~natvaa kuluupakassa daatabba.m deti, ahampi tumhaaka.m ida~ncida~nca dammii''ti vadanto sattama.m  gaathamaaha --
[21] ``dadaami ^a^M3.0334^ea^ te braahma.na rohi.niina.m, gava.m sahassa.m saha pu"ngavena.
[22] ariyo hi ariyassa katha.m na dajjaa, sutvaana gaathaa tava dhammayuttaa''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^rohi.niina^eb^nti rattava.n.naana.m. ^b^gava.m sahassa^eb^nti  khiiradadhiaadimadhurarasaparibhogatthaaya evaruupaana.m gunna.m sahassa.m tuyha.m dammi, ta.m me pa.tigga.nha.  ^b^ariyo^eb^ti aacaaraariyo. ^b^ariyassaa^eb^ti aacaaraariyassa. ^b^katha.m na dajjaa^eb^ti  kena kaara.nena na dadeyya.

[03] eva.m vutte bodhisatto ``aha.m mahaaraaja, aki~ncano pabbajito, na me gaaviihi attho''ti  ^a^V3.0313^ea^ pa.tikkhipi. raajaa tassovaade .thatvaa daanaadiini pu~n~naani katvaa saggaparaaya.no  ahosi. sopi aparihiinajjhaano brahmaloke uppajji.

[03] satthaa ima.m dhammadesana.m aaharitvaa saccaani pakaasetvaa jaataka.m samodhaanesi, saccapariyosaane  bahuu sotaapattiphalaadiisu pati.t.thitaa. tadaa raajaa aanando ahosi, a.t.thiseno pana ahameva  ahosinti.
[06] a.t.thisenajaatakava.n.nanaa a.t.thamaa.

[03] ^b^yattha verii nivasatii^eb^ti ida.m satthaa jetavane viharanto devadattassa pathavipavesana.m  aarabbha kathesi. tasmi~nhi pathavi.m pavi.t.the dhammasabhaaya.m katha.m samu.t.thaapesu.m ``aavuso, devadatto saha  parisaaya na.t.tho''ti. satthaa aagantvaa ``kaaya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathaaya sannisinnaa''ti  pucchitvaa ``imaaya naamaa''ti vutte ``na, bhikkhave, idaaneva devadatto saha parisaaya na.t.tho,  pubbepi nassiyevaa''ti vatvaa atiita.m aahari.

[03] atiite baaraa.nasiya.m brahmadatte rajja.m kaarente bodhisatto kapiyoniya.m nibbattitvaa  pa~ncasatakapiparivaaro raajuyyaane ^a^P3.0356^ea^ vasi. devadattopi kapiyoniya.m nibbattitvaa  pa~ncasatakapiparivaaro tattheva vasi. athekadivasa.m purohite uyyaana.m gantvaa nhatvaa ala"nkaritvaa  nikkhamante eko ^a^M3.0335^ea^ lolakapi puretara.m gantvaa raajuyyaanadvaare tora.namatthake  nisiiditvaa tassa matthake vaccapi.n.da.m paatetvaa puna uddha.m olokentassa mukhe paatesi. so  nivattitvaa ``hotu, jaanissaami tumhaaka.m kattabba''nti makka.te santajjetvaa puna nhatvaa pakkaami.  tena vera.m gahetvaa makka.taana.m santajjitabhaava.m bodhisattassa aarocesu.m. so ``veriina.m nivasana.t.thaane  naama vasitu.m na va.t.tati, sabbopi kapiga.no palaayitvaa a~n~nattha gacchatuu''ti kapisahassassapi  aarocaapesi. dubbacakapi attano parivaaramakka.te gahetvaa ``pacchaa jaanissaamii''ti tattheva  nisiidi. bodhisatto attano parivaara.m gahetvaa ara~n~na.m paavisi. athekadivasa.m ekissaa  viihiko.t.tikaaya daasiyaa aatape pasaaritaviihi.m khaadanto eko e.lako ummukkena pahaara.m labhitvaa  aadittasariiro palaayanto ekissaa hatthisaala.m nissaaya ti.naku.tiyaa ku.t.te sariira.m gha.msi  ^a^V3.0314^ea^. so aggi ti.naku.tika.m ga.nhi, tato u.t.thaaya hatthisaala.m ga.nhi, hatthisaalaaya  hatthiina.m pi.t.thi jhaayi, hatthivejjaa hatthiina.m pa.tijagganti.

[03] purohitopi makka.taana.m gaha.nuupaaya.m upadhaarento vicarati. atha na.m raajupa.t.thaana.m aagantvaa  nisinna.m raajaa aaha ``aacariya, bahuu no hatthii va.nitaa jaataa, hatthivejjaa pa.tijaggitu.m na  jaananti, jaanaasi nu kho ki~nci bhesajja''nti? ``jaanaami, mahaaraajaa''ti. ``ki.m  naamaa''ti? ``makka.tavasaa, mahaaraajaa''ti. ``kaha.m labhissaamaa''ti? ``nanu uyyaane bahuu  makka.taa''ti? raajaa ``uyyaane makka.te maaretvaa vasa.m aanethaa''ti aaha. dhanuggahaa gantvaa  pa~ncasatepi makka.te vijjhitvaa maaresu.m. eko pana je.t.thakamakka.to palaayanto sarapahaara.m labhitvaapi  tattheva apatitvaa ^a^P3.0357^ea^ bodhisattassa vasana.t.thaana.m patvaa pati. vaanaraa ``amhaaka.m  vasana.t.thaana.m patvaa mato''ti tassa pahaara.m laddhaa matabhaava.m bodhisattassa aarocesu.m. so gantvaa  kapiga.namajjhe nisinno ``pa.n.ditaana.m ovaada.m akatvaa veri.t.thaane vasantaa naama eva.m vinassantii''ti  kapiga.nassa ovaadavasena imaa gaathaa abhaasi --
[21] ``yattha verii nivasati, na vase tattha pa.n.dito.
[22] ekaratta.m dviratta.m vaa, dukkha.m vasati verisu..
[21] ``diso ^a^M3.0336^ea^ ve lahucittassa, posassaanuvidhiiyato.
[22] ekassa kapino hetu, yuuthassa anayo kato..
[21] ``baalova pa.n.ditamaanii, yuuthassa parihaarako.
[22] sacittassa vasa.m gantvaa, sayethaaya.m yathaa kapi..
[21] ``na saadhu balavaa baalo, yuuthassa parihaarako.
[22] ahito bhavati ~naatiina.m, saku.naana.mva cetako..
[21] ``dhiirova balavaa saadhu, yuuthassa parihaarako.
[22] hito bhavati ~naatiina.m, tidasaana.mva vaasavo..
[21] ``yo ^a^V3.0315^ea^ ca siila~nca pa~n~na~nca, suta~ncattani passati.
[22] ubhinnamattha.m carati, attano ca parassa ca..
[21] ``tasmaa tuleyya mattaana.m, siilapa~n~naasutaamiva.
[22] ga.na.m vaa parihare dhiiro, eko vaapi paribbaje''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^lahucittassaa^eb^ti lahucitto assa. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- yo poso lahucittassa  mittassa vaa ~naatino vaa anuvidhiiyati anuvattati, tassa posassa anuvidhiiyato so lahucitto  diso hoti, verikicca.m karoti. ^b^ekassa kapino^eb^ti passatha ekassa lahucittassa  andhabaalassa kapino hetu aya.m sakalassa yuuthassa anayo avu.d.dhi mahaavinaaso katoti.  ^b^pa.n.ditamaanii^eb^ti yo saya.m baalo hutvaa ``aha.m pa.n.dito''ti attaana.m ma~n~namaano pa.n.ditaana.m  ovaada.m akatvaa sakassa cittassa vasa.m gacchati, so sacittassa vasa.m gantvaa yathaaya.m dubbacakapi  matasayana.m sayito, eva.m sayethaati attho.

[03] ^b^na saadhuu^eb^ti baalo naama balasampanno yuuthassa parihaarako na saadhu na laddhako.  ki.mkaara.naa? so hi ^b^ahito bhavati ~naatiina.m,^eb^ vinaasameva vahati. ^b^saku.naana.mva  cetako^eb^ti yathaa hi tittirasaku.naana.m ^a^P3.0358^ea^ diipakatittiro divasampi vassanto a~n~ne  saku.ne na maareti, ~naatakeva maareti, tesa~n~neva ahito hoti, evanti attho. ^b^hito  bhavatii^eb^ti kaayenapi vaacaayapi manasaapi hitakaarakoyeva. ^b^ubhinnamattha.m caratii^eb^ti yo idha  puggalo ete siilaadayo gu.ne attani ^a^M3.0337^ea^ passati, so ``mayha.m aacaarasiilampi  atthi, pa~n~naapi sutapariyattipi atthii''ti tathato jaanitvaa ga.na.m pariharanto attano ca paresa~nca  attaana.m parivaaretvaa carantaananti ubhinnampi atthameva carati.

[03] ^b^tuleyya mattaana^eb^nti tuleyya attaana.m. ^b^tuleyyaa^eb^ti tuletvaa.  ^b^siilapa~n~naasutaamivaa^eb^ti etaani siilaadiini viya. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- yasmaa siilaadiini  attani samanupassanto ubhinnamattha.m carati, tasmaa pa.n.dito etaani siilaadiini viya attaanampi  tesu tuletvaa ``pati.t.thito nu khomhi siile pa~n~naaya sute''ti tiiretvaa pati.t.thitabhaava.m paccakkha.m  katvaa dhiiro ga.na.m vaa parihareyya, catuusu iriyaapathesu eko vaa hutvaa paribbajeyya vatteyya,  parisupa.t.thaakenapi vivekacaarinaapi imehi tiihi dhammehi samannaagateneva bhavitabbanti. eva.m  mahaasatto kapiraajaa hutvaapi vinayapariyattikicca.m kathesi.
[03] satthaa ^a^V3.0316^ea^ ima.m dhammadesana.m aaharitvaa jaataka.m samodhaanesi -- ``tadaa dubbacakapi  devadatto ahosi, parisaapissa devadattaparisaa, pa.n.ditakapiraajaa pana ahameva ahosi''nti.
[06] kapijaatakava.n.nanaa navamaa.

[03] ^b^dvaasattatii^eb^ti ida.m satthaa jetavane viharanto bakabrahmaana.m aarabbha kathesi. tassa hi  ``ida.m nicca.m dhuva.m sassata.m acavanadhamma.m, ito a~n~na.m lokanissara.na.m nibbaana.m naama natthii''ti eva.m  di.t.thi uppajji. he.t.thuupapattiko kiresa brahmaa pubbe jhaana.m bhaavetvaa vehapphalesu nibbatto, tattha  pa~ncakappasataparimaa.na.m aayu.m khepetvaa subhaki.nhesu nibbattitvaa catusa.t.thikappa.m khepetvaa tato cuto  a.t.thakappaayukesu aabhassaresu nibbatti, tatrassa esaa di.t.thi uppajji. so hi neva  uparibrahmalokato cuti.m, na tattha upapatti.m anussari, tadubhayampi apassanto eva.m di.t.thi.m ga.nhi.  bhagavaa tassa cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya seyyathaapi ^a^P3.0359^ea^ naama balavaa puriso  sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya, evameva jetavane antarahito tasmi.m  brahmaloke paaturahosi. atha ^a^M3.0338^ea^ brahmaa bhagavanta.m disvaa ``ehi kho, maarisa,  svaagata.m maarisa, cirassa.m kho, maarisa, ima.m pariyaayamakaasi, yadida.m idhaagamanaaya. ida~nhi  maarisa, nicca.m ida.m dhuva.m ida.m sassata.m ida.m kevala.m ida.m acavanadhamma.m, ida~nhi na ca jaayati na  jiiyati na miiyati na cavati na upapajjati, ito ca pana~n~na.m uttari nissara.na.m natthii''ti aaha.

[03] eva.m vutte bhagavaa baka.m brahmaana.m etadavoca ``avijjaagato vata bho bako brahmaa, avijjaagato  vata bho bako brahmaa, yatra hi naama anicca~n~neva samaana.m niccanti vakkhati...pe0... santa~nca  pana~n~na.m uttari nissara.na.m, nattha~n~na.m uttari nissara.nanti vakkhatii''ti (sa.m0 ni0  1.175).  ta.m sutvaa brahmaa ``tva.m eva.m kathesi, tva.m eva.m kathesi, iti ma.m esa anuyu~njanto anubandhatii''ti  cintetvaa yathaa naama dubbalo coro katipaye pahaare labhitvaa ``ki.m ahameva coro, asukopi  coro asukopi coro''ti sabbepi sahaayake aacikkhati, tatheva bhagavato anuyogabhayena bhiito  a~n~nepi attano sahaayake aacikkhanto pa.thama.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``dvaasattati ^a^V3.0317^ea^ gotama pu~n~nakammaa, vasavattino jaatijara.m atiitaa.
[22] ayamantimaa vedaguu brahmapatti, asmaabhijappanti janaa anekaa''ti.. (sa.m0 ni0   1.175).

[03] tattha ^b^dvaasattatii^eb^ti na kevala.m bho gotama, ahameva, atha kho imasmi.m brahmaloke maya.m  dvaasattati janaa pu~n~nakammaa a~n~nesa.m upari atthano vasa.m vattanena ^b^vasavattino^eb^ jaati~nca  jara~nca atiitaa, aya.m no vedehi gatattaa ^b^vedaguu,^eb^ aya.m bho gotama ^b^antimaa brahmapatti,^eb^  pacchimako.tippatti se.t.thabhaavappatti. ^b^asmaabhijappanti janaa anekaa^eb^ti amhe a~n~ne bahuu janaa  pa~njalikaa hutvaa -- ``aya.m kho bhava.m brahmaa mahaabrahmaa''tiaadiini vadantaa namassanti patthenti  pihayanti, ``aho vata mayampi evaruupaa bhaveyyaamaa''ti icchantiiti attho.
[03] tassa ^a^P3.0360^ea^ ^a^M3.0339^ea^ vacana.m sutvaa satthaa dutiya.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``appa.m hi eta.m na hi diighamaayu, ya.m tva.m baka ma~n~nasi diighamaayu.m.
[22] sata.m sahassaani nirabbudaana.m, aayu.m pajaanaami tavaaha brahme''ti.. (sa.m0 ni0   1.175).

[03] tattha ^b^sata.m sahassaani nirabbudaana^eb^nti nirabbudasa"nkhaataana.m ga.nanaana.m satasahassaani.  vassaana~nhi dasadasaka.m sata.m, dasa sataana.m sahassa.m, sata.m sahassaana.m satasahassa.m, sata.m satasahassaana.m  ko.ti naama, sata.m ko.tisatasahassaana.m pako.ti naama, sata.m pako.tisatasahassaana.m ko.tipako.ti naama,  sata.m ko.tipako.tisatasahassaana.m eka.m nahuta.m naama, sata.m nahutasatasahassaana.m eka.m ninnahuta.m naama.  cheko ga.nako ettaka.m ga.netu.m sakkoti, tato para.m ga.nanaa naama buddhaanameva visayo. tattha sata.m  ninnahutasatasahassaana.m eka.m abbuda.m, viisati abbudaani eka.m nirabbuda.m, tesa.m nirabbudasatasahassaana.m  eka.m ahaha.m naama, ettaka.m bakassa brahmuno tasmi.m bhave avasi.t.tha.m aayu, ta.m sandhaaya bhagavaa evamaaha.
[03] ta.m sutvaa bako tatiya.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``anantadassii ^a^V3.0318^ea^ bhagavaahamasmi, jaatijjara.m sokamupaativatto.
[22] ki.m me puraa.na.m vatasiilavatta.m, aacikkha me ta.m yamaha.m vija~n~na''nti.. (sa.m0 ni0   1.175).

[03] tattha ^b^bhagavaa^eb^ti bhagavaa tumhe ``aayu.m pajaanaami tavaaha''nti vadantaa ``aha.m  anantadassii jaatijara~nca soka~nca upaativattosmii''ti vadatha. ^b^vatasiilavatta^eb^nti  vatasamaadaana~nca siilavatta~nca. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- yadi tumhe sabba~n~nubuddhaa, eva.m sante ki.m mayha.m  puraa.na.m vata~nca siilavatta~nca, aacikkha me ta.m, yamaha.m tayaa aacikkhita.m yaathaavasarasato  vijaaneyyanti.
[03] athassa ^a^M3.0340^ea^ bhagavaa atiitaani vatthuuni aaharitvaa aacikkhanto catasso  gaathaa abhaasi --
[21] ``ya.m tva.m apaayesi bahuu manusse, pipaasite ghammani samparete.
[22] ta.m te puraa.na.m vatasiilavatta.m, suttappabuddhova anussaraami..
[21] ``ya.m ^a^P3.0361^ea^ e.nikuulasmi jana.m gahiita.m, amocayii gayhaka niiyamaana.m.
[22] ta.m te puraa.na.m vatasiilavatta.m, suttappabuddhova anussaraami..
[21] ``ga"ngaaya sotasmi.m gahiitanaava.m, luddena naagena manussakappaa.
[27] amocayi tva.m balasaa pasayha, ta.m te puraa.na.m vatasiilavatta.m.
[22] suttappabuddhova anussaraami..
[21] ``kappo ca te baddhacaro ahosi.m, sambuddhimanta.m vatina.m ama~n~na.m.
[22] ta.m te puraa.na.m vatasiilavatta.m, suttappabuddhova anussaraamii''ti.. (sa.m0 ni0   1.175).

[03] tattha ^b^apaayesii^eb^ti paayesi. ^b^ghammani samparete^eb^ti ghammena samparete ativiya  phu.t.the ghammakilante. ^b^suttappabuddhovaa^eb^ti paccuusakaale supanto supina.m passitvaa ta.m supinaka.m  viya anussaraami. so kira bakabrahmaa ekasmi.m kappe taapaso hutvaa marukantaare vasanto bahuuna.m  kantaarapa.tipannaana.m ^a^V3.0319^ea^ paaniiya.m aaharitvaa adaasi. athekadivasa.m eko satthavaaho pa~ncahi  saka.tasatehi marukantaara.m pa.tipajji. manussaa disaa vavatthapetu.m asakkontaa satta divasaani  aahi.n.ditvaa khii.nadaarudakaa niraahaaraa u.nhaabhibhuutaa ``idaani no jiivita.m natthii''ti saka.te  parivattetvaa go.ne ^a^M3.0341^ea^ mocetvaa he.t.thaasaka.tesu nipajji.msu. tadaa taapaso aavajjento  te disvaa ``mayi passante maa nassi.msuu''ti cintetvaa attano iddhaanubhaavena ga"ngaasota.m ubbattetvaa  satthavaahaabhimukha.m akaasi, aviduure ca eka.m vanasa.n.da.m maapesi. manussaa paaniiya.m pivitvaa nhatvaa  go.ne santappetvaa vanasa.n.dato ti.na.m laayitvaa daaruuni gahetvaa disa.m sallakkhetvaa arogaa kantaara.m  atikkami.msu, ta.m sandhaayeta.m vutta.m.

[03] ^b^e.nikuulasmi^eb^nti e.niyaa naama nadiyaa kuule. ^b^gayhaka niiyamaana^eb^nti karamaragaaha.m  gahetvaa niiyamaana.m. so kira taapaso aparasmi.m kaale eka.m paccantagaama.m nissaaya nadiitiire  vanasa.n.de vihaasi. athekasmi.m divase pabbatato coraa otaritvaa ta.m gaama.m paharitvaa mahaajana.m  gahetvaa pabbata.m aaropetvaa antaraamagge caarakamanusse .thapetvaa pabbatabila.m pavisitvaa aahaara.m  pacaapentaa nisiidi.msu. taapaso gomahi.msaadiina~nceva daarakadaarikaadiina~nca mahanta.m a.t.tassara.m sutvaa  ``mayi passante maa nassi.msuu''ti iddhaanubhaavena attabhaava.m jahitvaa catura"nginiyaa senaaya parivuto  raajaa hutvaa yuddhabheri.m aako.taapento ta.m .thaana.m agamaasi. caarakamanussaa ^a^P3.0362^ea^ ta.m  disvaa coraana.m aarocesu.m. coraa ``ra~n~naa saddhi.m viggaho naama na yutto''ti sabba.m gahitagahita.m  bha.n.daka.m cha.d.detvaa bhatta.m abhu~njitvaava palaayi.msu. taapaso te sabbe aanetvaa sakagaameyeva pati.t.thaapesi,  ta.m sandhaayeta.m vutta.m.

[03] ^b^gahiitanaava^eb^nti niggahitanaava.m. ^b^luddenaa^eb^ti kakkha.lena. ^b^manussakappaa^eb^ti  manusse vinaasetukaamataaya. ^b^balasaa^eb^ti balena. ^b^pasayhaa^eb^ti abhibhavitvaa. aparasmi.m  kaale so taapaso ga"ngaatiire vihaasi. tadaa manussaa dve tayo naavaasa"nghaa.te bandhitvaa  sa"nghaa.tamatthake pupphama.n.dapa.m kaaretvaa sa"nghaa.te nisiiditvaa khaadantaa pivantaa sambandhakula.m gacchanti.  te piitaavasesa.m sura.m bhuttakhaaditaavasesaani bhattamacchama.msatambulaadiini ga"ngaayameva paatenti.  ga"ngeyyo naagaraajaa ``ime ucchi.t.thaka.m mama upari khipantii''ti kujjhitvaa ``sabbe te jane  gahetvaa ga"ngaaya osiidaapessaamii''ti mahanta.m ekado.nikanaavappamaa.na.m attabhaava.m maapetvaa udaka.m  bhinditvaa ^a^M3.0342^ea^ pha.na.m dhaarayamaano tesa.m abhimukho paayaasi. te naagaraajaana.m disvaa  mara.nabhayatajjitaa ekappahaareneva mahaasadda.m kari.msu. taapaso tesa.m paridevitasadda.m sutvaa naagaraajassa  ca kuddhabhaava.m ~natvaa ``mayi passante maa nassi.msuu''ti khippanisantiyaa attano aanubhaavena khippa.m  supa.n.nava.n.na.m attaana.m maapetvaa agamaasi ^a^V3.0320^ea^. naagaraajaa ta.m disvaa mara.nabhayatajjito  udake nimujji. manussaa sotthibhaava.m patvaa agama.msu, ta.m sandhaayeta.m vutta.m.

[03] ^b^baddhacaro^eb^ti antevaasiko. ^b^sambuddhimanta.m vatina.m ama~n~na^eb^nti buddhisampanno ceva  vatasampanno ca taapasoti ta.m ma~n~namaano. iminaa ki.m dasseti? mahaabrahme aha.m atiite tava  kesavataapasakaale kappo naama antevaasiko veyyaavaccakaro hutvaa tuyha.m naaradena naama amaccena  baaraa.nasito himavanta.m aaniitassa roga.m vuupasamesi.m. atha na.m naarado dutiyavaare aagantvaa niroga.m  disvaa ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[21] ``manussinda.m jahitvaana, sabbakaamasamiddhina.m.
[22] katha.m nu bhagavaa kesi, kappassa ramati assame''ti.. (jaa0 1.4.181).
[25] tamena.m tva.m etadavoca --
[21] ``saaduuni rama.niiyaani, santi vakkhaa manoramaa.
[22] subhaasitaani kappassa, naarada ramayanti ma''nti.. (jaa0 1.4.182).

[25] itissa bhagavaa ima.m attanaa antevaasikena hutvaa rogassa vuupasamitabhaava.m diipento  evamaaha. ta~nca pana brahmunaa manussaloke katakamma.m sabba.m mahaabrahmaana.m sallakkhaapentova kathesi.
[03] so ^a^P3.0363^ea^ satthu vacanena attanaa katakamma.m saritvaa tathaagatassa thuti.m karonto  osaanagaathamaaha --
[21] ``addhaa pajaanaasi mametamaayu.m, a~n~nampi jaanaasi tathaa hi buddho.
[22] tathaa hi taaya.m jalitaanubhaavo, obhaasaya.m ti.t.thati brahmaloka''nti..

[03] tattha ^a^M3.0343^ea^ ^b^tathaa hi buddho^eb^ti tathaa hi tva.m buddho. buddhaana~nhi a~n~naata.m  naama natthi, sabbadhammaana.m buddhattaayeva hi te buddhaa naamaati dasseti. ^b^tathaa hi taaya^eb^nti  buddhattaayeva ca pana tava aya.m jalito sariirappabhaanubhaavo. ^b^obhaasaya.m ti.t.thatii^eb^ti ima.m  sakalampi brahmaloka.m obhaasento ti.t.thati.

[03] eva.m ^a^V3.0321^ea^ satthaa attano buddhagu.na.m jaanaapento dhamma.m desetvaa saccaani pakaasesi,  saccapariyosaane sampattaana.m dasamattaana.m brahmasahassaana.m anupaadaaya aasavehi cittaani vimucci.msu.  iti bhagavaa bahuuna.m brahmaana.m avassayo hutvaa brahmalokaa jetavana.m aagantvaa tattha kathitaniyaameneva ta.m  dhammadesana.m bhikkhuuna.m kathetvaa jaataka.m samodhaanesi -- ``tadaa kesavataapaso bakabrahmaa ahosi,  kappamaa.navo pana ahameva ahosi''nti.
[06] bakajaatakava.n.nanaa dasamaa.
[06] kukkuvaggo pa.thamo.

[03] ^b^hitvaa^eb^ ^a^V3.0322^ea^ ^b^gaamasahassaanii^eb^ti ida.m satthaa jetavane viharanto  bhesajjasannidhikaarasikkhaapada.m aarabbha kathesi. vatthu pana raajagahe samu.t.thita.m. aayasmataa hi  pilindavacchena aaraamikakula.m mocetu.m raajanivesana.m gantvaa ra~n~no paasaade iddhibalena sova.n.namaye  kate manussaa pasiiditvaa therassa pa~nca bhesajjaani pahi.ni.msu. so taani parisaaya vissajjesi.  parisaa panassa baahullikaa ahosi, laddha.m ^a^P3.0364^ea^ laddha.m ko.lambepi gha.tepi  pattatthavikaayopi puuretvaa pa.tisaamesi. manussaa disvaa ``mahicchaa ime sama.naa  antoko.t.thaagaarikaa''ti ujjhaayi.msu. satthaa ta.m pavatti.m sutvaa ``yaani kho pana taani gilaanaana.m  bhikkhuuna''nti (paaraa0 622-623) sikkhaapada.m pa~n~napetvaa ``bhikkhave, poraa.nakapa.n.ditaa  anuppanne buddhe baahirakapabbajja.m pabbajitvaa pa~ncasiilamattaka.m rakkhantaapi lo.nasakkharamattaka.m  punadivasatthaaya nidahante ^a^M3.0344^ea^ garahi.msu, tumhe pana evaruupe niyyaanikasaasane  pabbajitvaa dutiyatatiyadivasatthaaya sannidhi.m karontaa ayutta.m karothaa''ti vatvaa atiita.m aahari.

[03] atiite gandhaarara.t.the bodhisatto gandhaarara~n~no putto hutvaa pitu accayena rajje pati.t.thaaya dhammena  rajja.m kaaresi. majjhimapadesepi videhara.t.the videho naama raajaa rajja.m kaaresi. te dvepi raajaano  adi.t.thasahaayaa hutvaa a~n~nama~n~na.m thiravissaasaa ahesu.m. tadaa manussaa diighaayukaa honti, ti.msa  vassasahassaani jiivanti. athekadaa gandhaararaajaa pu.n.namuposathadivase samaadinnasiilo mahaatale  pa~n~nattavarapalla"nkamajjhagato viva.tena siihapa~njarena paaciinalokadhaatu.m olokento amaccaana.m  dhammatthayuttakatha.m kathento nisiidi. tasmi.m kha.ne gaganatala.m atila"nghantamiva paripu.n.na.m  candama.n.dala.m raahu avatthari, candappabhaa antaradhaayi. amaccaa candaaloka.m apassantaa candassa  raahunaa gahitabhaava.m ra~n~no aarocesu.m. raajaa canda.m oloketvaa ``aya.m cando aagantukaupakkilesena  upakkili.t.tho nippabho jaato, mayhampesa raajaparivaaro upakkileso, na kho pana meta.m patiruupa.m, yaaha.m  raahunaa gahitacando viya nippabho bhaveyya.m, visuddhe gaganatare virocanta.m candama.n.dala.m viya rajja.m  pahaaya pabbajissaami, ki.m me parena ovaditena ^a^V3.0323^ea^, kule ca ga.ne ca alaggo hutvaa  attaanameva ovadanto vicarissaami, ida.m me patiruupa''nti cintetvaa ``ya.m icchatha, ta.m ^a^P3.0365^ea^  raajaana.m karothaa''ti rajja.m amaccaana.m niyyaadesi. so rajja.m cha.d.detvaa isipabbajja.m  pabbajitvaa jhaanaabhi~n~naayo nibbattetvaa jhaanaratisamappito himavantapadese vaasa.m kappesi.

[03] videharaajaapi ``sukha.m me sahaayassaa''ti vaa.nije pucchitvaa tassa pabbajitabhaava.m sutvaa  ``mama sahaaye pabbajite aha.m rajjena ki.m karissaamii''ti sattayojanike mithilanagare  tiyojanasatike videhara.t.the so.lasasu gaamasahassesu puuritaani ko.t.thaagaaraani, so.lasasahassaa ca  naa.takitthiyo cha.d.detvaa puttadhiitaro amanasikatvaa himavantapadesa.m pavisitvaa pabbajitvaa  pavattaphalabhojano hutvaa samappavattavaasa.m vasanto vicari. te ubhopi samavattacaara.m carantaa  aparabhaage samaagacchi.msu, na pana a~n~nama~n~na.m sa~njaani.msu, sammodamaanaa ekatova samappavattavaasa.m  vasi.msu. tadaa videhataapaso gandhaarataapasassa upa.t.thaana.m karoti. tesa.m ^a^M3.0345^ea^ ekasmi.m  pu.n.namadivase a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule nisiiditvaa dhammatthayuttakatha.m kathentaana.m gaganatale virocamaana.m  candama.n.dala.m raahu avatthari. videhataapaso ``ki.m nu kho candassa pabhaa na.t.thaa''ti oloketvaa  raahunaa gahita.m canda.m disvaa ``ko nu kho esa aacariya, canda.m avattharitvaa nippabhamakaasii''ti  pucchi. antevaasika aya.m raahu naama candasseko upakkileso, virocitu.m na deti, ahampi  raahugahita.m candama.n.dala.m disvaa ``ida.m parisuddhassa candama.n.dalassa aagantukena upakkilesena nippabha.m  jaata.m, mayhampi ida.m rajja.m upakkileso, yaava candama.n.dala.m raahu viya ida.m nippabha.m na karoti, taava  pabbajissaamii''ti cintetvaa tadeva raahugahita.m candama.n.dala.m aaramma.na.m katvaa mahaarajja.m cha.d.detvaa  pabbajitoti. ``aacariya, tva.m gandhaararaajaa''ti ^a^P3.0366^ea^? ``aama, aha''nti.  ``aacariya, ahampi videhara.t.the mithilanagare videharaajaa naama, nanu maya.m a~n~nama~n~na.m  adi.t.thasahaayaa''ti. ``ki.m pana te aaramma.na.m ahosii''ti? aha.m ``tumhe pabbajitaa''ti sutvaa  ``addhaa pabbajjaaya mahanta.m gu.na.m addasaa''ti tumheyeva aaramma.na.m katvaa rajja.m pahaaya pabbajitoti.  te tato pa.t.thaaya ativiya samaggaa sammodamaanaa pavattaphalabhojanaa hutvaa vihari.msu. tattha diigharatta.m  vasitvaa ca pana lo.nambilasevanatthaaya himavantato otaritvaa eka.m paccantagaama.m sampaapu.ni.msu.

[03] manussaa tesa.m iriyaapathe pasiiditvaa bhikkha.m datvaa pa.ti~n~na.m gahetvaa ara~n~ne  rattidiva.t.thaanaadiini maapetvaa vasaapesu.m. antaraamaggepi nesa.m bhattakiccakara.natthaaya udakaphaasuka.t.thaane  pa.n.nasaala.m kaaresu.m. te paccantagaame bhikkha.m caritvaa taaya pa.n.nasaalaaya nisiiditvaa ^a^V3.0324^ea^  paribhu~njitvaa attano vasana.t.thaana.m gacchanti. tepi manussaa tesa.m aahaara.m dadamaanaa ekadaa lo.na.m  patte pakkhipitvaa denti, ekadaa pa.n.napu.te bandhitvaa denti, ekadaa alo.nakaahaarameva denti. te  ekadivasa.m pa.n.napu.te bahutara.m lo.na.m ada.msu. videhataapaso lo.na.m aadaaya gantvaa bodhisattassa  bhattakiccakaale pahonaka.m datvaa attanopi pamaa.nayutta.m gahetvaa atireka.m pa.n.napu.te bandhitvaa  ``alo.nakadivase bhavissatii''ti ti.nava.t.tikaantare .thapesi. athekadivasa.m alo.nake aahaare laddhe  videho gandhaarassa bhikkhaabhaajana.m datvaa ti.nava.t.tikaantarato lo.na.m aaharitvaa ``aacariya, lo.na.m  ga.nhathaa''ti aaha. ``ajja manussehi ^a^M3.0246^ea^ lo.na.m na dinna.m, tva.m kuto labhasii''ti?  ``aacariya, purimadivase manussaa bahu.m lo.namada.msu, athaaha.m `alo.nakadivase bhavissatii'ti  atireka.m lo.na.m .thapesi''nti. atha na.m bodhisatto ``moghapurisa, tiyojanasatika.m videhara.t.tha.m pahaaya  pabbajitvaa aki~ncanabhaava.m patvaa idaani lo.nasakkharaaya ta.nha.m janesii''ti tajjetvaa ovadanto  pa.thama.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``hitvaa ^a^P3.0367^ea^ gaamasahassaani, paripu.n.naani so.lasa.
[22] ko.t.thaagaaraani phiitaani, sannidhi.m daani kubbasii''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^ko.t.thaagaaraanii^eb^ti suva.n.narajatama.nimuttaadiratanako.t.thaagaaraani ceva dussako.t.thaagaaraani  ca dha~n~nako.t.thaagaaraani ca. ^b^phiitaanii^eb^ti puuraani. ^b^sannidhi.m daani kubbasii^eb^ti idaani  ``sve bhavissati, tatiyadivase bhavissatii''ti lo.namatta.m sannidhi.m karosiiti.

[03] videho eva.m garahiyamaano garaha.m asahanto pa.tipakkho hutvaa ``aacariya, tumhe attano  dosa.m adisvaa mayhameva dosa.m passatha, nanu tumhe `ki.m me parena ovaditena, attaanameva  ovadissaamii'ti rajja.m cha.d.detvaa pabbajitaa, tumhe idaani ma.m kasmaa ovadathaa''ti codento dutiya.m  gaathamaaha --
[21] ``hitvaa gandhaaravisaya.m, pahuutadhanadhaariya.m.
[22] pasaasanato nikkhanto, idha daani pasaasasii''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^pasaasanato^eb^ti ovaadaanusaasaniidaanato. ^b^idha daanii^eb^ti idaani idha ara~n~ne  kasmaa ma.m ovadathaati.
[03] ta.m ^a^V3.0325^ea^ sutvaa bodhisatto tatiya.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``dhamma.m bha.naami vedeha, adhammo me na ruccati.
[22] dhamma.m me bha.namaanassa, na paapamupalimpatii''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^dhamma^eb^nti sabhaava.m, buddhaadiihi va.n.nita.m pasattha.m kaara.nameva. ^b^adhammo me na  ruccatii^eb^ti adhammo naama asabhaavo mayha.m kadaacipi na ruccati. ^b^na paapamupalimpatii^eb^ti  mama sabhaavameva kaara.nameva bha.nantassa paapa.m naama hadaye ^a^M3.0347^ea^ na limpati na  alliiyati. ovaadadaana.m naameta.m buddhapaccekabuddhasaavakabodhisattaana.m pave.nii. tehi dinnovaada.m baalaa  na ga.nhanti, ovaadadaayakassa pana paapa.m naama natthi.
[21] ``nidhiina.mva pavattaara.m, ya.m passe vajjadassina.m.
[27] niggayhavaadi.m medhaavi.m, taadisa.m pa.n.dita.m bhaje.
[22] taadisa.m bhajamaanassa, seyyo hoti na paapiyo..
[21] ``ovadeyyaanusaaseyya, asabbhaa ca nivaaraye.
[22] sata~nhi so piyo hoti, asata.m hoti appiyo''ti.. (dha0 pa0 76-77).

[03] videhataapaso bodhisattassa katha.m sutvaa ``aacariya, atthanissita.m kathentenapi para.m gha.t.tetvaa  rosetvaa kathetu.m na ^a^P3.0368^ea^ va.t.tati, tva.m ma.m ku.n.thasatthakena mu.n.dento viya atipharusa.m  kathesii''ti vatvaa catuttha.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``yena kenaci va.n.nena, paro labhati ruppana.m.
[22] mahatthiyampi ce vaaca.m, na ta.m bhaaseyya pa.n.dito''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^yena kenacii^eb^ti dhammayuttenaapi kaara.nena. ^b^labhati ruppana^eb^nti gha.t.tana.m dussana.m  kuppana.m labhatiyeva. ^b^na ta.m bhaaseyyaa^eb^ti tasmaa ta.m parapuggala.m yaaya so vaacaaya dussati, ta.m  mahatthiya.m mahanta.m atthanissitampi vaaca.m na bhaaseyyaati attho.
[03] athassa bodhisatto pa~ncama.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``kaama.m ^a^V3.0326^ea^ ruppatu vaa maa vaa, bhusa.mva vikiriiyatu.
[22] dhamma.m me bha.namaanassa, na paapamupalimpatii''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^kaama^eb^nti eka.msena. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- ayuttakaarako puggalo ``ayutta.m te  kata''nti ovadiyamaano eka.mseneva kujjhatu vaa maa vaa kujjhatu, atha vaa bhusamu.t.thi viya  vikiriiyatu, mayha.m pana dhamma.m bha.nantassa paapa.m naama natthiiti.

[03] eva~nca pana vatvaa ``na vo aha.m, aananda, tathaa parakkamissaami, yathaa kumbhakaaro aamake  aamakamatte. niggayha niggayhaaha.m aananda, vakkhaami, yo ^a^M3.0348^ea^ saaro so  .thassatii''ti (ma0 ni0 3.196) imassa sugatovaadassa anuruupaaya pa.tipattiyaa .thatvaa ``yathaa  kumbhakaaro bhaajanesu punappuna.m aako.tetvaa aako.tetvaa aamaka.m aggahetvaa supakkameva bhaajana.m ga.nhaati,  eva.m punappuna.m ovaditvaa nigga.nhitvaa pakkabhaajanasadiso puggalo gahetabbo''ti dassetu.m puna ta.m  ovadanto --
[21] ``no ce assa sakaa buddhi, vinayo vaa susikkhito.
[22] vane andhamahi.msova, careyya bahuko jano..
[21] ``yasmaa ca panidhekacce, aaceramhi susikkhitaa.
[22] tasmaa viniitavinayaa, caranti susamaahitaa''ti.. -- ida.m gaathaadvayamaaha.

[03] tassattho ^a^P3.0369^ea^ -- samma vedeha, imesa~nhi sattaana.m sace attano buddhi vaa  pa.n.dite ovaadadaayake nissaaya aacaarapa.n.nattivinayo vaa susikkhito na bhaveyya, eva.m sante  yathaa ti.nalataadigahane vane andhamahi.mso gocaraagocara.m saasa"nkaniraasa"nka~nca .thaana.m ajaananto carati,  tathaa tumhaadiso bahuko jano careyya. yasmaa pana idha ekacce sakaaya buddhiyaa rahitaa sattaa  aacariyasantike aacaarapa.n.nattisusikkhitaa, tasmaa aacariyehi attano attano anuruupena vinayena  viniitattaa viniitavinayaa susamaahitaa ekaggacittaa hutvaa carantiiti.

[03] iminaa ida.m dasseti -- iminaa hi sattena gihinaa hutvaa attano kulaanuruupaa, pabbajitena  pabbajitaanuruupaa sikkhaa sikkhitabbaa. gihinopi hi attano kulaanuruupesu kasigorakkhaadiisu  sikkhitaava sampannaajiivaa hutvaa susamaahitaa caranti, pabbajitaapi pabbajitaanuruupesu ^a^V3.0327^ea^  paasaadikesu abhikkantapa.tikkantaadiisu adhisiilaadhicittaadhipa~n~naasikkhaasu sikkhitaava  vigatavikkhepaa susamaahitaa caranti. lokasmi~nhi --
[21] ``baahusacca~nca sippa~nca, vinayo ca susikkhito.
[22] subhaasitaa ca yaa vaacaa, eta.m ma"ngalamuttama''nti.. (khu0 paa0 5.5; su0 ni0  264).

[03] ta.m sutvaa vedehataapaso ``aacariya, ito pa.t.thaaya ma.m ovadatha anusaasatha, aha.m  anadhivaasanajaatikataaya tumhehi saddhi.m kathesi.m, ta.m ^a^M3.0349^ea^ me khamathaa''ti vanditvaa  mahaasatta.m khamaapesi. te samaggavaasa.m vasitvaa puna himavantameva agama.msu. tatra bodhisatto  vedehataapasassa kasi.naparikamma.m kathesi. so ta.m katvaa abhi~n~naa ca samaapattiyo ca nibbattesi.  iti te ubhopi aparihiinajjhaanaa brahmalokaparaaya.naa ahesu.m.
[03] satthaa ima.m dhammadesana.m aaharitvaa jaataka.m samodhaanesi -- ``tadaa vedeho aanando ahosi,  gandhaararaajaa pana ahameva ahosii''nti.
[06] gandhaarajaatakava.n.nanaa pa.thamaa.

[03] ^b^attaana.m sa"nkama.m katvaa^eb^ti ida.m satthaa jetavane viharanto ~naatatthacariya.m aarabbha kathesi.  vatthu ^b^bhaddasaalajaatake^eb^ (jaa0 1.12.13 aadayo) aavi bhavissati. tadaa pana  dhammasabhaaya.m katha.m samu.t.thaapesu.m ``aavuso, sammaasambuddho ~naatakaana.m attha.m caratii''ti. satthaa  ^a^P3.0370^ea^ aagantvaa ``kaaya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathaaya sannisinnaa''ti pucchitvaa  ``imaaya naamaa''ti vutte ``na, bhikkhave, idaaneva, pubbepi tathaagato ~naatiina.m attha.m cariyevaa''ti  vatvaa atiita.m aahari.

[03] atiite baaraa.nasiya.m brahmadatte rajja.m kaarente bodhisatto kapiyoniya.m nibbattitvaa vayappatto  aarohapari.naahasampanno thaamabaluupeto pa~ncahatthibalaparimaa.no asiitisahassakapiga.naparivuto  himavantapadese vasati. tattha ga"ngaatiira.m nissaaya saakhaavi.tapasampanno sandacchaayo bahalapatto  ^a^V3.0328^ea^ pabbatakuu.ta.m viya samuggato ambarukkho ahosi ``nigrodharukkho''tipi vadanti.  tassa madhuraani phalaani dibbagandharasaani mahantaani mahantakumbhappamaa.naani. tassa ekissaa  saakhaaya phalaani thale patanti, ekissaa saakhaaya ga"ngaajale, dvinna.m saakhaana.m phalaani majjhe  rukkhamuule patanti. bodhisatto kapiga.na.m aadaaya tattha phalaani khaadanto ``ekasmi.m kaale  imassa rukkhassa udake patita.m phala.m nissaaya amhaaka.m ^a^M3.0350^ea^ bhaya.m uppajjissatii''ti  udakamatthake saakhaaya ekaphalampi anavasesetvaa pupphakaale ka.laayamattakaalato pa.t.thaaya khaadaapeti ceva  paataapeti ca. eva.m santepi asiitivaanarasahassehi adi.t.tha.m kipillikapu.tapa.ticchanna.m eka.m pakkaphala.m  nadiya.m patitvaa uddha~nca adho ca jaala.m bandhaapetvaa udakakii.la.m kii.lantassa baaraa.nasira~n~no uddha.mjaale  laggi. ra~n~no divasa.m kii.litvaa saaya.m gamanasamaye keva.t.taa jaala.m ukkhipantaa ta.m disvaa  ``asukaphala.m naamaa''ti ajaanantaa ra~n~no dassesu.m.

[03] raajaa ``ki.mphala.m naameta''nti pucchi. ``na jaanaama, devaa''ti. ``ke  jaanissantii''ti? ``vanacarakaa, devaa''ti. so vanacarake pakkosaapetvaa tesa.m santikaa  ``ambapakka''nti sutvaa churikaaya chinditvaa pa.thama.m vanacarake khaadaapetvaa pacchaa attanaapi khaadi,  itthaagaarassaapi ^a^P3.0371^ea^ amaccaanampi daapesi. ra~n~no ambapakkaraso sakalasariira.m  pharitvaa a.t.thaasi. so rasata.nhaaya bajjhitvaa tassa rukkhassa .thita.t.thaana.m vanacarake pucchitvaa tehi  ``himavantapadese nadiitiire''ti vutte bahuu naavaasa"nghaa.te bandhaapetvaa vanacarakehi desitamaggena  uddha.msota.m agamaasi. ``ettakaani divasaanii''ti paricchedo na kathito, anupubbena pana ta.m .thaana.m  patvaa ``eso deva, rukkho''ti vanacarakaa ra~n~no aacikkhi.msu. raajaa naava.m .thapetvaa  mahaajanaparivuto padasaa tattha gantvaa rukkhamuule sayana.m pa~n~napaapetvaa ambapakkaani khaaditvaa  naanaggarasabhojana.m bhu~njitvaa nipajji, sabbadisaasu aarakkha.m .thapetvaa aggi.m kari.msu.

[03] mahaasatto manussesu nidda.m okkantesu a.d.dharattasamaye parisaaya saddhi.m agamaasi.  asiitisahassavaanaraa saakhaaya saakha.m carantaa ambaani khaadanti. raajaa pabujjhitvaa kapiga.na.m  disvaa manusse u.t.thaapetvaa dhanuggahe pakkosaapetvaa ``yathaa ete phalakhaadakaa vaanaraa na palaayanti,  tathaa te parikkhipitvaa vijjhatha, sve ambaani ceva vaanarama.msa~nca khaadissaamii''ti aaha.  dhanuggahaa ``saadhuu''ti sampa.ticchitvaa rukkha.m parivaaretvaa sare sannayhitvaa a.t.tha.msu. te disvaa  vaanaraa mara.nabhayabhiitaa palaayitu.m asakkontaa mahaasatta.m upasa"nkamitvaa ``deva, `palaayanamakka.te  vijjhissaamaa'ti rukkha.m parivaaretvaa dhanuggahaa .thitaa, ki.m karomaa''ti pucchitvaa kampamaanaa a.t.tha.msu.  bodhisatto ``maa bhaayittha, aha.m vo jiivita.m dassaamii''ti vaanaraga.na.m ^a^V3.0329^ea^  samassaasetvaa ujuka.m uggatasaakha.m aaruyha ga"ngaabhimukha.m ^a^M3.0351^ea^ gatasaakha.m gantvaa tassaa  pariyantato pakkhanditvaa dhanusatamatta.m .thaana.m atikkamma ga"ngaatiire ekasmi.m gumbamatthake patitvaa tato  oruyha ``mamaagata.t.thaana.m ettaka.m bhavissatii''ti aakaasa.m paricchinditvaa ^a^P3.0372^ea^ eka.m  vettalata.m muule chinditvaa sodhetvaa ``ettaka.m .thaana.m rukkhe bajjhissati, ettaka.m aakaasa.t.tha.m  bhavissatii''ti imaani dve .thaanaani vavatthapetvaa attano ka.tiya.m bandhana.t.thaana.m na sallakkhesi.

[03] so ta.m lata.m aadaaya eka.m ko.ti.m ga"ngaatiire pati.t.thitarukkhe bandhitvaa eka.m attano ka.tiya.m  bandhitvaa vaatacchinnavalaahako viya vegena dhanusatamatta.m .thaana.m la"nghitvaa ka.tiya.m bandhana.t.thaanassa  asallakkhitattaa rukkha.m paapu.nitu.m asakkonto ubhohi hatthehi ambasaakha.m da.lha.m ga.nhitvaa  vaanaraga.nassa sa~n~namadaasi ``siigha.m mama pi.t.thi.m maddamaanaa vettalataaya sotthigamana.m gacchathaa''ti.  asiitisahassavaanaraa mahaasatta.m vanditvaa khamaapetvaa tathaa agama.msu. tadaa devadattopi makka.to hutvaa  tesa.m abbhantare hoti. so ``aya.m me paccaamittassa pi.t.thi.m passitu.m kaalo''ti ucca.m saakha.m  aaruyha vega.m janetvaa tassa pi.t.thiya.m pati. mahaasattassa hadaya.m bhijji, balavavedanaa uppajji.  sopi ta.m vedanaappatta.m katvaa pakkaami. mahaasatto ekakova ahosi. raajaa aniddaayanto vaanarehi  ca mahaasattena ca katakiriya.m sabba.m disvaa ``aya.m tiracchaano hutvaa attano jiivita.m aga.netvaa  parisaaya sotthibhaavameva akaasii''ti cintento nipajji.

[03] so pabhaataaya rattiyaa mahaasattassa tussitvaa ``na yutta.m ima.m kapiraajaana.m naasetu.m, upaayena  na.m otaaretvaa pa.tijaggissaamii''ti antoga"ngaaya naavaasa"nghaa.ta.m .thapetvaa tattha a.t.taka.m bandhaapetvaa  sa.nika.m mahaasatta.m otaaraapetvaa pi.t.thiya.m kaasaavavattha.m pattharaapetvaa ga"ngodakena nhaapetvaa phaa.nitodaka.m  paayetvaa parisuddhasariira.m sahassapaakatelena abbha~njaapetvaa sayanapi.t.the e.lakacamma.m santharaapetvaa sa.nika.m  tattha nipajjaapetvaa attanaa niice aasane nisiiditvaa pa.thama.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``attaana.m ^a^P3.0373^ea^ sa"nkama.m katvaa, yo sotthi.m samataarayi.
[22] ki.m tva.m tesa.m kime tuyha.m, honti ete mahaakapii''ti..

[03] tassattho ^a^M3.0352^ea^ -- ambho mahaakapi, yo tva.m attaana.m sa"nkama.m katvaa tula.m  aaropetvaa jiivita.m pariccajitvaa ime vaanare sotthi.m samataarayi, khemena santaaresi; ki.m tva.m tesa.m  hosi, kime tuyha.m vaa ki.msu ete hontiiti?
[03] ta.m ^a^V3.0330^ea^ sutvaa bodhisatto raajaana.m ovadanto sesagaathaa abhaasi --
[21] ``raajaaha.m issaro tesa.m, yuuthassa parihaarako.
[22] tesa.m sokaparetaana.m, bhiitaana.m te arindama..
[21] ``ulla"nghayitvaa attaana.m, vissa.t.thadhanuno sata.m.
[22] tato aparapaadesu, da.lha.m bandha.m lataagu.na.m..
[21] ``chinnabbhamiva vaatena, nu.n.no rukkha.m upaagami.m.
[22] soha.m appabhava.m tattha, saakha.m hatthehi aggahi.m..
[21] ``ta.m ma.m viyaayata.m santa.m, saakhaaya ca lataaya ca.
[22] samanukkamantaa paadehi, sotthi.m saakhaamigaa gataa..
[21] ``ta.m ma.m na tapate bandho, mato me na tapessati.
[22] sukhamaaharita.m tesa.m, yesa.m rajjamakaarayi.m..
[21] ``esaa te upamaa raaja, ta.m su.nohi arindama.
[27] ra~n~naa ra.t.thassa yoggassa, balassa nigamassa ca.
[22] sabbesa.m sukhame.t.thabba.m, khattiyena pajaanataa''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^tesa^eb^nti tesa.m asiitisahassaana.m vaanaraana.m. ^b^bhiitaana.m te^eb^ti tava  vijjhanatthaaya aa.naapetvaa .thitassa bhiitaana.m. ^b^arindamaa^eb^ti raajaana.m aalapati. raajaa hi  coraadiina.m ariina.m damanato ``arindamo''ti vuccati. ^b^vissa.t.thadhanuno sata^eb^nti  anaaropitadhanusatappamaa.na.m .thaana.m attaana.m aakaase ulla"nghayitvaa vissajjetvaa tato imamhaa rukkhaa  la"nghayitvaa gata.t.thaanato. ^b^aparapaadesuu^eb^ti pacchaapaadesu. ida.m ka.tibhaaga.m sandhaaya vutta.m.  bodhisatto hi ka.tibhaage ta.m lataagu.na.m da.lha.m bandhitvaa pacchimapaadehi bhuumiya.m akkamitvaa  vissajjetvaa vaatavegena aakaasa.m pakkhandi. ^b^nu.n.no^eb^ ^a^M3.0353^ea^ ^b^rukkha.m  upaagami^eb^nti vaatacchinna.m abbhamiva attano ^a^P3.0374^ea^ vegajanitena vaatena nu.n.no.  yathaa vaatacchinnabbha.m vaatena, eva.m attano vegena nu.n.no hutvaa ima.m ambarukkha.m upaagami.m ^a^V3.0331^ea^.  ^b^appabhava^eb^nti so aha.m tattha aakaasappadese rukkha.m paapu.nitu.m appahonto tassa rukkhassa  saakha.m hatthehi aggahesinti attho.

[03] ^b^viyaayata^eb^nti rukkhasaakhaaya ca vettalataaya ca vii.naaya bhamaratanti viya vitata.m  aaka.d.dhitasariira.m. ^b^samanukkamantaa^eb^ti mayaa anu~n~naataa ma.m vanditvaa paadehi anukkamantaa  nirantarameva akkamantaa sotthi.m gataa. ^b^ta.m ma.m na tapate bandho^eb^ti ta.m ma.m naapi so valliyaa  bandho tapati, naapi idaani mara.na.m tapessati. ki.mkaara.naa? ^b^sukhamaaharita.m tesa^eb^nti yasmaa  yesa.m aha.m rajjamakaarayi.m, tesa.m mayaa sukhamaaharita.m. ete hi ``mahaaraaja, aya.m no uppanna.m dukkha.m  haritvaa sukha.m aaharissatii''ti ma.m raajaana.m aka.msu. ahampi ``tumhaaka.m uppanna.m dukkha.m  harissaami''cceva etesa.m raajaa jaato. ta.m ajja mayaa etesa.m mara.nadukkha.m haritvaa jiivitasukha.m  aaha.ta.m, tena ma.m naapi bandho tapati, na mara.navadho tapessati.

[03] ^b^esaa te upamaa^eb^ti esaa te mahaaraaja, mayaa katakiriyaaya upamaa. ^b^ta.m  su.nohii^eb^ti tasmaa imaaya upamaaya sa.msandetvaa attano diyyamaana.m ovaada.m su.naahi. ^b^ra~n~naa  ra.t.thassaa^eb^ti mahaaraaja, ra~n~naa naama ucchuyante ucchu.m viya ra.t.tha.m apii.letvaa catubbidha.m agatigamana.m  pahaaya catuuhi sa"ngahavatthuuhi sa"nga.nhantena dasasu raajadhammesu pati.t.thaaya mayaa viya attano jiivita.m  pariccajitvaa ``kintime ra.t.thavaasino vigatabhayaa gimhakaale viva.tadvaare ~naatiihi ca parivaarakehi  ca parivaaritaa ure putte naccentaa siitena vaatena biijiyamaanaa yathaaruci attano attano santaka.m  paribhu~njantaa kaayikacetasikasukhasama"ngino bhaveyyu''nti sakalara.t.thassa ca rathasaka.taadiyuttavaahanassa  ^b^yoggassa^eb^ ca pattisa"nkhaatassa ^b^balassa^eb^ ca nigamajanapadasa"nkhaatassa ^b^nigamassa^eb^ ca  sabbesa.m sukhameva esitabba.m gavesitabbanti attho. ^b^khattiyena pajaanataa^eb^ti khettaana.m  adhipatibhaavena ``khattiyo''ti laddhanaamena pana etena avasesasatte atikkamma pajaanataa  ~naa.nasampannena bhavitabbanti.

[03] eva.m ^a^M3.0354^ea^ mahaasatto raajaana.m ovadanto anusaasantova kaalamakaasi. raajaa  amacce pakkosaapetvaa ``imassa kapiraajassa raajuuna.m viya sariirakicca.m karothaa''ti vatvaa  itthaagaarampi aa.naapesi ``tumhe rattavatthanivatthaa viki.n.nakesaa da.n.dadiipikahatthaa kapiraajaana.m  parivaaretvaa aa.laahana.m gacchathaa''ti. amaccaa ^a^P3.0375^ea^ daaruuna.m saka.tasatamattena citaka.m  karitvaa raajuuna.m kara.naniyaameneva mahaasattassa sariirakicca.m katvaa siisakapaala.m gahetvaa ra~n~no  santika.m agama.msu. raajaa mahaasattassa aa.laahane cetiya.m kaaretvaa diipe jaalaapetvaa gandhamaalaadiihi  puujetvaa ^a^V3.0332^ea^ siisakapaala.m suva.n.nakhacita.m kaaretvaa kuntagge .thapetvaa purato katvaa  gandhamaalaadiihi puujento baaraa.nasi.m gantvaa antoraajadvaare .thapetvaa sakalanagara.m sajjaapetvaa sattaaha.m  dhaatupuuja.m kaaresi. atha na.m dhaatu.m gahetvaa cetiya.m kaaretvaa yaavajiiva.m gandhamaalaadiihi puujetvaa  bodhisattassa ovaade pati.t.thaaya daanaadiini pu~n~naani karonto dhammena rajja.m kaaretvaa saggaparaaya.no  ahosi.

[03] satthaa ima.m dhammadesana.m aaharitvaa saccaani pakaasetvaa jaataka.m samodhaanesi -- ``tadaa  raajaa aanando ahosi, du.t.thakapi devadatto, parisaa buddhaparisaa, kapiraajaa pana ahameva  ahosi''nti.
[06] mahaakapijaatakava.n.nanaa dutiyaa.

[03] ^b^ambaahamadda.m vanamantarasmi^eb^nti ida.m satthaa jetavane viharanto kilesaniggaha.m aarabbha  kathesi. vatthu ^b^paaniiyajaatake^eb^ (jaa0 1.11.59 aadayo) aavi bhavissati. tadaa pana  saavatthiya.m pa~ncasataa sahaayakaa pabbajitvaa antoko.tisanthaare vasamaanaa a.d.dharattasamaye kaamavitakka.m  vitakkayi.msu. satthaa attano saavake rattiyaa tayo vaare, divasassa tayo vaareti rattindiva.m cha  vaare olokento kikii a.n.da.m viya, camarii vaaladhi.m viya, maataa piyaputta.m viya, ekacakkhuko  puriso cakkhu.m viya rakkhati, tasmi.m tasmi.myeva kha.ne uppannakilesa.m nigga.nhaati. so ta.m divasa.m  a.d.dharattasamaye jetavana.m ^a^M3.0355^ea^ parigga.nhanto tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m vitakkasamudaacaara.m ~natvaa  ``imesa.m bhikkhuuna.m abbhantare aya.m kileso va.d.dhanto arahattassa hetu.m bhindissati, idaaneva nesa.m  kilesa.m nigga.nhitvaa arahatta.m dassaamii''ti gandhaku.tito nikkhamitvaa aanandatthera.m pakkosaapetvaa  ``aananda, antoko.tisanthaare ^a^P3.0376^ea^ vasanakabhikkhuu sabbe sannipaatehii''ti  sannipaataapetvaa pa~n~nattavarabuddhaasane nisiiditvaa ``na, bhikkhave, antopavattakilesaana.m vase vattitu.m  va.t.tati, kileso hi va.d.dhamaano paccaamitto viya mahaavinaasa.m paapeti, bhikkhunaa naama  appamattakampi kilesa.m nigga.nhitu.m va.t.tati, poraa.nakapa.n.ditaa appamattaka.m aaramma.na.m disvaa abbhantare  pavattakilesa.m nigga.nhitvaa paccekabodhi~naa.na.m nibbattesu''nti vatvaa atiita.m aahari.

[03] atiite baaraa.nasiya.m brahmadatte rajja.m kaarente bodhisatto baaraa.nasinagarassa dvaaragaame  kumbhakaarakule ^a^V3.0333^ea^ nibbattitvaa vayappatto ku.tumba.m sa.n.thapetvaa eka.m putta~nca dhiitara~nca  labhitvaa kumbhakaarakamma.m nissaaya puttadaara.m posesi. tadaa kali"ngara.t.the dantapuranagare kara.n.dako  naama raajaa mahantena parivaarena uyyaana.m gacchanto uyyaanadvaare phalabhaarabharita.m madhuraphala.m ambarukkha.m  disvaa hatthikkhandhavaragatoyeva hattha.m pasaaretvaa eka.m ambapi.n.da.m gahetvaa uyyaana.m pavisitvaa  ma"ngalasilaaya nisinno daatabbayuttakaana.m datvaa amba.m paribhu~nji. ``ra~n~naa gahitakaalato pa.t.thaaya  sesehi naama gahetabbamevaa''ti amaccaapi braahma.nagahapatikaadayopi ambaani paatetvaa khaadi.msu.  pacchaa aagataa rukkha.m aaruyha muggarehi pothetvaa obhaggavibhaggasaakha.m katvaa aamakaphalampi  asesetvaa khaadi.msu.

[03] raajaa divasa.m uyyaane kii.litvaa saayanhasamaye ala"nkatahatthikkhandhavare nisiiditvaa gacchanto  ta.m rukkha.m disvaa hatthito otaritvaa rukkhamuula.m gantvaa rukkha.m oloketvaa ``aya.m paatova  passantaana.m atittikaro phalabhaarabharito sobhamaano a.t.thaasi, idaani gahitaphalo obhaggavibhaggo  asobhamaano .thito''ti cintetvaa puna a~n~nato olokento apara.m nipphala.m ambarukkha.m disvaa  ``esa rukkho attano nipphalabhaavena mu.n.dama.nipabbato viya sobhamaano .thito, aya.m ^a^M3.0356^ea^  pana saphalabhaavena ima.m byasana.m ^a^P3.0377^ea^ patto, ida.m agaaramajjhampi  phalitarukkhasadisa.m, pabbajjaa nipphalarukkhasadisaa, sadhanasseva bhaya.m atthi, niddhanassa bhaya.m  natthi, mayaapi nipphalarukkhena viya bhavitabba''nti phalarukkha.m aaramma.na.m katvaa rukkhamuule  .thitakova tii.ni lakkha.naani sallakkhetvaa vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa paccekabodhi~naa.na.m nibbattetvaa  ``viddha.msitaa daani me maatukucchiku.tikaa, chinnaa tiisu bhavesu pa.tisandhi, sodhitaa  sa.msaaraukkaarabhuumi, sosito mayaa assusamuddo, bhinno a.t.thipaakaaro, natthi me puna pa.tisandhii''ti  aavajjento sabbaala"nkaarapa.tima.n.ditova a.t.thaasi.

[03] atha na.m amaccaa aaha.msu ``atibahu.m .thitattha, mahaaraajaa''ti. ``na maya.m mahaaraajaano,  paccekabuddhaa naama maya''nti. ``paccekabuddhaa naama tumhaadisaa na honti, devaa''ti. ``atha  kiidisaa hontii''ti? ``oropitakesamassukaasaavavatthapa.ticchannaa kule vaa ga.ne vaa alaggaa  vaatacchinnavalaahakaraahumuttacandama.n.dalapa.tibhaagaa himavante nandamuulakapabbhaare vasanti, evaruupaa deva,  paccekabuddhaa''ti. tasmi.m kha.ne raajaa hattha.m ukkhipitvaa siisa.m paraamasi, taavadevassa gihili"nga.m  antaradhaayi, sama.nali"nga.m paaturahosi.
[21] ``ticiivara~nca ^a^V3.0334^ea^ patto ca, vaasi suuci ca bandhana.m.
[22] parissaavanena a.t.thete, yuttayogassa bhikkhuno''ti.. --
[25] eva.m vuttaa sama.naparikkhaaraa kaayapa.tibaddhaava ahesu.m. so aakaase .thatvaa mahaajanassa  ovaada.m datvaa anilapathena uttarahimavante nandamuulakapabbhaarameva agamaasi.
