[03] athekadivasa.m janapadamanussa.m setamattikaaya nhaapetvaa gehe nisiidaapetvaa a~n~nepissa katipaye  parivaaramanusse aa.naapetvaa thokathoka.m paanabhojana.m daapesi. te khaadantaa bhu~njantaa nisiidi.msu.  gehadvaare ca cakkesu go.ne bandhaapetvaa eka.m saka.tampi .thapaapesi, saya.m pana pi.t.thigabbhe nisiiditvaa puuve  paci. mahallako aagantvaa dvaare a.t.thaasi. ta.m disvaa eko mahallakapuriso ``ayye, eko thero  dvaare .thito''ti aaha. ``vanditvaa aticchaapehii''ti. so ``aticchatha, bhante''ti punappuna.m  kathetvaapi ta.m agacchanta.m disvaa ``ayye, thero na gacchatii''ti aaha. saa aagantvaa saa.ni.m  ukkhipitvaa oloketvaa ``ambho aya.m mama daarakapitaa''ti vatvaa nikkhamitvaa patta.m gahetvaa geha.m  pavesetvaa parivisitvaa bhojanapariyosaane vanditvaa ``bhante, tumhe idheva parinibbaayatha, maya.m  ettaka.m kaala.m a~n~na.m kula.m na ga.nhimha, asaamike pana ghare gharaavaaso na sa.n.thaati, maya.m a~n~na.m kula.m  ga.nhaama, duura.m janapada.m ^a^V3.0408^ea^ gacchissaama, tumhe appamattaa hotha, sace me doso atthi,  khamathaa''ti aaha. mahallakassa hadayaphaalanakaalo viya ahosi. atha na.m ``aha.m ^a^M3.0439^ea^  ta.m jahitu.m na sakkomi, maa gaccha, vibbhamissaami, asuka.t.thaane me saa.taka.m pesehi,  pattaciivara.m pa.ticchaapetvaa aagacchissaamii''ti aaha. saa ``saadhuu''ti sampa.ticchi. mahallako  vihaara.m gantvaa aacariyupajjhaaye pattaciivara.m pa.ticchaapento ``kasmaa, aavuso, eva.m karosii''ti  vutto ``puraa.nadutiyika.m jahitu.m na sakkomi vibbhamissaamii''ti aaha. atha na.m te  anicchanta~n~neva satthu santika.m netvaa ``ki.m, bhikkhave, ima.m anicchanta~n~neva aanayitthaa''ti vutte  ``bhante, aya.m ukka.n.thitvaa vibbhamitukaamo''ti vadi.msu. atha na.m satthaa ``sacca.m kira tva.m  bhikkhu ukka.n.thitosii''ti pucchi. ``sacca.m, bhante''ti. ``ko ta.m ukka.n.thaapesii''ti?  ``puraa.nadutiyikaa bhante''ti vutte ``bhikkhu na idaaneva saa itthii tuyha.m anatthakaarikaa, pubbepi  tva.m ta.m nissaaya catuuhi jhaanehi parihiino mahaadukkha.m patvaa ma.m nissaaya tamhaa dukkhaa muccitvaa  na.t.thajjhaana.m pa.tilabhii''ti vatvaa atiita.m aahari.

[03] atiite ^a^P3.0463^ea^ baaraa.nasiya.m brahmadatte rajja.m kaarente bodhisatto tassa purohita.m  pa.ticca tassa braahma.niyaa kucchimhi nibbatti. jaatadivase cassa sakalanagare aavudhaani  pajjali.msu, tenassa ``jotipaalakumaaro''ti naama.m kari.msu. so vayappatto takkasilaaya.m  sabbasippaani ugga.nhitvaa ra~n~no sippa.m dassetvaa issariya.m pahaaya ka~nci ajaanaapetvaa aggadvaarena  nikkhamitvaa ara~n~na.m pavisitvaa sakkadattiye kavi.t.thakaassame isipabbajja.m pabbajitvaa  jhaanaabhi~n~naayo nibbattesi. ta.m tattha vasanta.m anekaani isisataani parivaaresu.m, mahaasamaagamo  ahosi. so sarabha"ngasatthaa naama ahosi, tassa satta antevaasikaje.t.thakaa ahesu.m. tesu  saalissaro naama isi kavi.t.thakaassamaa nikkhamitvaa sura.t.thajanapade puratthimajanapade saatodikaaya  naama nadiyaa tiire anekasahassaisiparivaaro vasi. me.n.dissaro naama isi  pajjotakapa~ncaalara~n~no vijite kalabbacuu.laka.m naama nigama.m nissaaya anekasahassaisiparivaaro vasi.  pabbato naama isi eka.m a.tavijanapada.m nissaaya anekasahassaisiparivaaro vasi. kaa.ladevilo  naama isi avantidakkhi.naapathe ekagghanasela.m nissaaya anekasahassaisiparivaaro vasi.  kisavaccho naama isi ekakova da.n.dakira~n~no kumbhavatiinagara.m nissaaya uyyaane vasi.  anupiyataapaso pana bodhisattassa upa.t.thaako tassa santike ^a^M3.0440^ea^ vasi. naarado  naama isi kaa.ladevilassa kani.t.tho majjhimadese aara~njaragirimhi pabbatajaalantare ekakova ekasmi.m  guhaale.ne vasi.

[03] aara~njaragirino naama aviduure eko aaki.n.namanusso nigamo atthi, tesa.m antare mahatii  ^a^V3.0409^ea^ nadii atthi, ta.m nadi.m bahuu manussaa otaranti. uttamaruupadharaa va.n.nadaasiyopi  purise palobhayamaanaa tassaa nadiyaa tiire nisiidanti. naaradataapaso taasu eka.m disvaa  pa.tibaddhacitto hutvaa jhaana.m antaradhaapetvaa niraahaaro parisussanto ^a^P3.0464^ea^ kilesavasa.m  gantvaa sattaaha.m vasitvaa nipajji. athassa bhaataa kaa.ladevilo aavajjento ta.m kaara.na.m ~natvaa  aakaasenaagantvaa le.na.m paavisi. naarado ta.m disvaa ``kasmaa bhava.m aagatosii''ti aaha. ``bhava.m  `akallako'ti bhavanta.m pa.tijaggitu.m aagatomhii''ti. atha na.m so ``abhuuta.m katha.m kathesi, alika.m  tuccha.m kathesii''ti musaavaadena nigga.nhi. so ``neta.m pahaatu.m va.t.tatii''ti saalissara.m aanesi,  me.n.dissara.m aanesi, pabbatampi aanesi. itaropi te tayo musaavaadena nigga.nhi. kaa.ladevilo  ``sarabha"ngasatthaara.m aanessaamii''ti aakaasenaagantvaa ta.m aanesi. so aagantvaa ta.m disvaa  ``indriyavasa.m gato''ti ~natvaa ``kacci naarada, indriyaana.m vasa.m gato''ti pucchi. itarena ta.m  sutvaava u.t.thaaya vanditvaa ``aama, aacariyaa''ti vutte ``naarada, indriyavasa.m gataa naama imasmi.m  attabhaave sussantaa dukkha.m anubhavitvaa dutiye attabhaave niraye nibbattantii''ti vatvaa pa.thama.m  gaathamaaha --
[21] ``yo indriyaana.m kaamena, vasa.m naarada gacchati.
[22] so pariccajjubho loke, jiivantova visussatii''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^yo indriyaana^eb^nti naarada, yo puriso ruupaadiisu subhaakaara.m gahetvaa  kilesakaamavasena channa.m indriyaana.m vasa.m gacchati. ^b^pariccajjubho loke^eb^ti so manussaloka~nca  devaloka~ncaati ubholoke pariccajitvaa nirayaadiisu nibbattantiiti attho. ^b^jiivantova  visussatii^eb^ti jiivantoyeva attanaa icchita.m kilesavatthu.m alabhanto sokena visussati, mahaadukkha.m  paapu.naatiiti.
[03] ta.m sutvaa naarado ``aacariya, kaamasevana.m naama sukha.m, evaruupa.m sukha.m ki.m sandhaaya  dukkhanti vadasii''ti pucchi. athassa sarabha"ngo ``tena hi su.naahii''ti dutiya.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``sukhassaanantara.m ^a^M3.0441^ea^ dukkha.m, dukkhassaanantara.m sukha.m.
[22] sosi patto sukhaa dukkha.m, paa.tika"nkha vara.m sukha''nti..

[03] tattha ^a^P3.0465^ea^ ^b^sukhassaanantara^eb^nti kaamasukhassa anantara.m nirayadukkha.m.  ^b^dukkhassaa^eb^ti siilarakkha.nadukkhassa ^a^V3.0410^ea^ anantara.m dibbamaanusakasukha~nceva  nibbaanasukha~nca. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- naarada, ime hi sattaa kaamasevanasamaye kaala.m katvaa  ekantadukkhe niraye nibbattanti, siila.m rakkhantaa vipassanaaya kamma.m karontaa ca pana kilamanti,  te dukkhena siila.m rakkhitvaa siilabalena vuttappakaara.m sukha.m labhanti, ida.m dukkha.m sandhaayaaha.m eva.m  vadaamiiti. ^b^sosi patto^eb^ti so tva.m naarada, idaani jhaanasukha.m naasetvaa tato sukhaa mahanta.m  kaamanissita.m cetasikadukkha.m patto. ^b^paa.tika"nkhaa^eb^ti ida.m kilesadukkha.m cha.d.detvaa puna tadeva  vara.m uttama.m jhaanasukha.m iccha patthehiiti.

[03] naarado ``ida.m aacariya, dukkha.m dussaha.m, na ta.m adhivaasetu.m sakkomii''ti aaha. atha na.m  mahaasatto ``naarada, dukkha.m naama uppanna.m adhivaasetabbamevaa''ti vatvaa tatiya.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``kicchakaale kicchasaho, yo kiccha.m naativattati.
[22] sa kicchanta.m sukha.m dhiiro, yoga.m samadhigacchatii''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^naativattatii^eb^ti naanuvattati, ayameva vaa paa.tho. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- naarada, yo  kaayikacetasikadukkhasa"nkhaatassa kicchassa uppannakaale appamatto tassa kicchassa hara.nuupaaya.m  karonto kicchasaho hutvaa ta.m kiccha.m naanuvattati, tassa vase avattitvaa tehi tehi upaayehi ta.m  kiccha.m abhibhavati vinaaseti, so dhiiro kicchassa antimasa"nkhaata.m niraamisasukhasa"nkhaata.m  jhaanasukha.m adhigacchati, ta.m vaa kicchanta.m yogasukha.m adhigacchati, akilamantova paapu.naatiiti.

[03] so ``aacariya, kaamasukha.m naama uttamasukha.m, na ta.m jahitu.m sakkomii''ti aaha. atha na.m  mahaasatto ``naarada, dhammo naama na kenaci kaara.nena naasetabbo''ti vatvaa catuttha.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``na ^a^P3.0466^ea^ heva kaamaana kaamaa, naanatthaa naatthakaara.naa.
[22] na kata~nca nira"nkatvaa, dhammaa cavitumarahasii''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^M3.0442^ea^ ^b^kaamaana kaamaa^eb^ti kaamaana.m kaamaa, vatthukaamaana.m patthanaayaati  attho. ^b^naanatthaa naatthakaara.naa^eb^ti na anatthato na atthakaara.naa. ^b^na kata~nca  nira"nkatvaa^eb^ti kata~nca nipphaadita.m jhaana.m ^a^V3.0411^ea^ nira.mkatvaa. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- naarada, na  heva vatthukaamapatthanaaya dhammaa cavitumarahasi, ekasmi.m anatthe uppanne ta.m pa.tihanitukaamo naanatthaa  na atthenapi kaara.nabhuutena dhammaa cavitumarahasi, ``asuko naama me attho uppajjissatii''ti  evampi atthakaara.naapi na dhammaa cavitumarahasi, kata.m pana nipphaadita.m jhaanasukha.m nira.mkatvaa  vinaasetvaa neva dhammaa cavitumarahasiisi.
[03] eva.m sarabha"ngena catuuhi gaathaahi dhamme desite kaa.ladevilo attano kani.t.tha.m ovadanto pa~ncama.m  gaathamaaha --
[21] ``dakkha.m gahapatii saadhu, sa.mvibhajja~nca bhojana.m.
[22] ahaaso atthalaabhesu, atthabyaapatti abyatho''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^dakkha.m gahapatii^eb^ti naarada gharaavaasa.m vasantaana.m gahapatiina.m bhoguppaadanatthaaya  analasyachekakusalabhaavasa"nkhaata.m dakkha.m naama saadhu, dakkhabhaavo bhaddako. ^b^sa.mvibhajja~nca  bhojana^eb^nti dukkhena uppaaditabhogaana.m dhammikasama.nabraahma.nehi saddhi.m sa.mvibhajitvaa paribhogakara.na.m  dutiya.m saadhu. ^b^ahaaso atthalaabhesuu^eb^ti mahante issariye uppanne appamaadavasena ahaaso  anuppilaavitatta.m tatiya.m saadhu. ^b^atthabyaapattii^eb^ti yadaa pana attano atthabyaapatti  yasavinaaso hoti, tadaa ^b^abyatho^eb^ akilamana.m catuttha.m saadhu, tasmaa tva.m, naarada, ``jhaana.m me  antarahita''nti maa soci, sace indriyaana.m vasa.m na gamissasi, na.t.thampi te jhaana.m puna  paakatikameva bhavissatiiti.
[03] ta.m puna kaa.ladevilena naaradassa ovaditabhaava.m ~natvaa satthaa abhisambuddho hutvaa cha.t.tha.m  gaathamaaha --
[21] ``ettaavateta.m pa.n.dicca.m, api so devilo bravi.
[22] na yito ki~nci paapiyo, yo indriyaana.m vasa.m vaje''ti..
[03] tassattho ^a^P3.0467^ea^ -- bhikkhave, ettaka.m eta.m pa.n.dicca.m soya.m devilo abravi.  yo pana kilesavasena indriyaana.m vasa.m vajati, ito a~n~no paapiyo natthiiti.

[03] atha ^a^V3.0412^ea^ ^a^M3.0443^ea^ na.m sarabha"ngo aamantetvaa ``naarada, ida.m taava su.na,  yo hi pa.thamameva kattabbayuttaka.m na karoti, so ara~n~na.m pavi.t.thamaa.navako viya socati  paridevatii''ti vatvaa atiita.m aahari.

[03] atiite ekasmi.m kaasinigame eko braahma.namaa.navo abhiruupo ahosi thaamasampanno naagabalo.  so cintesi -- ``ki.m me kasikammaadiini katvaa maataapituuhi pu.t.thehi, ki.m puttadaarena, ki.m  daanaadiihi pu~n~nehi katehi, ka~nci aposetvaa ki~nci pu~n~na.m akatvaa ara~n~na.m pavisitvaa mige  maaretvaa attaana.myeva posessaamii''ti? so pa~ncaavudhasannaddho himavanta.m gantvaa naanaamige vadhitvaa  khaadanto antohimavante vidhavaaya naama nadiyaa tiire giriparikkhitta.m mahanta.m pabbatajaala.m patvaa  tattha mige vadhitvaa a"ngaare pakkama.msa.m khaadanto vaasa.m kappesi. so cintesi ``aha.m sabbadaa  thaamasampanno na bhavissaami, dubbalakaale ara~n~ne caritu.m na sakkhissaami, idaaneva naanaava.n.ne  mige pabbatajaala.m pavesetvaa dvaara.m yojetvaa ara~n~na.m anaahi.n.dantova yathaaruciyaa mige vadhitvaa  khaadissaamii''ti tathaa akaasi. athassa kaale atikkante ta.m kamma.m matthakappatta.m di.t.thadhammavedaniiya.m  jaata.m, attano hatthapaadehi na labhi gantu.m, aparaapara.m parivattetu.m naasakkhi, neva ki~nci khaadaniiya.m  bhojaniiya.m, na paaniiya.m passi, sariira.m milaayi, manussapeto ahosi, gimhakaale pathavii viya  sariira.m bhijjitvaa raajiyo dassesi, so duruupo dussa.n.thito mahaadukkha.m anubhavi.

[03] eva.m addhaane gate sivira.t.the siviraajaa naama ``ara~n~ne a"ngaarapakkama.msa.m khaadissaamii''ti  amaccaana.m rajja.m niyyaadetvaa pa~ncaavudhasannaddho ara~n~na.m pavisitvaa mige vadhitvaa ma.msa.m khaadamaano  anupubbena ta.m padesa.m patvaa ta.m purisa.m disvaa bhiitopi sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa ``kosi tva.m ambho  purisaa''ti pucchi. ``saami, manussapeto aha.m, attano katakammassa phala.m anubhomi, tva.m pana  kosii''ti? ``siviraajaahamasmii''ti. ``atha kasmaa idhaagatosii''ti? ``migama.msa.m ^a^P3.0468^ea^  khaadanatthaayaa''ti. athassa so ``ahampi mahaaraaja, iminaava kaara.nena aagantvaa  manussapeto jaato''ti sabba.m vitthaarena kathetvaa attano dukkhitabhaava.m ra~n~no aacikkhanto  sesagaathaa aaha --
[21] ``amittaana.mva ^a^M3.0444^ea^ hatthattha.m, sivi pappoti maamiva.
[27] kamma.m vijja~nca dakkheyya.m, vivaaha.m siilamaddava.m.
[22] ete ca yase haapetvaa, nibbatto sehi kammehi..
[21] ``soha.m ^a^V3.0413^ea^ sahassajiinova, abandhu aparaaya.no.
[22] ariyadhammaa apakkanto, yathaa peto tathevaha.m..
[21] ``sukhakaame dukkhaapetvaa, aapannosmi pada.m ima.m.
[22] so sukha.m naadhigacchaami, .thito bhaa.numataamivaa''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^amittaana.mva hatthattha^eb^nti amittaana.m hatthe attha.m vinaasa.m viya. ^b^sivii^eb^ti  raajaana.m aalapati. ^b^pappoti maamivaa^eb^ti maadiso paapakammena paapu.naati, attanova kammena  vinaasa.m paapu.naatiiti vutta.m hoti. ^b^kamma^eb^nti kasikammaadibheda.m aajiivasaadhaka.m kicca.m.  ^b^vijja^eb^nti naanappakaaraka.m hatthisippaadika.m sippa.m. ^b^dakkheyya^eb^nti naanappakaarena  bhoguppaadanakosalla.m. ^b^vivaaha^eb^nti aavaahavivaahasambandha.m. ^b^siilamaddava^eb^nti  pa~ncavidhasiila~nceva muduvacana.m hitakaama.m paapanivaara.na.m kalyaa.namittata~nca. so hi idha maddavoti  adhippeto. ^b^ete ca yase haapetvaa^eb^ti ete ettake yasadaayake dhamme haapetvaa ca.  ^b^nibbatto sehi kammehii^eb^ti attano kammehi nibbatto. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- aha.m, mahaaraaja,  imasmi.m loke issariyadaayaka.m kattabbayuttaka.m kamma.m akatvaa sippa.m asikkhitvaa upaayena bhoge  anuppaadetvaa aavaahavivaaha.m akatvaa siila.m arakkhitvaa ma.m akicca.m karonta.m paapanivaara.nasamatthe  kalyaa.namitte abhajitvaa ime ettake yasadaayakattaa ``yase''ti sa"nkhya.m gate lokappavattidhamme  haapetvaa cha.d.detvaa ima.m ara~n~na.m pavisitvaa saya.m katehi paapakammehi idaani manussapeto hutvaa  nibbattosmiiti.

[03] ^b^sahassajiinovaa^eb^ti sahassajiinapuriso viyaati attho. svaaha.m sammaa pa.tipajjitvaa  bhoge uppaadeyya.m, tehi anekasahassehi bhogehi jitotipi attho. ^b^aparaaya.no^eb^ti asara.no,  nippati.t.thoti attho. ^b^ariyadhammaa^eb^ti sappurisadhammato. ^b^yathaa^eb^ ^a^P3.0469^ea^  ^b^peto^eb^ti yathaa mato peto hutvaa uppajjeyya, jiivamaanoyeva tathaa ^a^M3.0445^ea^ manussapeto  jaatosmiiti attho. ^b^sukhakaame dukkhaapetvaa^eb^ti sukhakaame satte dukkhaapetvaa.  ``sukhakaamo''tipi paa.tho, saya.m sukhakaamo para.m dukkhaapetvaati attho. ^b^aapannosmi pada.m  ima^eb^nti evaruupa.m ko.t.thaasa.m pattosmi. pathantipi paa.tho, ida.m dukkhassa pathabhuuta.m attabhaava.m  pattosmiiti attho. ^b^.thito bhaa.numataamivaa^eb^ti bhaa.numaa vuccati aggi, viitaccika"ngaarehi  samantaa pariki.n.no viya sariire u.t.thitena mahaadaahena dayhanto kaayikacetasikasukha.m na vindaamiiti  vadati.

[03] eva~nca pana vatvaa ``aha.m, mahaaraaja, sukhakaamo para.m dukkhaapetvaa di.t.theva dhamme manussapeto  ^a^V3.0414^ea^ jaato, tasmaa tva.m paapa.m maa kari, attano nagara.m gantvaa daanaadiini pu~n~naani  karohii''ti aaha. raajaa tathaa katvaa saggapura.m puuresi. sarabha"ngasatthaa ima.m kaara.na.m aaharitvaa  taapasa.m sa~n~naapesi. so tassa dhammakathaaya sa.mvega.m pa.tilabhitvaa ta.m vanditvaa khamaapetvaa  kasi.naparikamma.m katvaa na.t.tha.m jhaana.m pa.tipaakatika.m akaasi. sarabha"ngo tassa tattha vasitu.m adatvaa  ta.m aadaaya attano assama.m gato.
[03] satthaa ima.m dhammadesana.m aaharitvaa saccaani pakaasetvaa jaataka.m samodhaanesi, saccapariyosaane  ukka.n.thitabhikkhu sotaapattiphale pati.t.thahi.

[03] tadaa naarado ukka.n.thitabhikkhu ahosi, nagarasobhi.nii puraa.nadutiyikaa, saalissaro  saariputto, me.n.dissaro kassapo, pabbato anuruddho, kaa.ladevilo kaccaayano, anupiyo aanando,  kisavaccho mahaamoggallaano, sarabha"ngo pana ahameva ahosinti.
[06] indriyajaatakava.n.nanaa sattamaa.

[03] ^b^aadittasmi^eb^nti ida.m satthaa jetavane viharanto asadisadaana.m aarabbha kathesi.  asadisadaana.m ^b^mahaagovindasuttava.n.nanaato^eb^ (dii0 ni0 a.t.tha0 2.296) vitthaaretvaa kathetabba.m.  tassa pana dinnadivasato dutiyadivase dhammasabhaaya.m katha.m samu.t.thaapesu.m ``aavuso, kosalaraajaa  vicinitvaava ^a^P3.0470^ea^, pu~n~nakkhetta.m ~natvaa buddhappamukhassa ^a^M3.0446^ea^  ariyasa"nghassa asadisadaana.m adaasii''ti. satthaa aagantvaa ``kaaya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi  kathaaya sannisinnaa''ti pucchitvaa ``imaaya naamaa''ti vutte ``anacchariya.m, bhikkhave, ra~n~no  vicinitvaa anuttare pu~n~nakkhette daanapati.t.thaapana.m, poraa.nakapa.n.ditaapi vicinitvaava mahaadaana.m  ada.msuu''ti vatvaa atiita.m aahari.

[03] atiite sivira.t.the roruvanagare roruvamahaaraajaa naama dasa raajadhamme akopetvaa catuuhi  sa"ngahavatthuuhi jana.m sa"nga.nhanto mahaajanassa maataapitu.t.thaane .thatvaa kapa.naddhikavanibbakayaacakaadiina.m  mahaadaana.m pavattesi. tassa samuddavijayaa naama aggamahesii ahosi pa.n.ditaa ~naa.nasampannaa. so  ekadivasa.m daanagga.m olokento ``mayha.m daana.m dussiilaa lolasattaa bhu~njanti, ta.m ma.m na haaseti,  aha.m kho pana siilavantaana.m aggadakkhi.neyyaana.m paccekabuddhaana.m daatukaamo, te ca himavantapadese  ^a^V3.0415^ea^ vasanti, ko nu kho te nimantetvaa aanessati, ka.m pesessaamii''ti cintetvaa tamattha.m  deviyaa aarocesi. atha na.m saa aaha ``mahaaraaja, maa cintayittha, amhaaka.m daatabbadaanabalena  siilabalena saccabalena pupphaani pesetvaa paccekabuddhe nimantetvaa tesa.m aagatakaale  sabbaparikkhaarasampannadaana.m dassaamaa''ti. raajaa ``saadhuu''ti sampa.ticchitvaa  ``sakalanagaravaasino siila.m samaadiyantuu''ti nagare bheri.m caraapetvaa sayampi saparijano  uposatha"ngaani adhi.t.thaaya mahaadaana.m pavattetvaa sumanapupphapu.n.na.m suva.n.nasamugga.m gaahaapetvaa paasaadaa  oruyha raaja"nga.ne .thatvaa pa~nca"ngaani pathaviya.m pati.t.thaapetvaa paaciinadisaabhimukho vanditvaa  ``paaciinadisaaya arahante vandaami, sace amhaaka.m koci gu.no atthi, amhesu anukampa.m katvaa  amhaaka.m bhikkha.m ga.nhathaa''ti vatvaa satta pupphamu.t.thiyo khipi. paaciinadisaaya paccekabuddhaana.m  abhaavena punadivase naagami.msu. dutiyadivase dakkhi.nadisa.m namassi, tatopi naagataa.  tatiyadivase pacchimadisa.m ^a^P3.0471^ea^ namassi, tatopi naagataa. catutthadivase uttaradisa.m  namassi, namassitvaa ca pana ``uttarahimavantapadesavaasino paccekabuddhaa amhaaka.m bhikkha.m  ga.nhantuu''ti satta pupphamu.t.thiyo vissajjesi. pupphaani gantvaa nandamuulakapabbhaare pa~ncanna.m  paccekabuddhasataana.m upari pati.msu.

[03] te ^a^M3.0447^ea^ aavajjamaanaa ra~n~naa attano nimantitabhaava.m ~natvaa punadivase satta  paccekabuddhe aamantetvaa ``maarisaa, raajaa vo nimanteti, tassa sa"ngaha.m karothaa''ti vadi.msu. satta  paccekabuddhaa aakaasenaagantvaa raajadvaare otari.msu. te disvaa raajaa somanassajaato vanditvaa  paasaada.m aaropetvaa mahanta.m sakkaara.m katvaa daana.m datvaa bhattakiccapariyosaane punadivasatthaaya  punadivasatthaayaati eva.m cha divase nimantetvaa sattame divase sabbaparikkhaaradaana.m sajjetvaa  sattaratanakhacitaani ma~ncapii.thaadiini pa~n~napetvaa ticiivaraadike sabbasama.naparibhoge sattanna.m  paccekabuddhaana.m santike .thapetvaa ``maya.m ime parikkhaare tumhaaka.m demaa''ti vatvaa tesa.m  bhattakiccapariyosaane raajaa ca devii ca ubhopi namassamaanaa a.t.tha.msu. atha nesa.m anumodana.m  karonto sa"nghatthero dve gaathaa abhaasi --
[21] ``aadittasmi.m agaarasmi.m, ya.m niiharati bhaajana.m.
[22] ta.m tassa hoti atthaaya, no ca ya.m tattha .dayhati..
[21] ``evamaadiipito loko, jaraaya mara.nena ca.
[22] niiharetheva daanena, dinna.m hoti suniihata''nti..

[03] tattha ^a^V3.0416^ea^ ^b^aadittasmi^eb^nti ta"nkha.ne pajjalite. ^b^bhaajana^eb^nti upakara.na.m.  ^b^no ca ya.m tattha .dayhatii^eb^ti ya.m pana tattha .dayhati, antamaso ti.nasanthaaropi, sabba.m tassa  anupakara.nameva hoti. ^b^jaraaya mara.nena caa^eb^ti desanaasiisameta.m, atthato panesa ekaadasahi  aggiihi aadiipito naama. ^b^niiharethevaa^eb^ti ^a^P3.0472^ea^ tato ekaadasati aggiihi  pajjalitalokaa dasavidhadaanavatthubheda.m ta.m ta.m parikkhaaradaana.m cetanaaya nikka.d.dhetheva. ^b^dinna.m  hotii^eb^ti appa.m vaa bahu.m vaa ya.m dinna.m, tadeva suniihata.m naama hotiiti.

[03] eva.m sa"nghatthero anumodana.m katvaa ``appamatto hohi, mahaaraajaa''ti ra~n~no ovaada.m datvaa  aakaase uppatitvaa paasaadaka.n.nika.m dvidhaa katvaa gantvaa nandamuulakapabbhaareyeva otari. tassa  dinnaparikkhaaropi teneva saddhi.m uppatitvaa nandamuulakapabbhaareyeva otari. ra~n~no ca deviyaa ca  sakalasariira.m piitiyaa pu.n.na.m ahosi. eva.m tasmi.m gate avasesaapi --
[21] ``yo ^a^M3.0448^ea^ dhammaladdhassa dadaati daana.m, u.t.thaanaviiriyaadhigatassa jantu.
[22] atikkamma so vetara.ni.m yamassa, dibbaani .thaanaani upeti macco..
[21] ``daana~nca yuddha~nca samaanamaahu, appaapi santaa bahuke jinanti.
[22] appampi ce saddahaano dadaati, teneva so hoti sukhii parattha..
[21] ``viceyya daana.m sugatappasattha.m, ye dakkhi.neyyaa idha jiivaloke.
[22] etesu dinnaani mahapphalaani, biijaani vuttaani yathaa sukhette..
[21] ``yo paa.nabhuutaani ahe.thaya.m cara.m, paruupavaadaa na karoti paapa.m.
[22] bhiiru.m pasa.msanti na tattha suura.m, bhayaa hi santo na karonti paapa.m..
[21] ``hiinena brahmacariyena, khattiye upapajjati.
[22] majjhimena ca devatta.m, uttamena visujjhati..
[21] ``addhaa hi daana.m bahudhaa pasattha.m, daanaa ca kho dhammapada.mva seyyo.
[22] pubbeva ^a^P3.0473^ea^ hi pubbatareva santo, nibbaanamevajjhagamu.m sapa~n~naa''ti..  --
[25] evamekekaaya gaathaaya anumodana.m katvaa tatheva agami.msu saddhi.m parikkhaarehi.

[03] tattha ^a^V3.0417^ea^ ^b^dhammaladdhassaa^eb^ti khii.naasava.m aadi.m katvaa yaava  sukkhavipassakayogaavacaro puggalo dhammassa laddhattaa dhammaladdho naama. sveva u.t.thaanaviiriyena  tassa dhammassa adhigatattaa u.t.thaanaviiriyaadhigato naama. tassa puggalassa yo jantu dadaati  daananti attho, dhammena laddhassa u.t.thaanasa"nkhaatena viiriyena ^a^M3.0449^ea^ adhigatassa  deyyadhammassa agga.m gahetvaa yo jantu siilavantesu daana.m dadaatiitipi attho. upayogatthe vaa  saamivacana.m katvaapettha attho veditabbo. ^b^vetara.ni^eb^nti desanaasiisameta.m, a.t.tha mahaaniraye  so.lasa ca ussade atikkamitvaati attho. ^b^dibbaani .thaanaani upetii^eb^ti devaloke uppajjati.

[03] ^b^samaanamaahuu^eb^ti sadisa.m vadanti. khayabhiirukassa hi daana.m natthi, bhayabhiirukassa yuddha.m  natthi. jiivite aalaya.m vijahitvaa yujjantova yujjhitu.m sakkoti, bhogesu aalaya.m vijahitvaa  daayako daatu.m sakkoti, teneva ta.m ubhaya.m ``samaana''nti vadanti. ^b^appaapi santaa^eb^ti thokaapi  samaanaa pariccattajiivitaa bahuke jinanti, evameva appaapi mu~ncacetanaa bahumpi maccheracitta.m  lobhaadi.m vaa kilesagahana.m jinaati. ^b^appampi ce^eb^ti thokampi ce deyyadhamma.m kamma~nca  phala~nca saddahanto deti. ^b^teneva so^eb^ti tena parittadeyyadhammavatthukena parittakenaapi caagena  so parattha sukhii hoti, mahaaraajaati.

[03] ^b^viceyya daana^eb^nti dakkhi.na~nca dakkhi.neyya~nca vicinitvaa dinnadaana.m. tattha ya.m vaa  ta.m vaa adatvaa agga.m pa.niita.m deyyadhamma.m vicinitvaa dadanto dakkhi.na.m vicinaati naama, yesa.m tesa.m  vaa adatvaa siilaadigu.nasampanne vicinitvaa tesa.m dadanto dakkhi.neyya.m vicinaati naama.  ^b^sugatappasattha^eb^nti evaruupa.m daana.m buddhehi pasattha.m. tattha dakkhi.neyyavicinana.m dassetu.m  ^b^``ye dakkhi.neyyaa''^eb^tiaadi vutta.m. tattha ^b^dakkhi.neyyaa^eb^ti dakkhi.naaya anucchavikaa  buddhaadayo.

[03] ^b^paa.nabhuutaanii^eb^ti paa.nasa"nkhaataani bhuutaani. ^b^ahe.thaya.m cara^eb^nti kaaru~n~nena  avihe.thayanto caramaano. ^b^paruupavaadaa^eb^ti paruupavaadabhayena paapa.m na karoti. ^b^bhiiru^eb^nti  upavaadabhiiruka.m. ^b^na tattha suura^eb^nti yo pana ayonisomanasikaarena tasmi.m upavaade suuro  hoti, ta.m pa.n.ditaa nappasa.msanti. ^b^bhayaa hii^eb^ti upavaadabhayena hi pa.n.ditaa paapa.m na karonti.

[03] ^b^hiinena brahmacariyenaa^eb^ti baahiratitthaayatane taava methunaviratisiilamattaka.m ^a^P3.0474^ea^  hiina.m brahmacariya.m naama, tena khattiyakule uppajjati. jhaanassa upacaaramatta.m majjhima.m,  tena devaloke uppajjati. a.t.tha samaapattiyo uttama.m, tena ^a^M3.0450^ea^ brahmaloke uppajjanto  visujjhati naama. saasane pana ^a^V3.0418^ea^ siilavantasseva eka.m devanikaaya.m pa.nidhaaya brahmacariya.m  hiina.m naama, parisuddhasiilasseva samaapattinibbattana.m majjhima.m naama, parisuddhasiile .thatvaa vipassana.m  va.d.dhetvaa arahattuppatti uttama.m naama.

[03] osaanagaathaaya ayamattho -- mahaaraaja, ki~ncaapi eka.mseneva daana.m bahudhaa pasattha.m va.n.nita.m,  daanato pana samathavipassanaasa"nkhaata.m nibbaanasa"nkhaata~nca dhammako.t.thaasabhuuta.m dhammapadameva uttaritara.m.  ki.mkaara.naa? pubbeva hi imasmi.m kappe kassapadasabalaadayo pubbatareva vessabhuudasabalaadayo santo  sappurisaa sapa~n~naa samathavipassana.m bhaavetvaa nibbaanameva ajjhagamu.m adhigataati.

[03] eva.m satta paccekabuddhaa anumodanaaya ra~n~no amatamahaanibbaana.m va.n.netvaa raajaana.m appamaadena  ovaditvaa vuttanayeneva attano vasana.t.thaanameva gataa. raajaapi saddhi.m aggamahesiyaa daana.m datvaa  yaavajiiva.m .thatvaa tato cavitvaa saggapura.m puuresi.

[03] satthaa ima.m dhammadesana.m aaharitvaa ``eva.m pubbepi pa.n.ditaa viceyya daana.m ada.msuu''ti vatvaa  jaataka.m samodhaanesi -- ``tadaa paccekabuddhaa parinibbaayi.msu, samuddavijayaa raahulamaataa ahosi,  roruvamahaaraajaa pana ahameva ahosi''nti.
[06] aadittajaatakava.n.nanaa a.t.thamaa.

[03] ^b^ga"ngaa kumudinii^eb^ti ida.m satthaa jetavane viharanto eka.m ukka.n.thitabhikkhu.m aarabbha  kathesi. ta~nhi bhikkhu.m satthaa ``sacca.m kira tva.m bhikkhu ukka.n.thitosii''ti pucchitvaa ``sacca.m,  bhante''ti vutte ``ki.mkaara.naa''ti vatvaa ``kilesavasenaa''ti vutte ``bhikkhu maatugaamo naama  akata~n~nuu mittadubbhii avissaasaniiyo. atiite pa.n.ditaa devasika.m sahassa.m dentaapi maatugaama.m  tosetu.m naasakkhi.msu. saa ekadivasamatta.m sahassa.m alabhitvaava ^a^M3.0451^ea^ te giivaaya.m  gaahaapetvaa niiharaapesi ^a^P3.0475^ea^, eva.m akata~n~nuu maatugaamo, maa tassa kaara.naa  kilesavasa.m gacchaa''ti vatvaa atiita.m aahari.

[03] atiite ^a^V3.0419^ea^ baaraa.nasiya.m brahmadatte rajja.m kaarente tassa ca putto brahmadattakumaaro,  baaraa.nasise.t.thino ca putto mahaadhanakumaaro naama. te ubhopi sahapa.msukii.lakaa sahaayakaa ahesu.m,  ekaacariyakuleyeva sippa.m ga.nhi.msu. raajakumaaro pitu accayena rajje pati.t.thaasi, se.t.thiputtopissa  santikeyeva ahosi. baaraa.nasiya~nca ekaa nagarasobhi.nii va.n.nadaasii abhiruupaa ahosi  sobhaggappattaa. se.t.thiputto devasika.m sahassa.m datvaa niccakaale taayeva saddhi.m abhiramanto pitu  accayena se.t.thi.t.thaana.m labhitvaapi na ta.m vijahi, tatheva devasika.m sahassa.m datvaa abhirami. se.t.thiputto  divasassa tayo vaare raajupa.t.thaana.m gacchati. athassa ekadivasa.m raajupa.t.thaana.m gatassa ra~n~naa saddhi.m  samullapantasseva suuriyo attha"ngami, andhakaara.m jaata.m. so raajakulaa nikkhamitvaa ``idaani geha.m  gantvaa aagamanavelaa natthi, nagarasobhi.niyaayeva geha.m gamissaamii''ti upa.t.thaake uyyojetvaa ekakova  tassaa geha.m paavisi. atha na.m saa disvaa ``ayyaputta, sahassa.m aabhata''nti aaha. ``bhadde,  aha.m ajjeva ativikaalo jaato, tasmaa geha.m agantvaa manusse uyyojetvaa ekakova pavi.t.thosmi,  sve pana te dve sahassaani dassaamii''ti.

[03] saa cintesi ``sacaaha.m ajja okaasa.m karissaami, a~n~nesupi divasesu tucchahatthakova  aagamissati, eva.m me dhana.m parihaayissati, na daanissa okaasa.m karissaamii''ti. atha na.m  evamaaha ``saami, maya.m va.n.nadaasiyo naama, amhaaka.m sahassa.m adatvaa ke.li naama natthii''ti.  ``bhadde, sve digu.na.m aaharissaamii''ti punappuna.m ^a^P3.0476^ea^ yaaci. nagarasobhi.nii  daasiyo aa.naapesi ``etassa idha .thatvaa ma.m oloketu.m maa adattha, giivaaya.m ta.m gahetvaa niiharitvaa  dvaara.m pidahathaa''ti. ta.m sutvaa daasiyo tathaa kari.msu. atha so cintesi ``aha.m imaaya saddhi.m  asiitiko.tidhana.m khaadi.m, saa ma.m ekadivasa.m tucchahattha.m disvaa giivaaya.m gahetvaa niiharaapesi, aho  maatugaamo naama paapo nillajjo akata~n~nuu mittadubbhii''ti. so maatugaamassa agu.na.m anussarantova  virajji, pa.tikuulasa~n~na.m pa.tilabhi, gharaavaasepi ukka.n.thito ^a^M3.0452^ea^ ``ki.m me gharaavaasena,  ajjeva nikkhamitvaa pabbajissaamii''ti puna geha.m agantvaa raajaanampi adisvaava nagaraa  nikkhamitvaa ara~n~na.m pavisitvaa ga"ngaatiire assama.m maapetvaa isipabbajja.m pabbajitvaa jhaanaabhi~n~naayo  uppaadetvaa vanamuulaphalaahaaro tattha vaasa.m kappesi.

[03] raajaa ta.m apassanto ``kaha.m mama sahaayo''ti pucchi. nagarasobhi.niyaapi katakamma.m  sakalanagare paaka.ta.m jaata.m. athassa tamattha.m aacikkhitvaa ``iti te deva, sahaayo lajjaaya  gharampi agantvaa ara~n~na.m pavisitvaa pabbajito bhavissatii''ti aaha.msu. raajaa ta.m sutvaa  nagarasobhi.ni.m ^a^V3.0420^ea^ pakkosaapetvaa ``sacca.m kira tva.m ekadivasa.m sahassa.m alabhitvaa mama  sahaaya.m giivaaya.m gaahaapetvaa niiharaapesii''ti pucchi. ``sacca.m, devaa''ti. ``paape jammii, siigha.m  mama sahaayassa gata.t.thaana.m gantvaa ta.m aanehi, no ce aanessasi, jiivita.m te natthii''ti. saa  ra~n~no vacana.m sutvaa bhiitaa ratha.m aaruyha mahantena parivaarena nagaraa nikkhamitvaa tassa vasana.t.thaana.m  pariyesantii sutavasena ta.m .thaana.m sutvaa tattha gantvaa vanditvaa ``ayya, mayaa andhabaalabhaavena kata.m  dosa.m khamatha, aha.m na puneva.m karissaamii''ti yaacitvaa ``saadhu, khamaami te, natthi me tayi  aaghaato''ti vutte ``sace me khamatha, mayaa saddhi.m ratha.m abhiruhatha, nagara.m gacchissaama, gatakaale  ^a^P3.0477^ea^ ya.m mama ghare dhana.m atthi, sabba.m dassaamii''ti aaha. so tassaa vacana.m  sutvaa ``bhadde, idaani tayaa saddhi.m gantu.m na sakkaa, yadaa pana imasmi.m loke yena na bhavitabba.m, ta.m  bhavissati, api naama tadaa gaccheyya''nti vatvaa pa.thama.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``ga"ngaa kumudinii santaa, sa"nkhava.n.naa ca kokilaa.
[22] jambuu taalaphala.m dajjaa, atha nuuna tadaa siyaa''ti..

[03] tassattho -- bhadde, yathaa hi kumudasaraa kumudehi sa~nchannaa ti.t.thanti, tatheva sace sakalaapi  mahaaga"ngaa kumudinii siighasota.m pahaaya santaa upasantaa siyaa, sabbe kokilaa ca sa"nkhava.n.naa  bhaveyyu.m, sabbo jamburukkho ca taalaphala.m dadeyya. ^b^atha nuuna tadaa siyaa^eb^ti atha taadise  kaale amhaakampi samaagamo nuuna siyaa, bhaveyya naamaati vutta.m hoti.
[01] eva~nca ^a^M3.0453^ea^ vatvaa punapi taaya ``ehi, ayya, gacchaamaa''ti vutte  ``gacchissaamaa''ti vatvaa ``kasmi.m kaale''ti vutte ``asukasmi~nca asukasmi~ncaa''ti vatvaa  sesagaathaa abhaasi --
[21] ``yadaa kacchapalomaana.m, paavaaro tividho siyaa.
[22] hemantika.m paavura.na.m, atha nuuna tadaa siyaa..
[21] ``yadaa makasapaadaana.m, a.t.taalo sukato siyaa.
[22] da.lho ca avikampii ca, atha nuuna tadaa siyaa..
[21] ``yadaa sasavisaa.naana.m, nisse.nii sukataa siyaa.
[22] saggassaaroha.natthaaya, atha nuuna tadaa siyaa..
[21] ``yadaa ^a^V3.0421^ea^ nisse.nimaaruyha, canda.m khaadeyyu muusikaa.
[22] raahu~nca paripaateyyu.m, atha nuuna tadaa siyaa..
[21] ``yadaa suraagha.ta.m pitvaa, makkhikaa ga.nacaari.nii.
[22] a"ngaare vaasa.m kappeyyu.m, atha nuuna tadaa siyaa..
[21] ``yadaa bimbo.t.thasampanno, gadrabho sumukho siyaa.
[22] kusalo naccagiitassa, atha nuuna tadaa siyaa..
[21] ``yadaa kaakaa uluukaa ca, mantayeyyu.m rahogataa.
[22] a~n~nama~n~na.m pihayyeyyu.m, atha nuuna tadaa siyaa..
[21] ``yadaa ^a^P3.0478^ea^ mu.laalapattaana.m, chatta.m thiratara.m siyaa.
[22] vassassa pa.tighaataaya, atha nuuna tadaa siyaa..
[21] ``yadaa kulako saku.no, pabbata.m gandhamaadana.m.
[22] tu.n.denaadaaya gaccheyya, atha nuuna tadaa siyaa..
[21] ``yadaa saamuddika.m naava.m, sayanta.m sava.taakara.m.
[22] ce.to aadaaya gaccheyya, atha nuuna tadaa siyaa''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^M3.0454^ea^ ^b^tividho^eb^ti eko kacchapalomamayena pupphena, eko tuulena,  eko ubhayenaati eva.m tippakaaro. ^b^hemantika.m paavura.na^eb^nti himapaatasamaye paavura.naaya bhavitu.m  samattho. ^b^atha nuuna tadaa siyaa^eb^ti atha tasmi.m kaale mama tayaa saddhi.m eka.mseneva sa.msaggo  siyaa. eva.m sabbattha pacchimapada.m yojetabba.m. ^b^a.t.taalo sukato^eb^ti abhiruhitvaa yujjhanta.m  purisasata.m dhaaretu.m yathaa sakkoti, eva.m sukato. ^b^paripaateyyu^eb^nti palaapeyyu.m. ^b^a"ngaare^eb^ti  viitaccika"ngaarasanthare. ^b^vaasa.m kappeyyu^eb^nti ekeka.m suraagha.ta.m pivitvaa mattaa vaseyyu.m.  ^b^bimbo.t.thasampanno^eb^ti bimbaphalasadisehi o.t.thehi samannaagato. ^b^sumukho^eb^ti  suva.n.naaadaasasadiso mukho. ^b^pihayeyyu^eb^nti a~n~nama~n~nassa sampatti.m icchantaa pihayeyyu.m  pattheyyu.m. ^b^mu.laalapattaana^eb^nti sa.nhaana.m mu.laalagacchapattaana.m. ^b^kulako^eb^ti eko  khuddakasaku.no. ^b^saamuddika^eb^nti samuddapakkhandanamahaanaava.m. ^b^sayanta.m sava.taakara^eb^nti yantena  ceva va.taakarena ^a^V3.0422^ea^ ca saddhi.m sabbasambhaarayutta.m. ^b^ce.to aadaayaa^eb^ti yadaa evaruupa.m  naava.m khuddako gaamadaarako hatthena gahetvaa gaccheyyaati attho.

[03] iti mahaasatto iminaa a.t.thaanaparikappena ekaadasa gaathaa abhaasi. ta.m sutvaa nagarasobhi.nii  mahaasatta.m khamaapetvaa nagara.m gantvaa ra~n~no ta.m kaara.na.m aarocetvaa attano jiivita.m yaacitvaa ga.nhi.

[03] satthaa ima.m dhammadesana.m aaharitvaa ``eva.m bhikkhu maatugaamo naama akata~n~nuu mittadubbhii''ti  vatvaa saccaani pakaasetvaa jaataka.m samodhaanesi, saccapariyosaane ukka.n.thitabhikkhu sotaapattiphale  pati.t.thahi. tadaa raajaa aanando ahosi, taapaso pana ahameva ahosinti.
[06] a.t.thaanajaatakava.n.nanaa navamaa.

[03] ^b^khamaniiya.m^eb^ ^a^P3.0479^ea^ ^a^M3.0455^ea^ ^b^yaapaniiya^eb^nti ida.m satthaa  ve.luvane viharanto eka.m e.lika.m aarabbha kathesi. ekasmi~nhi samaye mahaamoggallaanatthero  giriparikkhitte ekadvaare giribbajasenaasane vihaasi. dvaarasamiipeyevassa ca"nkamo ahosi. tadaa  e.lakapaalakaa ``e.lakaa ettha carantuu''ti giribbaja.m pavesetvaa kii.lantaa viharanti. tesu  ekadivasa.m saaya.m aagantvaa e.lake gahetvaa gacchantesu ekaa e.likaa duure caramaanaa e.lake  nikkhamante adisvaa ohiiyi. ta.m pacchaa nikkhamanti.m eko diipiko disvaa ``khaadissaami  na''nti giribbajadvaare a.t.thaasi. saapi ito cito ca olokentii ta.m disvaa ``esa ma.m maaretvaa  khaaditukaamataaya .thito, sace nivattitvaa palaayissaami, jiivita.m me natthi, ajja mayaa purisakaara.m  kaatu.m va.t.tatii''ti cintetvaa si"ngaani ukkhipitvaa tassa abhimukha.m vegena pakkhanditvaa diipikassa  ``ito ga.nhissaami, ito ga.nhissaamii''ti vipphandatova gaha.na.m anupagantvaa vegena palaayitvaa  e.lakaana.m antara.m paavisi. atha thero ta.m tesa.m kiriya.m disvaa punadivase gantvaa tathaagatassa  aarocetvaa ``eva.m bhante, saa e.likaa attano upaayakusalataaya parakkama.m katvaa diipikato muccii''ti  aaha. satthaa ``moggallaana, idaani taava so diipiko ta.m gahetu.m naasakkhi, pubbe pana na.m  viravanti.m maaretvaa khaadii''ti vatvaa tena yaacito atiita.m aahari.

[03] atiite ^a^V3.0423^ea^ magadhara.t.the bodhisatto ekasmi.m gaame mahaabhogakule nibbattitvaa vayappatto  kaame pahaaya isipabbajja.m pabbajitvaa jhaanaabhi~n~naayo nibbattetvaa cira.m himavante vasitvaa  lo.nambilasevanatthaaya raajagaha.m gantvaa ekasmi.myeva giribbaje pa.n.nasaala.m maapetvaa vaasa.m kappesi.  tadaa iminaava niyaamena e.lakapaalakesu e.lake carantesu ekadivasa.m evameva eka.m e.lika.m pacchaa  nikkhamanti.m disvaa eko diipiko ``khaadissaami na''nti dvaare a.t.thaasi. saapi ta.m disvaa  ``ajja mayha.m jiivita.m natthi, ekenupaayena iminaa saddhi.m madhurapa.tisanthaara.m katvaa hadayamassa muduka.m  janetvaa ^a^P3.0480^ea^ jiivita.m rakkhissaamii''ti cintetvaa duuratova tena saddhi.m pa.tisanthaara.m  karontii aagacchamaanaa pa.thama.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``khamaniiya.m ^a^M3.0456^ea^ yaapaniiya.m, kacci maatula te sukha.m.
[22] sukha.m te ammaa avaca, sukhakaamaava te maya''nti..
[03] tattha ^b^sukha.m te ammaa^eb^ti mayha.m maataapi ``tumhaaka.m sukha.m puccheyyaasii''ti ajja ma.m  avacaati attho. ^b^maya^eb^nti maatula mayampi tumhaaka.m sukha.m eva icchaamaati.
[03] ta.m sutvaa diipiko ``aya.m dhuttikaa ma.m maatulavaadena va~ncetukaamaa, na me kakkha.labhaava.m  jaanaatii''ti cintetvaa dutiya.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``na"ngu.t.tha.m me avakkamma, he.thayitvaana e.like.
[22] saajja maatulavaadena, mu~ncitabbaa nu ma~n~nasii''ti..
[03] tassattho -- tva.m mama na"ngu.t.thama.n.dala.m akkamitvaa he.thayitvaa aagacchasi, saa tva.m ``ajja  maatulavaadena mu~ncitabbaahamasmii''ti ma~n~nasi nu, eva.m ma~n~nasi ma~n~neti.
[03] ta.m sutvaa itaraa ``maatula, maa eva.m karii''ti vatvaa tatiya.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``puratthaamukho nisinnosi, aha.m te mukhamaagataa.
[22] pacchato tuyha.m na"ngu.t.tha.m, katha.m khvaaha.m avakkami''nti..
[03] tattha ^a^V3.0424^ea^ ^b^mukha^eb^nti abhimukha.m. ^b^katha.m khvaaha.m avakkami^eb^nti tava pacchato  .thita.m aha.m katha.m avakkaminti attho.
[03] atha na.m so ``ki.m kathesi e.like, mama na"ngu.t.thassa a.t.thita.t.thaana.m naama natthii''ti vatvaa  catuttha.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``yaavataa ^a^P3.0481^ea^ caturo diipaa, sasamuddaa sapabbataa.
[22] taavataa mayha.m na"ngu.t.tha.m, katha.m kho ta.m vivajjayii''ti..
[03] tattha taavataati ettaka.m .thaana.m mama na"ngu.t.tha.m parikkhipitvaa gatanti vadati.
[03] ta.m sutvaa e.likaa ``aya.m paapo madhurakathaaya na alliiyati, pa.tisattu hutvaa tassa  kathessaamii''ti vatvaa pa~ncama.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``pubbeva ^a^M3.0457^ea^ metamakkhi.msu, maataa pitaa ca bhaataro.
[22] diigha.m du.t.thassa na"ngu.t.tha.m, saamhi vehaayasaagataa''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^akkhi.msuu^eb^ti pubbeva me eta.m maataa ca pitaa ca bhaataro ca aacikkhi.msu.  ^b^saamhii^eb^ti saa aha.m ~naatakaana.m santikaa tava na"ngu.t.thassa diighabhaava.m sutvaa tava na"ngu.t.tha.m pariharantii  ^b^vehaayasaa^eb^ aakaasena aagataati.
[03] atha na.m so ``jaanaami te aha.m aakaasena aagatabhaava.m, eva.m aagacchantii pana mayha.m bhakkhe  naasetvaa aagataasii''ti vatvaa cha.t.tha.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``ta~nca disvaana aayanti.m, antalikkhasmi e.like.
[22] migasa"ngho palaayittha, bhakkho me naasito tayaa''ti..

[03] ta.m sutvaa itaraa mara.nabhayabhiitaa a~n~na.m kaara.na.m aaharitu.m asakkontii ``maatula, maa evaruupa.m  kakkha.lakamma.m kari, jiivita.m me dehii''ti vilapi. itaropi na.m vilapanti~n~neva khandhe gahetvaa  maaretvaa khaadi.
[21] ``icceva.m ^a^V3.0425^ea^ vilapantiyaa, e.lakiyaa ruhagghaso.
[22] galaka.m anvaavamaddi, natthi du.t.the subhaasita.m..
[21] ``neva du.t.the nayo atthi, na dhammo na subhaasita.m.
[22] nikkama.m du.t.the yu~njetha, so ca sabbhi.m na ra~njatii''ti.. --
[25] imaa dve abhisambuddhagaathaa --

[03] tattha ^a^P3.0482^ea^ ^b^ruhagghaso^eb^ti ruhirabhakkho lohitapaayii saahasikadiipiko.  ^b^galaka.m anvaavamaddii^eb^ti giiva.m maddi, .da.msitvaa phaalesiiti attho. ^b^nayo^eb^ti kaara.na.m.  ^b^dhammo^eb^ti sabhaavo. ^b^subhaasita^eb^nti sukathitavacana.m, sabbameta.m du.t.the natthiiti attho.  ^b^nikkama.m du.t.the yu~njethaa^eb^ti bhikkhave, du.t.thapuggale parakkamameva yu~njeyya. ^b^so ca sabbhi.m na  ra~njatii^eb^ti so pana puggalo sabbhi.m sundara.m subhaasita.m na ra~njati, na piyaayatiiti attho.  taapaso tesa.m kiriya.m sabba.m addasa.
[03] satthaa ^a^M3.0458^ea^ ima.m dhammadesana.m aaharitvaa jaataka.m samodhaanesi -- ``tadaa  e.likaava etarahi e.likaa ahosi, diipikopi etarahi diipikova, taapaso pana ahameva  ahosi''nti.
[06] diipijaatakava.n.nanaa dasamaa.
[01] jaatakuddaana.m --
[21] kaccaanii a.t.thasadda~nca, sulasaa ca suma"ngala.m.
[27] ga"ngamaala~nca cetiya.m, indriya~nceva aaditta.m.
[22] a.t.thaana~nceva diipi ca, dasa a.t.thanipaatake..
[06] a.t.thakanipaatava.n.nanaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] ^b^parisa"nkupatho^eb^ ^a^V3.0426^ea^ ^a^P3.0483^ea^ ^a^M3.0459^ea^ ^b^naamaa^eb^ti ida.m  satthaa jetavane viharanto eka.m dubbacabhikkhu.m aarabbha kathesi. so kira eko kulaputto  niyyaanikasaasane pabbajitvaapi atthakaamehi aacariyupajjhaayehi ceva sabrahmacaariihi ca ``eva.m te  abhikkamitabba.m, eva.m pa.tikkamitabba.m, eva.m aalokitabba.m, eva.m vilokitabba.m, eva.m sami~njitabba.m, eva.m  pasaaritabba.m, eva.m nivaasetabba.m, eva.m paarupitabba.m, eva.m patto gahetabbo, yaapanamatta.m bhatta.m gahetvaa  paccavekkhitvaava paribhu~njitabba.m, indriyesu guttadvaarena bhojane matta~n~nunaa jaagariyamanuyuttena  bhavitabba.m, ida.m aagantukavatta.m naama jaanitabba.m, ida.m gamikavatta.m naama, imaani cuddasa  khandhakavattaani, asiiti mahaavattaani. tattha te sammaa vattitabba.m, ime terasa dhuta"ngagu.naa naama,  ete samaadaaya vattitabba''nti ovadiyamaano dubbaco ahosi akkhamo appadakkhi.naggaahii  anusaasani.m. ``aha.m tumhe na vadaami, tumhe pana ma.m kasmaa vadatha, ahameva attano attha.m vaa  anattha.m vaa jaanissaamii''ti attaana.m avacaniiya.m akaasi. athassa dubbacabhaava.m ~natvaa bhikkhuu  dhammasabhaaya.m agu.nakatha.m kathentaa nisiidi.msu. satthaa aagantvaa ``kaaya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi  kathaaya sannisinnaa''ti pucchitvaa ``imaaya naamaa''ti vutte ta.m bhikkhu.m pakkosaapetvaa ``sacca.m kira  tva.m bhikkhu dubbacosii''ti pucchitvaa ``sacca''nti vutte ``kasmaa bhikkhu evaruupe  niyyaanikasaasane pabbajitvaa ^a^P3.0484^ea^ atthakaamaana.m vacana.m na karosi, pubbepi tva.m  pa.n.ditaana.m vacana.m akatvaa verambhavaatamukhe cu.n.navicu.n.no jaato''ti vatvaa atiita.m aahari.

[03] atiite gijjhakuu.te pabbate bodhisatto gijjhayoniya.m nibbatti. putto panassa supatto naama  gijjharaajaa anekasahassagijjhaparivaaro thaamasampanno ahosi. so maataapitaro posesi,  thaamasampannattaa pana atiduura.m uppatati. atha na.m pitaa ``taata, ettaka.m naama .thaana.m atikkamitvaa na  gantabba''nti ovadi. so ``saadhuu''ti vatvaapi ekadivasa.m pana ^a^M3.0460^ea^ vu.t.the deve  gijjhehi ^a^V3.0427^ea^ saddhi.m uppatitvaa sese ohaaya atibhuumi.m gantvaa verambhavaatamukha.m patvaa  cu.n.navicu.n.nabhaava.m paapu.ni. satthaa tamattha.m dassento abhisambuddho hutvaa imaa gaathaa abhaasi --
[21] ``parisa"nkupatho naama, gijjhapantho sanantano.
[27] tatraasi maataapitaro, gijjho posesi ji.n.nake.
[22] tesa.m ajagarameda.m, accahaasi bahuttaso..
[21] ``pitaa ca putta.m avaca, jaana.m ucca.m papaatina.m.
[22] supatta.m thaamasampanna.m, tejassi.m duuragaamina.m..
[21] ``pariplavanta.m pathavi.m, yadaa taata vijaanahi.
[27] saagarena parikkhitta.m, cakka.mva parima.n.dala.m.
[22] tato taata nivattassu, maassu etto para.m gami..
[21] ``udapattosi vegena, balii pakkhii dijuttamo.
[22] olokayanto vakka"ngo, pabbataani vanaani ca..
[21] ``addassa pathavi.m gijjho, yathaasaasi pitussuta.m.
[22] saagarena parikkhitta.m, cakka.mva parima.n.dala.m..
[21] ``ta~nca so samatikkamma, paramevaccavattatha.
[22] ta~nca vaatasikhaa tikkhaa, accahaasi bali.m dija.m..
[21] ``naasakkhaatigato poso, punadeva nivattitu.m.
[22] dijo byasanamaapaadi, verambhaana.m vasa.m gato..
[21] ``tassa ^a^P3.0485^ea^ puttaa ca daaraa ca, ye ca~n~ne anujiivino.
[22] sabbe byasanamaapaadu.m, anovaadakare dije..
[21] ``evampi ^a^V3.0428^ea^ idha vu.d.dhaana.m, yo vaakya.m naavabujjhati.
[27] atisiimacaro ditto, gijjhovaatiitasaasano.
[22] sa ve byasana.m pappoti, akatvaa vu.d.dhasaasana''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^parisa"nkupatho^eb^ti sa"nkupatho. manussaa hira~n~nasuva.n.natthaaya gacchantaa tasmi.m padese  khaa.nuke ko.t.tetvaa tesu rajjuyo bandhitvaa gacchanti, tena so gijjhapabbate ja"nghamaggo  ``sa"nkupatho''ti vuccati. ^b^gijjhapantho^eb^ti ^a^M3.0461^ea^ gijjhapabbatamatthake mahaamaggo.  ^b^sanantano^eb^ti poraa.no. ^b^tatraasii^eb^ti tasmi.m gijjhapabbatamatthake sa"nkupathe eko gijjho  aasi, so ji.n.nake maataapitaro posesi. ^b^ajagarameda^eb^nti ajagaraana.m meda.m.  ^b^accahaasii^eb^ti ativiya aahari. ^b^bahuttaso^eb^ti bahuso. ^b^jaana.m ucca.m papaatina^eb^nti  ``putto te atiucca.m .thaana.m la"nghatii''ti sutvaa ``ucce papaatii aya''nti jaananto.  ^b^tejassi^eb^nti purisatejasampanna.m. ^b^duuragaamina^eb^nti teneva tejena duuragaami.m.  ^b^pariplavanta^eb^nti uppalapatta.m viya udake uplavamaana.m. ^b^vijaanahii^eb^ti vijaanaasi.  ^b^cakka.mva parima.n.dala^eb^nti yasmi.m te padese .thitassa samuddena paricchinno jambudiipo cakkama.n.dala.mva  pa~n~naayati, tato taata nivattaahiiti ovadanto evamaaha.

[03] ^b^udapattosii^eb^ti pitu ovaada.m akatvaa ekadivasa.m gijjhehi saddhi.m uppatito te ohaaya  pitaraa kathita.t.thaana.m agamaasi. ^b^olokayanto^eb^ti ta.m .thaana.m patvaa he.t.thaa olokento.  ^b^vakka"ngo^eb^ti va"nkagiivo. ^b^yathaasaasi pitussuta^eb^nti yathaassa pitu santikaa suta.m aasi,  tatheva addasa, ``yathaassaasii''tipi paa.tho. ^b^paramevaccavattathaa^eb^ti pitaraa akkhaata.t.thaanato para.m  ativattova. ^b^ta~nca vaatasikhaa tikkhaa^eb^ti ta.m anovaadaka.m balimpi samaana.m dija.m  tikhi.naverambhavaatasikhaa accahaasi atihari, cu.n.navicu.n.na.m akaasi. ^b^naasakkhaatigato^eb^ti  naasakkhi atigato. ^b^poso^eb^ti satto. ^b^anovaadakare^eb^ti tasmi.m dije pa.n.ditaana.m  ovaada.m akaronte sabbepi te mahaadukkha.m paapu.ni.msu. ^b^akatvaa vu.d.dhasaasana^eb^nti vu.d.dhaana.m  hitakaamaana.m vacana.m akatvaa evameva byasana.m mahaadukkha.m paapu.naati. tasmaa ^a^P3.0486^ea^ tva.m  bhikkhu maa gijjhasadiso bhava, atthakaamaana.m vacana.m karohiiti. so satthaaraa eva.m ovadito  tato pa.t.thaaya suvaco ahosi.
[03] satthaa ima.m dhammadesana.m aaharitvaa jaataka.m samodhaanesi -- ``tadaa dubbacagijjho etarahi  dubbacabhikkhu ahosi, gijjhapitaa pana ahameva ahosi''nti.
[06] gijjhajaatakava.n.nanaa pa.thamaa.

[03] ^b^puthusaddo^eb^ti ^a^V3.0429^ea^ ^a^M3.0462^ea^ ida.m satthaa kosambi.m nissaaya  ghositaaraame viharanto kosambiya.m bha.n.danakaarake bhikkhuu aarabbha kathesi. vatthu  ^b^kosambakakkhandhake^eb^ (mahaava0 451 aadayo) aagatameva, aya.m panettha sa"nkhepo. tadaa kira  dve bhikkhuu ekasmi.m aavaase vasi.msu vinayadharo ca suttantiko ca. tesu suttantiko ekadivasa.m  sariiravala~nja.m katvaa udakako.t.thake aacamanaudakaavasesa.m bhaajane .thapetvaa nikkhami. pacchaa  vinayadharo tattha pavi.t.tho ta.m udaka.m disvaa nikkhamitvaa itara.m pucchi ``aavuso, tayaa udaka.m  .thapita''nti. ``aamaavuso''ti. ``ki.m panettha aapattibhaava.m na jaanaasii''ti? ``aamaavuso  na jaanaamii''ti. ``hoti, aavuso, ettha aapattii''ti? ``tena hi pa.tikarissaami na''nti.  ``sace pana te, aavuso, asa~ncicca asatiyaa kata.m, natthi aapattii''ti. so tassaa  aapattiyaa anaapattidi.t.thi ahosi. vinayadharopi attano nissitakaana.m ``aya.m suttantiko  aapatti.m aapajjamaanopi na jaanaatii''ti aarocesi. te tassa nissitake disvaa ``tumhaaka.m  upajjhaayo aapatti.m aapajjitvaapi aapattibhaava.m na jaanaatii''ti aaha.msu. te gantvaa attano  upajjhaayassa aarocesu.m. so evamaaha -- ``aya.m vinayadharo pubbe `anaapattii'ti vatvaa idaani  `aapattii'ti vadati, musaavaadii eso''ti. te gantvaa ``tumhaaka.m upajjhaayo musaavaadii''ti eva.m  a~n~nama~n~na.m kalaha.m va.d.dhayi.msu. tato vinayadharo okaasa.m labhitvaa tassa aapattiyaa adassanena  ukkhepaniiyakamma.m akaasi. tato pa.t.thaaya tesa.m paccayadaayakaa upaasakaapi dve ko.t.thaasaa ahesu.m.  ovaadapa.tiggaahikaa bhikkhuniyopi aarakkhadevataapi dve ko.t.thaasaa ahesu.m. taasa.m sandi.t.thasambhattaa  aakaasa.t.thadevataapi yaava ^a^P3.0487^ea^ brahmalokaa sabbe puthujjanaa dve pakkhaa ahesu.m. yaava  akani.t.thabhavanaa pana ida.m kolaahala.m agamaasi.

[03] atheko bhikkhu tathaagata.m upasa"nkamitvaa ukkhepakaana.m ``dhammikeneva kammena aya.m ukkhitto,  ukkhittaanuvattakaana.m adhammikena kammena ukkhitto''ti laddhi.m, ukkhepakehi vaariyamaanaanampi tesa.m  ta.m anuparivaaretvaa cara.nabhaava~nca satthu aarocesi. bhagavaa ``samaggaa kira hontuu''ti dve vaare  pesetvaa ``na icchanti bhante samaggaa bhavitu''nti sutvaa ^a^M3.0463^ea^ tatiyavaare ``bhinno  bhikkhusa"ngho''ti tesa.m santika.m gantvaa ukkhepakaana.m ukkhepane, itaresa~nca asa~ncicca aapattiyaa  adassane aadiinava.m vatvaa pakkaami. puna tesa.m tattheva ekasiimaaya.m uposathaadiini kaaretvaa  bhattaggaadiisu bha.n.danajaataana.m ``aasanantarikaaya nisiiditabba''nti bhattagge vatta.m pa~n~naapetvaa  ``idaanipi bha.n.danajaataa viharantii''ti sutvaa tattha gantvaa ``ala.m, bhikkhave, maa  bha.n.dana''ntiaadiini ^a^V3.0430^ea^ vatvaa a~n~natarena bhikkhunaa dhammavaadinaa bhagavato vihesa.m  anicchantena ``aagametu, bhante, bhagavaa dhammasaami, appossukko bhante, bhagavaa di.t.thadhammasukhavihaara.m  anuyutto viharatu, maya.m tena bha.n.danena kalahena viggahena vivaadena pa~n~naayissaamaa''ti vutte --

[03] bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhave, baaraa.nasiya.m brahmadatto naama kaasiraajaa ahosiiti brahmadattena  diighiitissa kosalara~n~no rajja.m acchanditvaa a~n~naatakavesena vasantassa maaritabhaava~nceva  diighaavukumaarena attano jiivite dinne tato pa.t.thaaya tesa.m samaggabhaava~nca kathetvaa ``tesa~nhi naama,  bhikkhave, raajuuna.m aadinnada.n.daana.m aadinnasatthaana.m evaruupa.m khantisoracca.m bhavissati. idha kho ta.m,  bhikkhave, sobhetha, ya.m tumhe eva.m svaakkhaate dhammavinaye pabbajitaa samaanaa khamaa ca bhaveyyaatha  sorataa caa''ti ovaditvaa dutiyampi tatiyampi ``ala.m, bhikkhave, maa bha.n.dana''nti vaaretvaa  anoramante disvaa ``pariyaadi.n.naruupaa kho ime moghapurisaa, na yime sukaraa sa~n~naapetu''nti  pakkamitvaa punadivase pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto gandhaku.tiyaa thoka.m vissamitvaa senaasana.m sa.msaametvaa  attano pattaciivaramaadaaya sa"nghamajjhe aakaase .thatvaa imaa gaathaa abhaasi --
[21] ``puthusaddo ^a^P3.0488^ea^ samajano, na baalo koci ma~n~natha.
[22] sa"nghasmi.m bhijjamaanasmi.m, naa~n~na.m bhiyyo ama~n~naru.m..
[21] ``parimu.t.thaa pa.n.ditaabhaasaa, vaacaagocarabhaa.nino.
[22] yaavicchanti mukhaayaama.m, yena niitaa na ta.m viduu..
[21] ``akkocchi ma.m avadhi ma.m, ajini ma.m ahaasi me.
[22] ye ca ta.m upanayhanti, vera.m tesa.m na sammati..
[21] ``akkocchi ^a^M3.0464^ea^ ma.m avadhi ma.m, ajini ma.m ahaasi me.
[22] ye ca ta.m nupanayhanti, vera.m tesuupasammati..
[21] ``na hi verena veraani, sammantiidha kudaacana.m.
[22] averena ca sammanti, esa dhammo sanantano..
[21] ``pare ^a^V3.0431^ea^ ca na vijaananti, mayamettha yamaamase.
[22] ye ca tattha vijaananti, tato sammanti medhagaa..
[21] ``a.t.thicchinnaa paa.naharaa, gavaassadhanahaarino.
[27] ra.t.tha.m vilumpamaanaana.m, tesampi hoti sa"ngati.
[22] kasmaa tumhaaka no siyaa..
[21] ``sace labhetha nipaka.m sahaaya.m, saddhi.mcara.m saadhuvihaaridhiira.m.
[22] abhibhuyya sabbaani parissayaani, careyya tenattamano satiimaa..
[21] ``no ce labhetha nipaka.m sahaaya.m, saddhi.mcara.m saadhuvihaaridhiira.m.
[22] raajaava ra.t.tha.m vijita.m pahaaya, eko care maata"ngara~n~neva naago..
[21] ``ekassa carita.m seyyo, natthi baale sahaayataa.
[22] eko care na paapaani kayiraa, appossukko maata"ngara~n~neva naago''ti..

[03] tattha puthu mahaasaddo assaati ^b^puthusaddo. samajano^eb^ti samaano ekasadiso jano,  sabbovaaya.m bha.n.danakaarakajano samantato saddanicchaara.nena puthusaddo ceva sadiso caati vutta.m hoti.  ^b^na baalo koci ma~n~nathaa^eb^ti tattha koci ekopi ``aha.m baalo''ti ^a^M3.0465^ea^ na  ma~n~nittha, sabbe pa.n.ditamaanino, sabbovaaya.m bha.n.danakaarako janoyeva. ^b^naa~n~na.m bhiyyo  ama~n~naru^eb^nti koci ekopi ``aha.m baalo''ti na ma~n~nittha, bhiyyo ca sa"nghasmi.m bhijjamaane  a~n~nampi eka.m ``mayha.m kaara.naa sa"ngho bhijjatii''ti ida.m kaara.na.m na ma~n~nitthaati attho.

[03] ^b^parimu.t.thaa^eb^ti mu.t.thassatino. ^b^pa.n.ditaabhaasaa^eb^ti attano pa.n.ditamaanena ^a^P3.0489^ea^  pa.n.ditasadisaa. ^b^vaacaagocarabhaa.nino^eb^ti raa-kaarassa rassaadeso kato, vaacaagocaraa  ca na satipa.t.thaanaadiariyadhammagocaraa, bhaa.nino ca. katha.m bhaa.nino? ^b^yaavicchanti  mukhaayaama^eb^nti, yaava mukha.m pasaaretu.m icchanti, taava pasaaretvaa aggapaadehi .thatvaa bhaa.nino,  ekopi sa"nghagaaravena mukhasa"nkocana.m na karotiiti attho. ^b^yena niitaa^eb^ti yena bha.n.danena ima.m  nillajjabhaava.m niitaa. ^b^na ta.m viduu^eb^ti eva.m ``aadiinava.m ida''nti ta.m na jaananti.

[03] ^b^ye^eb^ ^a^V3.0432^ea^ ^b^ca ta.m upanayhantii^eb^ti ta.m ``akkocchi ma''ntiaadika.m aakaara.m ye  upanayhanti. ^b^sanantano^eb^ti poraa.no. ^b^pare^eb^ti pa.n.dite .thapetvaa tato a~n~ne  bha.n.danakaarakaa pare naama. te ettha sa"nghamajjhe kolaahala.m karontaa ``maya.m yamaamase upayamaama  nassaama, satata.m samita.m maccusantika.m gacchaamaa''ti na jaananti. ^b^ye ca tattha vijaanantii^eb^ti  ye tattha pa.n.ditaa ``maya.m maccusamiipa.m gacchaamaa''ti vijaananti. ^b^tato sammanti medhagaa^eb^ti  bhikkhave, eva~nhi te jaanantaa yonisomanasikaara.m uppaadetvaa medhagaana.m kalahaana.m vuupasamaaya  pa.tipajjanti.

[03] ^b^a.t.thicchinnaa^eb^ti aya.m gaathaa brahmadatta~nca diighaavukumaara~nca sandhaaya vuttaa. tesampi hoti  sa"ngati. kasmaa tumhaaka.m na hoti? yesa.m vo neva maataapituuna.m a.t.thiini chinnaani, na paa.naa  ha.taa, na gavaassadhanaani ha.taani. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- bhikkhave, tesa~nhi naama aadinnada.n.daana.m  aadinnasatthaana.m raajuuna.m evaruupaa sa"ngati samaagamo aavaahavivaahasambandha.m katvaa ekato paanabhojana.m  hoti, tumhe evaruupe saasane pabbajitvaa attano veramattampi jahitu.m na sakkotha, ko tumhaaka.m  bhikkhubhaavoti.

[03] ^b^sace^eb^ ^a^M3.0466^ea^ ^b^labhethaa^eb^tiaadigaathaayo pa.n.ditasahaayassa ca  baalasahaayassa ca va.n.naava.n.nadiipanattha.m vuttaa. ^b^abhibhuyya sabbaani parissayaanii^eb^ti sabbe  paaka.taparissaye ca pa.ticchannaparissaye ca abhibhavitvaa tena saddhi.m attamano satimaa careyya.  ^b^raajaava ra.t.tha.m vijita.m pahaayaa^eb^ti yathaa attano vijita.m ra.t.tha.m mahaajanakaraajaa ca arindamaraajaa  ca pahaaya ekakova cari.msu, eva.m careyyaati attho. ^b^maata"ngara~n~neva naago^eb^ti maata"ngo ara~n~ne  naagova. ^b^maata"ngo^eb^ti hatthii vuccati, ^b^naago^eb^ti mahantaadhivacanameta.m. yathaa hi  maatuposako maata"nganaago ara~n~ne ekako cari, na ca paapaani akaasi, yathaa ca siilavahatthinaago.  yathaa ca paalileyyako, eva.m eko care, na ca paapaani kayiraati vutta.m hoti.

[03] satthaa eva.m kathetvaapi te bhikkhuu samagge kaatu.m asakkonto baalakalo.nakagaama.m gantvaa  bhaguttherassa ekiibhaave aanisa.msa.m kathetvaa tato ti.n.na.m kulaputtaana.m vasana.t.thaana.m gantvaa tesa.m  saamaggivaase aanisa.msa.m kathetvaa tato paalileyyakavanasa.n.da.m gantvaa tattha ^a^P3.0490^ea^ temaasa.m  vasitvaa puna kosambi.m agantvaa saavatthimeva agamaasi. kosambivaasinopi upaasakaa ``ime  kho ayyaa, kosambakaa bhikkhuu bahuno amhaaka.m anatthassa kaarakaa, imehi ubbaa.lho bhagavaa  pakkanto, imesa.m neva abhivaadanaadiini karissaama, na upagataana.m pi.n.dapaata.m dassaama, eva.m ime  ^a^V3.0433^ea^ pakkamissanti vaa vera.m viramissanti vaa bhagavanta.m vaa pasaadessantii''ti  sammantayitvaa tatheva aka.msu. te tena da.n.dakammena pii.litaa saavatthi.m gantvaa bhagavanta.m khamaapesu.m.
[03] satthaa ima.m dhammadesana.m aaharitvaa jaataka.m samodhaanesi -- ``pitaa suddhodanamahaaraajaa  ahosi, maataa mahaamaayaa, diighaavukumaaro pana ahameva ahosi''nti.
[06] kosambiyajaatakava.n.nanaa dutiyaa.

[03] ^b^dumo^eb^ ^a^M3.0467^ea^ ^b^yadaa hotii^eb^ti ida.m satthaa jetavane viharanto a~n~natara.m  bhikkhu.m aarabbha kathesi. so kira satthu santike kamma.t.thaana.m gahetvaa kosalajanapade a~n~natara.m  paccantagaama.m upanissaaya ara~n~ne vihaasi. manussaa tassa ratti.t.thaanadivaa.t.thaanaani sampaadetvaa  gamanaagamanasampanne .thaane senaasana.m katvaa sakkacca.m upa.t.thahi.msu. tassa vassuupagatassa pa.thamamaaseyeva  so gaamo jhaayi, manussaana.m biijamattampi avasi.t.tha.m naahosi. te tassa pa.niita.m pi.n.dapaata.m daatu.m  naasakkhi.msu. so sappaayasenaasanepi pi.n.dapaatena kilamanto magga.m vaa phala.m vaa nibbattetu.m  naasakkhi. atha na.m temaasaccayena satthaara.m vanditu.m aagata.m satthaa pa.tisanthaara.m katvaa ``kacci  bhikkhu pi.n.dapaatena na kilamantosi, senaasanasappaaya~nca ahosii''ti pucchi. so tamattha.m  aarocesi. satthaa ``tassa senaasana.m sappaaya''nti ~natvaa ``bhikkhu sama.nena naama  senaasanasappaaye sati loluppacaara.m pahaaya ki~ncideva yathaaladdha.m paribhu~njitvaa santu.t.thena sama.nadhamma.m  kaatu.m va.t.tati. poraa.nakapa.n.ditaa tiracchaanayoniya.m nibbattitvaa attano nivaasasukkharukkhe cu.n.na.m  ^a^P3.0491^ea^ khaadantaapi loluppacaara.m pahaaya santu.t.thaa mittadhamma.m abhinditvaa a~n~nattha na  gami.msu, tva.m pana kasmaa `pi.n.dapaato paritto luukho'ti sappaayasenaasana.m pariccajii''ti vatvaa tena  yaacito atiita.m aahari.

[03] atiite himavante ga"ngaatiire ekasmi.m udumbaravane anekasatasahassaa sukaa vasi.msu. tatra  eko suvaraajaa attano nivaasarukkhassa phalesu khii.nesu yadeva avasi.t.tha.m hoti a"nkuro vaa patta.m vaa  taco vaa papa.tikaa vaa, ta.m khaaditvaa ga"ngaaya paaniiya.m pivitvaa paramappicchasantu.t.tho hutvaa a~n~nattha  na gacchati. tassa appicchasantu.t.thabhaavagu.nena sakkassa bhavana.m kampi. sakko aavajjamaano ta.m  disvaa tassa viima.msanattha.m attano aanubhaavena ta.m rukkha.m sukkhaapesi. rukkho ^a^V3.0434^ea^  khaa.nukamatto hutvaa chiddaavachiddo vaate paharante aako.tiyamaano viya a.t.thaasi. tassa chiddehi  cu.n.naani nikkhamanti. suvaraajaa taani cu.n.naani khaaditvaa ga"ngaaya paaniiya.m pivitvaa a~n~nattha  agantvaa vaataatapa.m aga.netvaa udumbarakhaa.nuke nisiidi. sakko tassa paramappicchabhaava.m ~natvaa  ``mittadhammagu.na.m kathaapetvaa varamassa datvaa udumbara.m ^a^M3.0468^ea^ amataphala.m karitvaa  aagamissaamii''ti eko ha.msaraajaa hutvaa suja.m asuraka~n~na.m purato katvaa ta.m udumbaravana.m gantvaa  aviduure ekarukkhassa saakhaaya nisiiditvaa tena saddhi.m katha.m samu.t.thaapento pa.thama.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``dumo yadaa hoti phaluupapanno, bhu~njanti na.m viha"ngamaa sampatantaa.
[22] khii.nanti ~natvaana duma.m phalaccaye, disodisa.m yanti tato viha"ngamaa''ti..

[03] tassattho -- suvaraaja, rukkho naama yadaa phalasampanno hoti, tadaa ta.m saakhato saakha.m  sampatantaava viha"ngamaa bhu~njanti, ta.m pana khii.na.m ~natvaa phalaana.m accayena tato rukkhato disodisa.m  viha"ngamaa gacchantiiti.
[03] eva~nca ^a^P3.0492^ea^ pana vatvaa tato na.m uyyojetu.m dutiya.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``cara caarika.m lohitatu.n.da maa mari, ki.m tva.m suva sukkhadumamhi jhaayasi.
[22] tadi"ngha ma.m bruuhi vasantasannibha, kasmaa suva sukkhaduma.m na ri~ncasii''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^M3.0469^ea^ ^b^jhaayasii^eb^ti ki.mkaara.naa sukkhakhaa.numatthake jhaayanto  pajjhaayanto ti.t.thasi. ^b^i"nghaa^eb^ti codanatthe nipaato. ^b^vasantasannibhaa^eb^ti vasantakaale  vanasa.n.do suvaga.nasamoki.n.no viya niilobhaaso hoti, tena ta.m ``vasantasannibhaa''ti aalapati.  ^b^na ri~ncasii^eb^ti na cha.d.desi.
[03] atha na.m suvaraajaa ``aha.m ha.msa attano kata~n~nukataveditaaya ima.m rukkha.m na jahaamii''ti vatvaa  dve gaathaa abhaasi --
[21] ``ye ve sakhiina.m sakhaaro bhavanti, paa.naccaye dukkhasukhesu ha.msa.
[22] khii.na.m akhii.nampi na ta.m jahanti, santo sata.m dhammamanussarantaa..
[21] ``soha.m ^a^V3.0435^ea^ sata.m a~n~natarosmi ha.msa, ~naatii ca me hoti sakhaa ca rukkho.
[22] ta.m nussahe jiivikattho pahaatu.m, khii.nanti ~natvaana na hesa dhammo''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^ye ve sakhiina.m sakhaaro bhavantii^eb^ti ye sahaayaana.m sahaayaa honti. ^b^khii.na.m  akhii.nampii^eb^ti pa.n.ditaa naama attano sahaaya.m bhogaparikkhayena khii.nampi akhii.nampi na jahanti.  ^b^sata.m dhammamanussarantaa^eb^ti pa.n.ditaana.m pave.ni.m anussaramaanaa. ^b^~naatii ca me^eb^ti ha.msaraaja,  aya.m rukkho sampiyaayanatthena mayha.m ~naati ca samaaci.n.nacara.nataaya sakhaa ca.  ^b^jiivikattho^eb^ti tamaha.m jiivikaaya atthiko hutvaa pahaatu.m na sakkomi.
[03] sakko tassa vacana.m sutvaa tu.t.tho pasa.msitvaa vara.m daatukaamo dve gaathaa abhaasi --
[21] ``saadhu ^a^P3.0493^ea^ sakkhi kata.m hoti, metti sa.msati santhavo.
[22] saceta.m dhamma.m rocesi, paasa.msosi vijaanata.m..
[21] ``so te suva vara.m dammi, pattayaana viha"ngama.
[22] vara.m varassu vakka"nga, ya.m ki~nci manasicchasii''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^saadhuu^eb^ti sampaha.msana.m. ^b^sakkhi kata.m hoti, metti sa.msati santhavo^eb^ti  sakhibhaavo ca metti ca parisamajjhe santhavo caati tayaa mitta.m kata.m saadhu hoti laddhaka.m bhaddakameva.  ^b^saceta.m dhamma^eb^nti sace eta.m mittadhamma.m. ^b^vijaanata^eb^nti eva.m sante vi~n~nuuna.m  pasa.msitabbayuttakosiiti attho. ^b^so te^eb^ti so aha.m tuyha.m. ^b^varassuu^eb^ti icchassu.  ^b^ya.m ki~nci manasicchasii^eb^ti ya.m ki~nci manasaa icchasi, sabba.m ta.m vara.m dadaami teti.
[03] ta.m sutvaa suvaraajaa vara.m ga.nhanto sattama.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``vara~nca me ha.msa bhava.m dadeyya, aya~nca rukkho punaraayu.m labhetha.
[22] so saakhavaa phalimaa sa.mviruu.lho, madhutthiko ti.t.thatu sobhamaano''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^saakhavaa^eb^ti saakhasampanno. ^b^phalimaa^eb^ti phalena upeto.  ^b^sa.mviruu.lho^eb^ti samantato viruu.lhapatto ^a^V3.0436^ea^ taru.napattasampanno hutvaa.  ^b^madhutthiko^eb^ti sa.mvijjamaanamadhuraphalesu pakkhittamadhu viya madhuraphalo hutvaati attho.
[03] athassa ^a^M3.0470^ea^ sakko vara.m dadamaano a.t.thama.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``ta.m passa samma phalima.m u.laara.m, sahaava te hotu udumbarena.
[22] so saakhavaa phalimaa sa.mviruu.lho, madhutthiko ti.t.thatu sobhamaano''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^sahaava te hotu udumbarenaa^eb^ti tava udumbarena saddhi.m saha ekatova vaaso hotu.

[03] eva~nca ^a^P3.0494^ea^ pana vatvaa sakko ta.m attabhaava.m vijahitvaa attano ca sujaaya ca  aanubhaava.m dassetvaa ga"ngaato hatthena udaka.m gahetvaa udumbarakhaa.nuka.m pahari. taavadeva  saakhaavi.tapasacchanno madhuraphalo rukkho u.t.thahitvaa mu.n.dama.nipabbato viya vilaasasampanno a.t.thaasi.  suvaraajaa ta.m disvaa somanassappatto sakkassa thuti.m karonto navama.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``eva.m sakka sukhii hohi, saha sabbehi ~naatibhi.
[22] yathaahamajja sukhito, disvaana saphala.m duma''nti..
[03] sakkopi tassa vara.m datvaa udumbara.m amataphala.m katvaa saddhi.m sujaaya attano .thaanameva gato.  tamattha.m diipayamaanaa osaane abhisambuddhagaathaa .thapitaa --
[21] ``suvassa ca vara.m datvaa, katvaana saphala.m duma.m.
[22] pakkaami saha bhariyaaya, devaana.m nandana.m vana''nti..

[01] satthaa ima.m dhammadesana.m aaharitvaa ``eva.m bhikkhu poraa.nakapa.n.ditaa tiracchaanayoniya.m  nibbattaapi aloluppacaaraa ahesu.m. tva.m pana kasmaa evaruupe saasane pabbajitvaa loluppacaara.m  carasi, gaccha tattheva vasaahii''ti kamma.t.thaanamassa kathetvaa jaataka.m samodhaanesi. so bhikkhu  tattha gantvaa vipassana.m va.d.dhento arahatta.m paapu.ni. tadaa sakko anuruddho ahosi, suvaraajaa pana  ahameva ahosinti.
[06] mahaasuvajaatakava.n.nanaa tatiyaa.

[03] ^b^santi^eb^ ^a^V3.0437^ea^ ^a^M3.0471^ea^ ^b^rukkhaa^eb^ti ida.m satthaa saavatthiya.m  jetavane viharanto vera~njaka.n.da.m aarabbha kathesi. satthari vera~njaaya.m vassa.m vasitvaa anupubbena  saavatthi.m anuppatte bhikkhuu dhammasabhaaya.m katha.m samu.t.thaapesu.m ``aavuso, tathaagato khattiyasukhumaalo  buddhasukhumaalo mahantena iddhaanubhaavena samannaagatopi vera~njabraahma.nena nimantito temaasa.m vasanto  maaraava.t.tanavasena tassa santikaa ekadivasampi bhikkha.m alabhitvaa loluppacaara.m pahaaya temaasa.m  patthapulakapi.t.thodakena yaapento a~n~nattha na agamaasi, aho tathaagataana.m ^a^P3.0495^ea^  appicchasantu.t.thabhaavo''ti. satthaa aagantvaa ``kaaya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathaaya  sannisinnaa''ti pucchitvaa ``imaaya naamaa''ti vutte ``anacchariya.m, bhikkhave, tathaagatassa idaani  loluppacaarappahaana.m, pubbepi tiracchaanayoniya.m nibbattopi loluppacaara.m pahaasi''nti vatvaa atiita.m  aahari. sabbampi vatthu purimanayeneva vitthaaretabba.m.
[21] ``santi rukkhaa haripattaa, dumaa nekaphalaa bahuu.
[22] kasmaa nu sukkhe ko.laape, suvassa nirato mano..
[21] ``phalassa upabhu~njimhaa, nekavassaga.ne bahuu.
[22] aphalampi viditvaana, saava metti yathaa pure..
[21] ``sukkha~nca rukkha.m ko.laapa.m, opattamaphala.m duma.m.
[22] ohaaya saku.naa yanti, ki.m dosa.m passase dija..
[21] ``ye phalatthaa sambhajanti, aphaloti jahanti na.m.
[22] attatthapa~n~naa dummedhaa, te honti pakkhapaatino..
[21] ``saadhu sakkhi kata.m hoti, metti sa.msati santhavo.
[22] saceta.m dhamma.m rocesi, paasa.msosi vijaanata.m..
[21] ``so te suva vara.m dammi, pattayaana viha"ngama.
[22] vara.m varassu vakka"nga, ya.m ki~nci manasicchasi..
[21] ``api ^a^V3.0438^ea^ ^a^M3.0472^ea^ naama na.m passeyya.m, sapatta.m saphala.m duma.m.
[22] daliddova nidhi.m laddhaa, nandeyyaaha.m punappuna.m..
[21] ``tato amatamaadaaya, abhisi~nci mahiiruha.m.
[22] tassa saakhaa viruuhi.msu, siitacchaayaa manoramaa..
[21] ``eva.m sakka sukhii hohi, saha sabbehi ~naatibhi.
[22] yathaahamajja sukhito, disvaana saphala.m duma.m..
[21] ``suvassa ca vara.m datvaa, katvaana saphala.m duma.m.
[22] pakkaami saha bhariyaaya, devaana.m nandana.m vana''nti.. --
[25] pa~nhapa.tipa~nhaapi atthopi purimanayeneva veditabbaa, anuttaanapadameva pana  va.n.nayissaama.

[03] ^b^haripattaa^eb^ti niilapattasacchannaa. ^b^ko.laape^eb^ti vaate paharante aako.titasadda.m ^a^P3.0496^ea^  viya mu~ncamaane nissaare. ^b^suvassaa^eb^ti aayasmato suvaraajassa kasmaa evaruupe  rukkhe mano nirato. ^b^phalassaa^eb^ti phala.m assa rukkhassa. ^b^nekavassaga.ne^eb^ti  anekavassaga.ne. ^b^bahuu^eb^ti samaanepi anekasate na dve tayo, atha kho bahuuva.  ^b^viditvaanaa^eb^ti ha.msaraaja idaani amhaaka.m ima.m rukkha.m aphala.m viditvaapi yathaa pure etena saddhi.m  metti, saava metti, ta~nhi maya.m na bhindaama, metti.m bhindantaa hi anariyaa asappurisaa naama  hontiiti pakaasento evamaaha.

[03] ^b^opatta^eb^nti avapatta.m nippatta.m patitapatta.m. ^b^ki.m dosa.m passase^eb^ti a~n~ne saku.naa eta.m  ohaaya a~n~nattha gacchanti, tva.m eva.m gamane ki.m naama dosa.m passasi. ^b^ye phalatthaa^eb^ti ye  pakkhino phalatthaaya phalakaara.naa sambhajanti upagacchanti, aphaloti ~natvaa eta.m jahanti.  ^b^attatthapa~n~naa^eb^ti attano atthaaya pa~n~naa, para.m anoloketvaa attaniyeva vaa .thitaa etesa.m  pa~n~naati attatthapa~n~naa. ^b^pakkhapaatino^eb^ti te attanoyeva vu.d.dhi.m paccaasiisamaanaa mittapakkha.m  paatenti naasentiiti pakkhapaatino naama honti. attapakkheyeva vaa patantiiti ^b^pakkhapaatino^eb^.

[03] ^b^api^eb^ ^a^M3.0473^ea^ ^b^naama na^eb^nti ha.msaraaja, sace me manoratho nipphajjeyya,  tayaa dinno varo sampajjeyya, api naama aha.m ima.m rukkha.m sapatta.m saphala.m puna passeyya.m, tato  daliddo nidhi.m ^a^V3.0439^ea^ labhitvaava punappuna.m eta.m abhinandeyya.m, ta.m disvaava pamodeyya.m.  ^b^amatamaadaayaa^eb^ti attano aanubhaavena .thito ga"ngodaka.m gahetvaa abhisi~ncayiiti attho.  imasmi.m jaatake imaaya saddhi.m dve abhisambuddhagaathaa honti.
[03] satthaa ima.m dhammadesana.m aaharitvaa jaataka.m samodhaanesi -- ``tadaa sakko anuruddho ahosi,  suvaraajaa pana ahameva ahosi''nti.
[06] cuu.lasuvajaatakava.n.nanaa catutthaa.

[03] ^b^suta.m meta.m mahaabrahme^eb^ti ida.m satthaa jetavane viharanto ukka.n.thitabhikkhu.m aarabbha kathesi.  ta~nhi bhikkhu.m eka.m ala"nkatamaatugaama.m disvaa ukka.n.thita.m diighakesanakhaloma.m vibbhamitukaama.m  aacariyupajjhaayehi aruciyaa aaniita.m. satthaa ``sacca.m kira tva.m bhikkhu ukka.n.thitosii''ti  pucchitvaa ``sacca.m, bhante''ti vutte ``ki.mkaara.naa''ti vatvaa ``ala"nkatamaatugaama.m disvaa  kilesavasena, bhante''ti ^a^P3.0497^ea^ vutte ``bhikkhu kileso naama gu.naviddha.msako  appassaado niraye nibbattaapeti, esa pana kileso ki.mkaara.naa ta.m na kilamessati? na hi  sineru.m paharitvaa pahara.navaato puraa.napa.n.nassa lajjati, ima~nhi kilesa.m nissaaya bodhi~naa.nassa  anupada.m caramaanaa pa~ncaabhi~n~naa.t.thasamaapattilaabhino visuddhamahaapurisaapi sati.m upa.t.thapetu.m asakkontaa  jhaana.m antaradhaapesu''nti vatvaa atiita.m aahari.

[03] atiite baaraa.nasiya.m brahmadatte rajja.m kaarente bodhisatto ekasmi.m nigame asiitiko.tivibhave  braahma.nakule nibbatti, ka~ncanachavitaaya panassa ``haritacakumaaro''ti naama.m kari.msu. so  vayappatto takkasila.m gantvaa uggahitasippo ku.tumba.m sa.n.thapetvaa maataapituuna.m accayena dhanavilokana.m  katvaa ``dhanameva pa~n~naayati, dhanassa uppaadakaa na pa~n~naayanti, mayaapi mara.namukhe cu.n.navicu.n.nena  bhavitabba''nti mara.nabhayabhiito mahaadaana.m datvaa ^a^M3.0474^ea^ himavanta.m pavisitvaa isipabbajja.m  pabbajitvaa sattame divase abhi~n~naa ca samaapattiyo ca nibbattetvaa tattha cira.m vanamuulaphalaahaaro  yaapetvaa lo.nambilasevanatthaaya pabbataa otaritvaa anupubbena baaraa.nasi.m patvaa raajuyyaane vasitvaa  punadivase baaraa.nasiya.m bhikkhaaya caranto raajadvaara.m sampaapu.ni. raajaa ta.m disvaa pasannacitto  pakkosaapetvaa samussitasetacchatte raajapalla"nke nisiidaapetvaa ^a^V3.0440^ea^ naanaggarasabhojana.m bhojetvaa  anumodanaavasaane atirekatara.m pasiiditvaa ``kaha.m, bhante, gacchathaa''ti vatvaa ``vassaavaasa.t.thaana.m  upadhaarema, mahaaraajaa''ti vutte ``saadhu, bhante''ti bhuttapaataraaso ta.m aadaaya uyyaana.m gantvaa tattha  ratti.t.thaanadivaa.t.thaanaadiini kaaraapetvaa uyyaanapaala.m paricaaraka.m katvaa datvaa vanditvaa nikkhami.  mahaasatto tato pa.t.thaaya nibaddha.m ra~n~no gehe bhu~njanto dvaadasa vassaani tattha vasi.

[03] athekadivasa.m raajaa paccanta.m kupita.m vuupasametu.m gacchanto ^a^P3.0498^ea^ ``amhaaka.m  pu~n~nakkhetta.m maa pamajjii''ti mahaasatta.m deviyaa niyyaadetvaa agamaasi. tato pa.t.thaaya saa mahaasatta.m  sahatthaa parivisati. athekadivasa.m saa bhojana.m sampaadetvaa tasmi.m ciraayamaane gandhodakena nhatvaa  sa.nha.m ma.t.thasaa.taka.m nivaasetvaa siihapa~njara.m vivaraapetvaa sariire vaata.m paharaapentii khuddakama~ncake nipajji.  mahaasattopi divaatara.m sunivattho supaaruto bhikkhaabhaajana.m aadaaya aakaasenaagantvaa siihapa~njara.m  paapu.ni. deviyaa tassa vaakacirasadda.m sutvaa vegena u.t.thahantiyaa ma.t.thasaa.tako bhassi, mahaasattassa  visabhaagaaramma.na.m cakkhu.m pa.tiha~n~ni. athassa anekavassako.tisatasahassakaale abbhantare  nivutthakileso kara.n.dake sayitaaasiiviso viya u.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m antaradhaapesi. so sati.m  upa.t.thaapetu.m asakkonto gantvaa devi.m hatthe ga.nhi, taavadeva saa.ni.m parikkhipi.msu. so taaya saddhi.m  lokadhamma.m sevitvaa bhu~njitvaa uyyaana.m gantvaa tato pa.t.thaaya devasika.m tatheva akaasi. tassa taaya  saddhi.m lokadhammapa.tisevana.m sakalanagare paaka.ta.m jaata.m. amaccaa ``haritacataapaso evamakaasii''ti  ra~n~no pa.n.na.m pahi.ni.msu. raajaa ``ma.m bhinditukaamaa eva.m vadantii''ti asaddahitvaa paccanta.m  vuupasametvaa baaraa.nasi.m paccaagantvaa nagara.m padakkhi.na.m katvaa deviyaa santika.m gantvaa ``sacca.m, kira  mama ayyo ^a^M3.0475^ea^ haritacataapaso tayaa saddhi.m lokadhamma.m pa.tisevatii''ti pucchi.  ``sacca.m, devaa''ti. so tassaapi asaddahitvaa ``tameva pa.tipucchissaamii''ti uyyaana.m gantvaa  vanditvaa ekamanta.m nisiiditvaa ta.m pucchanto pa.thama.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``suta.m meta.m mahaabrahme, kaame bhu~njati haarito.
[22] kacceta.m vacana.m tuccha.m, kacci suddho iriyyasii''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^kacceta^eb^nti kacci eta.m ``haarito kaame paribhu~njatii''ti amhehi suta.m vacana.m  tuccha.m abhuuta.m, kacci tva.m suddho iriyyasi viharasiiti.

[03] so ^a^V3.0441^ea^ ^a^P3.0499^ea^ cintesi -- ``aya.m raajaa `naaha.m paribhu~njaamii'ti  vuttepi mama saddahissateva, imasmi.m loke saccasadisii pati.t.thaa naama natthi. ujjhitasaccaa hi  bodhimuule nisiiditvaa bodhi.m paapu.nitu.m na sakkonti, mayaa saccameva kathetu.m va.t.tatii''ti.  bodhisattassa hi ekaccesu .thaanesu paa.naatipaatopi adinnaadaanampi kaamesumicchaacaaropi  suraamerayamajjapaanampi hotiyeva, atthabhedakavisa.mvaadana.m purakkhatvaa musaavaado naama na hoti, tasmaa  so saccameva kathento dutiya.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``evameta.m mahaaraaja, yathaa te vacana.m suta.m.
[22] kummagga.m pa.tipannosmi, mohaneyyesu mucchito''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^mohaneyyesuu^eb^ti kaamagu.nesu. kaamagu.nesu hi loko muyhati, te ca loka.m  mohayanti, tasmaa te ``mohaneyyaa''ti vuccantiiti.
[03] ta.m sutvaa raajaa tatiya.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``adu pa~n~naa kimatthiyaa, nipu.naa saadhucintinii.
[22] yaaya uppatita.m raaga.m, ki.m mano na vinodaye''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^aduu^eb^ti nipaato. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- bhante, gilaanassa naama bhesajja.m,  pipaasitassa paaniiya.m pa.tisara.na.m, tumhaaka.m panesaa nipu.naa saadhuuna.m atthaana.m cintinii pa~n~naa  kimatthiyaa, yaaya puna uppatita.m raaga.m ^b^ki.m mano na vinodaye,^eb^ ki.m citta.m vinodetu.m  naasakkhiiti.
[03] athassa ^a^M3.0476^ea^ kilesabala.m dassento haarito catuttha.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``cattaarome mahaaraaja, loke atibalaa bhusaa.
[22] raago doso mado moho, yattha pa~n~naa na gaadhatii''ti..
[03] tattha ^a^P3.0500^ea^ ^b^yatthaa^eb^ti yesu pariyu.t.thaana.m pattesu mahoghe patitaa viya pa~n~naa  gaadha.m pati.t.tha.m na labhati.
[03] ta.m ^a^V3.0442^ea^ sutvaa raajaa pa~ncama.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``arahaa siilasampanno, suddho carati haarito.
[22] medhaavii pa.n.dito ceva, iti no sammato bhava''nti..
[03] tattha ^b^iti no sammato^eb^ti eva.m amhaaka.m sammato sambhaavito bhava.m.
[03] tato haarito cha.t.thama.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``medhaaviinampi hi.msanti, isi.m dhammagu.ne rata.m.
[22] vitakkaa paapakaa raaja, subhaa raaguupasa.mhitaa''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^subhaa^eb^ti subhanimittaggaha.nena pavattaati.
[03] atha na.m kilesappahaane ussaaha.m kaarento raajaa sattama.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``uppannaaya.m sariirajo, raago va.n.naviduusano tava.
[22] ta.m pajaha bhaddamatthu te, bahunnaasi medhaavisammato''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^va.n.naviduusano tavaa^eb^ti tava sariirava.n.nassa ca gu.nava.n.nassa ca viduusano.  ^b^bahunnaasii^eb^ti bahuuna.m aasi medhaaviiti sammato.
[03] tato mahaasatto sati.m labhitvaa kaamesu aadiinava.m sallakkhetvaa a.t.thama.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``te andhakaarake kaame, bahudukkhe mahaavise.
[22] tesa.m muula.m gavesissa.m, checcha.m raaga.m sabandhana''nti..

[03] tattha ^a^M3.0477^ea^ ^b^andhakaarake^eb^ti pa~n~naacakkhuvinaasanato andhabhaavakare.  ^b^bahudukkhe^eb^ti ettha ``appassaadaa kaamaa''tiaadiini (ma0 ni0 1.234; paaci0 417;  cuu.lava0 65) suttaani haritvaa tesa.m bahudukkhataa dassetabbaa. ^b^mahaavise^eb^ti  sampayuttakilesavisassa ceva vipaakavisassa ^a^V3.0443^ea^ ca mahantataaya mahaavise. ^b^tesa.m  muula^eb^nti te vuttappakaare kaame pahaatu.m tesa.m muula.m ^a^P3.0501^ea^ gavesissa.m pariyesissaami.  ki.m pana tesa.m muulanti? ayonisomanasikaaro. ^b^checcha.m raaga.m sabandhana^eb^nti mahaaraaja,  idaaneva pa~n~naakhaggena paharitvaa subhanimittabandhanena sabandhana.m raaga.m chindissaamiiti.

[03] ida~nca pana vatvaa ``mahaaraaja, okaasa.m taava me karohii''ti okaasa.m kaaretvaa pa.n.nasaala.m  pavisitvaa kasi.nama.n.dala.m oloketvaa puna na.t.thajjhaana.m uppaadetvaa pa.n.nasaalato nikkhamitvaa aakaase  palla"nkena nisiiditvaa ra~n~no dhamma.m desetvaa ``mahaaraaja, aha.m a.t.thaane vutthakaara.naa mahaajanamajjhe  garahappatto, appamatto hohi, puna daani aha.m anitthigandhavanasa.n.dameva gamissaamii''ti ra~n~no  rodantassa paridevantassa himavantameva gantvaa aparihiinajjhaano brahmalokuupago ahosi.
[03] satthaa ta.m kaara.na.m ~natvaa --
[21] ``ida.m vatvaana haarito, isi saccaparakkamo.
[22] kaamaraaga.m viraajetvaa, brahmalokuupago ahuu''ti.. --
[25] abhisambuddho hutvaa ima.m gaatha.m vatvaa saccaani pakaasetvaa jaataka.m samodhaanesi,  saccapariyosaane ukka.n.thitabhikkhu arahatte pati.t.thahi.
[03] tadaa raajaa aanando ahosi, haritacataapaso pana ahameva ahosinti.
[06] haritacajaatakava.n.nanaa pa~ncamaa.

[03] ^b^bahussuta^eb^nti ida.m satthaa jetavane viharanto eka.m daaraka.m aarabbha kathesi. so kira  saavatthiya.m ku.tumbikaputto sattavassakaaleyeva padakusalo ahosi. athassa pitaa ``ima.m  viima.msissaamii''ti tassa ajaanantasseva ^a^M3.0478^ea^ mittaghara.m agamaasi. so pitu  gata.t.thaana.m apucchitvaava tassa padaanusaarena gantvaa pitu santike a.t.thaasi. atha na.m pitaa ekadivasa.m  pucchi ^a^V3.0444^ea^ ``taata, tva.m mayi ta.m ajaanaapetvaa gatepi mama gata.t.thaana.m ki.m jaanaasii''ti?  ``taata ^a^P3.0502^ea^, pada.m te sa~njaanaami, padakusalo aha''nti. athassa viima.msanatthaaya  pitaa bhuttapaataraaso gharaa nikkhamitvaa anantara.m pa.tivissakaghara.m gantvaa tato dutiya.m, tato tatiya.m  ghara.m pavisitvaa tatiyagharaa nikkhamitvaa puna attano ghara.m aagantvaa tato uttaradvaarena nikkhamitvaa  nagara.m vaama.m karonto jetavana.m gantvaa satthaara.m vanditvaa dhamma.m su.nanto nisiidi. daarako ``kaha.m  me pitaa''ti pucchitvaa ``na jaanaamaa''ti vutte tassa padaanusaarena anantarapa.tivissakassa ghara.m  aadi.m katvaa pitu gatamaggeneva jetavana.m gantvaa satthaara.m vanditvaa pitu santike a.t.thaasi. pitaraa  ca ``katha.m taata, mama idhaagatabhaava.m a~n~naasii''ti pu.t.tho ``pada.m te sa~njaanitvaa padaanusaarena  aagatomhii''ti aaha. satthaa ``ki.m kathesi upaasakaa''ti pucchitvaa ``bhante, aya.m daarako  padakusalo, aha.m ima.m viima.msanto iminaa naama upaayena aagato, ayampi ma.m gehe adisvaa mama  padaanusaarena aagato''ti vutte ``anacchariya.m, upaasaka, bhuumiya.m padasa~njaanana.m, poraa.nakapa.n.ditaa  aakaase pada.m sa~njaani.msuu''ti vatvaa tena yaacito atiita.m aahari.

[03] atiite baaraa.nasiya.m brahmadatte rajja.m kaarente tassa aggamahesii aticaritvaa ra~n~naa pucchitaa  ``sace aha.m tumhe aticaraami, assamukhii yakkhinii homii''ti sapatha.m katvaa tato kaala.m katvaa  ekasmi.m pabbatapaade assamukhii yakkhinii hutvaa le.naguhaaya.m vasamaanaa mahaaa.taviya.m pubbantato  aparanta.m gamanamagge anusa~ncarante manusse gahetvaa khaadati. saa kira tii.ni vassaani vessava.na.m  upa.t.thahitvaa aayaamato ti.msayojane vitthaarato pa~ncayojane .thaane manusse khaaditu.m labhi.  athekadivasa.m eko a.d.dho mahaddhano mahaabhogo abhiruupo braahma.no bahuuhi manussehi parivuto ta.m  magga.m abhiruhi. ta.m disvaa yakkhinii tussitvaa pakkhandi, ta.m disvaa parivaaramanussaa palaayi.msu.  saa vaatavegena gantvaa braahma.na.m gahetvaa pi.t.thiyaa ^a^P3.0503^ea^ nipajjaapetvaa guha.m gacchantii  purisasamphassa.m pa.tilabhitvaa kilesavasena tasmi.m sineha.m uppaadetvaa ta.m akhaaditvaa attano saamika.m  akaasi. te ubhopi samaggasa.mvaasa.m vasi.msu ^a^M3.0479^ea^ tato pa.t.thaaya yakkhinii manusse  ga.nhantii vatthata.n.dulatelaadiinipi gahetvaa tassa naanaggarasabhojana.m upanetvaa attanaa manussama.msa.m  khaadati. gamanakaale tassa palaayanabhayena mahatiyaa silaaya guhaadvaara.m pidahitvaa gacchati. eva.m  tesu sammodamaanesu vasantesu bodhisatto nibbatta.t.thaanaa cavitvaa braahma.na.m pa.ticca tassaa kucchimhi  pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhi. saa dasamaasaccayena putta.m vijaayitvaa putte ca braahma.ne ca balavasinehaa hutvaa  ubhopi posesi. saa aparabhaage putte vu.d.dhippatte puttampi pitaraa saddhi.m antoguhaaya.m pavesetvaa dvaara.m  pidahi.

[03] athekadivasa.m ^a^V3.0445^ea^ bodhisatto tassaa gatakaala.m ~natvaa sila.m apanetvaa pitara.m bahi  akaasi. saa aagantvaa ``kena silaa apaniitaa''ti vatvaa ``amma, mayaa apaniitaa, andhakaare  nisiiditu.m na sakkomii''ti vutte puttasinehena na ki~nci avoca. athekadivasa.m bodhisatto pitara.m  pucchi ``taata, mayha.m maatu mukha.m a~n~naadisa.m, tumhaaka.m mukha.m a~n~naadisa.m, ki.m nu kho kaara.na''nti?  ``taata, tava maataa manussama.msakhaadikaa yakkhinii, maya.m ubho manussaa''ti. ``taata, yadi  eva.m, idha kasmaa vasaama, ehi manussapatha.m gacchaamaa''ti. ``taata, sace maya.m palaayissaama,  ubhopi amhe tava maataa khaadissatii''ti. bodhisatto ``maa bhaayi, taata, tava  manussapathasampaapana.m mama bhaaro''ti pitara.m samassaasetvaa punadivase maatari gataaya pitara.m gahetvaa  palaayi. yakkhinii aagantvaa te adisvaa vaatavegena pakkhanditvaa te gahetvaa ``braahma.na, ki.m  palaayasi, ki.m te idha natthii''ti vatvaa ``bhadde, maa mayha.m kujjhi, putto te ma.m ^a^P3.0504^ea^  gahetvaa palaayatii''ti vutte puttasinehena ki~nci avatvaa te assaasetvaa attano  vasana.t.thaana~n~neva te gahetvaa gantvaa eva.m punapi katipaye divase palaayante aanesi.
