[03] atheko satthavaahabraahma.no a.tavipaalaana.m sahassa.m datvaa pa~ncahi  saka.tasatehi ta.m magga.m pa.tipajji. manussayakkho viravanto pakkhandi,  bhiitaa manussaa urena nipajji.msu. so braahma.na.m gahetvaa palaayanto  khaa.nunaa paade viddho a.tavipaalesu anubandhantesu braahma.na.m cha.d.detvaa  attano vasana.t.thaanarukkhamuule nipajji. tassa tattha nipannassa sattame  divase jayaddisaraajaa migavadha.m aa.naapetvaa nagaraa nikkhami. ta.m  nagaraa nikkhantamattameva ^a^P5.0023^ea^ ^a^M5.0024^ea^  takkasilavaasii nando naama maatuposakabraahma.no catasso sataarahagaathaayo  aadaaya aagantvaa raajaana.m addasa. raajaa ``nivattitvaa  su.nissaamii''ti tassa nivaasageha.m daapetvaa migava.m gantvaa ``yassa  passena migo palaayati, tasseva giivaa''ti aaha. atheko pasadamigo  u.t.thahitvaa ra~n~no abhimukho gantvaa palaayi. amaccaa parihaasa.m kari.msu.  raajaa khagga.m gahetvaa ta.m anubandhitvaa tiyojanamatthake patvaa khaggena  paharitvaa dve kha.n.daani karitvaa kaajenaadaaya aagacchanto  manussayakkhassa nipanna.t.thaana.m patvaa dabbati.nesu nisiiditvaa thoka.m  vissamitvaa gantu.m aarabhi. atha na.m so u.t.thaaya ``ti.t.tha kuhi.m  gacchasi, bhakkhosi me''ti hatthe gahetvaa pa.thama.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``cirassa.m vata me udapaadi ajja, bhakkho mahaa  sattamibhattakaale.
[22] kutosi kovaasi tadi"ngha bruuhi, aacikkha jaati.m  vidito yathaasii''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^bhakkho mahaa^eb^ti mahaabhakkho.  ^b^sattamibhattakaale^eb^ti paa.tipadato pa.t.thaaya niraahaarassa sattamiya.m  bhattakaale. ^b^kutosii^eb^ti kuto aagatosiiti.
[03] raajaa ^a^V5.0022^ea^ yakkha.m disvaa bhiito uurutthambha.m patvaa palaayitu.m  naasakkhi, sati.m pana paccupa.t.thaapetvaa dutiya.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``pa~ncaalaraajaa migava.m pavi.t.tho, jayaddiso naama  yadissuto te.
[22] caraami kacchaani vanaani caaha.m, pasada.m ima.m khaada  mamajja mu~ncaa''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^migava.m pavi.t.tho^eb^ti migavadhaaya ra.t.thaa nikkhanto.  ^b^kacchaanii^eb^ti pabbatapassaani. ^b^pasada^eb^nti pasadamiga.m.
[03] ta.m ^a^P5.0024^ea^ ^a^M5.0025^ea^ sutvaa yakkho tatiya.m  gaathamaaha --
[21] ``seneva tva.m pa.nasi sassamaano, mamesa bhakkho pasado  ya.m vadesi.
[22] ta.m khaadiyaana pasada.m jigha~n~na.m, khaadissa.m pacchaa na  vilaapakaalo''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^senevaa^eb^ti mama santakeneva. ^b^pa.nasii^eb^ti  voharasi attaana.m vikki.naasi. ^b^sassamaano^eb^ti vihi.msayamaano.  ^b^ta.m khaadiyaanaa^eb^ti ta.m pa.thama.m khaaditvaa. ^b^jigha~n~na^eb^nti  ghasitukaamo. ^b^khaadissa^eb^nti eta.m pacchaa khaadissaami. ^b^na  vilaapakaalo^eb^ti maa vilapi. naaya.m vilaapakaaloti vadati.
[03] ta.m sutvaa raajaa nandabraahma.na.m saritvaa catuttha.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``na catthi mokkho mama nikkayena, gantvaana  pacchaagamanaaya pa.nhe.
[22] ta.m sa"ngara.m braahma.nassappadaaya, saccaanurakkhii  punaraavajissa''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^na catthii^eb^ti na ce mayha.m nikkayena vimokkho atthi.  ^b^gantvaanaa^eb^ti eva.m sante ajja ima.m migama.msa.m khaaditvaa mama  nagara.m gantvaa. ^b^pa.nhe^eb^ti pageyeva, sveva paataraasakaale  paccaagamanatthaaya pa.ti~n~na.m ga.nhaahiiti adhippaayo. ^b^ta.m sa"ngara^eb^nti  mayaa ``dhana.m te dassaamii''ti braahma.nassa sa"ngaro kato, ta.m tassa  datvaa ima.m mayaa vutta.m sacca.m anurakkhanto aha.m puna aagamissaamiiti  attho.
[03] ta.m ^a^V5.0023^ea^ sutvaa yakkho pa~ncama.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``ki.m kammajaata.m anutappate tva.m, patta.m samiipa.m mara.nassa  raaja.
[22] aacikkha me ta.m api sakku.nemu, anujaanitu.m aagamanaaya  pa.nhe''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^P5.0025^ea^ ^a^M5.0026^ea^ kammameva  ^b^kammajaata.m. anutappate^eb^ti ta.m anutappati. ^b^patta^eb^nti upagata.m.  ^b^api sakku.nemuu^eb^ti api naama ta.m tava sokakaara.na.m sutvaa  paatova aagamanaaya ta.m anujaanitu.m sakku.neyyaamaati attho.
[03] raajaa ta.m kaara.na.m kathento cha.t.tha.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``kataa mayaa braahma.nassa dhanaasaa, ta.m sa"ngara.m pa.timukka.m  na mutta.m.
[22] ta.m sa"ngara.m braahma.nassappadaaya, saccaanurakkhii  punaraavajissa''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^pa.timukka.m na mutta^eb^nti catasso sataarahaa gaathaa sutvaa  ``dhana.m te dassaamii''ti pa.ti~n~naaya mayaa attani pa.timu~ncitvaa .thapita.m,  na pana ta.m mutta.m dhanassa adinnattaa.
[03] ta.m sutvaa yakkho sattama.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``yaa te kataa braahma.nassa dhanaasaa, ta.m sa"ngara.m pa.timukka.m  na mutta.m.
[22] ta.m sa"ngara.m braahma.nassappadaaya, saccaanurakkhii  punaraavajassuu''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^punaraavajassuu^eb^ti puna aagacchassu.

[03] eva~nca pana vatvaa raajaana.m vissajjesi. so tena vissa.t.tho  ``tva.m maa cintayi, aha.m paatova aagamissaamii''ti vatvaa  magganimittaani sallakkhento attano balakaaya.m upagantvaa  balakaayaparivuto nagara.m pavisitvaa nandabraahma.na.m pakkosaapetvaa mahaarahe  aasane nisiidaapetvaa taa gaathaa sutvaa cattaari sahassaani datvaa yaana.m  aaropetvaa ``ima.m takkasilameva nethaa''ti manusse datvaa braahma.na.m  uyyojetvaa dutiyadivase pa.tigantukaamo hutvaa putta.m aamantetvaa  anusaasi. tamattha.m diipento satthaa dve gaathaa abhaasi --
[21] ``muttoca ^a^V5.0024^ea^ ^a^M5.0027^ea^ so porisaadassa hatthaa,  gantvaa saka.m mandira.m kaamakaamii.
[22] ta.m ^a^P5.0026^ea^ sa"ngara.m braahma.nassappadaaya,  aamantayii puttamaliinasattu.m..
[21] ``ajjeva rajja.m abhisi~ncayassu, dhamma.m cara sesu paresu  caapi.
[22] adhammakaaro ca te maahu ra.t.the, gacchaamaha.m porisaadassa  ~natte''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^aliinasattu^eb^nti eva.mnaamaka.m kumaara.m. paa.liya.m pana  ``arinasattu''nti likhita.m. ^b^ajjeva rajja^eb^nti putta rajja.m te  dammi, tva.m ajjeva muddhani abhiseka.m abhisi~ncayassu. ^b^~natte^eb^ti  abhyaase, santiketi attho.
[03] ta.m sutvaa kumaaro dasama.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``ki.m kamma krubba.m tava deva paava, naaraadhayii ta.m  tadicchaami sotu.m.
[22] yamajja rajjamhi udassaye tuva.m, rajjampi niccheyya.m, tayaa  vinaaha''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^krubba^eb^nti karonto. ^b^yamajjaa^eb^ti yena  anaaraadhakammena ajja ma.m rajjamhi tva.m udassaye ussaapesi pati.t.thaapesi,  ta.m me aacikkha, aha~nhi tayaa vinaa rajjampi na icchaamiiti attho.
[03] ta.m sutvaa raajaa anantara.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``na kammunaa vaa vacasaava taata, aparaadhitoha.m tuviya.m  saraami.
[22] sandhi~nca katvaa purisaadakena, saccaanurakkhii punaaha.m  gamissa''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^aparaadhito^eb^ti aparaadha.m ito. ^b^tuviya^eb^nti tava  santaka.m. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- taata, aha.m ito tava kammato vaa tava  vacanato vaa ^a^M5.0028^ea^ ki~nci mama appiya.m aparaadha.m na  saraamiiti. ^b^sandhi~nca katvaa^eb^ti ma.m pana migava.m ^a^P5.0027^ea^  gata.m eko yakkho ``khaadissaamii''ti ga.nhi. athaaha.m  braahma.nassa dhammakatha.m sutvaa tassa sakkaara.m katvaa ``sve tava  paataraasakaale aagamissaamii''ti tena purisaadakena sandhi.m sacca.m katvaa  aagato, tasmaa ta.m sacca.m anurakkhanto puna tattha gamissaami, tva.m rajja.m  kaarehiiti vadati.
[03] ta.m ^a^V5.0025^ea^ sutvaa kumaaro gaathamaaha --
[21] ``aha.m gamissaami idheva hohi, natthi tato jiivato  vippamokkho.
[22] sace tuva.m gacchasiyeva raaja, ahampi gacchaami ubho na  homaa''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^idhevaa^eb^ti tva.m idheva hoti. ^b^tato^eb^ti tassa  santikaa jiivantassa mokkho naama natthi. ^b^ubho^eb^ti eva.m sante  ubhopi na bhavissaama.
[03] ta.m sutvaa raajaa gaathamaaha --
[21] ``addhaa hi taata sataanesa dhammo, mara.naa ca me  dukkhatara.m tadassa.
[22] kammaasapaado ta.m yadaa pacitvaa, pasayha khaade bhidaa  rukkhasuule''ti..

[03] tassattho -- ^b^addhaa^eb^ eka.msena esa, taata, ^b^sataana.m^eb^  pa.n.ditaana.m ^b^dhammo^eb^ sabhaavo, yutta.m tva.m vadasi, api ca kho pana  mayha.m mara.natopeta.m dukkhatara.m assa, yadaa ta.m so kammaasapaado.  ^b^bhidaa rukkhasuule^eb^ti tikhi.narukkhasuule bhitvaa pacitvaa pasayha  balakkaarena khaadeyyaati.
[03] ta.m sutvaa kumaaro gaathamaaha --
[21] ``paa.nena te paa.namaha.m nimissa.m, maa tva.m agaa  porisaadassa ~natte.
[22] eva~nca te paa.namaha.m nimissa.m, tasmaa mata.m jiivitassa  va.n.nemii''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^M5.0029^ea^ ^b^nimissa^eb^nti aha.m idheva tava  paa.nena mama paa.na.m parivattessa.m. ^b^tasmaa^eb^ti yasmaa eta.m paa.na.m tava  paa.nenaaha.m nimissa.m, tasmaa tava ^a^P5.0028^ea^ jiivitassatthaaya  mama mara.na.m va.n.nemi mara.nameva varemi, icchaamiiti attho.
[03] ta.m sutvaa raajaa puttassa bala.m jaananto ``saadhu taata,  gacchaahii''ti sampa.ticchi. so maataapitaro vanditvaa nagaramhaa  nikkhami. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa upa.d.dhagaathamaaha --
[04] ``tato ^a^V5.0026^ea^ have dhitimaa raajaputto, vanditvaa maatu ca  pitu ca paade''ti..
[22] tattha ^b^paade^eb^ti paade vanditvaa nikkhantoti attho.

[03] athassa maataapitaropi bhaginiipi bhariyaapi amaccaparijanehi  saddhi.myeva nikkhami.msu. so nagaraa nikkhamitvaa pitara.m magga.m  pucchitvaa su.t.thu vavatthapetvaa maataapitaro vanditvaa sesaana.m ovaada.m datvaa  acchambhito kesarasiiho viya magga.m aaruyha yakkhaavaasa.m paayaasi. ta.m  gacchanta.m disvaa maataa sakabhaavena sa.n.thaatu.m asakkontii pathaviya.m pati.  pitaa baahaa paggayha mahantena saddena kandi. tampi attha.m pakaasento  satthaa --
[03] ``dukhinissa maataa nipataa pathabyaa, pitaassa paggayha bhujaani  kandatii''ti.. --
[25] upa.d.dhagaatha.m vatvaa tassa pitaraa payutta.m aasiisavaada.m  abhivaadanavaada.m maataraa bhaginiibhariyaahi ca kata.m saccakiriya.m  pakaasento aparaapi catasso gaathaa abhaasi --
[21] ``ta.m gacchanta.m taava pitaa viditvaa, parammukho vandati  pa~njaliiko.
[27] somo ca raajaa varu.no ca raajaa, pajaapatii candimaa  suuriyo ca.
[22] etehi gutto purisaadakamhaa, anu~n~naato sotthi paccehi  taata..
[21] ``ya.m ^a^P5.0029^ea^ ^a^M5.0030^ea^ da.n.dakira~n~no  gatassa maataa, raamassakaasi sotthaana.m suguttaa.
[27] ta.m te aha.m sotthaana.m karomi, etena saccena sarantu  devaa.
[22] anu~n~naato sotthi paccehi putta..
[21] ``aavii raho vaapi manopadosa.m, naaha.m sare jaatu  maliinasatte.
[22] etena saccena sarantu devaa, anu~n~naato sotthi paccehi  bhaatika..
[21] ``yasmaa ca me anadhimanosi saami, na caapi me  manasaa appiyosi.
[22] etena saccena sarantu devaa, anu~n~naato sotthi paccehi  saamii''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^parammukho^eb^ti aya.m me putto parammukho maataapitaro  vanditvaa gacchati, iti eta.m parammukha.m ^a^V5.0027^ea^ gacchanta.m disvaa viditvaa.  ^b^pa~njaliiko^eb^ti tasmi.m kaale sirasi a~njali.m .thapetvaa vandati  devataa namassati. ^b^purisaadakamhaa^eb^ti purisaadassa santikaa tena  anu~n~naato sotthinaa paccehi.

[03] ^b^raamassakaasii^eb^ti raamassa akaasi. eko kira  baaraa.nasivaasii raamo naama maatuposako maataapitaro pa.tijagganto  vohaaratthaaya gato da.n.dakira~n~no vijite kumbhavatiinagara.m gantvaa  navavidhena vassena sakalara.t.the vinaasiyamaane maataapituuna.m gu.na.m sari.  atha na.m maatupa.t.thaanakammassa phalena devataa sotthinaa aanayitvaa maatu  ada.msu. ta.m kaara.na.m sutavasenaaharitvaa evamaaha. ^b^sotthaana^eb^nti  sotthibhaava.m. ta.m pana ki~ncaapi devataa kari.msu, maatupa.t.thaana.m nissaaya  nibbattattaa pana maataa akaasiiti vutta.m. ^b^ta.m te aha^eb^nti ahampi  te tameva sotthaana.m karomi, ma.m nissaaya tatheva tava sotthibhaavo  hotuuti attho. atha vaa ^b^karomii^eb^ti icchaami. ^b^etena  saccenaa^eb^ti sace devataahi tassa sotthinaa aaniitabhaavo sacco, etena  saccena mamapi putta.m sarantu devaa ^a^M5.0031^ea^, raama.m viya tampi  aaharitvaa mama dassantuuti attho. ^b^anu~n~naato^eb^ti porisaadena  ``gacchaa''ti anu~n~naato devataana.m aanubhaavena sotthi pa.tiaagaccha  puttaati vadati.

[03] ^b^jaatu maliinasatte^eb^ti jaatu eka.msena aliinasatte mama  bhaatike aha.m sammukhaa vaa parammukhaa vaa manopadosa.m na saraami, na  mayaa tamhi manopadoso katapubboti evamassa kani.t.thaa saccamakaasi.  ^b^yasmaa ca me anadhimanosi^eb^ ^a^P5.0030^ea^, ^b^saamii^eb^ti  mama, saami aliinasattu yasmaa tva.m anadhimanosi, ma.m abhibhavitvaa  atikkamitvaa a~n~na.m manena na patthesi. ^b^na caapi me manasaa  appiyosii^eb^ti mayhampi ca manasaa tva.m appiyo na hosi, a~n~nama~n~na.m  piyasa.mvaasaava mayanti evamassa aggamahesii saccamakaasi.

[03] kumaaropi pitaraa akkhaatanayena rakkhaavaasamagga.m pa.tipajji.  yakkhopi ``khattiyaa naama bahumaayaa honti, ko jaanaati, ki.m  bhavissatii''ti rukkha.m abhiruhitvaa ra~n~no aagamana.m olokento  nisiidi. so kumaara.m aagacchanta.m disvaa ``pitara.m nivattetvaa putto  aagato bhavissati, natthi me bhaya''nti otaritvaa tassa pi.t.thi.m  dassento nisiidi. so aagantvaa tassa purato a.t.thaasi. atha  yakkho gaathamaaha --
[21] ``brahaa ujuu caarumukho kutosi, na ma.m pajaanaasi vane  vasanta.m.
[22] ludda.m ma.m ~natvaa `purisaadako'si, ko  sotthimaajaanamidhaavajeyyaa''ti..
[03] tattha ^a^V5.0028^ea^ ^b^ko sotthimaajaanamidhaavajeyyaa^eb^ti kumaara ko naama  puriso attano sotthibhaava.m jaananto icchanto idhaagaccheyya, tva.m  ajaananto aagato ma~n~neti.
[03] ta.m sutvaa kumaaro gaathamaaha --
[21] ``jaanaami ludda purisaadako tva.m, na ta.m na jaanaami  vane vasanta.m.
[22] aha~nca puttosmi jayaddisassa, mamajja khaada pituno  pamokkhaa''ti..
[03] tattha ^a^M5.0032^ea^ ^b^pamokkhaa^eb^ti pamokkhahetu aha.m  pitu jiivita.m datvaa idhaagato, tasmaa ta.m mu~nca, ma.m khaadaahiiti attho.
[03] tato yakkho gaathamaaha --
[21] ``jaanaami puttoti jayaddisassa, tathaa hi vo  mukhava.n.no ubhinna.m.
[22] sudukkara~n~neva ^a^P5.0031^ea^ kata.m taveda.m, yo  mattumicche pituno pamokkhaa''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^tathaa hi vo^eb^ti taadiso vo tumhaaka.m. ubhinnampi  sadisova mukhava.n.no hotiiti attho. ^b^kata.m taveda^eb^nti ida.m tava  kamma.m sudukkara.m.
[03] tato kumaaro gaathamaaha --
[21] ``na dukkara.m ki~nci mahettha ma~n~ne, yo mattumicche  pituno pamokkhaa.
[22] maatu ca hetu paraloka gantvaa, sukhena saggena ca  sampayutto''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^ki~nci mahettha ma~n~ne^eb^ti ki~nci aha.m ettha na  ma~n~naami. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- yakkha yo puggalo pitu vaa  pamokkhatthaaya maatu vaa hetu paraloka.m gantvaa sukhena sagge  nibbattanakasukhena sampayutto bhavitu.m ^b^mattumicche^eb^ maritu.m icchati,  tasmaa aha.m ettha maataapituuna.m atthaaya jiivitapariccaage ki~nci dukkara.m  na ma~n~naamiiti.
[03] ta.m ^a^V5.0029^ea^ sutvaa yakkho ``kumaara, mara.nassa abhayaanakasatto naama  natthi, tva.m kasmaa na bhaayasii''ti pucchi. so tassa kathento dve  gaathaa abhaasi --
[21] ``aha~nca kho attano paapakiriya.m, aavii raho vaapi  sare na jaatu.
[22] sa"nkhaatajaatiimara.nohamasmi, yatheva me idha tathaa parattha..
[21] ``khaadajja ^a^M5.0033^ea^ ma.m daani mahaanubhaava,  karassu kiccaani ima.m sariira.m.
[22] rukkhassa vaa te papataami aggaa, chaadayamaano mayha.m  tvamadesi ma.msa''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^sare na jaatuu^eb^ti eka.mseneva na saraami.  ^b^sa"nkhaatajaatiimara.nohamasmii^eb^ti aha.m ~naa.nena  suparicchinnajaatimara.no, jaatasatto amara.nadhammo naama natthiiti  jaanaami. ^b^yatheva me idhaa^eb^ti yatheva mama idha ^a^P5.0032^ea^,  tathaa paraloke, yathaa ca paraloke, tathaa idhaapi mara.nato  mutti naama natthiiti idampi mama ~naa.nena suparicchinna.m. ^b^karassu  kiccaanii^eb^ti iminaa sariirena kattabbakiccaani kara, ima.m te mayaa  nissa.t.tha.m sariira.m. ^b^chaadayamaano mayha.m tvamadesi ma.msa^eb^nti mayi  rukkhaggaa patitvaa mate mama sariirato tva.m chaadayamaano rocayamaano ya.m  ya.m icchasi, ta.m ta.m ma.msa.m adesi, khaadeyyaasiiti attho.
[03] yakkho tassa vacana.m sutvaa bhiito hutvaa ``na sakkaa imassa  ma.msa.m khaaditu.m, upaayena na.m palaapessaamii''ti cintetvaa ima.m gaathamaaha  --
[21] ``ida~nca te ruccati raajaputta, cajesi paa.na.m pituno  pamokkhaa.
[22] tasmaa hi so tva.m taramaanaruupo, sambha~nja ka.t.thaani  jalehi aggi''nti..
[03] tattha ^b^jalehii^eb^ti ara~n~na.m pavisitvaa saaradaaruuni aaharitvaa  aggi.m jaaletvaa niddhuume a"ngaare kara, tattha te ma.msa.m pacitvaa  khaadissaamiiti diipeti.
[01] so tathaa katvaa tassa santika.m agamaasi. ta.m kaara.na.m  pakaasento satthaa itara.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``tato have dhitimaa raajaputto, daaru.m samaaharitvaa  mahantamaggi.m.
[22] santiipayitvaa pa.tivedayittha, aadiipito daani  mahaayamaggii''ti..

[03] yakkho ^a^V5.0030^ea^ ^a^M5.0034^ea^ aggi.m katvaa aagata.m kumaara.m  oloketvaa ``aya.m purisasiiho, mara.naapissa bhaya.m natthi, mayaa  ettaka.m kaala.m eva.m nibbhayo naama na di.t.thapubbo''ti lomaha.msajaato  kumaara.m punappuna.m olokento nisiidi. kumaaro tassa kiriya.m disvaa  gaathamaaha --
[21] ``khaadajja ma.m daani pasayhakaari, ki.m ma.m muhu.m pekkhasi  ha.t.thalomo.
[22] tathaa ^a^P5.0033^ea^ tathaa tuyhamaha.m karomi, yathaa  yathaa ma.m chaadayamaano adesii''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^muhu^eb^nti punappuna.m. ^b^tathaa tathaa tuyhamaha^eb^nti  aha.m tuyha.m tathaa tathaa vacana.m karomi, idaani ki.m karissaami, yathaa  yathaa ma.m chaadayamaano rocayamaano adesi khaadissasi, tasmaa khaadajja  manti.
[03] athassa vacana.m sutvaa yakkho gaathamaaha --
[21] ``ko taadisa.m arahati khaaditaaye, dhamme .thita.m  saccavaadi.m vada~n~nu.m.
[22] muddhaapi tassa viphaleyya sattadhaa, yo taadisa.m saccavaadi.m  adeyyaa''ti..

[03] ta.m sutvaa kumaaro ``sace ma.m na khaaditukaamosi, atha kasmaa  daaruuni bha~njaapetvaa aggi.m kaaresii''ti vatvaa ``palaayissati nu kho,  noti tava parigga.nhanatthaayaa''ti vutte ``tva.m idaani ma.m katha.m  parigga.nhissasi, yoha.m tiracchaanayoniya.m nibbatto sakkassa devara~n~no  attaana.m parigga.nhitu.m naadaasi''nti vatvaa aaha --
[21] ``ida~nhi so braahma.na.m ma~n~namaano, saso avaasesi  sake sariire.
[22] teneva so candimaa devaputto, sasatthuto kaamaduhajja  yakkhaa''ti..

[03] tassattho -- ida~nhi so sasapa.n.dito ``braahma.no eso''ti  braahma.na.m ma~n~namaano ``ajja ima.m sariira.m khaaditvaa idheva vasaa''ti eva.m  sake sariire attano sariira.m daatu.m avaasesi, vasaapesiiti attho.  sariira~ncassa ^a^M5.0035^ea^ bhakkhatthaaya adaasi. sakko  pabbatarasa.m pii.letvaa aadaaya candama.n.dale sasalakkha.na.m akaasi. tato  pa.t.thaaya teneva sasalakkha.nena so candimaa devaputto ``sasii sasii''ti  eva.m sasatthuto lokassa kaamaduho pemava.d.dhano ajja yakkha virocati.  kappa.t.thiya~nheta.m paa.tihaariyanti.
[03] ta.m ^a^V5.0031^ea^ ^a^P5.0034^ea^ sutvaa yakkho kumaara.m vissajjento  gaathamaaha --
[21] ``cando yathaa raahumukhaa pamutto, virocate pannaraseva  bhaa.numaa.
[27] eva.m tuva.m porisaadaa pamutto, viroca kappile  mahaanubhaava.
[22] aamodaya.m pitara.m maatara~nca, sabbo ca te nandatu  ~naatipakkho''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^bhaa.numaa^eb^ti suuriyo. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- yathaa  pannarase raahumukhaa mutto cando vaa bhaa.numaa vaa virocati, eva.m tvampi  mama santikaa mutto kapilara.t.the viroca mahaanubhaavaati.  ^b^nandatuu^eb^ti tussatu.

[03] gaccha mahaaviiraati mahaasatta.m uyyojesi. sopi ta.m  nibbisevana.m katvaa pa~nca siilaani datvaa ``yakkho nu kho esa,  no''ti parigga.nhanto ``yakkhaana.m akkhiini rattaani honti  animmisaani ca, chaayaa na pa~n~naayati, acchambhitaa honti. naaya.m  yakkho, manusso eso. mayha.m pitu kira tayo bhaataro yakkhiniyaa  gahitaa. tesu etaaya dve khaaditaa bhavissanti, eko puttasinehena  pa.tijaggito bhavissati, iminaa tena bhavitabba.m, ima.m netvaa mayha.m pitu  aacikkhitvaa rajje pati.t.thaapessaamii''ti cintetvaa ``ehi ambho, na  tva.m yakkho, pitu me je.t.thabhaatikosi, ehi mayaa saddhi.m gantvaa  kulasantake rajje chatta.m ussaapehii''ti vatvaa itarena ``naaha.m  manusso''ti vutte ``na tva.m mayha.m saddahasi, atthi pana so, yassa  saddahasii''ti pucchitvaa ``atthi asuka.t.thaane dibbacakkhukataapaso''ti  vutte ta.m aadaaya tattha agamaasi. taapaso te disvaava ``ki.m  karontaa pitaaputtaa ara~n~ne carathaa''ti vatvaa tesa.m ~naatibhaava.m kathesi  ^a^M5.0036^ea^. porisaado tassa saddahitvaa ``taata, tva.m gaccha,  aha.m ekasmi~n~neva attabhaave dvidhaa jaato, na me rajjenattho,  pabbajissaamaha''nti taapasassa santike isipabbajja.m pabbaji. atha  na.m kumaaro vanditvaa nagara.m agamaasi. tamattha.m ^a^P5.0035^ea^  pakaasento satthaa --
[21] ``tato have dhitimaa raajaputto, kata~njalii pariyaaya  porisaada.m.
[22] anu~n~naato sotthi sukhii arogo, paccaagamaa  kapilamaliinasattaa''ti.. --
[25] gaatha.m vatvaa tassa nagara.m gatassa negamaadiihi katakiriya.m  dassento osaanagaathamaaha --
[21] ``ta.m ^a^V5.0032^ea^ negamaa jaanapadaa ca sabbe, hatthaarohaa rathikaa  pattikaa ca.
[22] namassamaanaa pa~njalikaa upaagamu.m, namatthu te  dukkarakaarakosii''ti..

[03] raajaa ``kumaaro kira aagato''ti sutvaa paccuggamana.m akaasi.  kumaaro mahaajanaparivaaro gantvaa raajaana.m vandi. atha na.m so  pucchi -- ``taata, katha.m taadisaa porisaadaa muttosii''ti. ``taata,  naaya.m yakkho, tumhaaka.m je.t.thabhaatiko, esa mayha.m petteyyo''ti sabba.m  pavatti.m aarocetvaa ``tumhehi mama petteyya.m da.t.thu.m va.t.tatii''ti aaha.  raajaa ta"nkha.na~n~neva bheri.m caraapetvaa mahantena parivaarena taapasaana.m  santika.m agamaasi. mahaataapaso tassa yakkhiniyaa aanetvaa  akhaaditvaa positakaara.na~nca yakkhaabhaavakaara.na~nca tesa.m ~naatibhaava~nca  sabba.m vitthaarato kathesi. raajaa ``ehi, bhaatika, rajja.m kaarehii''ti  aaha. ``ala.m mahaaraajaa''ti. ``tena hi etha uyyaane vasissatha,  aha.m vo catuuhi paccayehi upa.t.thahissaamii''ti? ``na aagacchaami  mahaaraajaa''ti. raajaa tesa.m assamapadato aviduure eka.m pabbatantara.m  bandhitvaa mahanta.m ta.laaka.m kaaretvaa kedaare sampaadetvaa maha.d.dhakulasahassa.m  aanetvaa mahaagaama.m nivaasetvaa taapasaana.m bhikkhaacaara.m pa.t.thapesi. so  gaamo cuu.lakammaasadammanigamo ^a^M5.0037^ea^ naama jaato.  sutasomamahaasattena ^a^P5.0036^ea^ porisaadassa damitapadeso pana  mahaakammaasadammanigamoti veditabbo.

[03] satthaa ida.m dhammadesana.m aaharitvaa saccaani pakaasetvaa jaataka.m  samodhaanesi, saccapariyosaane maatuposakatthero sotaapattiphale pati.t.thahi.  tadaa maataapitaro mahaaraajakulaani ahesu.m, taapaso saariputto,  porisaado a"ngulimaalo, kani.t.thaa uppalava.n.naa, aggamahesii  raahulamaataa, aliinasattukumaaro pana ahameva ahosinti.
[06] jayaddisajaatakava.n.nanaa tatiyaa.

[03] ^b^ki.m nu socasii^eb^ti ida.m satthaa jetavane viharanto eka.m  daharabhikkhuni.m aarabbha kathesi. saa kira saavatthiya.m kuladhiitaa  gharaavaase aadiinava.m disvaa saasane pabbajitvaa ekadivasa.m bhikkhuniihi  saddhi.m dhammasavanaaya gantvaa ala"nkatadhammaasane nisiiditvaa dhamma.m  desentassa dasabalassa aparimaa.napu~n~napabhaavaabhinibbatta.m  uttamaruupasampattiyutta.m attabhaava.m oloketvaa ``parici.n.napubbaa ^a^V5.0033^ea^  nu kho me bhavasmi.m vicarantiyaa imassa mahaapurisassa paadaparicaarikaa''ti  cintesi. athassaa ta"nkha.na~n~neva jaatissara~naa.na.m uppajji --  ``chaddantavaara.nakaale aha.m imassa mahaapurisassa paadaparicaarikaa  bhuutapubbaa''ti. athassaa sarantiyaa mahanta.m piitipaamojja.m uppajji.  saa piitivegena mahaahasita.m hasitvaa puna cintesi --  ``paadaparicaarikaa naama saamikaana.m hitajjhaasayaa appakaa,  ahitajjhaasayaava bahutaraa, hitajjhaasayaa nu kho aha.m imassa  mahaapurisassa ahosi.m, ahitajjhaasayaa''ti. saa anussaramaanaa  ``aha.m appamattaka.m dosa.m hadaye .thapetvaa viisaratanasatika.m  chaddantamahaagajissara.m sonuttara.m naama nesaada.m pesetvaa visapiitasallena  vijjhaapetvaa jiivitakkhaya.m paapesi''nti addasa. athassaa soko  udapaadi, hadaya.m u.nha.m ahosi, soka.m sandhaaretu.m asakkontii assasitvaa  passasitvaa mahaasaddena parodi. ta.m disvaa satthaa ^a^M5.0038^ea^  sita.m paatu karitvaa ``ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo sitassa  paatukammaayaa''ti bhikkhusa"nghena pu.t.tho ``bhikkhave, aya.m daharabhikkhunii  pubbe mayi kata.m aparaadha.m saritvaa rodatii''ti vatvaa atiita.m aahari.

[03] atiite ^a^P5.0037^ea^ himavantapadese chaddantadaha.m upanissaaya  a.t.thasahassaa hatthinaagaa vasi.msu iddhimantaa vehaasa"ngamaa. tadaa  bodhisatto je.t.thakavaara.nassa putto hutvaa nibbatti, so sabbaseto  ahosi rattamukhapaado. so aparabhaage vuddhippatto a.t.thaasiitihatthubbedho  ahosi viisaratanasataayaamo. a.t.thapa.n.naasahatthaaya rajatadaamasadisaaya  so.n.daaya samannaagato. dantaa panassa parikkhepato pannarasahatthaa ahesu.m  diighato ti.msahatthaa chabba.n.nara.msiihi samannaagataa. so a.t.thanna.m  naagasahassaana.m je.t.thako ahosi, pa~ncasate paccekabuddhe puujesi. tassa  dve aggamahesiyo ahesu.m -- cuu.lasubhaddaa, mahaasubhaddaa caati. naagaraajaa  a.t.thanaagasahassaparivaaro ka~ncanaguhaaya.m vasati. so pana chaddantadaho  aayaamato ca vitthaarato ca pa.n.naasayojano hoti. tassa majjhe  dvaadasayojanappamaa.ne .thaane sevaalo vaa pa.naka.m vaa natthi,  ma.nikkhandhava.n.naudakameva santi.t.thati, tadanantara.m yojanavitthata.m suddha.m  kallahaaravana.m, ta.m udaka.m parikkhipitvaa .thita.m, tadanantara.m  yojanavitthatameva suddha.m niiluppalavana.m ta.m parikkhipitvaa .thita.m, tato  yojanayojanavitthataaneva rattuppalasetuppalarattapadumasetapadumakumudavanaani  purima.m purima.m parikkhipitvaa .thitaani. imesa.m pana sattanna.m vanaana.m  anantara.m sabbesampi tesa.m kallahaaraadivanaana.m vasena omissakavana.m  yojanavitthatameva taani parikkhipitvaa .thita.m. tadanantara.m naagaana.m  ka.tippamaa.ne udake yojanavitthatameva rattasaalivana.m, tadanantara.m  udakapariyante yojanavitthatameva  niilapiitalohitaodaatasurabhisukhumakusumasamaaki.n.na.m khuddakagacchavana.m,  iti imaani dasa vanaani yojanavitthataaneva. tato  khuddakaraajamaasamahaaraajamaasamuggavana.m, tadanantara.m  tipusaelaalukalaabukumbha.n.davallivanaani, tato puugarukkhappamaa.na.m ^a^V5.0034^ea^ ucchuvana.m,  tato hatthidantappamaa.naphala.m kadalivana.m ^a^P5.0038^ea^, tato  saalavana.m, tadanantara.m caa.tippamaa.naphala.m panasavana.m, tato madhuraphala.m  ci~ncavana.m, tato ambavana.m, tato kapi.t.thavana.m, tato omissako  mahaavanasa.n.do, tato ve.luvana.m, ayamassa tasmi.m ^a^M5.0039^ea^ kaale  sampatti. sa.myutta.t.thakathaaya.m pana idaani pavattamaanasampattiyeva kathitaa.

[03] ve.luvana.m pana parikkhipitvaa satta pabbataa .thitaa. tesa.m  baahirantato pa.t.thaaya pa.thamo cuu.lakaa.lapabbato naama, dutiyo  mahaakaa.lapabbato naama, tato udakapabbato naama, tato  candimapassapabbato naama, tato suuriyapassapabbato naama, tato  ma.nipassapabbato naama, sattamo suva.n.napassapabbato naama. so  ubbedhato sattayojaniko chaddantadaha.m parikkhipitvaa pattassa mukhava.t.ti  viya .thito. tassa abbhantarima.m passa.m suva.n.nava.n.na.m, tato  nikkhantena obhaasena chaddantadaho samuggatabaalasuuriyo viya hoti.  baahirapabbatesu pana eko ubbedhato chayojaniko, eko pa~nca, eko  cattaari, eko tii.ni, eko dve, eko yojaniko, eva.m  sattapabbataparikkhittassa pana tassa dahassa pubbuttaraka.n.ne  udakavaatappahara.nokaase mahaanigrodharukkho atthi. tassa khandho  parikkhepato pa~ncayojaniko, ubbedhato sattayojaniko, catuusu disaasu  catasso saakhaa chayojanikaa, uddha.m uggatasaakhaapi chayojanikaava,  iti so muulato pa.t.thaaya ubbedhena terasayojaniko, saakhaana.m  orimantato yaava paarimantaa dvaadasayojaniko, a.t.thahi paarohasahassehi  pa.tima.n.dito mu.n.dama.nipabbato viya vilaasamaano ti.t.thati.  chaddantadahassa pana pacchimadisaabhaage suva.n.napassapabbate  dvaadasayojanikaa ka~ncanaguhaa ti.t.thati. chaddanto naama naagaraajaa  vassaaratte hemante a.t.thasahassanaagaparivuto ka~ncanaguhaaya.m vasati.  gimhakaale udakavaata.m sampa.ticchamaano mahaanigrodhamuule paarohantare  ti.t.thatii.

[03] athassa ekadivasa.m ``mahaasaalavana.m pupphita''nti taru.nanaagaa  aagantvaa aarocayi.msu. so saparivaaro ``saalakii.la.m  kii.lissaamii''ti ^a^P5.0039^ea^ saalavana.m gantvaa eka.m supupphita.m  saalarukkha.m kumbhena pahari. tadaa cuu.lasubhaddaa pa.tivaatapasse .thitaa,  tassaa sariire sukkhada.n.dakamissakaani puraa.napa.n.naani ceva  tambakipillikaani ca pati.msu. mahaasubhaddaa adhovaatapasse .thitaa,  tassaa sariire pupphare.nuki~njakkhapattaani pati.msu. cuu.lasubhaddaa ``aya.m  naagaraajaa attano piyabhariyaaya upari pupphare.nuki~njakkhapattaani  paatesi, mama ^a^M5.0040^ea^ sariire sukkhada.n.dakamissaani  puraa.napa.n.naani ceva tambakipillikaani ca paatesi, hotu, kaatabba.m  jaanissaamii''ti mahaasatte vera.m bandhi.

[01] aparampi divasa.m naagaraajaa saparivaaro nhaanatthaaya  chaddantadaha.m otari. atha dve taru.nanaagaa so.n.daahi ^a^V5.0035^ea^ usirakalaape  gahetvaa kelaasakuu.ta.m majjantaa viya nhaapesu.m. tasmi.m nhatvaa utti.n.ne dve  kare.nuyo nhaapesu.m. taapi uttaritvaa mahaasattassa santike a.t.tha.msu.  tato a.t.thasahassanaagaasara.m otaritvaa udakakii.la.m kii.litvaa sarato  naanaapupphaani aaharitvaa rajatathuupa.m ala"nkarontaa viya mahaasatta.m  ala"nkaritvaa pacchaa dve kare.nuyo ala"nkari.msu. atheko hatthii sare  vicaranto sattuddaya.m naama mahaapaduma.m labhitvaa aaharitvaa mahaasattassa  adaasi. so ta.m so.n.daaya gahetvaa re.nu.m kumbhe okiritvaa je.t.thakaaya  mahaasubhaddaaya adaasi. ta.m disvaa itaraa ``idampi sattuddaya.m  mahaapaduma.m attano piyabhariyaaya eva adaasi, na mayha''nti punapi  tasmi.m vera.m bandhi.

[03] athekadivasa.m bodhisatte madhuraphalaani ceva bhisamu.laalaani ca  pokkharamadhunaa yojetvaa pa~ncasate paccekabuddhe bhojente cuu.lasubhaddaa  attanaa laddhaphalaaphala.m paccekabuddhaana.m datvaa ``bhante, ito cavitvaa  maddaraajakule nibbattitvaa subhaddaa naama raajaka~n~naa hutvaa vayappattaa  baaraa.nasira~n~no aggamahesibhaava.m patvaa tassa piyaa manaapaa ta.m attano  ruci.m kaaretu.m samatthaa hutvaa tassa aacikkhitvaa eka.m luddaka.m pesetvaa  ima.m hatthi.m visapiitena sallena vijjhaapetvaa jiivitakkhaya.m paapetvaa  chabba.n.nara.msi.m ^a^P5.0040^ea^ vissajjente yamakadante aaharaapetu.m  samatthaa homii''ti patthana.m .thapesi. saa tato pa.t.thaaya gocara.m aggahetvaa  sussitvaa nacirasseva kaala.m katvaa maddara.t.the raajaaggamahesiyaa  kucchimhi nibbatti, subhaddaatissaa naama.m kari.msu. atha na.m vayappatta.m  baaraa.nasira~n~no ada.msu. saa tassa piyaa ahosi manaapaa, so.lasanna.m  itthisahassaana.m je.t.thikaa hutvaa jaatissara~naa.na~nca pa.tilabhi. saa  cintesi -- ``samiddhaa me patthanaa, idaani tassa naagassa  yamakadante aaharaapessaamii''ti. tato sariira.m telena makkhetvaa  kili.t.thavattha.m nivaasetvaa gilaanaakaara.m dassetvaa sirigabbha.m pavisitvaa  ma~ncake nipajji. raajaa ``kuhi.m subhaddaa''ti vatvaa ``gilaanaa''ti  sutvaa sirigabbha.m pavisitvaa ma~ncake nisiiditvaa tassaa pi.t.thi.m  parimajjanto pa.thama.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``ki.m ^a^M5.0041^ea^ nu socasinucca"ngi, pa.n.duusi  varava.n.nini.
[22] milaayasi visaalakkhi, maalaava parimadditaa''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^anucca"ngii^eb^ti ka~ncanasannibhasariire. ^b^maalaava  parimadditaa^eb^ti hatthehi parimadditaa padumamaalaa viya.
[03] ta.m sutvaa saa itara.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``doha.lo ^a^V5.0036^ea^ me mahaaraaja, supinantenupajjhagaa.
[22] na so sulabharuupova, yaadiso mama doha.lo''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^na so^eb^ti yaadiso mama ^b^supinantenupajjhagaa^eb^  supine passantiyaa mayaa di.t.tho doha.lo, so sulabharuupo viya na  hoti, dullabho so, mayha.m pana ta.m alabhantiyaa jiivita.m natthiiti avaca.
[03] ta.m sutvaa raajaa gaathamaaha --
[21] ``ye keci maanusaa kaamaa, idha lokamhi nandane.
[22] sabbe te pacuraa mayha.m, aha.m te dammi doha.la''nti..
[03] tattha ^b^pacuraa^eb^ti bahuu sulabhaa.

[03] ta.m sutvaa devii, ``mahaaraaja, dullabho mama doha.lo, na ta.m  idaani kathemi, yaavattakaa pana te vijite luddaa, te sabbe sannipaatetha  ^a^P5.0041^ea^, tesa.m majjhe kathessaamii''ti diipentii anantara.m  gaathamaaha --
[21] ``luddaa deva samaayantu, ye keci vijite tava.
[22] etesa.m ahamakkhissa.m, yaadiso mama doha.lo''ti..

[03] raajaa ``saadhuu''ti sirigabbhaa nikkhamitvaa ``yaavatikaa  tiyojanasatike kaasikara.t.the luddaa, tesa.m sannipaatatthaaya bheri.m  caraapethaa''ti amacce aa.naapesi. te tathaa aka.msu. nacirasseva  kaasira.t.thavaasino luddaa yathaabala.m pa.n.naakaara.m gahetvaa aagantvaa  aagatabhaava.m ra~n~no aarocaapesu.m ^a^M5.0042^ea^. te sabbepi  sa.t.thisahassamattaa ahesu.m. raajaa tesa.m aagatabhaava.m ~natvaa vaatapaane .thito  hattha.m pasaaretvaa tesa.m aagatabhaava.m deviyaa kathento aaha --
[21] ``ime te luddakaa devi, katahatthaa visaaradaa.
[22] vana~n~nuu ca miga~n~nuu ca, mamatthe cattajiivitaa''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^V5.0037^ea^ ime teti ye tva.m sannipaataapesi, ime te. katahatthaati  vijjhanachedanesu katahatthaa kusalaa susikkhitaa. visaaradaati  nibbhayaa. vana~n~nuu ca miga~n~nuu caati vanaani ca mige ca jaananti.  mamattheti sabbepi cete mamatthe cattajiivitaa, yamaha.m icchaami, ta.m  karontiiti.
[03] ta.m sutvaa devii te aamantetvaa itara.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``luddaputtaa nisaametha, yaavantettha samaagataa.
[27] chabbisaa.na.m gaja.m seta.m, addasa.m supine aha.m.
[22] tassa dantehi me attho, alaabhe natthi jiivita''nti..
[03] tattha nisaamethaati su.naatha. chabbisaa.nanti chabba.n.navisaa.na.m.
[03] ta.m sutvaa luddaputtaa aaha.msu --
[21] ``na no pituuna.m na pitaamahaana.m, di.t.tho suto ku~njaro  chabbisaa.no.
[22] yamaddasaa ^a^P5.0042^ea^ supine raajaputtii, akkhaahi  no yaadiso hatthinaago''ti..

[03] tattha pituunanti kara.natthe saamivacana.m. ida.m vutta.m hoti --  devi neva amhaaka.m pituuhi, na pitaamahehi evaruupo ku~njaro di.t.thapubbo,  pageva amhehi, tasmaa attanaa di.t.thalakkha.navasena akkhaahi no,  yaadiso tayaa di.t.tho hatthinaagoti.
[03] anantaragaathaapi ^a^M5.0043^ea^ teheva vuttaa --
[21] ``disaa catasso vidisaa catasso, uddha.m adho dasa  disaa imaayo.
[22] katama.m disa.m ti.t.thati naagaraajaa, yamaddasaa supine  chabbisaa.na''nti..
[03] tattha disaati disaasu. katamanti etaasu disaasu katamaaya  disaayaati.

[03] eva.m vutte subhaddaa sabbe ludde oloketvaa tesa.m antare pattha.tapaada.m  bhattapu.tasadisaja"ngha.m mahaajaa.nuka.m mahaaphaasuka.m bahalamassutambadaa.thika.m  nibbiddhapi"ngala.m dussa.n.thaana.m biibhaccha.m sabbesa.m matthakamatthakena  ^a^V5.0038^ea^ pa~n~naayamaana.m mahaasattassa pubbaveri.m sonuttara.m naama nesaada.m disvaa  ``esa mama vacana.m kaatu.m sakkhissatii''ti raajaana.m anujaanaapetvaa ta.m  aadaaya sattabhuumikapaasaadassa uparimatala.m aaruyha uttarasiihapa~njara.m  vivaritvaa uttarahimavantaabhimukha.m hattha.m pasaaretvaa catasso gaathaa  abhaasi --
[21] ``ito uju.m uttariya.m disaaya.m, atikkamma so satta  girii brahmante.
[22] suva.n.napasso naama girii u.laaro, supupphito  kimpurisaanuci.n.no..
[21] ``aaruyha sela.m bhavana.m kinnaraana.m, olokaya  pabbatapaadamuula.m.
[22] atha ^a^P5.0043^ea^ dakkhasii meghasamaanava.n.na.m,  nigrodharaaja.m a.t.thasahassapaada.m..
[21] ``tatthacchatii ku~njaro chabbisaa.no, sabbaseto duppasaho  parebhi.
[22] rakkhanti na.m a.t.thasahassanaagaa, iisaadantaa  vaatajavappahaarino..
[21] ``ti.t.thanti ^a^M5.0044^ea^ te tumuula.m passasantaa,  kuppanti vaatassapi eritassa.
[22] manussabhuuta.m pana tattha disvaa, bhasma.m kareyyu.m naassa  rajopi tassaa''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^ito^eb^ti imamhaa .thaanaa. ^b^uttariya^eb^nti uttaraaya.  ^b^u.laaro^eb^ti mahaa itarehi chahi pabbatehi uccataro.  ^b^olokayaa^eb^ti aalokeyyaasi. ^b^tatthacchatii^eb^ti tasmi.m  nigrodhamuule gimhasamaye udakavaata.m sampa.ticchanto ti.t.thati.  ^b^duppasaho^eb^ti a~n~ne ta.m upagantvaa pasayhakaara.m kaatu.m samatthaa naama  natthiiti duppasaho parebhi. ^b^iisaadantaa^eb^ti rathiisaaya samaanadantaa.  ^b^vaatajavappahaarino^eb^ti vaatajavena gantvaa paccaamitte pahara.nasiilaa  evaruupaa a.t.thasahassanaagaa naagaraajaana.m rakkhanti. ^b^tumuula^eb^nti  bhi.msanaka.m mahaasaddaanubandha.m assaasa.m mu~ncantaa ti.t.thanti.  ^b^eritassaa^eb^ti vaatapaharitassa ya.m saddaanubandha.m erita.m calana.m  kampana.m, tassapi kuppanti, eva.mpharusaa te naagaa. ^b^naassaa^eb^ti  tassa naasavaatena viddha.msetvaa bhasma.m katassa tassa rajopi na  bhaveyyaati.
[03] ta.m sutvaa sonuttaro mara.nabhayabhiito aaha --
[21] ``bahuu ^a^V5.0039^ea^ hime raajakulamhi santi, pi.landhanaa  jaataruupassa devi.
[27] muttaa ^a^P5.0044^ea^ ma.nii ve.luriyaamayaa ca, ki.m  kaahasi dantapi.landhanena.
[22] maaretukaamaa ku~njara.m chabbisaa.na.m, udaahu ghaatessasi  luddaputte''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^pi.landhanaa^eb^ti aabhara.naani. ^b^ve.luriyaamayaa^eb^ti  ve.luriyamayaani. ^b^ghaatessasii^eb^ti udaahu pi.landhanaapadesena luddaputte  ghaataapetukaamaasiiti pucchati.
[03] tato devii gaathamaaha --
[21] ``saa issitaa dukkhitaa casmi ludda, uddha~nca  sussaami anussarantii.
[22] karohi me luddaka etamattha.m, dassaami te gaamavaraani  pa~ncaa''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^M5.0045^ea^ ^b^saa^eb^ti saa aha.m.  ^b^anussarantii^eb^ti tena vaara.nena pure mayi kata.m vera.m anussaramaanaa.  ^b^dassaami te^eb^ti etasmi.m te atthe nipphaadite sa.mvacchare  satasahassu.t.thaanake pa~nca gaamavare dadaamiiti.

[03] eva~nca pana vatvaa ``samma luddaputta aha.m `eta.m chaddantahatthi.m  maaraapetvaa yamakadante aaharaapetu.m samatthaa homii'ti pubbe paccekabuddhaana.m  daana.m datvaa patthana.m pa.t.thapesi.m, mayaa supinantena di.t.tha.m naama natthi, saa  pana mayaa patthitapatthanaa samijjhissati, tva.m gacchanto maa bhaayii''ti  ta.m samassaasetvaa pesesi. so ``saadhu, ayye''ti tassaa vacana.m  sampa.ticchitvaa ``tena hi me paaka.ta.m katvaa tassa vasana.t.thaana.m  kathehii''ti pucchanto ima.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``katthacchatii kattha mupeti .thaana.m, viithissa kaa  nhaanagatassa hoti.
[22] katha~nhi so nhaayati naagaraajaa, katha.m vijaanemu gati.m  gajassaa''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^katthacchatii^eb^ti kattha vasati. ^b^kattha mupetii^eb^ti  kattha upeti, kattha ti.t.thatiiti attho. ^b^viithissa kaa^eb^ti tassa  nhaanagatassa kaa viithi hoti, kataramaggena so gacchati. ^b^katha.m  vijaanemu gati^eb^nti tayaa akathite maya.m katha.m tassa naagaraajassa gati.m  vijaanissaama, tasmaa kathehi noti attho.
[03] tato ^a^V5.0040^ea^ ^a^P5.0045^ea^ saa jaatissara~naa.nena paccakkhato  di.t.tha.t.thaana.m tassa aacikkhantii dve gaathaa abhaasi --
[21] ``tattheva saa pokkhara.nii aduure, rammaa sutitthaa ca  mahodikaa ca.
[22] sampupphitaa bhamaraga.naanuci.n.naa, ettha hi so nhaayati  naagaraajaa..
[21] ``siisa.m ^a^M5.0046^ea^ nahaatuppalamaalabhaarii,  sabbaseto pu.n.dariikattaca"ngii.
[22] aamodamaano gacchati sanniketa.m, purakkhatvaa mahesi.m  sabbabhadda''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^tatthevaa^eb^ti tassa vasana.t.thaaneyeva.  ^b^pokkhara.nii^eb^ti chaddantadaha.m sandhaayaaha. ^b^sampupphitaa^eb^ti  duvidhehi kumudehi tividhehi uppalehi pa~ncava.n.nehi ca padumehi  samantato pupphitaa. ^b^ettha hi so^eb^ti so naagaraajaa ettha  chaddantadahe nhaayati. ^b^uppalamaalabhaarii^eb^ti uppalaadiina.m  jalajathalajaana.m pupphaana.m maala.m dhaarento. ^b^pu.n.dariikattaca"ngii^eb^ti  pu.n.dariikasadisatacena odaatena a"ngena samannaagato.  ^b^aamodamaano^eb^ti aamoditapamodito. ^b^sanniketa^eb^nti attano  vasana.t.thaana.m. ^b^purakkhatvaa^eb^ti sabbabhadda.m naama mahesi.m purato katvaa  a.t.thahi naagasahassehi parivuto attano vasana.t.thaana.m gacchatiiti.

[03] ta.m sutvaa sonuttaro ``saadhu ayye, aha.m ta.m vaara.na.m maaretvaa  tassa dante aaharissaamii''ti sampa.ticchi. athassa saa tu.t.thaa sahassa.m  datvaa ``geha.m taava gaccha, ito sattaahaccayena tattha gamissasii''ti ta.m  uyyojetvaa kammaare pakkosaapetvaa ``taataa amhaaka.m  vaasipharasu-kuddaala-nikhaadana-mu.t.thikave.lugumbacchedana-sattha-ti.nalaayana-asilohada.n.dakakacakhaa.nuka-  ayasi"nghaa.takehi attho, sabba.m siigha.m katvaa aaharathaa''ti aa.naapetvaa  cammakaare pakkosaapetvaa ``taataa amhaaka.m kumbhabhaaragaahita.m cammabhasta.m  kaatu.m va.t.tati, cammayottavarattahatthipaadaupaahanacammachattehipi no attho,  sabba.m siigha.m katvaa aaharathaa''ti aa.naapesi. te ubhopi sabbaani  taani siigha.m katvaa aaharitvaa ^a^P5.0046^ea^ ada.msu. saa tassa  paatheyya.m sa.mvidahitvaa ara.nisahita.m aadi.m katvaa sabba.m upakara.na~nca  baddhasattumaadi.m katvaa paatheyya~nca cammabhastaaya.m pakkhipi, ta.m sabbampi  kumbhabhaaramatta.m ahosi.

[03] sonuttaropi attano parivaccha.m katvaa sattame divase aagantvaa  devi.m vanditvaa a.t.thaasi. atha na.m saa ``ni.t.thita.m te samma  sabbuupakara.na.m, ima.m taava pasibbaka.m ga.nhaa''ti aaha. so pana  mahaathaamo pa~ncanna.m hatthiina.m bala.m ^a^M5.0047^ea^ dhaareti, tasmaa  tambuulapasibbaka.m viya ukkhipitvaa upakacchantare ^a^V5.0041^ea^ .thapetvaa rittahattho  viya a.t.thaasi. subhaddaa luddassa puttadaaraana.m paribbaya.m datvaa ra~n~no  aacikkhitvaa sonuttara.m uyyojesi. sopi raajaana~nca devi~nca  vanditvaa raajanivesanaa oruyha rathe .thatvaa mahantena parivaarena nagaraa  nikkhamitvaa gaamanigamajanapadaparamparaaya paccanta.m patvaa jaanapade  nivattetvaa paccantavaasiihi saddhi.m ara~n~na.m pavisitvaa manussapatha.m  atikkamma paccantavaasinopi nivattetvaa ekakova gacchanto ti.msayojana.m  patvaa pa.thama.m dabbagahana.m kaasagahana.m ti.nagahana.m tulasigahana.m saragahana.m  tirivacchagahananti cha gahanaani, ka.n.takave.lugumbagahanaani vettagahana.m  omissakagahana.m na.lagahana.m saragahanasadisa.m uragenapi dubbinivijjha.m  ghanavanagahana.m rukkhagahana.m ve.lugahana.m aparampi ve.lugumbagahana.m kalalagahana.m  udakagahana.m pabbatagahananti a.t.thaarasa gahanaani pa.tipaa.tiyaa patvaa  dabbagahanaadiini asitena laayitvaa tulasigahanaadiini  ve.lugumbacchedanasatthena chinditvaa rukkhe pharasunaa ko.t.tetvaa atimahante  rukkhe nikhaadanena vijjhitvaa magga.m karonto ve.luvane nisse.ni.m katvaa  ve.lugumba.m aaruyha ve.lu.m chinditvaa aparassa ve.lugumbassa upari paatetvaa  ve.lugumbamatthakena gantvaa kalalagahane sukkharukkhapadara.m ^a^P5.0047^ea^  attharitvaa tena gantvaa apara.m attharitvaa itara.m ukkhipitvaa  puna purato attharanto ta.m atikkamitvaa udakagahane do.ni.m katvaa taaya  udakagahana.m taritvaa pabbatapaade .thatvaa ayasi"nghaa.taka.m yottena bandhitvaa  uddha.m khipitvaa pabbate laggaapetvaa yottenaaruyha vajiraggena lohada.n.dena  pabbata.m vijjhitvaa khaa.nuka.m ko.t.tetvaa tattha .thatvaa si"nghaa.taka.m  aaka.d.dhitvaa puna upari laggaapetvaa tattha .thito cammayotta.m olambetvaa  ta.m aadaaya otaritvaa he.t.thimakhaa.nuke bandhitvaa vaamahatthena yotta.m gahetvaa  dakkhi.nahatthena muggara.m aadaaya yotta.m paharitvaa khaa.nuka.m niiharitvaa puna  abhiruhati. etenupaayena pabbatamatthaka.m abhiruyha parato otaranto  purimanayeneva pa.thama.m pabbatamatthake khaa.nuka.m ko.t.tetvaa cammapasibbake  yotta.m bandhitvaa khaa.nuke ve.thetvaa saya.m antopasibbake nisiiditvaa  makka.takaana.m makka.tasuttavissajjanaakaarena yotta.m vinive.thento otarati.  cammachattena vaata.m gaahaapetvaa saku.no viya otaratiitipi vadantiyeva.

[03] eva.m ^a^M5.0048^ea^ tassa subhaddaaya vacana.m aadaaya nagaraa  nikkhamitvaa sattarasa gahanaani atikkamitvaa pabbatagahana.m patvaa tatraapi  cha pabbate atikkamitvaa suva.n.napassapabbatamatthaka.m aaru.lhabhaava.m  aavikaronto satthaa aaha --
[21] ``tattheva so uggahetvaana vaakya.m, aadaaya tuu.ni~nca  dhanu~nca luddo.
[22] vituriyati satta girii brahante, suva.n.napassa.m naama giri.m  u.laara.m..
[21] ``aaruyha ^a^V5.0042^ea^ sela.m bhavana.m kinnaraana.m, olokayii  pabbatapaadamuula.m.
[22] tatthaddasaa meghasamaanava.n.na.m, nigrodharaaja.m a.t.thasahassapaada.m..
[21] ``tatthaddasaa ^a^P5.0048^ea^ ku~njara.m chabbisaa.na.m,  sabbaseta.m duppasaha.m parebhi.
[22] rakkhanti na.m a.t.thasahassanaagaa, iisaadantaa  vaatajavappahaarino..
[21] ``tatthaddasaa pokkhara.ni.m aduure, ramma.m sutittha~nca  mahodika~nca.
[22] sampupphita.m bhamaraga.naanuci.n.na.m, yattha hi so nhaayati  naagaraajaa..
[21] ``disvaana naagassa gati.m .thiti~nca, viithissayaa  nhaanagatassa hoti.
[22] opaatamaagacchi anariyaruupo, payojito  cittavasaanugaayaa''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^so^eb^ti, bhikkhave, so luddo tattheva  sattabhuumikapaasaadatale .thitaaya tassaa subhaddaaya vacana.m uggahetvaa  saratuu.ni~nca mahaadhanu~nca aadaaya pabbatagahana.m patvaa ``kataro nu kho  suva.n.napassapabbato naamaa''ti satta ^a^M5.0049^ea^ mahaapabbate  vituriyati, tasmi.m kaale tuleti tiireti. so eva.m tiirento  suva.n.napassa.m naama giri.m u.laara.m disvaa ``aya.m so bhavissatii''ti  cintesi. ^b^olokayii^eb^ti ta.m kinnaraana.m bhavanabhuuta.m pabbata.m aaruyha  subhaddaaya dinnasa~n~naavasena he.t.thaa olokesi. ^b^tatthaa^eb^ti tasmi.m  pabbatapaadamuule aviduureyeva ta.m nigrodha.m addasa.

[03] ^b^tatthaa^eb^ti tasmi.m nigrodharukkhamuule .thita.m. ^b^tatthaa^eb^ti  tattheva antopabbate tassa nigrodhassaaviduure yattha so nhaayati, ta.m  pokkhara.ni.m addasa. ^b^disvaanaa^eb^ti suva.n.napassapabbataa oruyha  hatthiina.m gatakaale hatthipaadaupaahana.m aaruyha tassa naagara~n~no gata.t.thaana.m  nibaddhavasana.t.thaana.m upadhaarento ``iminaa maggena gacchati, idha  nhaayati, nhatvaa utti.n.no, idha ti.t.thatii''ti sabba.m disvaa  ahirikabhaavena anariyaruupo taaya cittavasaanugaaya payojito, tasmaa  opaata.m aagacchi pa.tipajji, aavaa.ta.m kha.niiti attho.

[03] tatraaya.m anupubbikathaa -- ``so kira mahaasattassa vasanokaasa.m  sattamaasaadhikehi sattahi sa.mvaccharehi sattahi ca divasehi patvaa  vuttanayeneva tassa vasanokaasa.m sallakkhetvaa ``idha aavaa.ta.m kha.nitvaa  tasmi.m .thito vaara.naadhipati.m visapiitena sallena vijjhitvaa  jiivitakkhaya.m paapessaamii''ti vavatthapetvaa ara~n~na.m pavisitvaa  thambhaadiina.m atthaaya rukkhe chinditvaa dabbasambhaare ^a^V5.0043^ea^ sajjetvaa hatthiisu  ^a^P5.0049^ea^ nhaanatthaaya gatesu tassa vasanokaase mahaakuddaalena  caturassa.m aavaa.ta.m kha.nitvaa uddhatapa.msu.m biija.m vapanto viya udakena  vikiritvaa udukkhalapaasaa.naana.m upari thambhe pati.t.thapetvaa tulaa ca kaaje  ca datvaa padaraani attharitvaa ka.n.dappamaa.na.m chidda.m katvaa upari pa.msu~nca  kacavara~nca pakkhipitvaa ekena passena attano pavisana.t.thaana.m katvaa eva.m  ni.t.thite aavaa.te paccuusakaaleyeva patisiisaka.m pa.timu~ncitvaa kaasaayaani  paridahitvaa saddhi.m visapiitena sallena dhanu.m aadaaya aavaa.ta.m otaritvaa  a.t.thaasi. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
[21] ``kha.nitvaana kaasu.m phalakehi chaadayi, attaanamodhaaya  dhanu~nca luddo.
[22] passaagata.m puthusallena naaga.m, samappayii dukka.takammakaarii..
[21] ``viddho ^a^M5.0050^ea^ ca naago ko~ncamanaadi  ghora.m, sabbe ca naagaa ninnadu.m ghoraruupa.m.
[22] ti.na~nca ka.t.tha~nca ra.na.m karontaa, dhaavi.msu te a.t.tha disaa  samantato..
[21] ``vadhissametanti paraamasanto, kaasaavamaddakkhi dhaja.m  isiina.m.
[22] dukkhena phu.t.thassudapaadi sa~n~naa, arahaddhajo sabbhi  avajjharuupo''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^odhaayaa^eb^ti odahitvaa pavesetvaa.  ^b^passaagata^eb^nti attano aavaa.tassa passa.m aagata.m. so kira  dutiyadivase aagantvaa nhatvaa utti.n.no tasmi.m mahaavisaalamaalake naama  padese a.t.thaasi. athassa sariirato udaka.m naabhipadesena ogalitvaa  tena chiddena luddassa sariire pati. taaya sa~n~naaya so mahaasattassa  aagantvaa .thitabhaava.m ~natvaa ta.m passaagata.m puthunaa sallena samappayi  vijjhi. ^b^dukka.takammakaarii^eb^ti tassa mahaasattassa  kaayikacetasikassa dukkhassa uppaadanena dukka.tassa kammassa kaarako.

[03] ^b^ko~ncamanaadii^eb^ti ko~ncanaada.m akari. tassa kira ta.m  salla.m naabhiya.m pavisitvaa pihakaadiini sa~ncu.n.netvaa antaani chinditvaa  pi.t.thibhaaga.m ^a^P5.0050^ea^ pharasunaa padaalenta.m viya uggantvaa  aakaase pakkhandi. bhinnarajatakumbhato rajana.m viya pahaaramukhena  lohita.m pagghari, balavavedanaa uppajji. so vedana.m adhivaasetu.m  asakkonto vedanaappatto sakalapabbata.m ekaninnaada.m karonto tikkhattu.m  mahanta.m ko~ncanaada.m nadi. ^b^sabbe caa^eb^ti tepi sabbe  a.t.thasahassanaagaa ta.m sadda.m sutvaa mara.nabhayabhiitaa ghoraruupa.m ninnadu.m anurava.m  kari.msu. ^b^ra.na.m karontaa^eb^ti tena saddena gantvaa chaddantavaara.na.m  ^a^V5.0044^ea^ vedanaappatta.m disvaa ``paccaamitta.m ga.nhissaamaa''ti ti.na~nca ka.t.tha~nca  cu.n.navicu.n.na.m karontaa samantaa dhaavi.msu.

[03] ^b^vadhissameta^eb^nti ``bhikkhave, so chaddantavaara.no disaa  pakkantesu naagesu subhaddaaya kare.nuyaa passe .thatvaa sandhaaretvaa  samassaasayamaanaaya vedana.m adhivaasetvaa ka.n.dassa aagata.t.thaana.m  sallakkhento `sace ^a^M5.0051^ea^ ida.m puratthimadisaadiihi aagata.m  abhavissa, kumbhaadiihi pavisitvaa pacchimakaayiidiihi nikkhamissa,  ida.m pana naabhiyaa pavisitvaa aakaasa.m pakkhandi, tasmaa pathaviya.m  .thitena vissa.t.tha.m bhavissatii'ti upadhaaretvaa .thita.t.thaana.m upaparikkhitukaamo  ``ko jaanaati, ki.m bhavissati, subhadda.m apanetu.m va.t.tatii''ti cintetvaa  ``bhadde, a.t.thasahassanaagaa mama paccaamitta.m pariyesantaa disaa pakkhandaa,  tva.m idha ki.m karosii''ti vatvaa, ``deva, aha.m tumhe sandhaaretvaa  samassaasentii .thitaa, khamatha me''ti tikkhattu.m padakkhi.na.m katvaa catuusu  .thaanesu vanditvaa taaya aakaasa.m pakkhandaaya naagaraajaa bhuumi.m paadanakhena  pahari, padara.m uppatitvaa gata.m. so chiddena olokento sonuttara.m  disvaa ``vadhissaami na''nti citta.m uppaadetvaa rajatadaamava.n.naso.n.da.m  pavesetvaa paraamasanto buddhaana.m isiina.m dhaja.m kaasaava.m addakkhi. luddo  kaasaava.m mahaasattassa hatthe .thapesi. so ta.m ukkhipitvaa purato .thapesi.  athassa tena tathaaruupenapi dukkhena phu.t.thassa ``arahaddhajo naama  sabbhi pa.n.ditehi avajjharuupo, a~n~nadatthu sakkaatabbo  garukaatabboyevaa''ti aya.m sa~n~naa udapaadi.
[03] so tena saddhi.m sallapanto gaathaadvayamaaha --
[21] ``anikkasaavo kaasaava.m, yo vattha.m paridahissati.
[22] apeto damasaccena, na so kaasaavamarahati..
[21] ``yo ca vantakasaavassa, siilesu susamaahito.
[22] upeto damasaccena, sa ve kaasaavamarahatii''ti..

[03] tassattho -- samma luddaputta yo puriso raagaadiihi kasaavehi  anikkasaavo indriyadamena ceva vaciisaccena ca apeto anupagato tehi  gu.nehi kasaavarasapiita.m kaasaavavattha.m paridahati, so ta.m kaasaava.m  naarahati, naanucchaviko so tassa ^a^P5.0051^ea^ vatthassa. yo  pana tesa.m kasaavaana.m vantattaa ^a^V5.0045^ea^ vantakasaavo assa siilesu susamaahito  supati.t.thito paripu.n.nasiilaacaaro, so ta.m kaasaava.m arahati naamaati.

[03] eva.m vatvaa mahaasatto tasmi.m citta.m nibbaapetvaa ``samma kimattha.m  tva.m ma.m vijjhasi, ki.m attano atthaaya, udaahu a~n~nena  payojitosii''ti pucchi. tamattha.m aaviikaronto satthaa aaha --
[21] ``samappito ^a^M5.0052^ea^ puthusallena naago,  adu.t.thacitto luddakamajjhabhaasi.
[22] kimatthaya.m kissa vaa samma hetu, mama.m vadhii kassa vaaya.m  payogo''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^kimatthaya^eb^nti aayati.m ki.m patthento. ^b^kissa  vaa^eb^ti kissa hetu kena kaara.nena, ki.m naama tava mayaa saddhi.m veranti  adhippaayo. ^b^kassa vaa^eb^ti kassa vaa a~n~nassa aya.m payogo,  kena payojito ma.m avadhiiti attho.
[03] athassa aacikkhanto luddo gaathamaaha --
[21] ``kaasissa ra~n~no mahesii bhadante, saa puujitaa  raajakule subhaddaa.
[22] ta.m addasaa saa ca mama.m asa.msi, dantehi atthoti ca ma.m  avocaa''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^puujitaa^eb^ti aggamahesi.t.thaane .thapetvaa puujitaa.  ^b^addasaa^eb^ti saa kira ta.m supinante addasa. ^b^asa.msii^eb^ti saa  ca mama sakkaara.m kaaretvaa ``himavantapadese evaruupo naama naago  asukasmi.m naama .thaane vasatii''ti mama.m aacikkhi. ^b^dantehii^eb^ti  tassa naagassa chabba.n.nara.msisamujjalaa dantaa, tehi mama attho,  pi.landhana.m kaaretukaamaamhi, te me aaharaati ma.m avocaati.

[03] ta.m sutvaa ``ida.m cuu.lasubhaddaaya kamma''nti ~natvaa mahaasatto  vedana.m adhivaasetvaa ``tassaa mama dantehi attho natthi, ma.m  maaretukaamataaya pana pahi.nii''ti diipento gaathaadvayamaaha --
[21] ``bahuu hime dantayugaa u.laaraa, ye me pituuna~nca  pitaamahaana.m.
[22] jaanaati saa kodhanaa raajaputtii, vadhatthikaa veramakaasi  baalaa..
[21] ``u.t.thehi ^a^V5.0046^ea^ ^a^P5.0052^ea^ tva.m ludda khara.m gahetvaa,  dante ime chinda puraa maraami.
[22] vajjaasi ta.m kodhana.m raajaputti.m, naago hato handa imassa  dantaa''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^M5.0053^ea^ ^b^ime^eb^ti tassa kira pitu  pitaamahaana.m dantaa maa vinassantuuti guhaaya.m sannicitaa, te sandhaaya  evamaaha. ^b^jaanaatii^eb^ti bahuuna.m vaara.naana.m idha sannicihe dante  jaanaati. ^b^vadhatthikaa^eb^ti kevala.m pana saa ma.m maaretukaamaa  appamattaka.m dosa.m hadaye .thapetvaa attano vera.m akaasi, evaruupena  pharusakammena matthaka.m paapesi. ^b^khara^eb^nti kakaca.m. ^b^puraa  maraamii^eb^ti yaava na maraami. ^b^vajjasii^eb^ti vadeyyaasi.  ^b^handa imassa dantaa^eb^ti hato so mayaa naago, manoratho te  matthakappatto, ga.nha, ime tassa dantaati.

[03] so tassa vacana.m sutvaa nisiidana.t.thaanaa vu.t.thaaya kakaca.m aadaaya  ``dante chindissaamii''ti tassa santika.m upagato. so pana  ubbedhato a.t.thaasiitihattho rajatapabbato viya .thito, tenassa so  danta.t.thaana.m na paapu.ni. atha mahaasatto kaaya.m upanaamento he.t.thaasiisako  nipajji. tadaa nesaado mahaasattassa rajatadaamasadisa.m so.n.da.m maddanto  abhiruhitvaa kelaasakuu.te viya kumbhe .thatvaa mukhako.tima.msa.m dhanukena  paharitvaa anto pakkhipitvaa kumbhato oruyha kakaca.m antomukhe  pavesesi, ubhohi hatthehi da.lha.m aparaapara.m ka.d.dhi. mahaasattassa  balavavedanaa uppajji, mukha.m lohitena puuri. nesaado ito cito ca  sa~ncaarento kakacena chinditu.m naasakkhi. atha na.m mahaasatto mukhato  lohita.m cha.d.detvaa vedana.m adhivaasetvaa ``ki.m samma chinditu.m na  sakkosii''ti pucchi. ``aama, saamii''ti. mahaasatto sati.m  paccupa.t.thapetvaa ``tena hi samma mama so.n.da.m ukkhipitvaa kakacako.ti.m  ga.nhaapehi, mama saya.m so.n.da.m ukkhipitu.m bala.m natthii''ti aaha.  nesaado tathaa akaasi.

[03] mahaasatto so.n.daaya kakaca.m gahetvaa aparaapara.m caaresi, dantaa  ka.liiraa viya chijji.msu. atha na.m te aaharaapetvaa ga.nhitvaa ``samma  luddaputta aha.m ime dante tuyha.m dadamaano neva `mayha.m appiyaa'ti  ^a^P5.0053^ea^ dammi, na sakkattamaarattabrahmattaani patthento, imehi  pana me dantehi satagu.nena sahassagu.nena satasahassagu.nena  sabba~n~nuta~n~naa.nadantaava piyataraa, sabba~n~nuta~n~naa.nappa.tivedhaaya me ida.m  pu~n~na.m paccayo hotuu''ti dante datvaa ``samma ida.m .thaana.m kittakena  kaalena aagatosii''ti pucchitvaa ``sattamaasasattadivasaadhikehi sattahi  sa.mvaccharehii''ti vutte -- ``gaccha imesa.m ^a^M5.0054^ea^ dantaana.m  aanubhaavena sattadivasabbhantareyeva baaraa.nasi.m paapu.nissasii''ti vatvaa  tassa paritta.m katvaa ta.m uyyojesi ^a^V5.0047^ea^. uyyojetvaa ca pana anaagatesuyeva  tesu naagesu subhaddaaya ca anaagataaya kaalamakaasi. tamattha.m pakaasento  satthaa aaha --
[21] ``u.t.thaaya so luddo khara.m gahetvaa, chetvaana dantaani  gajuttamassa.
[22] vagguu subhe appa.time pathabyaa, aadaaya pakkaami tato hi  khippa''nti..
[03] tattha ^b^vagguu^eb^ti vilaasavante. ^b^subhe^eb^ti sundare.  ^b^appa.time^eb^ti imissa.m pathaviya.m a~n~nehi dantehi asadiseti.
[03] tasmi.m pakkante te naagaa paccaamitta.m adisvaa aagami.msu. tamattha.m  pakaasento satthaa aaha --
[21] ``bhaya.t.titaa naagavadhena a.t.taa, ye te naagaa a.t.tha disaa  vidhaavu.m.
[22] adisvaana posa.m gajapaccamitta.m, paccaagamu.m yena so  naagaraajaa''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^bhaya.t.titaa^eb^ti mara.nabhayena upaddutaa. ^b^a.t.taa^eb^ti  dukkhitaa. ^b^gajapaccamitta^eb^nti gajassa paccaamitta.m. ^b^yena  so^eb^ti yattha visaalamaalake so naagaraajaa kaala.m katvaa kelaasapabbato  viya patito, ta.m .thaana.m paccaagamunti attho.

[03] tehi ^a^P5.0054^ea^ pana saddhi.m mahaasubhaddaapi aagataa. te  sabbepi a.t.thasahassanaagaa tattha roditvaa kanditvaa mahaasattassa  kulupakaana.m paccekabuddhaana.m santika.m gantvaa, ``bhante, tumhaaka.m  paccayadaayako visapiitena sallena viddho kaalakato,  siivathikadassanamassa aagacchathaa''ti vadi.msu. pa~ncasataa  paccekabuddhaapi aakaasenaagantvaa visaalamaalake otari.msu. tasmi.m kha.ne  dve taru.nanaagaa naagara~n~no sariira.m dantehi ukkhipitvaa paccekabuddhe  vandaapetvaa citaka.m aaropetvaa jhaapayi.msu. paccekabuddhaa sabbaratti.m  aa.laahane ^a^M5.0055^ea^ dhammasajjhaayamaka.msu. a.t.thasahassanaagaa  aa.laahana.m nibbaapetvaa vanditvaa nhatvaa mahaasubhadda.m purato katvaa attano  vasana.t.thaana.m agama.msu. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
[21] ``te tattha kanditvaa roditvaana naagaa, siise sake  pa.msuka.m okiritvaa.
[22] agama.msu te sabbe saka.m niketa.m, purakkhatvaa mahesi.m  sabbabhadda''nti..
[03] tattha ^a^V5.0048^ea^ ^b^pa.msuka^eb^nti aa.laahanapa.msuka.m.
[03] sonuttaropi appatteyeva sattame divase dante aadaaya baaraa.nasi.m  sampaapu.ni. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
[21] ``aadaaya dantaani gajuttamassa, vagguu subhe appa.time  pathabyaa.
[27] suva.n.naraajiihi samantamodare, so luddako kaasipura.m  upaagami.
[22] upanesi so raajaka~n~naaya dante, naago hato handa  imassa dantaa''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^suva.n.naraajiihii^eb^ti suva.n.naraajira.msiihi.  ^b^samantamodare^eb^ti samantato obhaasante sakalavanasa.n.da.m suva.n.nava.n.na.m  viya karonte. ^b^upanesii^eb^ti aha.m chaddantavaara.nassa  chabba.n.nara.msivissajjane yamakadante aadaaya ^a^P5.0055^ea^  aagacchaami, nagara.m ala"nkaaraapethaati deviyaa saasana.m pesetvaa taaya  ra~n~no aarocaapetvaa devanagara.m viya nagare ala"nkaaraapite sonuttaropi  nagara.m pavisitvaa paasaada.m aaruhitvaa dante upanesi, upanetvaa ca pana,  ``ayye, yassa kira tumhe appamattaka.m dosa.m hadaye karittha, so naago  mayaa hato mato, `matabhaava.m me aaroceyyaasii'ti aaha, tassa matabhaava.m  tumhe jaanaatha, ga.nhatha, ime tassa dantaa''ti dante adaasi.

[03] saa mahaasattassa chabba.n.nara.msivicittadante ma.nitaalava.n.tena  gahetvaa uuruusu .thapetvaa purimabhave attano pirasaamikassa dante  olokentii ``evaruupa.m ^a^M5.0056^ea^ sobhaggappatta.m vaara.na.m  visapiitena sallena jiivitakkhaya.m paapetvaa ime dante chinditvaa  sonuttaro aagato''ti mahaasatta.m anussarantii soka.m uppaadetvaa  adhivaasetu.m naasakkhi. athassaa tattheva hadaya.m phali, ta.m divasameva  kaalamakaasi. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
[21] ``disvaana dantaani gajuttamassa, bhattuppiyassa purimaaya  jaatiyaa.
[22] tattheva tassaa hadaya.m aphaali, teneva saa kaalamakaasi  baalaa''ti..
[21] ``sambodhipatto sa mahaanubhaavo, sita.m akaasii  parisaaya majjhe.
[22] pucchi.msu bhikkhuu suvimuttacittaa, naakaara.ne paatukaronti  buddhaa..
[21] ``yamaddasaatha ^a^V5.0049^ea^ dahari.m kumaari.m, kaasaayavattha.m anagaariya.m  caranti.m.
[22] saa kho tadaa raajaka~n~naa ahosi, aha.m tadaa naagaraajaa  ahosi.m..
[21] ``aadaaya dantaani gajuttamassa, vagguu subhe appa.time  pathabyaa.
[22] yo ^a^P5.0056^ea^ luddako kaasipura.m upaagami, so  kho tadaa devadatto ahosi..
[21] ``anaavasuura.m cirarattasa.msita.m, uccaavaca.m caritamida.m  puraa.na.m.
[22] viitaddaro viitasoko visallo, saya.m abhi~n~naaya abhaasi  buddho..
[21] ``aha.m vo tena kaalena, ahosi.m tattha bhikkhavo.
[22] naagaraajaa tadaa homi, eva.m dhaaretha jaataka''nti.. --
[25] imaa ^a^M5.0057^ea^ gaathaa dasabalassa gu.ne  va.n.nentehi dhammasa"ngaahakattherehi .thapitaa.

[03] tattha ^b^sita.m akaasii^eb^ti so sambodhippatto satthaa  mahaanubhaavo ala"nkatadhammasabhaaya.m ala"nkatadhammaasane parisamajjhe  nisinno ekadivasa.m sita.m akaasi. ^b^naakaara.ne^eb^ti ``bhante,  buddhaa naama akaara.ne sita.m na karonti, tumhehi ca sita.m kata.m, kena  nu kho kaara.nena sita.m kata''nti mahaakhii.naasavaa bhikkhuu pucchi.msu.  ^b^yamaddasaathaa^eb^ti eva.m pu.t.tho, aavuso, satthaa attano sitakaara.na.m  aacikkhanto eka.m daharabhikkhuni.m dassetvaa evamaaha -- ``bhikkhave,  ya.m eka.m dahara.m yobbanappatta.m kumaari.m kaasaayavattha.m anagaariya.m upeta.m  pabbajitvaa imasmi.m saasane caranti.m addasaatha passatha, saa tadaa  `visapiitena sallena naagaraaja.m vijjhitvaa vadhehii'''ti sonuttarassa  pesetaa raajaka~n~naa ahosi. tena gantvaa jiivitakkhaya.m paapito aha.m  tadaa so naagaraajaa ahosinti attho. ^b^devadatto^eb^ti, bhikkhave,  idaani devadatto tadaa so luddako ahosi.

[03] ^b^anaavasuura^eb^nti na avasuura.m, anattha"ngatasuuriyanti attho.  ^b^cirarattasa.msita^eb^nti ito ciraratte anekavassako.timatthake sa.msita.m  sa.msarita.m anuci.n.na.m. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- aavuso, ito  anekavassako.timatthake sa.msaritampi pubba.nhe kata.m ta.m divasameva saayanhe  saranto viya attano caritavasena uccattaa taaya raajadhiitaaya ca  sonuttarassa ca caritavasena niicattaa uccaaniica.m carita.m ida.m puraa.na.m  raagaadiina.m daraana.m vigatataaya viitaddaro, ~naatidhanasokaadiina.m abhaavena  viitasoko, raagasallaadiina.m vigatattaa visallo attanaava jaanitvaa buddho  abhaasiiti. ^b^aha.m vo^eb^ti ^a^V5.0050^ea^ ettha ^b^vo^eb^ti nipaatamatta.m,  bhikkhave, aha.m tena kaalena tattha chaddantadahe ahosinti attho.  ^b^naagaraajaa^eb^ti honto ca pana na a~n~no koci tadaa homi, atha  kho naagaraajaa homiiti attho. ^b^eva.m caarethaa^eb^ti tumhe ta.m jaataka.m  eva.m dhaaretha ugga.nhaatha pariyaapu.naathaati.
[03] ima~nca ^a^P5.0057^ea^ pana dhammadesana.m sutvaa bahuu  sotaapannaadayo ahesu.m. saa pana bhikkhunii pacchaa vipassitvaa arahatta.m  pattaati.
[06] chaddantajaatakava.n.nanaa catutthaa.

[03] ^b^rajja~nca^eb^ ^a^M5.0058^ea^ ^b^pa.tipannaasmaa^eb^ti ida.m  satthaa jetavane viharanto pa~n~naapaarami.m aarabbha kathesi. paccuppannavatthu  ^b^mahaauma"ngajaatake^eb^ (jaa0 2.22.590 aadayo) aavi bhavissati.

[03] atiite pana kurura.t.the indapatthanagare dhana~ncayakorabyo naama raajaa  rajja.m kaaresi. tassa sucirato naama braahma.no purohito  atthadhammaanusaasako ahosi. raajaa daanaadiini pu~n~naani karonto  dhammena rajjamanusaasi. so ekadivasa.m dhammayaaga.m naama pa~nha.m  abhisa"nkharitvaa sucirata.m naama braahma.na.m purohita.m aasane nisiidaapetvaa  sakkaara.m katvaa pa~nha.m pucchanto catasso gaathaayo abhaasi --
[21] ``rajja~nca pa.tipannaasma, aadhipacca.m suciirata.
[22] mahatta.m pattumicchaami, vijetu.m pathavi.m ima.m..
[21] ``dhammena no adhammena, adhammo me na ruccati.
[22] kiccova dhammo carito, ra~n~no hoti suciirata..
[21] ``idha cevaaninditaa yena, pecca yena aninditaa.
[22] yasa.m devamanussesu, yena pappomu braahma.na..
[21] ``yoha.m ^a^V5.0051^ea^ attha~nca dhamma~nca, kattumicchaami braahma.na.
[22] ta.m tva.m attha~nca dhamma~nca, braahma.nakkhaahi pucchito''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^rajja^eb^nti, aacariya, maya.m imasmi.m sattayojanike  indapatthanagare rajja~nca, tiyojanasatike kurura.t.the issarabhaavasa"nkhaata.m  aadhipacca~nca. ^b^pa.tipannaasmaa^eb^ti adhigataa bhavaama.  ^b^mahatta^eb^nti idaani mahantabhaava.m. ^b^pattumicchaami vijetu^eb^nti  ima.m pathavi.m dhammena abhibhavitu.m ajjhottharitu.m icchaami.  ^b^kiccovaa^eb^ti avasesajanehi ra~n~no carito dhammo kicco  kara.niiyataro. raajaanuvattako hi loko, so tasmi.m dhammike  sabbopi dhammiko hoti. tasmaa esa dhammo naama ra~n~nova kiccoti.

[03] ^b^idha cevaaninditaa^eb^ti yena maya.m idhaloke paraloke  ^a^P5.0058^ea^ ca aninditaa. ^b^yena pappomuu^eb^ti yena maya.m  nirayaadiisu anibbattitvaa devesu ca manussesu ca yasa.m issariya.m  sobhagga.m paapu.neyyaama, ta.m no kaara.na.m kathehiiti ^a^M5.0059^ea^.  ^b^yoha^eb^nti, braahma.na, yo aha.m phalavipaakasa"nkhaata.m attha~nca tassa  atthassa hetubhuuta.m dhamma~nca kattu.m samaadaaya vattitu.m uppaadetu~nca icchaami.  ^b^ta.m tva^eb^nti tassa mayha.m tva.m sukheneva nibbaanagaamimagga.m aaruyha  apa.tisandhikabhaava.m patthentassa ta.m attha~nca dhamma~nca pucchito akkhaahi,  paaka.ta.m katvaa kathehiiti braahma.na.m dhammayaagapa~nha.m pucchi.

[03] aya.m pana pa~nho gambhiiro buddhavisayo, sabba~n~nubuddhameva ta.m  pucchitu.m yutta.m, tasmi.m asati sabba~n~nuta~n~naa.napariyesaka.m bodhisattanti.  sucirato pana attano abodhisattataaya pa~nha.m kathetu.m naasakkhi,  asakkonto ca pa.n.ditamaana.m akatvaa attano asamatthabhaava.m kathento  gaathamaaha --
[21] ``naa~n~natra vidhuraa raaja, etadakkhaatumarahati.
[22] ya.m tva.m attha~nca dhamma~nca, kattumicchasi khattiyaa''ti..

[03] tassattho -- avisayo esa, mahaaraaja, pa~nho maadisaana.m.  aha~nhi nevassa aadi.m, na pariyosaana.m passaami, andhakaara.m pavi.t.tho  viya homi. baaraa.nasira~n~no pana purohito vidhuro naama braahma.no  atthi, so eta.m aacikkheyya, ta.m .thapetvaa ya.m tva.m attha~nca dhamma~nca  kattumicchasi, eta.m akkhaatu.m na a~n~no arahatiiti.
[03] raajaa ^a^V5.0052^ea^ tassa vacana.m sutvaa ``tena hi, braahma.na, khippa.m tassa  santika.m gacchaahii''ti pa.n.naakaara.m datvaa ta.m pesetukaamo hutvaa gaathamaaha  --
[21] ``ehi kho pahito gaccha, vidhurassa upantika.m.
[27] nikkha~ncima.m suva.n.nassa, hara.m gaccha suciirata.
[22] abhihaara.m ima.m dajjaa, atthadhammaanusi.t.thiyaa''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^upantika^eb^nti santika.m. ^b^nikkha^eb^nti  pa~ncasuva.n.no eko nikkho. aya.m pana rattasuva.n.nassa nikkhasahassa.m  datvaa evamaaha. ^b^ima.m dajjaa^eb^ti tena imasmi.m dhammayaagapa~nhe  kathite tassa atthadhammaanusi.t.thiyaa abhihaarapuuja.m karonto ima.m  nikkhasahassa.m dadeyyaasiiti.

[03] eva~nca ^a^P5.0059^ea^ pana vatvaa pa~nhavissajjanassa  likhanatthaaya satasahassagghanaka.m suva.n.napa.t.ta~nca gamanatthaaya yaana.m,  parivaaratthaaya balakaaya.m, ta~nca pa.n.naakaara.m datvaa ^a^M5.0060^ea^  ta"nkha.na~n~neva uyyojesi. so pana indapatthanagaraa nikkhamitvaa  ujukameva baaraa.nasi.m agantvaa yattha yattha pa.n.ditaa vasanti, sabbaani  taani .thaanaani upasa"nkamitvaa sakalajambudiipe pa~nhassa vissajjetaara.m  alabhitvaa anupubbena baaraa.nasi.m patvaa ekasmi.m .thaane nivaasa.m gahetvaa  katipayehi janehi saddhi.m paataraasabhu~njanavelaaya vidhurassa nivesana.m  gantvaa aagatabhaava.m aarocaapetvaa tena pakkosaapito ta.m sake ghare  bhu~njamaana.m addasa. tamattha.m aavikaronto satthaa sattama.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``svaadhippaagaa bhaaradvaajo, vidhurassa upantika.m.
[22] tamaddasa mahaabrahmaa, asamaana.m sake ghare''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^svaadhippaagaa^eb^ti so bhaaradvaajagotto sucirato  adhippaagaa, gatoti attho. ^b^mahaabrahmaa^eb^ti mahaabraahma.no.  ^b^asamaana^eb^nti bhu~njamaana.m.

[03] so pana tassa baalasahaayako ekaacariyakule uggahitasippo,  tasmaa tena saddhi.m ekato bhu~njitvaa bhattakiccapariyosaane sukhanisinno  ``samma kimattha.m aagatosii''ti pu.t.tho aagamanakaara.na.m aacikkhanto  a.t.thama.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``ra~n~noha.m ^a^V5.0053^ea^ pahito duuto, korabyassa yasassino.
[27] `attha.m dhamma~nca pucchesi', iccabravi yudhi.t.thilo.
[22] ta.m tva.m attha~nca dhamma~nca, vidhurakkhaahi pucchito''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^ra~n~noha^eb^nti aha.m ra~n~no korabyassa yasassino duuto.  ^b^pahito^eb^ti tena pesito idhaagami.m. ^b^pucchesii^eb^ti so  yudhi.t.thilagotto dhana~ncayaraajaa ma.m dhammayaagapa~nha.m naama pucchi, aha.m  kathetu.m asakkonto ``tva.m sakkhissasii''ti ~natvaa tassa aarocesi.m,  so ca pa.n.naakaara.m datvaa pa~nhapucchanatthaaya ma.m tava santika.m pesento  ``vidhurassa santika.m gantvaa imassa pa~nhassa attha~nca paa.lidhamma~nca  puccheyyaasii''ti abravi. ``ta.m tva.m idaani mayaa pucchito  akkhaahii''ti.

[03] tadaa ^a^P5.0060^ea^ pana so braahma.no ``mahaajanassa citta.m  ga.nhissaamii''ti ga"nga.m pidahanto viya vinicchaya.m vicaareti. tassa  pa~nhavissajjane okaaso natthi. so tamattha.m aacikkhanto navama.m  gaathamaaha --
[21] ``ga"nga.m ^a^M5.0061^ea^ me pidahissanti, na ta.m  sakkomi braahma.na.
[27] apidhetu.m mahaasindhu.m, ta.m katha.m so bhavissati.
[22] na te sakkomi akkhaatu.m, attha.m dhamma~nca pucchito''ti..

[03] tassattho -- braahma.na, mayha.m ``mahaajanassa  naanaacittagatisa"nkhaata.m ga"nga.m pidahissa''nti byaapaaro uppanno, tamaha.m  mahaasindhu.m apidhetu.m na sakkomi, tasmaa katha.m so okaaso bhavissati,  yasmaa te aha.m pa~nha.m vissajjeyya.m. iti cittekaggata~nceva okaasa~nca  alabhanto na te sakkomi akkhaatu.m attha.m dhamma~nca pucchitoti.
[03] eva~nca pana vatvaa ``putto me pa.n.dito mayaa ~naa.navantataro,  so te byaakarissati, tassa santika.m gacchaahii''ti vatvaa dasama.m  gaathamaaha --
[21] ``bhadrakaaro ca me putto, oraso mama atrajo.
[22] ta.m tva.m attha~nca dhamma~nca, gantvaa pucchassu braahma.naa''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^oraso^eb^ti ure sa.mva.d.dho. ^b^atrajo^eb^ti attanaa  jaatoti.

[03] ta.m ^a^V5.0054^ea^ sutvaa sucirato vidhurassa gharaa nikkhamitvaa bhadrakaarassa  bhuttapaataraasassa attano parisamajjhe nisinnakaale nivesana.m agamaasi.  tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa ekaadasama.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``svaadhippaagaa bhaaradvaajo, bhadrakaarassupantika.m.
[22] tamaddasa mahaabrahmaa, nisinna.m samhi vesmanii''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^vesmanii^eb^ti ghare.
[03] so tattha gantvaa bhadrakaaramaa.navena kataasanaabhihaarasakkaaro  nisiiditvaa aagamanakaara.na.m pu.t.tho dvaadasama.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``ra~n~noha.m ^a^P5.0061^ea^ pahito duuto, korabyassa  yasassino.
[27] `attha.m dhamma~nca pucchesi', iccabravi yudhi.t.thilo.
[22] ta.m tva.m attha~nca dhamma~nca, bhadrakaara pabruuhi me''ti..

[03] atha na.m bhadrakaaro, ``taata, aha.m imesu divasesu  paradaarikakamme abhinivi.t.tho, citta.m me byaakula.m, tena tyaaha.m vissajjetu.m  na sakkhissaami, mayha.m ^a^M5.0062^ea^ pana kani.t.tho sa~ncayakumaaro  naama mayaa ativiya ~naa.navantataro, ta.m puccha, so te pa~nha.m  vissajjessatii''ti tassa santika.m pesento dve gaathaa abhaasi --
[21] ``ma.msakaaja.m avahaaya, godha.m anupataamaha.m.
[22] na te sakkomi akkhaatu.m, attha.m dhamma~nca pucchito..
[21] ``sa~ncayo naama me bhaataa, kani.t.tho me suciirata.
[22] ta.m tva.m attha~nca dhamma~nca, gantvaa pucchassu braahma.naa''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^ma.msakaaja^eb^nti yathaa naama puriso thuulamigama.msa.m  kaajenaadaaya gacchanto antaraamagge godhapotaka.m disvaa ma.msakaaja.m  cha.d.detvaa ta.m anubandheyya, evameva attano ghare vasavattini.m bhariya.m  cha.d.detvaa parassa rakkhitagopita.m itthi.m anubandhanto homiiti diipento  evamaahaati.
[03] so ^a^V5.0055^ea^ tasmi.m kha.ne sa~ncayassa nivesana.m gantvaa tena katasakkaaro  aagamanakaara.na.m pu.t.tho aacikkhi. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa dve gaathaa  abhaasi --
[21] ``svaadhippaagaa bhaaradvaajo, sa~ncayassa upantika.m.
[22] tamaddasa mahaabrahmaa, nisinna.m samhi vesmani..
[21] ``ra~n~noha.m pahito duuto, korabyassa yasassino.
[27] `attha.m dhamma~nca pucchesi', iccabravi yudhi.t.thilo.
[22] ta.m tva.m attha~nca dhamma~nca, sa~ncayakkhaahi pucchito''ti..

[03] sa~ncayakumaaro pana tadaa paradaarameva sevati. athassa so  ``aha.m, taata, paradaara.m sevaami, sevanto ca pana ga"nga.m otaritvaa  ^a^P5.0062^ea^ paratiira.m gacchaami, ta.m ma.m saaya~nca paato ca nadi.m  taranta.m maccu gilati naama, tena citta.m me byaakula.m, na tyaaha.m  aacikkhitu.m sakkhissaami, kani.t.tho pana me sambhavakumaaro naama  atthi jaatiyaa sattavassiko, mayaa satagu.nena sahassagu.nena  satasahassagu.nenaadhika~naa.nataro, so te aacikkhissati, gaccha ta.m  pucchaahii''ti aaha. imamattha.m pakaasento satthaa dve gaathaa abhaasi --
[21] ``sadaa ^a^M5.0063^ea^ ma.m gilate maccu, saaya.m paato  suciirata.
[22] na te sakkomi akkhaatu.m, attha.m dhamma~nca pucchito..
[21] ``sambhavo naama me bhaataa, kani.t.tho me suciirata.
[22] ta.m tva.m attha~nca dhamma~nca, gantvaa pucchassu braahma.naa''ti..
[03] ta.m sutvaa sucirato ``aya.m pa~nho imasmi.m loke abbhuto  bhavissati, ima.m pa~nha.m vissajjetu.m samattho naama natthi ma~n~ne''ti  cintetvaa dve gaathaa abhaasi --
[21] ``abbhuto vata bho dhammo, naaya.m asmaaka ruccati.
[22] tayo janaa pitaaputtaa, te su pa~n~naaya no viduu..
[21] ``na ^a^V5.0056^ea^ ta.m sakkotha akkhaatu.m, attha.m dhamma~nca pucchitaa.
[22] katha.m nu daharo ja~n~naa, attha.m dhamma~nca pucchito''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^naaya^eb^nti aya.m pa~nhadhammo abbhuto, ima.m kathetu.m  samatthena naama na bhavitabba.m, tasmaa ya.m tva.m ``kumaaro kathessatii''ti  vadati, naaya.m asmaaka.m ruccati. ^b^te suu^eb^ti ettha ^b^su^eb^-kaaro  nipaatamatta.m. ^b^pitaa^eb^ti vidhuro pa.n.dito, puttaa bhadrakaaro sa~ncayo  caati tepi tayo pitaaputtaa pa~n~naaya ima.m dhamma.m no viduu, na  vijaananti, a~n~no ko jaanissatiiti attho. ^b^na ta^eb^nti tumhe  tayo janaa pucchitaa eta.m akkhaatu.m na sakkotha, daharo sattavassiko  kumaaro pucchito katha.m nu ja~n~naa, kena kaara.nena jaanitu.m  sakkhissatiiti attho.

[03] ta.m sutvaa sa~ncayakumaaro, ``taata, sambhavakumaara.m `daharo'ti maa  u~n~naasi, sacepi pa~nhavissajjanenaatthiko, gaccha na.m pucchaa''ti  atthadiipanaahi upamaahi kumaarassa va.n.na.m pakaasento dvaadasa gaathaa  abhaasi --
[21] ``maa ^a^P5.0063^ea^ na.m daharoti u~n~naasi,  apucchitvaana sambhava.m.
[22] pucchitvaa sambhava.m ja~n~naa, attha.m dhamma~nca braahma.na..
[21] ``yathaapi cando vimalo, gaccha.m aakaasadhaatuyaa.
[22] sabbe taaraaga.ne loke, aabhaaya atirocati..
[21] ``evampi ^a^M5.0064^ea^ daharuupeto, pa~n~naayogena  sambhavo.
[27] maa na.m daharoti u~n~naasi, apucchitvaana sambhava.m.
[22] pucchitvaa sambhava.m ja~n~naa, attha.m dhamma~nca braahma.na..
[21] ``yathaapi rammako maaso, gimhaana.m hoti braahma.na.
[22] ateva~n~nehi maasehi, dumapupphehi sobhati..
[21] ``evampi daharuupeto, pa~n~naayogena sambhavo.
[27] maa na.m daharoti u~n~naasi, apucchitvaana sambhava.m.
[22] pucchitvaa sambhava.m ja~n~naa, attha.m dhamma~nca braahma.na..
[21] ``yathaapi ^a^V5.0057^ea^ himavaa brahme, pabbato gandhamaadano.
[27] naanaarukkhehi sa~nchanno, mahaabhuutaga.naalayo.
[22] osadhehi ca dibbehi, disaa bhaati pavaati ca..
[21] ``evampi daharuupeto, pa~n~naayogena sambhavo.
[27] maa na.m daharoti u~n~naasi, apucchitvaana sambhava.m.
[22] pucchitvaa sambhava.m ja~n~naa, attha.m dhamma~nca braahma.na..
[21] ``yathaapi paavako brahme, accimaalii yasassimaa.
[22] jalamaano vane gacche, analo ka.nhavattanii..
[21] ``ghataasano dhuumaketu, uttamaahevanandaho.
[22] nisiithe pabbataggasmi.m, pahuutedho virocati..
[21] ``evampi daharuupeto, pa~n~naayogena sambhavo.
[27] maa na.m daharoti u~n~naasi, apucchitvaana sambhava.m.
[22] pucchitvaa sambhava.m ja~n~naa, attha.m dhamma~nca braahma.na..
[21] ``javena bhadra.m jaananti, balibadda~nca vaahiye.
[22] dohena dhenu.m jaananti, bhaasamaana~nca pa.n.dita.m..
[21] ``evampi daharuupeto, pa~n~naayogena sambhavo.
[27] maa na.m daharoti u~n~naasi, apucchitvaana sambhava.m.
[22] pucchitvaa sambhava.m ja~n~naa, attha.m dhamma~nca braahma.naa''ti..

[03] tattha ^a^M5.0065^ea^ ^b^ja~n~naa^eb^ti jaanissasi.  ^b^cando^eb^ti pu.n.nacando. ^b^vimalo^eb^ti abbhaadimalavirahito.  ^b^evampi daharuupeto^eb^ti eva.m sambhavakumaaro daharabhaavena upetopi  ^a^P5.0064^ea^ pa~n~naayogena sakalajambudiipatale avasese pa.n.dite  atikkamitvaa virocati. ^b^rammako^eb^ti cittamaaso.  ^b^ateva~n~nehii^eb^ti ativiya a~n~nehi ekaadasahi maasehi.  ^b^eva^eb^nti eva.m sambhavopi pa~n~naayogena sobhati. ^b^himavaa^eb^ti  himapaatasamaye himayuttoti himavaa, gimhakaale hima.m vamatiiti himavaa.  sampatta.m ^a^V5.0058^ea^ jana.m gandhena madayatiiti ^b^gandhamaadano.  mahaabhuutaga.naalayo^eb^ti devaga.naana.m nivaaso. ^b^disaa bhaatii^eb^ti  sabbadisaa ekobhaasaa viya karoti. ^b^pavaatii^eb^ti gandhena  sabbadisaa vaayati. ^b^eva^eb^nti eva.m sambhavopi pa~n~naayogena  sabbadisaa bhaati ceva pavaati ca.

[03] ^b^yasassimaa^eb^ti tejasampattiyaa yasassimaa.  ^b^accimaalii^eb^ti acciihi yutto. ^b^jalamaano vane gacche^eb^ti  gacchasa"nkhaate mahaavane jalanto carati. ^b^analo^eb^ti atitto.  gatamaggassa ka.nhabhaavena ^b^ka.nhavattanii^eb^. ya~n~ne aahutivasena aahuta.m  ghata.m asnaatiiti ^b^ghataasano^eb^. dhuumo ketukicca.m assa saadhetiiti  ^b^dhuumaketu. uttamaahevanandaho^eb^ti ahevana.m vuccati vanasa.n.do, uttama.m  vanasa.n.da.m dahatiiti attho. ^b^nisiithe^eb^ti rattibhaage.  ^b^pabbataggasmi^eb^nti pabbatasikhare. ^b^pahuutedho^eb^ti pahuutaindhano.  ^b^virocatii^eb^ti sabbadisaasu obhaasati. ^b^eva^eb^nti eva.m  mama kani.t.tho sambhavakumaaro daharopi pa~n~naayogena virocati.  ^b^bhadra^eb^nti bhadra.m assaajaaniiya.m javasampattiyaa jaananti, na sariirena.  ^b^vaahiye^eb^ti vahitabbabhaare sati bhaaravahataaya ``aha.m uttamo''ti  balibadda.m jaananti. ^b^dohenaa^eb^ti dohasampattiyaa dhenu.m  ``sukhiiraa''ti jaananti. ^b^bhaasamaana^eb^nti ettha ``naabhaasamaana.m  jaananti, missa.m baalehi pa.n.dita''nti sutta.m (sa.m0 ni0  2.241)  aaharitabba.m.

[03] sucirato eva.m tasmi.m sambhava.m va.n.nente ``pa~nha.m pucchitvaa  jaanissaamii''ti ``kaha.m pana te kumaara kani.t.tho''ti pucchi. athassa  so siihapa~njara.m vivaritvaa hattha.m pasaaretvaa ``yo esa paasaadadvaare  antaraviithiyaa kumaarakehi saddhi.m suva.n.nava.n.no kii.lati, aya.m mama  kani.t.tho, upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m puccha, buddhalii.laaya te pa~nha.m kathessatii''ti  aaha. sucirato tassa vacana.m sutvaa ^a^M5.0066^ea^ paasaadaa  oruyha kumaarassa santika.m agamaasi. kaaya velaayaati? kumaarassa  nivatthasaa.taka.m mocetvaa ^a^P5.0065^ea^ khandhe khipitvaa ubhohi  hatthehi pa.msu.m gahetvaa .thitavelaaya. tamattha.m aavikaronto satthaa  gaathamaaha --
[21] ``svaadhippaagaa bhaaradvaajo, sambhavassa upantika.m.
[22] tamaddasa mahaabrahmaa, kii.lamaana.m bahiipure''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^bahiipure^eb^ti bahinivesane.

[03] mahaasattopi braahma.na.m aagantvaa purato .thita.m disvaa ``taata,  kenatthenaagatosii''ti pucchitvaa, ``taata, kumaara aha.m jambudiipatale  aahi.n.danto mayaa pucchita.m pa~nha.m kathetu.m samattha.m alabhitvaa  ^a^V5.0059^ea^ tava santika.m aagatomhii''ti vutte ``sakalajambudiipe kira avinicchito  pa~nho mama santika.m aagato, aha.m ~naa.nena mahallako''ti hirottappa.m  pa.tilabhitvaa hatthagata.m pa.msu.m cha.d.detvaa khandhato saa.taka.m aadaaya nivaasetvaa  ``puccha, braahma.na, buddhalii.laaya te kathessaamii''ti sabba~n~nupavaara.na.m  pavaaresi. tato braahma.no --
[21] ``ra~n~noha.m pahito duuto, korabyassa yasassino.
[27] `attha.m dhamma~nca pucchesi', iccabravi yudhi.t.thilo.
[22] ta.m tva.m attha~nca dhamma~nca, sambhavakkhaahi pucchito''ti..  --
[25] gaathaaya pa~nha.m pucchi.
[03] tassa attho sambhavapa.n.ditassa gaganamajjhe pu.n.nacando viya  paaka.to ahosi.
[03] atha na.m ``tena hi su.nohii''ti vatvaa dhammayaagapa~nha.m  vissajjento gaathamaaha --
[21] ``taggha te ahamakkhissa.m, yathaapi kusalo tathaa.
[22] raajaa ca kho ta.m jaanaati, yadi kaahati vaa na vaa''ti..

[03] tassa antaraviithiya.m .thatvaa madhurassarena dhamma.m desentassa saddo  dvaadasayojanika.m sakalabaaraa.nasinagara.m avatthari. atha raajaa ca  uparaajaadayo ca sabbe sannipati.msu. mahaasatto mahaajanassa majjhe  dhammadesana.m pa.t.thapesi.

[03] tattha ^a^P5.0066^ea^ ^a^M5.0067^ea^ ^b^tagghaa^eb^ti  eka.msavacana.m. ^b^yathaapi kusalo^eb^ti yathaa atikusalo sabba~n~nubuddho  aacikkhati, tathaa te eka.mseneva ahamakkhissanti attho. ^b^raajaa  ca kho ta^eb^nti aha.m ta.m pa~nha.m yathaa tumhaaka.m raajaa jaanitu.m sakkoti,  tathaa kathessaami. tato uttari raajaa eva ta.m jaanaati, yadi  karissati vaa na vaa karissati, karontassa vaa akarontassa vaa  tasseveta.m bhavissati, mayha.m pana doso natthiiti diipeti.
[03] eva.m imaaya gaathaaya pa~nhakathana.m pa.tijaanitvaa idaani  dhammayaagapa~nha.m kathento aaha --
[21] ``ajja ^a^V5.0060^ea^ suveti sa.mseyya, ra~n~naa pu.t.tho suciirata.
[22] maa katvaa avasii raajaa, atthe jaate yudhi.t.thilo..
[21] ``ajjhatta~n~neva sa.mseyya, ra~n~naa pu.t.tho suciirata.
[22] kummagga.m na niveseyya, yathaa muu.lho acetaso..
[21] ``attaana.m naativatteyya, adhamma.m na samaacare.
[22] atitthe nappataareyya, anatthe na yuto siyaa..
[21] ``yo ca etaani .thaanaani, kattu.m jaanaati khattiyo.
[22] sadaa so va.d.dhate raajaa, sukkapakkheva candimaa..
[21] ``~naatiina~nca piyo hoti, mittesu ca virocati.
[22] kaayassa bhedaa sappa~n~no, sagga.m so upapajjatii''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^sa.mseyyaa^eb^ti katheyya. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- taata,  sucirata sace tumhaaka.m ra~n~naa ``ajja daana.m dema, siila.m rakkhaama,  uposathakamma.m karomaa''ti koci pu.t.tho, ``mahaaraaja, ajja taava paa.na.m  hanaama, kaame paribhu~njaama, sura.m pivaama, kusala.m pana karissaama  suve''ti ra~n~no katheyya, tassa atimahantassapi amaccassa vacana.m  katvaa tumhaaka.m raajaa yudhi.t.thilagotto tathaaruupe atthe jaate ta.m divasa.m  pamaadena viitinaamento maa avasi, tassa vacana.m akatvaa uppanna.m  kusalacitta.m aparihaapetvaa kusalapa.tisa.myutta.m kamma.m karotuyeva, idamassa  katheyyaasiiti. eva.m mahaasatto imaaya gaathaaya --
[22] ``ajjeva ^a^M5.0068^ea^ kiccamaatappa.m, ko ja~n~naa  mara.na.m suve''ti.. (ma0 ni0 3.272) --
[25] bhaddekarattasutta~nceva,
[22] ``appamaado amatapada.m, pamaado maccuno pada''nti..  (dha0 pa0 21) --
[25] appamaadovaada~nca kathesi.

[03] ^b^ajjhatta~n~nevaa^eb^ti ^a^V5.0061^ea^, taata, sucirata sambhavapa.n.dito tayaa  dhammayaagapa~nhe pucchite ki.m kathesiiti ra~n~naa pu.t.tho samaano tumhaaka.m  ra~n~no ajjhatta~n~neva sa.mseyya, niyakajjhattasa"nkhaata.m khandhapa~ncaka.m hutvaa  abhaavato aniccanti katheyyaasi. ettaavataa mahaasatto --
[22] ``sabbe sa"nkhaaraa aniccaati, yadaa pa~n~naaya passati''..  (dha0 pa0 277) --
[22] ``aniccaa vata sa"nkhaaraa, uppaadavayadhammino''ti..  (dii0 ni0 2.221) --
[25] eva.m vibhaavita.m aniccata.m kathesiiti.
